27b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar bslab par bya'o// de bas na khyim bdag rnams 'jig rten 'di blang bar mi bya'o// 'jig rten pha rol blang bar mi bya'o zhes khyim bdag rnams de ltar bslab par bya'o// 
27b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag khyed rnams nam mig mi len cing / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi len pa de na khyed rnams mig nas yid kyi bar la mi gnas par 'gyu ro// khyim bdag
27b6(dkon brtsegs): khyed rnams nam gzugs mi len cing / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams mi len pa de na khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams
27b7(dkon brtsegs): nam gzugs kyi phung po mi len cing / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po mi len pa de na khyed rnams 'du byed kyi phung po la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// / 
27b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag khyed rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i phung po la mi len pa de na khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam sa'i khams
28a1(dkon brtsegs): mi len cig / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam pa'i khams mi len pa de na khyed rnams namakha'i khams la mi gnas par 'gyuraro// khyim bdag khyed/ 
28a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len pa den khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam 'jig rten 'di mi len
28a3(dkon brtsegs): cing / 'jig rten pha rol mi len pa de na khyed rnams 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos thams cad mi len pa de na khyed rnams chos
28a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnam sa nam chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de na khyed rnams mi 'byung mi 'jig go// khyed rnams nam mi 'byung mi 'jig/ 
28a5(dkon brtsegs): bden khyed rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang // mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba/ dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yod
28a6(dkon brtsegs): su thar par 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
28a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs so// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba yis// 'jig rten 'di kun kun nas 'bar// byis pa skyabs med gtse ba ste// de dag 'phags pa'i lam las nyams// brgya lam 'jig rten sdang mdzad pa/ 
28a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// dal ba chud sos ma byed pa// brtson 'grus brtan pa rtsom byos shig/ gang la gnas te rnam bsgom pa// shes rab kyi ni de yang ltos// shes
28b1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis ni de mthong ste/ rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gang la gnas te sems bsgom pa// thams cad stong par shes par bya// chos rnams stong par rig nas ni// byang chub nyid kyang stong
28b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang // me gsum de dag shin tu mi bzad pa// des na 'jig rten 'di kun rang 'bar yang // byis pa riganas gnyid log khong mi chud// skye dang
28b3(dkon brtsegs): rga dang na dang 'chi ba dang // smre sngags 'don cing sdug bsngal yid mi bdes// 'jig rten 'di dag gtses par rig nas ni// chos rnams kun la gnas par ma byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan
28b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces dgasol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba rnyed par gyur cig/ 
28b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag tshur shog ces
28b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa dang / de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / de nyid kyis dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// 'di la chos nyid 'di yin te de la
28b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya'o// de dag gis ni ngur smrig dgos// de dag gis ni sgra yang bregs// kun kyang lhung bzed thogs gyur nas// de nyid du ni dgra bcom gyur// ston pas dgra bcom rab mkhyen nas// 
28b8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi ni dge 'dun dang // lha rnams 'dun du mngon sum du// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// 'jig rten gyi ni mgon po la// sngon chad sbyin pa byin pas na// gang na bde ba mang ba der/ shin tu/ 
29a1(dkon brtsegs): / dga' zhing 'ongs par 'gyur// de dag gis ning mthong nas// dad pa rab tu skyes par gyur// de dag sems ni dang ba la// chos rnams kyis ni mchog bstan to// dgra bcom gyi ni gsung thos
29a2(dkon brtsegs): nas// bdag tu lta ba rnam par bshig/ stong nyid mngon du byas nas ni// de dag skye ba kun las grol// khyim bdag gi le'u ste dang po'o// 
29a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bar du khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po mi g.yo ba'i gnas la bkod nas kun nas mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gsheg so// de nas rgyal po'i
29a4(dkon brtsegs): khab kyi grong khyer gyi lha rnams dang / gnod sbyin ji 'jigs 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin dganas 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa bcom ldan 'das la
29a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms dbul lo snyam mo// de nas gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa/ reg
29a6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ gnod sbyin ji 'jigs la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms de bzhes so// bcom ldan 'das la
29a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bsod snyoms phul ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe steng gi bar snang las ji 'jigs kyi 'khor mang po gnod sbyin drug khri brgya stong gis legs so// zhes bya ba byin te rje su yi
29a8(dkon brtsegs): rang po'i sgra phyung ngo // de nas de'i phyir gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi rang gi 'khor rnams la bos te/ bdag gis ni da bzod de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms phul gyis/ nga khyed kyis ni dge
29b1(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig/ de ni khyed rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rnams kyis dge slogage 'dun la bsod snyoms phul nas gnod
29b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang bsod snyoms blangaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa las des bsod snyoms
29b3(dkon brtsegs): blangs par mkhyen nas sa phyogs de nas slar log go// de ltar de'i tshe lha stong phrag du ma dang / klu stong phrag du ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi
29b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
29b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i zha 'bring du dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che ba zhig tu byon nas/ gdan bshams pa la bzhug so// de nas gnod sbyin ji
29b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs 'khor dang bcas pas lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i
29b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
29b8(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bsam pa yang mkhyen/ de'i 'khor gnod sbyin mang po'i bsam pa yang mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos
30a1(dkon brtsegs): / nyid ni 'di yin te nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad bde na zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sgyer po dang / dmar po dang / 
30a2(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid med par byas
30a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das
30a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// kha cig ni phrag par nub po// kha cig/  ni pus mor nub po// chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ nam sangs/ rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems
30a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer zhabs kyi 'og tu nub par 'gyur ro// nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer gnam logasu nub
30a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// nam gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer mdun du nub par 'gyur ro// nam mi rnams la lung ston par de na 'od zer g.yon du nub par 'gyuraro// 
30a7(dkon brtsegs): nam lha rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer g.yas su nub par 'gyur ro// nam nyan thos rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer pus mor nub par 'gyur ro// nam rang sangs rgyas rnams la lung ston
30a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de na 'od zer phrag par nub par 'gyur ro// nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de na 'od zer steng
30b1(dkon brtsegs): gi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su nub par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ mthong nas bdag gis chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ 
30b2(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// ci rgyus 'jig rten
30b3(dkon brtsegs): snang mdzad pa// 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i slang // 'jig rten mgon po 'ong mdzad pa// ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// de ring su yis sa bon btab// de ring
30b4(dkon brtsegs): su la lung yang ston// gang zhig mthar phyin rab tu zhugs// dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa rnams// rgyu ma mchis par/ 'dzum pa mdzad// thub pa ci slang 'dzum pa bstan// 'od
30b5(dkon brtsegs): zer don ni bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar gsungs pa// 'jig rten mgon po
30b6(dkon brtsegs): skyob pa la// ji 'jigs rab tu dang sems kyis// bsod snyoms dag ni phul bas na// de ltar de phyir 'dzum pa mdzad// gnod sbyin 'di nas shi 'phos nas// sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
30b7(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gsum shi 'phos nas// 'thab bral du yang 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab bral nas ni dga' ldan 'gro// 'dod pa 'dod pas dga' byas nas// mi yi nang du skye 'gyur te// rgyal po rdzu 'phrul
30b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur// 'khor los bsgyur ba mi yi dbang // gling bzhi dag gi dbang po ste// mi yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba nyi shur
31a1(dkon brtsegs): // ni/ rtag tu bsti stang byas par 'gyur// lha yi nang dang mi nang du// yang dang yang du kun du 'gro// phyis de rgyal srid bor nas ni// khyim med par yang rab tu byung // rkyen gyis byang chub
31a2(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyur te// de ni mthar yang thug par 'gyur// gnod sbyin dag ni sum khri dag/ gnod sbyin skye gnas 'phos gyur nas// sum cu rtsa gsum skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nA/ 
31a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byams pa mthong gyur cing // de na mthar ni thug 'gyur te// dgra bcom pa yang thob 'gyur na// ston pa la ni su mi mchod// gnod sbyin stong du tshang ba rnams// byang chub mchog la/ 
31a4(dkon brtsegs): rab zhugs pas// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des// nam du'ang dngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// kha cig srog chags kun phan phyir// byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing // sangs rgyas
31a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa stong rnams la// bkur sti dag ni byed par 'gyur// kha cig sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// stong phrag gnyis dang gsum dag kyang // me tog phreng ba dri rnams kyis// 
31a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa dag ni mchod par 'gyur// dag pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can// 'dren pa bye ba phrag stong la// kha cig bkur bsti byed 'gyur te// 'di dag phyis ni byang chub reg/ de nas ji 'jigs
31a7(dkon brtsegs): de yi bu// ri bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul che// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag gyur ces// des kyang sems ni bskyed par 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas bsti stang byas// thams cad du yang smon lam
31a8(dkon brtsegs): btab// nga mthong nas ni mchod byas te// byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed do// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// ngan 'gro thams cad spangs gyur nas// sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni// gdugs
31b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur// gdugs rnams bye ba phul nas ni// na bza' bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur// na bza' bye ba phul nas ni// de nyid du ni rab tu byung // srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// 
31b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing // lo yang lnga brgya tshang bar ni// tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi rnam grangs kyis// sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod// gang+gA'i bye ma ji
31b3(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa// de snyed bskal pa spyod par 'gyur// dper gsungs pa ni de snyed du// de dag khyed kyis shes par gyis// de dag dper yang shes nas ni// de bas lhag par spyad par gyis// sngar ni dper
31b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang spyod pa// gang+gA yi ni bye snyed kyis// bye skyed sangs rgyas mthong gyur nas// de dag kun la bsti stang / byed// e ma'o ye shes e ma shes// e ma'o bla na
31b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems// sems can kun gyi 'dren pa ni// de ltar zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de phyir sems can kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas su yang de 'gyur te// de na de yi
31b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan btags pa// sman pa'i rgyal por rnam par grags// lo ni bye ba bdun cur yang // srog chags rnams la chos bstan te// phyis gdong rkang gnyis gtso bo ni// de nas mya ngan 'das pa
31b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rab tu 'dul ba'i sems rnams kyi// 'dus pa dag ni nyi shur 'gyur// de la tha ma gcig po ni// dge slong bye ba nyi shur 'gyur// 'dus pa rnams ni gang brjod pa// nyan thos dpag tu
31b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste// de yi nyan thos ji snyed pa// byang chub zhugs pa'ang de snyed do// sems can rnams kyi don mdzad nas// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das// lo ni brgya phrag stong dag tu// de yi
32a1(dkon brtsegs): dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bskal pa lnga brgya chang bar ni// sangs rgyas mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa cig la'ang 'byung ba ni// de na stong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// mi
32a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams mkhas pa gang dag ni// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsnyen 'dod pa// tshul bzhin mang du thos pa dang // rab tu 'dun pa nyid du bya// tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par spongs// tshul bzhin la
32a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rtag tu bsgoms// mang du thos par rab tu bya// des ni shes rab rnam par 'phel// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi// rtsa ba'i don ni chos bzhi ste// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang gtor/ 
32a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi ni lam la bzang // bla na med pa'i theg pa mchog byang chub kyi ni lam yang bstan// the tsom gcod pa bzang po yis// nyan thos kyi ni lam bstan to// sems
32a5(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag 'di 'dod pa// de la ngas ni skabs dbye'o// chos rnams kyi ni mchog ston pa// 'jig rten snang mdzad rnyed/ par dka'// de nas gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bo 'di
32a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems par gyur te// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs shes grag gis// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po zhig bskyed do/ 
32a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// de nas gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bos rang gi 'khor la smras pa// grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod phung
32a8(dkon brtsegs): po'i ri la gshegs kyis de la grogs po dag mthu ci yod pa dang / ci nus kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la spro ba bskyed cig/ de nas gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g.yog dang bcas pas
32b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas bzung ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar gyi lam de thams cad bseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma rnams med par byas so// me long gi dkyil
32b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ltar dag par byas so// lam de dag thams cad bsal nas/ spos kyi chus kun du chag chag btab po// lam der gos 'tshams med par bting ngo // lam der mi gang tsam du me tog gis chal bar
32b3(dkon brtsegs): bkang ngo // lam de dag tu gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag gis shin du brgyan to// lam der gdugs dang dam pa'i snying po rab kyi snod nas bdugs so// steng gi bar snang las dar gyi lnga ldi sbyangs
32b4(dkon brtsegs): te shin du brgyan to// lam der sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra 'khrol da par byas so// lam de nas mda' rgyang gang tshun chad tsam da me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs
32b5(dkon brtsegs): shing ngur pa sgra 'byin par byas so// lam de gser brebs pas rab tu g.yog so// lam de gser gyi dra ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi dra bas rab tu g.yog so// de nas gnod
32b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du de lta bu'i bkod pa byas nas/ lus chen po mngon par sprul te/ 'khor dang bcas pas dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' ste mos shing yid bde ba skyes nas
32b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems dang bde ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / rnam par dang ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / rab tu sim pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas la gzhol ba'i sems
32b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos la gzhol ba'i sems dang / dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i sems dang / byang chub las mi g.yo ba'i sems dang / mi bskyod pa'i sems dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang / 
33a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang sto/ 
33a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems dang / snying po'i sems dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / mi phyed pa'i sems dang / ma zhigs pa'i sems dang / nyan
33a3(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad bsgrub pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabras
33a4(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri/ 
33a5(dkon brtsegs): bo thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams mchog/ chos rnams kyi ni dam pa ston// 'jig rten mgon
33a6(dkon brtsegs): la bdag gis ni// bla na ma mchis mchod par bgyis// 'dren pa ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin// stobs bcu dang ni rab ldan te// mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas nas// sems can don rnams bgyid par
33a7(dkon brtsegs): shog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// 'jig rten snang bar byed par shog/ srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// 
33a8(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa'i chos ni rab ston cing // rnam pa bcu gnyis dam pa yi// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog/ rgyal ba ji lta de bzhin du// cho 'phrul rnams ni rab ston cing // srog chags bye ba du ma yi// sems
33b1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi don bgyid shog/ dpa' chen gang rnams ma byon pa// 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad ltar// byang chub dam par ba rtogs nas// lam de rab tu ston par shog/ sems can mdongs pa kun gyi
33b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir// mig dang ldan pa nyid gyur te// gnas dang rten dang skyabs dag dang // de bzhin dpung gnyen 'gyur bar shog// ji ltar 'dren par grol mdzad bzhin// 'gro ba lngar ni skyes pa yi// srog chags
33b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mgon du shog/ bdag gi sdug bsngal kun nas dgrol// 'jig rten na ni mtshungs pa yod min pa// lha dbang lha ma yin dang klus mchod pa// gzi brjid dag ni mtha' yas 'od mdzad pa// 
33b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis mchog la bdag gis mchod pa bgyis// bdag ni lus mchog dam pa 'di dag gis// mi dbangs steng mchog tu gyur pa bzhin// bsod nams rab mchog sum cu gnyis
33b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ldan// chos kyi bdag po de dang 'dra bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ro bo la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs pa/ chos kyis
33b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa rnams kyi phyir// ston pa'i rim gro gang byed pa// sems can rnams kyi mchog yin te// de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'// 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten snang mdzad
33b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog la ni// lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis// mchod pa byas par 'os par 'gyur// byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas nas// shing mchog drung du rab 'dug ste// sdig can bdud las rgyal nas ni// srog
33b8(dkon brtsegs): chags rnams la chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha stong phrag du ma dang // gnod sbyin dang / srin po stong phrag du ma dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang / mi dang
34a1(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / 
34a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen pos 'od zer ni rab tu 'gyed/ zhing ni rab tu g.yo bar byas/ me tog gi char ni rab
34a3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig ni rab tu 'khrol bar byas te/ gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du bkod pa ji ltar mngon par byas pa bzhin du shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyis pad+ma la zha bra/ 
34a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhag ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gdags te byon nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan mchog
34a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gdan dam pa gdan bzang po// 'jig rten gsum po kun la khyad par 'phags pa'i gdan sangs rgyas kyi gdan shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la
34a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la snying rtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i mdo sde
34a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la phan par rab tu bsngags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'chad par 'gyur te/ de'ang sems can thams cad the tsom du gyur pa la rab tu ston pa/ 
34a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom skye ba gcod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chad par 'gyur zhes bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
34b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/ de na lha bye ba drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis ras bcos bu re re de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/ de dag kyang der gdan du gting bar gyur nas/ 
34b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs pa// 'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du
34b3(dkon brtsegs): ni/ lha yi gos rab dam pa mchog/ lha yis rab tu bting ba pa// de la rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs// thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur ma thag/ 'jig rten
34b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug g.yos shing // skye bo rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni ri dang bcas// de na rab tu snang bar gyur// de na chos 'dod rnams la ni// skyob pas sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
34b5(dkon brtsegs): ston// lha dang klu dang mi rnams dang // grum bum yi dgas srul po rnams// de dag gcig gis gcig mthong ste// sgrib pa dag ni med par gyur// lha rnams bye ba phrag stong dang // 
34b6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag ni brgya rnams dag/ rnyed dka' yi ni tshig gsung po// sangs rgyas la ni dga' bas lta// rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang // de tshe blon pos yongs bskor zhing // 'jig rten gyi ni mgon/ 
34b7(dkon brtsegs): po mchog/ sangs rgyas drung du 'ongs par gyur// ston pas lha dang klu rnams dang // mi rnams 'dus par mkhyen pa dang // srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// phyogs bzhi dag tu rab gzigs nas// 'jig rten the
34b8(dkon brtsegs): chom gang yod pa// rkang gnyis mchog la dris shig dang // the tshom dag ni dris pa rnams// rnam par 'dren pa ngas bshad do// de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji
35a1(dkon brtsegs): skye 'dus nas chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis ngal bar shes nas sems can thams cad kyis bsams te phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i phyir rna ba blags te 'dug par gyur to// de nas partsa/ 
35a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu chen po dge slong ma 'dus pa rnams la som la/ ma lhags pa rnams tshol te rgyang ring po na gnas pa
35a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang bsdus shig/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ri'i rgyal po kha ba can gyi lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos bsams te/ bsams nas
35a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la da ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po longs
35a5(dkon brtsegs): shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams dang / lha dang // 
35a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du chos ston te/ ston pas bka' stsal gyis btsun pa 'od srungs bdag cag gnyis kyis chos kyi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dong ngo // de skad
35a7(dkon brtsegs): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po khyod song shig dang / kho bo yang khyod
35a8(dkon brtsegs): song ba'i rjes bzhin du 'ong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos stan de la sprul pa sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ 
35b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po 'khor bzhis bskor cing mdun du bdar nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
35b2(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar 'khor gyi nang du ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen pos sprul pa de mthong nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la
35b3(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ngo // tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po che dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ha cang yang mi rang ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa mthong ste
35b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srung khyod dastan las ga la ba de nas sprul to// sprul nas mgyogs par bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/ spyan sngar ha cang
35b5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa ni myur ba la brten pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan no// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan
35b6(dkon brtsegs): pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs na 'di la kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par
35b7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa lta ci zhig tu 'gyur gnod sbyin ji 'jigs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// bam po gsum pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gro
35b8(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus
36a1(dkon brtsegs): nas zhub lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
36a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
36a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe
36a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dag lags/ ngag
36a5(dkon brtsegs): gi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma thob ma mchis pa dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag padang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las yod
36a6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / lus kyi las ma g.yos pa dang / ngag gi las ma g.yos pa dang / yid kyi las ma g.yos pa rnams lags/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dam bdud kyi
36a7(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha rnams kyi bskyod mi nus pa rnams lags/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa lags/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa dang / rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dren
36a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa dang / sgron mar gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa dang / zam par gyur pa dang / grur gyur pa dang / sgrol ba po dang / pha rol tu 'gro bar gyur pa dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / 
36b1(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen du gyur pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bzlog par mi nus pa rnams lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa'i
36b2(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis don de nyid kun zhus pa/ gang gis byang chub rab zhugs pa// dpa' bo de yi don ci lags// gang gis dam pa 'tshang rgya ba// yonan chos rnams brjod du gsol// srog chags kun la sman slad
36b3(dkon brtsegs): du/ dpa' bo de dag ji ltar spyod// ji lta bu yi chos bsgoms pas// mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// byang chub snying por rab gnas nas// sdig can dag ni ji ltar 'dul// bye ba dag gi zhing bskyod
36b4(dkon brtsegs): nas// ji ltar byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya// byang chub sems dpa' gang gi don// 'di 'dra'i tshig ni ci zhig lags// sangs rgyas chos kyi mchog rnams dang // byang chub dag ni 'dir/ 
36b5(dkon brtsegs): brjod gsol// srog chags kun la sman slad du// pad+ma bzhin du ma chags shing // sems can bye ba grol mdzad par// 'jig rten 'di na ji ltar spyod// mkhas pa lha dang klu dag
36b6(dkon brtsegs): dang // mi dang mi ma lags rnams kyis// ji lta bur ni mchod gyur pa// zhus pa de dag bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA
36b7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang / ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bsam pa phun sum
36b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po de dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to// de nas bcom
37a1(dkon brtsegs): / ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsam pa ji lta bu dang / byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom
37a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu bsam pa zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i phyir snying po'o// brtan pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o// mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ 
37a3(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'o// ma 'khrul pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o// shin du gnas pa'i phyir ma 'khrul pa'o// mi ldog pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'o// sems can la blta ba'i phyir mi bzlog pa'o// snying rje chen
37a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems can la blta ba'o// yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir cho ga shes pa'i phyir yongs su
37a5(dkon brtsegs): mi skyo ba'o// bdag la bde ba ma yin pa'i phyir sems can yod/ su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'o// lan du phan 'dogs/ bar re ba med pa'i phyir bdag bde ba ma yin pa'o// zang zing med
37a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'o// sems can gyi phyir 'brang bas zang zing med pa'o// mthu chung ba'i sems can blta ba'i phyir sems can gyi phyir 'brang ba'o// mgon du gyur pa'i
37a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir mthu chung ba'i sems can la blta ba'o// skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyi phyir mgon du gyur pa'o// ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir skyabs dang dpung gnyen no// shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'i phyir ma
37a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa'o// rtsod pa med pa'i phyir shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'o// bsam pa dge ba'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o// ci yang med pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba'o// shin du yong su dag pa'i phyir ci yang
37b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// rab tu byang bar byas pa'i phyir shin tu yongs su dag pa'o// nang dri ma med pa'i phyir rab tu byang bar byas pa'o// phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu mi byed/ 
37b2(dkon brtsegs): pas snying po zhes bya ba nas phyi shin du yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'i bar du ste bsam pa ni de lta bu'o// byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu zhe na/ sems de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi
37b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzi ba'o// sems de ni theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i phyir 'brel pa med pa'o// sems de ni pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad mi 'phrog pa'i phyir brtan pa'o// sems de ni bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed
37b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// sems de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir rtag dpa'o// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o// sems de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gan
37b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// sems de ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par phigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'o// sems de ni sems can tham
37b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi bsam pa la mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o// sems de ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// sems de ni shes rab kyis snang bar byed pa'i
37b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir dri ma med pa'o// sems de ni sems can thams cad la skabs 'byed pa'i phyir rgya che ba'o// sems de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o// sems de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
37b8(dkon brtsegs): shes la btang ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o// sems de ni snying rje chen po ma bcad pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// sems de ni mkhas pas bsngags pa'i phyir mngon du 'gro bar byas pa'o// 
38a1(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o// sems de ni bde ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi gnas so// sems de ni tshul khrims kyis smon lam las byung
38a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// sems de ni bzod pas bsnyems par dka' ba'o// sems de ni brtson 'grus kyi thul bar dka' ba'o// sems de ni bsam gtan dag gis nye bar zhi ba'o// sems deni shes rab kyi tshogs
38a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnod pa med pa'o// yang sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o// sems de
38a4(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o// sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
38a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// yang shA ri'i bu sems de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems shes bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
38a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi sems de lta bu dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems de ni rgya chen po sems can mchog rab ces bya'o// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad
38a7(dkon brtsegs): las khyad par du gyur pa'i sems can zhes bya'o// lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ lus kyi las
38a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin/ ngag gi las yongs su dag pa yin/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ lus kyi las ma g.yos pa yin/ ngag gi las ma g.yos pa yin/ yid kyi las ma g.yo/ 
38b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa yin/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad
38b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mgos pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mar gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa dang / 
38b3(dkon brtsegs): zam par gyur pa dang / grur gyur pa dang / sgrol bar gyur pa dang / pha rol du 'gro ba dang / gnas dang mgon dang / skyabs dang dpung gnyen no// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las
38b4(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa nga yin no// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
38b5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed nas dad pa yin no// dad pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa yin/ ser sna med cing lhag par gtong ba dang // 
38b6(dkon brtsegs): lag pa brkyang zhing rnam par gtong ba la dga' ba dang / sbyin pa 'ged pa la dga' ba yin/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems yin/ rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrug pa
38b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / de las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mngon par dad pa dang / rab tu rtog cing yid ches pa dang / the tshom med cing som nyi med pa yin no// 
38b8(dkon brtsegs): de nag po dang dkar po'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu mi stong par shes pas srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin te/ de srog gcod pa spong ba yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la
39a1(dkon brtsegs): / log pa g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spong ba yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i
39a2(dkon brtsegs): las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par len cing spyod do// de dad pa dang ldan pas gang dge sbyong dang bram ze dag yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag
39a3(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba
39a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rtsod pa'i smra ba med pa dang / mi snyan par smra ba med pa dang / bsam pa dge zhing mi dge ba'i dbasam pa med pa dang / dge ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / 
39a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spang ba dang / rgod pa med pa dang / khengs pa ma yin pa dang / yab yab po med pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / tshig ma 'dres pa dang / 
39a6(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa de dag dang ji ltar srid par 'dren pa bcad pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / 
39a7(dkon brtsegs): som nyi las brgal ba dang / yang srid pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang de lta bu'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dge ba'i bshes
39a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyen du rig nas de dag la bsnyen cing brten te bsnyen bkur byed cing mgu bar byed kyi yid las byung bar mi byed do// dga' bar byed kyi mi dga' bar mi byed do// des dge ba'i bshes gnyen
39b1(dkon brtsegs): mgu bar byas nas de dag la chos kyis phan 'dogs par byed de/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng stong / yang dag par rab tu dga'
39b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhe
39b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston to// 'di ni sbyin pa/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu/ 'di ni ser sna/ 'di ni sor sna'i 'bras bu/ 'di ni tshul khrims/ 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal
39b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni bzod pa/ 'di ni bzod pa'i rna bar smin pa/ 'di ni gnod sem/ 'di ni gnod sems kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di
39b5(dkon brtsegs): ni brtson 'grus/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni le lo// 'di ni le lo'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni/ bsam gtan/ 'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa/ 
39b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sems g.yeng ba/ 'di ni sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni shes rab/ 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab/ 'di ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin
39b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'di ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni ngag gi
39b8(dkon brtsegs): legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni ngag gi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni ngag gi nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni yid kyi legs par
40a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa/ 'di ni yid kyi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni yid kyi nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni dge ba/ 'di ni mi dge ba/ 'di
40a2(dkon brtsegs): ni bya ba/ 'di ni mi bya ba/ 'di ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur/ 'di ni byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar de la dge ba'i
40a3(dkon brtsegs): ba shes gnyen de dag gis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston te/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ snod du gyur pa yang shes
40a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ zab mo'i gtam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ 'di da lta ste stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam dang / mngon par 'du mi
40a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang / srog med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i
40a6(dkon brtsegs): gtam dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam rab tu ston to// 'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du
40a7(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba/ 
40a8(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
40b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste 'di med na 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di/ 
40b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'di la ni chos gang yang skye ba
40b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'gag pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pa byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/ 'di la chos gang
40b4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'grub pa med pa ldog pa med pa/ rjes su 'jug pa med de/ yang dag pa ma yin pa rmongs pas khams gsum du 'dogs par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i lam dang / sdug bsngal
40b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi lam du 'dogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ma yin pa'irmongs pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa po ma yin no// gang la byed
40b6(dkon brtsegs): pa po med pa de la don dam par bya ba yang mi dmigs te/ de la chos gang yang 'byung ba med 'jig pa med do zhes brjod do// des de lta bu'i chos zab mo thos nas the tshom mi za som nyi med cing
40b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi chags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ ming dang gzugs dang / mig gi
40b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi stong pa'o zhe
41a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas la lta ba las yongs su mi nyams/ chos nyan pa las yongs su mi nyams/ dge 'dun la bsnyen
41a2(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed pa las yongs su mi nyams so// de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas la blta ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 
41a3(dkon brtsegs): bral bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur te/ de dang de dag tu skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// de brtson
41a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas mi 'dod par 'gyur/ bu po dang bu mo 'dod par mi 'gyur/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag mi 'dod par 'gyur// 
41a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung ba thams cad kyi ngor lta ba mi 'dod par 'gyur te/ de skyes nas 'dod pa la ma rtses par na chod/ gzhon nur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa
41a6(dkon brtsegs): la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu byung ngo // dad pas rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs/ dge ba'i bshes
41a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyen la rtog pas dge ba'i bsam pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos rnams nyan cing bsgrub pa'i snying por byed par 'gyur te/ tshig lhur len pa'i blo
41a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bas ngoms par mi 'gyur/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston te/ zang zing med pa'i sems
41b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa mi re zhing rang gi tshig yongs su mi spong bar gzhan la chos ston te/ ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan la chos ston to// chos
41b2(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa rnams la byams pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen por 'jug par 'gyur ro// de mang du thos pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur/ 'dod pa nyung zhing
41b3(dkon brtsegs): chog shes par 'gyur/ rab tu dben pa dang nges par 'gyur/ gso sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / dgon pa la dga' ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog pa dang / don la rton gyi
41b4(dkon brtsegs): yi ge la mi rton pa yin/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du/ bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rten du gyur pa dang / bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir zhugs pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams
41b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi phyir 'di lta ste theg pa chen po bla na med pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags
41b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol lo// bag yod pa lhur byed par 'gyur te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dbang po yang dag par sdom pa'o// de la dbang po yang dag par sdom pa gang zhe na/ 
41b7(dkon brtsegs): gang mig gis gzugs mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin mngon rtags su mi 'dzin/ gzugs la chags pa dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// / 
41b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rna bas sgra dang / snas dri dang / lho ro dang / lus kyi reg bya dang / yid kyis chos shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin/ chos rnams la chags pa dang / nyes
42a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'don pag yod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu dag yod pa zhes bya ba ni gang bdag gi sems dul ba dang / gzhan gyi
42a2(dkon brtsegs): sems bsrung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba spong ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba
42a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / chags pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / zhe sdang gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / gti mug go mi
42a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod dpa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa mi 'byung ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa
42a5(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa mi 'byung ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ba de ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
42a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu sbyor ba ni gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes so// de la ci yod ci med na yang dag pa la rab tu sbyor ba la
42a7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do// log pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med do// las kyi rnam par smin pa ni yod do// gang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa de ni med
42a8(dkon brtsegs): do// gzhan yang mig ni yod de/ gang gi mig de ni med do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yod do// gang gi yid de ni med do// gzhan yang gzugs mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
42b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do// gzugs rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / ther zug pa dang / de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
42b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / brtan pa
42b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / ther zug pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do// gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod kyi/ ma rig pa med na 'du byed med
42b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar du yod kyi/ skye ba med na rga shi med do// gzhan yang sbyin pa las longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do// / 
42b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do// 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni med do// thos pa/ sa shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// 'chal ba'i shes
42b6(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni med do// bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// bsgoms pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas kun du
42b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba ni yod do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'bral ba ni med do// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub yod do// le lo can la ni byang chub med do// nga rgyal
42b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa la ni rab tu byung bar lung bstan pa yod do// nga rgyal can la ni mya ngan las 'da' ba med do// gzhan yang thams cad du song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do// 'di ni bdag dang sems can dang srog
43a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag go zhes bya ba ni med do// de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa ni gang yod par 'jig rten gyi
43a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni yod do zhes 'dogs so// gang med par 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni med do zhes 'dogs so// de yod ces tha snyad du 'dogs
43a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang yang dag par shes par mi byed/ med ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la yang yang dag par shes par mi byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i yang dag
43a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don kyang khong du chud do// chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus te/ chos kyi mdo bzhir 'dus par byas so// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'du byed thams
43a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las// 'das pa zhi ba'o// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya ba
43a6(dkon brtsegs): ni rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtag par 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni bde bar 'du shes pa'i
43a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi bde bar 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba ni bdag tu 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bdag
43a8(dkon brtsegs): tu 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes bya ba ni dmigs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa phyin ci log tu
43b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes thos nas shin tu mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug go// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o zhes thos nas
43b2(dkon brtsegs): smon lam dang bral ba bskyed do// chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes thos nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgom mo// mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes thos nas
43b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par byed de/ dus ma yin par ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i chos la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge
43b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos las yongs su mi nyams te/ myur du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' la brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
43b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gyis mi
43b6(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i chos bcu la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tsom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de bzhin
43b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad
43b8(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes bskyed do// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad pa nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed pa'i bar
44a1(dkon brtsegs): / du'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
44a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshe
44a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste
44a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
44a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin/ gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa / rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon
44a6(dkon brtsegs): par dad yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams kyi
44a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson 'grus cher rtsom zhing mi zhum mi 'gong mi skyo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po ma thob kyi bar du/ lus kyi lpags pa dang / rgyus pa
44a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / pri dang / dbugs dang / rus pa dag lta zhog la lus kyi sha dang / khrag khams kyang bla'i brtson 'grus nyams par mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pas mos pa'i byang chub
44b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams la mngon par dang yod ches rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed do// 
44b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas sku ni bsam mi khyad// chos kyi sku yis rab tu che// mtshan ma mang
44b3(dkon brtsegs): cing snang med na// rgyal ba'i thugs sras dang par byed// 'gro ba tha dad ji snyed kyi// sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa// thams cad du ni chos sgrogs te// sangs rgyas kyi ni spyod yul dang // ji tsam sems
44b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi// dus gsum dag gi dbang po kun// sang ngas rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen te// bsam mi khyab la rab tu dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od mtha' yas// 'od zer dra ba
44b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa// thams cad kyi ni phyogs su khyab// thub pa'i tshul khrims 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rten chos la mi gnas te/ rdzu
44b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul rkang pa bsam yas la// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dang // sangs rgyas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ rnam par thar pa bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni// sems can
44b7(dkon brtsegs): kun gyis shes mi nus// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med la// gang gi stobs kyis shes 'gyur ba// drang srong chen po'i ye shes stobs// na mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa// sems can gcig gi don phyir/ 
44b8(dkon brtsegs): yang // bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par// 'dul ba'i don la bzhugs pas na// de dag snying rje de 'dra'o// sems can thams cad gzhan dang gzhan// dri ba rgya mtsho 'dri byed kyang // dris lan
45a1(dkon brtsegs): / gcig gis tshim byed do// mi 'jigs pa ni bsam mi khyab// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa// chos rnams thams cad thugs su chud// sangs rgyas chos rnams ma 'dres pa// thams
45a2(dkon brtsegs): cad du ni ye shes gzigs// dad pa la ni rab gnas pas// sangs rgyas kun chos chos nyid rnams// bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag la// de dag thams cad dad par byed// shA ri'i bu ji ltar byang chub
45a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs par rnyed
45a4(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o// / 
45a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste mi gtsang ba dang / 'chil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / bsnabs dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / bral ba rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag
45a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyus pa las rnam par grol ba'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ yongs su dag pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'o// 'di lta ste/ 
45a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mgos pa'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / bsod nams
45a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
45b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yon+dan thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin
45b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku ni yongs su dag pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / chu la zla ba snang ba lta bu'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni na mkha'i dbyings su yang
45b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'du zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa thams cad las log par zad pa'o// 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i
45b4(dkon brtsegs): sku ni 'dus byas thams cad dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' lta bu'i sku'o// mnyam pa med pa'i sku'o// 'ji dag rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i
45b5(dkon brtsegs): sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dpe med pa/ zla med pa mtshungs pa med pa'i sku ste/ dag pa dri ma med pa kun nas/ nyon mongs pa med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de ni
45b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phye ma'i mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ da ltar byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye ba dang / rus dang / rigs kyi rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma
45b7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ mtshan gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dpe byad bzang pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sems kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ yid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ lta bas
45b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba ma yin/ thos pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dran pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye mched
46a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gnas pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'jig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 
46a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dor bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ nges par 'byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ spyod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ kha dog gis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rtags kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dbyibs
46a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'ongs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'gro bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ tshul khrims yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 
46a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol bas rab tu daphye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong / pa yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid kyis
46a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid mi mthun pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ stobasu sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mi
46a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rab tu phye ba ma yin/ snying rje chen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
46a7(dkon brtsegs): pabasgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur skye ba'i sku'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las byung / 
46a8(dkon brtsegs): drug ci su rtso// mi 'khrugs pa'i sku'o// rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku'o// mi gnas pa'i sku'o// mi bsnyems pa'i sku'o// gnas pa dang rab tu gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku'o// gzugs med pa
46b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o// tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o// byung ba ma yin/ 
46b2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu byung ba ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin pa'i sku'o// rmad du byung ba rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sku'o// mig las byung ba ma yin/ gzugasu gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ rna ba la
46b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin/ sgrar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ snas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/ drir gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ lces bskyed pa ma yin/ ror gtogs pa
46b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ lus dang ldan pa ma yin/ reg byar gtogs pa ma yin// phyi rol ma yin/ sems la 'jug pa ma yin/ yid la 'jug pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa ma
46b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ ldog pa ma yin/ rjes su 'jug pa ma yin/ gnas pa dang mi g.yo ba thob pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa na ma khA dang
46b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i sku ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ 
46b7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' te/ bde bar gshegs pa de skad ces gsungs nas/ 
46b8(dkon brtsegs): ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med par// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam spyod cing // las rnams gsum ni shin tu yongs dag par// mtshungs
47a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa bar gshegs pa'i sku tshol lo// phyogs bcu 'gro bkun la byams pa dang / snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas sbyin pa byin// 'dod la log par g.yem
47a2(dkon brtsegs): brtag slong zhing // namapa' lta bu'i mchog gi sku tshol lo// gser ltar dag cing mdzes pa'i gos rnams ni// dngag tu med pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed// sbyin po'i pha rol byin par baspyod cing / 
47a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sras kyi 'jig rten mchog la phul// g.yag gi rnga ma bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung // yan lag nyid lag bcad kyang dgra la bzod// brtson 'gru kyi ni pha rol phyin spyod cing / 
47a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sku la smon pa yongs mi skye// shes rab thabs dag rgya cher bsam gtan pa// bsam gtan spyod yul dag nga rgyal rnam par lta// chos dbyings dam pa bde bar gshegs
47a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku// de 'drar bdag gyur zhes ni de la smon// srid par 'gro ba dag tu dge byed cing // mi mchog gis ni byang chub mtshungs med thob// dag pa dri med gtsang zhing rdul
47a6(dkon brtsegs): grol ba// na mkha' 'dra ba yangs pa'i sku thob bo// rang bzhin stong ste bdag dang sems can bral// mtshan ma med cing sgra dang bral ba thob// mig gi yul kun las ni rab 'das pa// de
47a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i sku ni thub pas yang dag thob// bzod ma nas stong ma byas ma byung ba// gzugs dang sgra bral yid kyang rnam dag pa// de bzhin gshegs sku mi g.yo gang thob pa// des ni phyogs bcu'i
47a8(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa mthong // ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa sna tshogs lus// rta dang glang po bud med skyes pa'i gzugs// byis pa srub brdzun zhing phyin ci log/ de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la lta bar
47b1(dkon brtsegs): byos// gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang // ma byon rgyal ba de bzhin gang snang dag/ chos nyid gcig gyur mnyam pa med pa'i sku// chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing na mkha' 'dra// / 
47b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu
47b3(dkon brtsegs): ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi
47b4(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di ltarade shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa na 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir
47b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra byung ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jigarten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed mod kyi/ shA
47b6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas dge slong gi 'khor la ni 'di bshad/ dge slong ma'i 'khor la ni 'di/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor la ni 'di/ bram ze'i 'khor la ni 'di/ rgyal
47b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi 'khor la ni 'di/ khyim bdag gi 'khor la ni 'di/ lha'i 'khor la ni 'di/ tshangs pa'i 'khor la ni/ 'di lta ste mdo sde gang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung
47b8(dkon brtsegs): du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshig su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / rtog pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi snga
48a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmang du byung ba chos kyi sde dang / brtan pa dbab pa bstan pa'i sdernams bshad bar bya'o rnam du la dgongs mod kyi/ 
48a2(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang shA ri'i bu 'khor ji ltar 'dus par gyur pa tshangs pa'i 'khor rdzi bar du 'dus par gyur pa de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa ci 'dra ba dang / sems can de dgo la chos kyi mdo ji lta bur thos pa
48a3(dkon brtsegs): bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi mdo thos par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar yang dag par shes kyang / chos bstan pa de cig la gcig nges pa'i tshig gnod par
48a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'ang med de thams cad kyang rang gi chos rnam par rig brar kun shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam
48a5(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa las mngon par grub pa bden pa'i rjesu 'brang bar 'jug go// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni 'jam par 'byung / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid
48a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / snyan pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / shes par 'os pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi blang ba dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems
48a7(dkon brtsegs): sim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba bskyed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / gsal zhing 'thad pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba
48a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / seng ge'i skad kyi drag shul gyi nga ro'i sgra dang / sprin gyi sgra dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / mi 'am ci'i glu dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka'i
48b1(dkon brtsegs): nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang / rnga'i sgra dbyangs dang / dpal dang ldan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / zur phyin pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
48b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad du grags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yon tan dpag tu med pa dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin
48b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs 'byung ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
48b4(dkon brtsegs): dad / yid ches rab tu rtog the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te de la 'di skad
48b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// tshangs pa yi ni sgra dbyangs su// 'dren pa gsung sgra rab 'byin te// tshangs rnams la ni tshom parabyed// 'di 'dra'i chos ni phun sum tshogs// de yi dbyangs ni
48b6(dkon brtsegs): byams dang ldan// snying rje las ni yang dag 'byung // btang snyoms dang ni gang ldan pa// thub pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu byung // srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags me// zhe sdang dug ni zhi byed cing // 
48b7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug mun pa sel ba ste// phun sum tshogs dbyangs 'di 'dra'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams na// mir gyur pa yi skad ni mtha' yas pa// kun na de yi sgra rnams sna tshogs pa// 
48b8(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs 'di thos nas rje su rtogs par 'gyur// sa bla dang ni de bzhin par snang lha// de dag ci 'dra'i skad la 'jug pa ltar// de phyir thub dbang dbyangs ni rab bzhugs te// rnam par nges thos mya ngan
49a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das reg 'gyur// nang gnyis dag dang rkang bzhi rnams dang ni// nang mangs dag dang gang pa med pa rnams// thams cad la ni de yi sgra ngas 'jug/ bskur
49a2(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu 'chos shing tshar gcod byed// stong gsum 'di yi sgra rnams ji snyed pa// tha ma dang ni 'bring dang de bzhin rab// de dag rjesu 'jug dbyangs de sgrogs te// 'dul ba'i sems can thar pa
49a3(dkon brtsegs): reg par byed// rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog ste// bzung ba dang ni bcings las byung ma yin// mnyam par bzhag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa 'chang // sems can thos nas nyon mongs zhi
49a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun sgra/ sbyin thos tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa dag/ mtha' yas sgra ni sems can thos byed de// de bzhin gshegs par
49a5(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs ni de 'dra'o// dbyangs kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa// de yi dbyangs kyi tshad ni yod med de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas dad cing // de bzhin
49a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i dbyangs la the tshom med// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / 
49a7(dkon brtsegs): yid ches rab tu rtog the tshom mi za thos nas rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa la
49a8(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa'i ye shes gzigs par 'jug ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas dad pas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyib du du shes bskyed do// de bzhin
49b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu yong su brtag par bzung ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtsa dang / 
49b2(dkon brtsegs): shing gi yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / chung ngu na sor bzhi'i tshad tsam yas chad ji snyed yod pa/ skyes bu la la zhig gis de dag gcig tu spungs te/ gcig tu spungs nas mes
49b3(dkon brtsegs): bsregs te/ tshig par gyur nas thal bar byas so// thal bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po ga na yod pa de dag tu drugs te/ lo stong du
49b4(dkon brtsegs): dkrugs kyang / shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dro bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen po
49b5(dkon brtsegs): de dang de dag nas thal ba de dag blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi/ khams de dang de dag du 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che/ ge mo zhig gi shing 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o// 'di ni
49b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing che ge mo zhig gis rtsa ba dang / che ge mo zhig gi sdong po dang / che ge mo zhig yal ga dang / che ge mo zhig gi lo ma dang / che ge mo zhig gi
49b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu'i thal ba'o// 'di ni phyogs che ge mo zhig gi 'dab ma 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu 'byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos dbyings
49b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhog gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu mkhyen nas rgyas par byas te/ de ltar shA
50a1(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// de ltar mthu che ba'o// 'di ltar dbang che bar
50a2(dkon brtsegs): grags pa ste/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dang / yid ches rab tu rtog cing de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa de
50a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te/ de shin
50a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems bskyed dpa gcig kyang chung mi za'o// shA ri'i bu khyod la dper bya ste 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpes bshad pa'i
50a5(dkon brtsegs): don rnams kun shes te/ 'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la tshe lo rgya sa 'tshe ba zhig gis skra'i rtse mo bye babargyar brtsal bas chu'i thig pa blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs
50a6(dkon brtsegs): nas phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces kye go'u ta ma bdag gis chu thigs pa 'di khyod la bdams kyis/ nam bdag la dgos par gyur pa de na slar byin cig ces zer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
50a7(dkon brtsegs): pas de blangs te/ de'i chu'i rgyun gyis bdas te 'dres nas lhan cig tu mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// de nas skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa de lo brgya lon pa dang ngag la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas
50a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces go'u ta ma bdag go chu'i thigs pa de dgos kyis bdag la byin cig ces zer na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ye shes yod de/ ye shes
50b1(dkon brtsegs): de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar brtsal bas chu'i thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres par
50b2(dkon brtsegs): blangs te skyes bu de la slar byin no// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bstan to// de gang gi don du blta zhe na/ 'di lta ste shA ri'i bu skyes bu'i chu'i thogs pa de bzhin
50b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i lag tu gzhag pa yun ring po zhig lon yang chud mi za ba de bzhin du shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu la dang / 
50b4(dkon brtsegs): yid ches rab tu rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dmigs nas de'i phyir na mkha' la me tog 'thor ba de dag
50b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' ma ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu
50b6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs te/ rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems cig bskyed pa yang chung mi za'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// 
50b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang rnam par shes pa ma mchis par 'jug pa ma mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ni ma
50b8(dkon brtsegs): yin no// bcom ldan 'das ye shes ni gang lags/ rnam par shes pa ni gang lags/ shA ri'i bu 'di bzhi ni rnam par shes pa'i gnas te rnam par shes pa de la gnas so// 
51a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste rnam par shes pa gzugs la nye bar song zhing gnas/ gzugs la dmigs/ gzugs la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas
51a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur pa dang / rnam par shes pa gzugs tshor ba la nye bar song zhing gnas/ tshor ba la dmigs/ tshor ba la gnas/ dga' ba la brten nas/ skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba
51a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa 'du shes la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du shes la dmigs/ 'du shes la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas/ skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / 
51a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa 'du byed la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du byed/ la dmigs/ 'du byed la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas/ skye zhing 'phel nas rgyas par 'gyur te/ shA
51a5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang len pa'i phung lnga la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongasu shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam
51a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes
51a7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// gang khams bzhi la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi khams kun tu dbye ba shes pa 'di ni ye shes shes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba
51a8(dkon brtsegs): ni gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam par rig pa dang / rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnam par rig pa dang / snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnam par rig pa dang / lces shes par bya/ 
51b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ro rnam par rig pa dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig pa dang / yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnam par rig pa ste 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang nang
51b2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ste/ ye shes kyi phyir 'brang zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa las skyes so// 
51b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa ni yid la byed pa las skyes so// rnam par shes pa ni yongasu rtog pa la skye ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang 'dzin pa med pas bsnyems pa dang / dmigs
51b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med rnam par rig pa med cing mi rtog pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos la rnam de par shes pa gnas shing / gang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i
51b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni ye shes shes bya'o// gzhan
51b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gang skye ba dang / 'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gnas pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu 'di ni
51b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa 'di ni ye shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la mngon par dang yid ches rab tu
51b8(dkon brtsegs): rtog the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa snyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di
52a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gsungs so// ji ltar gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma dpag med pa// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi lha rnams ni// de dag skyes bu la las med
52a2(dkon brtsegs): bsregs thal bar byas// l-i ni brgya stong ngag du rgya mtshor dkrugs pa rnams// de 'dra ba yi stobs bcu ye shes phra mnga' bas// thal ba blangs nas 'gro ba dag la lung ston pa// ning
