52a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab 'byams dag gi shing rigs 'di// de tshig thal ba 'di zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen// 'di ltar phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul// thams cad rdul du byas nas
52a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rnams ston te// de dag thams cad bgang yang chags dmed the tshom med// de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes na mkha' bzhin// ji snyed ye shes phyogs bcu
52a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud// gang dag 'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang gti mug ldan// spyod pa kun gyi tshul shes bsam pa rnams dang ni// gang gis blangs nyams
52a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis thar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen// 'jig rten mchog stobs bcu rnams kyi ye shes ni// ji snyed phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbying su rab bzhugs kyang // 'dren pa rnams la rtog dang rnam
52a7(dkon brtsegs): bar rtog mi 'byung / bde gshegs sras po dang ba rgyal la dad pa byed// bam po ban pa// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na
52a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa chom mi za/ rgya tshor
52b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs pas de
52b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas/ lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger mdzad do// de 'di lta ste dper na sprin med pa'i
52b3(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' la nyi ma mngon par shar nas/ lham me lhan ne/ lhang nge ba bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / stong
52b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon pa ngar gshegs nas/ lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger mdzadad do// shA ri'i bu srin bu me khyer gyi 'od de bas ni gang
52b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'odagasal/ shin tu rgya che'o// 'bru mar gyi mar me'i
52b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ong de bas ni rtsig pa chen po'i 'od ni shin tu 'phags/ shin tu mchog pa nas shin tu rgya che ba'i bar du'o// gang rtsig pa chen po'i 'od de bas ni/ me'i phung po chen po'i 'od gang
52b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / sman dang skar ma'i 'od gang yin pa'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od dang / gzhal med khang dang / 
52b8(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
53a1(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi lha rnams kyi rab dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i
53a2(dkon brtsegs): mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin
53a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bzang / shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa
53a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs chenadagyi lha rnams kyi 'od kyang rgyas par byas te/ 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / 
53a5(dkon brtsegs): dge rgyas kyi bar dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 
53a6(dkon brtsegs): gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong gi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi 'od dang / gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi
53a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin tu mchog/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / 
53a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'od bas ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin tu bzang / shin
53b1(dkon brtsegs): tu mchog/ shin tu 'dog dang ldan/ shin tu 'od gsal/ shin tu rgya che'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / ting nge
53b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// de ltar shA ril
53b3(dkon brtsegs): ga tso stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od rab tu btags pa gdags pas btags pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu
53b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de 'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi nang du gser tha mal pa bzhagangan snag tsha'i gar bu bzhin du 'gyur te/ lham mer mi 'gyur
53b5(dkon brtsegs): lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni 'od du gdags pas btags pa ji snyed yod pa
53b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na lham mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// 'od gsal bar mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
53b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ bla na med pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma tsa ba'i 'od las kyi rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa'i
53b8(dkon brtsegs): 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas shin tu rgyas par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi snang ba yang mi 'byung / nyin mor yang mi shes
54a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mor yang mi shes/ zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig par yang mi shes/ dus dang lor yang mi shes mod kyi/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pas
54a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'od 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na/ 'jig rten
54a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams grangs med pa 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa ste/ shA
54a4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu don de nyid rab tu rtog par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan to// shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul ji snyed pa thams cad
54a5(dkon brtsegs): rdul phra rab tu byas nas rdul de dag thu bar blugs te/ shar/ phyogasu song nas rdul phra mo ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ rdul phra rab gnyis bor zhing
54a6(dkon brtsegs): shar phyogasu song na shA ri'i bu rdul phra rab de thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni zad pa med do// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang
54a7(dkon brtsegs): nas phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'o// shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi mtha' dang mu bzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi
54a8(dkon brtsegs): nus so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams
54b1(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na ji tsam du btags pas gdags pas btags pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na rgya'i char
54b2(dkon brtsegs): yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam
54b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od la ni rtsig pa 'am/ shing ngam/ ljon pa 'am/ khor yug gi ri 'am/ khor yug chen po 'am/ ri spos kyi
54b4(dkon brtsegs): nga ldang ngam/ ri btang bzung ngam/ ri btang bzung / chen po 'am/ gangs ri 'am/ ri gnye' shinga'adzin tam/ de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po 'am/ 
54b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i rgyal po ri rab bam/ gang gis kyang sgrib par mi nus te/ de dag thams cad las thal nas stong gsu gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas
54b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams mos par mi 'gyur te/ de la sems can la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'dom gang tsam du mthong ngo // de bas rgya che ba de dag gis
54b7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'od 'dom do tsam du mthong ngo // de bas shin tu rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'ong rgyang grags tsam du mthong ba nas/ gang de bas kyang shin tu rgya chen pos ni 'od stong gsum gyi stong chen po
54b8(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyi bar du mthong ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu stong phrag brgya'i tshangs pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du 'od kyis khyab par mthong ste rgyas par bya'o// sa thob pa'i byang
55a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i bar du khyab par mthong ngo // de ltar shA ri'i bu na mkha'i khams ci
55a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la thugs brtsa ba'i phyir/ de tsam du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do// de byang chub sems dpas thos nas the tshom
55a3(dkon brtsegs): med/ som nyi mi mngon par dad yid ches rab tu rtog/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// 'di la chos nyid 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad
55a4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od gang dang // brgya byin tshangs 'od gang yod dang // 'og min bar gyi 'od rnams kyis// bcu drug char yang mi bod ngo // 'og min gyi ni 'od rnams
55a5(dkon brtsegs): dang // gang rnams stong gsum khyab gyur pas/ sangs rgyas spu yi 'od zer gyi// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// nam mkha' dag ni ji tsam par// de tsam
55a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyis khyab byed pa// blo gros rgya chen sems can gyis// de 'dra bar ni 'od mthong ngo // sangs rgyas 'od ni mtha' yas te// na mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam pa// ji ltar 'dul bar
55a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur rnams kyis// de 'dra bar ni 'od mthong ngo // ji ltar skyes bu dmus long gis// nyi ma'i 'od ni de 'dra ba// ma mthong bas ni 'od de la// 'od ni yod pa min zhes smra// de bzhin sems/ 
55a8(dkon brtsegs): can dman pa gang // rgyal ba'i 'od ni mi mthong ste// ma mthong bas na rgyal ba yi// 'od ni yod pa min zhes zer// la las 'domado tsam du mthong // la las rgyang grags dpag tshad dang // 
55b1(dkon brtsegs): la las stong gsum thams cad du// 'od kyis khyab par gyur par mthong // sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang // bcu pa la ni gang gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che// sa chen/ 
55b2(dkon brtsegs): la ni gang gnas pa// de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od// mtha' yas dkyil 'khor 'jug byed cing // bsam yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas dag gi bya ba byed// de
55b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar sangs rgyas bsam yas te// sangs rgyas 'od zer bsam mi khyab// bsam mi khyab la dang byas nas// bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na de bzhin
55b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrim das bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad yid ches rab tu rtog the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed
55b5(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'iting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad yid
55b6(dkon brtsegs): ches rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshor dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang dag par smra bas smra ba tshul khrims yong su dag pa'i sems can 'jig rten du byung ste/ 
55b7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi las yong su dag pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi las yongasasu dag pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi las yong su dag pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten du byung zhing skyes nas 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma
55b8(dkon brtsegs): gos pa/ bram ze sdig pa spangs pa/ dge sbyong zhi ba bsam gtan pa'i mchog/ ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i sems can 'jig rten du byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
56a1(dkon brtsegs): yin par yang dag par smrab sgo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / 
56a2(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong du bcas pa dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skyes dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
56a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas ltar tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa tshad med pa de lta bu ngas ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang
56a4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son dpa'o// shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i dpe tsam nyan par
56a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge sbyong dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams te dpe tsam
56a6(dkon brtsegs): bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das las 'di ltar thos pa de bzhin du 'dzin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni 'di lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni 'di lags so// 
56a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ sems can gyi khams dang / sa'i khams gang mang / gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis
56a8(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi sa'i khams ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// shA ri'i
56b1(dkon brtsegs): bu de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu sems can gyi khams rab tu mang gi sa'i khams ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed sgo nga las
56b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa 'am/ mngal las skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ brdzus te skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 
56b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams ji tsam sems can du gdags pas btags pa de thams cad yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ skad cig
56b4(dkon brtsegs): thang cig yud tsam cig gis snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob pa ra gyur la/ shA ri'i bu mir gyur pa'i sems can de dedag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis snga
56b5(dkon brtsegs): byiphyi med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur zhing / yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re
56b6(dkon brtsegs): res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang dbu stong stong du gyur/ dbu re re la yang zhal stong
56b7(dkon brtsegs): stong du gyur/ zhal re re la yang ljags stong stong du gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin
56b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / chags pa med pa sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pas
57a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsngags pa brjod kyang de
57a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de ni de 'dra ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yang mi zangad / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spobs
57a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bla na med pa yang mi zad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad de'i bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i
57a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa bla na med pa dang / de gnyis ni tshad med grangs med pa dang / de gnyis ni tshad
57a5(dkon brtsegs): med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs so// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta zhog la/ 
57a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi
57a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud
57a8(dkon brtsegs): tsotsam cig gis mi'i lus thob par gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i bar du gong ma bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ 
57b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab dang spobs pa bla na med pa dang / de gnyis tshad med grangs med
57b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o// shA ri'i
57b3(dkon brtsegs): bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dpe tsam du byas pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das las thos nas de
57b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus na da lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod 'di lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
57b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de'i dus de'i tshod 'byung ste/ nyi ma bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar/ kun 'bar/ kun tu
57b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa de'i phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag
57b7(dkon brtsegs): gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba de'i sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bcu gang zhe na/ sa phyogs de lag mthil ltar
57b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos dang po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu
58a1(dkon brtsegs): mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal
58a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sa phyogs de gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing mtho bar gyur pa'i gzug su 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i
58a3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ 
58a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs dade de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu longs spyod pa'i phyir yang sa shing mnyam par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo
58a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gsum po 'di dang ldan par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mchod cing 'bar te/ 
58a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der rtswa sngo ba 'khyil ba 'jam pa/ 
58a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba/ ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 
58a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'tshed cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshog pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs
58b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu grang ba yang ba/ 'jam pa dang rnyog pa med pa/ rab tu dang ba/ 'thung 'dod
58b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mang du 'thungs kyang nang du mi 'gyur ba dang / yan lag 'di brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar rma dang rmad kyi chos lnga pa 'di dang ldan
58b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de
58b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs som/ bzhug sra sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der/ de bzhin ga sha dgas pa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas rab tu bsil
58b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rlung ldang ba de 'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu sos ka nyi ma/ tsha bas gdungs pa'i dus na/ skyes bu la la zhig gang gA'i klung du zhugs nas lus bsil bar byas te/ rims
58b6(dkon brtsegs): dang snyoms pa thams cad zhi bar byas nas gang gA'i klung nas byung zhing slar byung nas 'chag cing 'gro ba las ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na nags stug po yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 
58b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma grib ma stug po dang ldan pa chen po zhig mthong nas de nags stug po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin pa dang / nags stug po'i dbus na khri'i steng du phyar bu bting ba/ be'u ras kyis
58b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs pa/ ka tsa lin da'i gding ba gting ba/ de'i steng dar gyis g.yogs pa/ ya thog ma thog tu sngas dmar po bshams pa zhig mthong nas de de la 'dug go/ de de la 'dug ste
59a1(dkon brtsegs): 'greng zhing phyogs bzhi kun nas bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bus phyogs der bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus
59a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos drug pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig/ 
59a3(dkon brtsegs): tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der chu las skyes pa'i me tog/ ut+pa la dang / pad+ma
59a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bdun po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi/ 
59a5(dkon brtsegs): khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing / 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshog pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ 
59a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der thang las skyes pa'i me tog 'di lta ste/ a d+hi mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / pa ri sha ka dang / mya
59a7(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'tshang dang / skya snar dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / ta ra ni dang / ko ta ra ni la sogs pa thang las skyes pa'i me tog sna tshogs kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa 'byung bar
59a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bus phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos brgyad pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu
59b1(dkon brtsegs): mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa
59b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs de sra zhing mi shigs pa/ sa gzhir rdo rjer 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos dgu pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu stong gsum
59b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lam me/ rab tu lam me/ kun tu rab tu lam me/ 'bar kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas
59b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bco dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chag gam/ dbazhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs
59b5(dkon brtsegs): der lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze ra bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
59b6(dkon brtsegs): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
59b7(dkon brtsegs): cho kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te/ de rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la gcig tu bde bar so
59b8(dkon brtsegs): so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du zhugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su
60a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bri ba med par ngas bshad do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms gcig gis bskal par gnas sam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong
60a2(dkon brtsegs): ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag brgya 'am/ bskal pa bye ba 'am/ bskal pa bye ba brgya 'am/ bskal pa bye ba stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya 'am/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
60a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang bzhugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gi
60a4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin dgashegs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ de ltar mthu che/ ba/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o// 'di lta ste dper na
60a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lha'i bu skyes pa de dmigs pa gcig la gan sa pa'i rnam par shes pas bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du
60a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste/ bsam gtan gyis tshe'i mtha' 'chi ba'i dus ma byas kyi bar du rnam par shes pa de las rnam par shes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shA ri'i bu gang gi nub mo de bzhin
60a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya
60a8(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa med/ sos 'gyur ba med/ sems rgyu ba med/ sems rnam par rgyu ba med/ sems rab tu rgyu ba med/ 
60b1(dkon brtsegs): sems rgyas pa med/ sems kyi 'dren pa med/ sems kyi g.yeng ba med/ sems mtho ba med/ sems dma' ba med/ sems kun tu bsrung ba med/ sems sbed pa med/ sems tshim
60b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ sems mi mthun pa med/ sems 'dud pa med/ sems g.yo ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar byed pa med/ sems zhum pa med/ sems rtog pa med/ sems rnam par
60b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med/ sems yongs su rtog pa med/ sems can gyi rje su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med/ sems mig la gnas pa med/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la
60b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med/ gzugs la gnas pa med/ sems sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos lag nus pa med/ sems chos la 'jug pa med/ sems rnam
60b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa la 'jug pa med/ sems 'das pa la yang / mi lta/ sems ma 'ongs pa la yang mi lta/ sems da ltar byung ba la yang mi lta ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin
60b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas sems las chos gang yang bsal ba med mod kyi/ lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
60b7(dkon brtsegs): la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong bar 'jug go/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral mod kyi gnas kyang mi 'dor te/ lhun
60b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pa de skad gsungs nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // 
61a1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med cing gzhal yas par// sngon gyi srid pa'i 'gro bar byang chub spyod spyad tshe// tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting nge 'dzin bag yod dang // 
61a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dag kyang byang chub mchog phyir 'dren pas sgoms// rgyal ba'i rtog dang 'bras bu dge ba 'di 'dra bas// tshul khrims shin tu yongs dag 'jig rten kun gyi mchog/ ji ltar na mkha' dri
61a3(dkon brtsegs): med rnam shes spros med ltar// stobs bcu tshul khrims dri ma med pa na mkha' bzhin// gang gi nub mo rgyal bas dang po byang chub rtogs// gang gi nub mo tha mar mya ngan 'das gshegs tshe// 
61a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu rnams la sems rgyu rab tu rgyu ba med// de bzhin dbasam gtan ting 'dzin nyams pa nam yang med// stobs bcu rnams kyi tshul khrims phung po nyams med de/ 
61a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul stobs dang rnam thar nyams pa'i char 'gyur med/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du sems ni gcig gi gnas// 'dren pa la ni rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med// 'dren pa
61a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rnam rtog spyod yul na mkha' 'dra// dus gsum dag la sangs rgyas ye shes thogs med 'jug/ stobs bcu rnams la sems yid rnam par rgyu ba dang // rtog dang gtong ba med par
61a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sras rnams dang // da ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa
61a8(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi meng/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na bya
61b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi
61b2(dkon brtsegs): za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad
61b3(dkon brtsegs): du gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni nga'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na mchog go zhes gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul de la 'jal zhing yongasu dpyod/ 
61b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul la yang 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod do// gzhal te yongasu dpyad na byang chub sems dad pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong ngo // 
61b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la gzhal zhing yongs su dpyad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la 'jal zhing / yongasu dpyod do// gzhal te yongasu dpyad nas de bzhin
61b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po
61b7(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yongasu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir rgya cher brtson 'grus rtsom mo// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te/ dpe tsam
61b8(dkon brtsegs): du bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa las khyod nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod 'di lag so// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi
62a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te dpe bshad na dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das las de thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin par
62a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ do phyir shA ri bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas tshi dang ldan
62a3(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ gnas brtan mau dgal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba
62a4(dkon brtsegs): yin nam/ gsol pa/ dge slong nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na 'di ltar gnas brtan mo dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni mchog go zhes bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum
62a5(dkon brtsegs): du thos te/ mngon sum du gzung ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten rgya khams 'di nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po mo dgal gyi bus
62a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po lta bus 'di lta ste dper na bu ram shing gi shing stug po 'am/ 'dam bu stug po 'am/ 'od ma stug po 'am/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing bzhin du gang bar gyur la/ de ltar
62a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dus pa'i nyan thos kyi tshogs de lta bus mthu dang brtson 'grus thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi
62a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char yang / grangs
62b1(dkon brtsegs): su yang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par
62b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ni rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi dam par pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shA ri'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sa 'di la yungs dkar gyi 'bru cig bzhag na de bzhin gshegs pas
62b3(dkon brtsegs): yungs dkar gyi 'bru bzhag pa de yang / de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyi mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi
62b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs thams cad bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bzhi dag pa'i yungs dkar gyi 'bru skra'i rtse mo cig tsam yang bskyed par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de
62b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'o// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen
62b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta zhog la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed yod pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang
62b7(dkon brtsegs): 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji tsam sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skyes pa
62b8(dkon brtsegs): nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi sems can de dag thams cad yongasu brtag pa gzung ste/ nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di lta ste dper na maud dgal gyi bu chen po lta bur gyur la/ 
63a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de lta bus nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyi stobs dang / mthu dang / drug shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams
63a2(dkon brtsegs): cad bstan kyang yungs 'bru yang gdeg par mi nus/ za na skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang bskyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu
63a3(dkon brtsegs): byin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
63a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i dbu khyod kyis nam 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i dus kyi tsher gyur pa de na kun tu 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ rlung de langs
63a5(dkon brtsegs): pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri kho ra khor yug gi dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dang / gling chen po bzhi
63a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gling brgyad khri dang / ri chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po yang dpag tshad srid du mngon par 'phen cing rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur ba khyod kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/ bdag gis bac+doMs
63a7(dkon brtsegs): las mngon su du thos te mngon sum du gzung ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nam 'jig pa'i rlung 'byung ba de na kun tu 'jom pa chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
63a8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas/ khor yug dang bcas/ ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dpag tshad brgyar mngon par 'phen zhing rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad nyis brgya dang / dpag
63b1(dkon brtsegs): tshad sum brgya dang / dpag tshad bzhi brgya dang / dpag tshad lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad stong dang / dpag tshad nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bzhi stong dang / lnga stong du mngon par
63b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phen zhing rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad stong phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang por mngon par 'phen zhing rab tu 'thor te/ de dag gi rdul yang
63b3(dkon brtsegs): mi snang na/ ri dang rdo rnams lta ci smos/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang dkrugs bcom/ rab tu gtor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na gzhal med khang rnams lta ci smos/ 
63b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang / tshangs pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge
63b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi bar du de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o// ji ltar 'thab bral gyi dkrugs bcom rab tu gtor te/ dkrugs bcom rab tu gtor ba de dag
63b6(dkon brtsegs): gi rdul yang mi snang na gzhal med khang dang ra ba rnams lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu gal te de lta bu'i rlung langs kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yos
63b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus na chos gos sam/ chos gos kyi grwa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu
63b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan no// shA ri'i bu gal te 'di lta bu'i rlung gi
64a1(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs 'tshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi
64a2(dkon brtsegs): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rlung mngon par ldang yang / shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo'i rtse mos bzlog kyang
64a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs bri ba yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam
64a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad/ yid ches rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ da rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas de mtshar dang
64a5(dkon brtsegs): rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// khams gsum sems can
64a6(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa// gnas brtan mo dgal bu bzhin du// rdzu 'phrul pha rol byin pa yi// nyan thos mkhas pa kun gyur pas// rdzu 'phrul thams cad rab bstan kyang // de bzhin gshegs pas sa
64a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la// yungs dkar gyi ni 'bru gzhag pa// g.yo bar bya bar mi nus so// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// gang+gA'i klung ni bye ma snyed// rnam par rlung dang kun 'jom pa// rlung rnams
64a8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur langs par gyur// de lta bu yi rlung chen des// thams cad gzigs pa'i chos gos kyi// mtha' ma skra yi rtse tsam yang // g.yo bar bya bar mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i spu gcig
64b1(dkon brtsegs): gis// rlung de rab tu bzlog par mdzad// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra ba// mtha' yas pa ni na mkha' bzhin// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
64b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad yid ches pa nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gsheb
64b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ so mo nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar
64b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshen pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ni bcu po 'di da gra ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu
64b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i
64b6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gnas dgra ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa du ma dang mos pa sna
64b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam
64b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba mkhyen
65a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mngon du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag
65a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du yang
65a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par sang+ge'i sgra sgrogs shing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyi mche ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin
65a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa sa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs
65a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnas kyang gan su gnas nangal gan ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// de la gnas gang gnas ma yin gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang lus kyis nyes
65a6(dkon brtsegs): par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ongs pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do// gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / 
65a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis nyes pa spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas te skabs yod do// / 
65a8(dkon brtsegs): gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gi legs par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong
65b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do// gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyang ba'i rnam par smin pa 'dod
65b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med/ gang ser snas longs
65b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang ser snas dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang sbyin
65b4(dkon brtsegs): pas dbul por 'gyur ba de na gnas ma yin no// gang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing
65b5(dkon brtsegs): skabs med de gang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis lha dang / mir skye ba rnyed pa de ni gnas pa ma yin no// gang 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
65b6(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
65b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang tshul khrims kyis lha dang / mir skye ba thob pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med
65b8(dkon brtsegs): de gnod sems kyis gzugs mdzes pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang gnod sems kyis gzugs mi sdug pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni ga sa yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin
66a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing skabs med de gang bzod pas gzugs mi sdug pa mngon par grub de ni gnas ma yin no// gang bzod pas gzugs mdzes pa mngon par grub pa de ni gnas yin
66a2(dkon brtsegs): te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang le los 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang le los 'thob pa dang / mngon
66a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ra bu gnas ma yan ta skabs yang nga// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang brtson 'grus kyis 'thob pa dang
66a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sems g.yeng bas nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur
66a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang sems g.yengs pas nges par gyur pa la mi 'jug pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang
66a6(dkon brtsegs): sems rtse gcig pa nges par gyur pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang sems rtse gcig pa nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// 
66a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'chal pa'i shes rab
66a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang shes rab kyis
66b1(dkon brtsegs): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms
66b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang zag srog gcod pa'i rgyus tshe rings por 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin no// 
66b3(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang zag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang
66b4(dkon brtsegs): zag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag/ tshe ring bar 'gyur bu de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// 
66b5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ma/ byin par len pa'i skyes bu gang zag longs spyod chen po rnyed ba de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu ma byin par len
66b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skyes bu gang zag dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// yang shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang ma byin pa len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag dbul por 'gyur ba de
66b7(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas ma yin no// gang ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang 'dod
66b8(dkon brtsegs): pa la log par g.yem pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla med pa rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang shA ri'i bu 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla yod pa rnyed pa
67a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla
67a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla med pa rnyed pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// gong ma
67a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sbyar te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gsum po de dag bstan pa de bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thams cad la'ang bya'o// gang brdzun smra ba des skur pa 'thob par mi
67a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang brdzun smra ba spangs pas skur pa thob pa ru 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang thob par mi 'gyur ba
67a5(dkon brtsegs): don gnas so// gang bram zer bas mi phyed pa'i g.yog/ rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang phra ma spangs pas g.yog
67a6(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang g.yog mi byed po de na gnas so// gang tshig rtsub po smra bas rtag par yid du 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang yid du mi 'ong ba
67a7(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang tshig rtsub po spangs pas yid du mi 'ongs pa thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang yid du 'ong ba thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang tshig
67a8(dkon brtsegs): kyal pa smra bas shin tu gdon mi za ba'i spobs par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang tshig kyal par smra ba spangs pas shin tu gdon mi za ba'i spobs par mi
67b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang shin tu gdon mi za ba'i spobs par 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang brnab sems can longs spyod rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// 
67b2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'gyur ba de ni gnas so// gang brnab sems spangs pa longs spyod rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang gnod sems can sems can
67b3(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar mi 'gro ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'gro ba ni gnas so// gang gnod sems spangs pa de 'gro ris kyi 'jig rten du mi 'gro ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'gro ba ni gnas so// shA
67b4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang log par lta// pa'i skyes bu gang zag log par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus lam rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu/ 
67b5(dkon brtsegs): gang log par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag log par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus lam mi rnyed pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gang yang dag par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag yang dag
67b6(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyu sa 'phags pa'i lam mi rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do// yang shA ri'i bu yang dag par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag yang dag par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus 'phags pa'i
67b7(dkon brtsegs): lam rnyed pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// gang mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems gnas par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang tshul khrims yongasu
67b8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i sems gnas par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang dmigs par lta bas rje su 'thun pa'i bzod par 'thob pa de ni gnas ma yin no// gang
68a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang stong pa nyid la mos pas rjesu 'thun pa'i bzod pa mi 'thob pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'thob par 'gyur ba ni
68a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// gang 'gyod pa la gnas pa'i sems shin tu byung ba rjesu thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'thob pa ni gnas so// gang kun tu dkris te 'dug pa'i sems las sems shin
68a3(dkon brtsegs): tu byang bar 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bud med 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang skyes bur 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang
68a4(dkon brtsegs): bud med lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang skyes bur 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bud med tshangs dab dbang byed du 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang skyes bur/ 
68a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang bud med sangs rgyasu 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang bud med kyi lus bsgyur nas sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas so// 
68a6(dkon brtsegs): gang skyes bu gang zag brgyad pa 'bras bu ma thob par ldang ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang 'bras bu thob nas ldang ba ni gnas so// gang rgyun tu zhugs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par bsgrub pa ni gnas ma
68a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gang phung po de nyid kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba srid pa gsum pa mngon par bsgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang phung po de nyid kyi yongasu mya ngan
68a8(dkon brtsegs): 'da' ba ni gnas so// gang phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir 'ong ba ni gnas ma yin no// gang de nyid du yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba ni gnas so// gang dag bcom pa mtshams sbyor ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba
68b1(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas ma yin no// gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang 'phags pa'i gang zag ston pa gzhan tshol ba 'am/ rgyal mtshan gzhan bzung nas spyod pa ni gnas ma yin no// lha gzhan med par
68b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni gnas so// gang mi skye ba la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir ldog pa ni gnas ma yin no// gang byang chub rje su 'thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas so// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing
68b3(dkon brtsegs): skabs med de byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas par ldang ba de ni gnas ma yin no// gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bla na
68b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ldang ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod ngo // shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang de
68b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba snang ba de/ ni gnas ma yin no// gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad
68b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bcom pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do// gang sangs rgyas bcom
68b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes thogs pa med pa ni gnas yin te skabs song ngo // shA ri'i du gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor la las bltar mthong ba don
68b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin no// gang sas rgyas bcom ldan las rnams kyi gtsug gter bgAr mi bang bani gnas yin rten pas med do// shA buganas ma yini nang nabs med da nga bzhin sa shim
69a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang spyod pa snang ba ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa mi snang ba ni gnas yin te skabs
69a2(dkon brtsegs): yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas
69a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam par gzhag pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bden pa'i tshig 'byung ba de ni
69a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin no// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ldog par mi gsung zhing gzhan ma yin par gsung ba ni gnas yi na te/ skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing
69a5(dkon brtsegs): skabs med do// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrul pa dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrul pa med de/ 
69a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig mi 'khrul pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams
69a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par bya ste/ shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa dang sgrib par bcas pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa'i bar du de
69a8(dkon brtsegs): niganas ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar gyi dus la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do// de ltar shA ri'i bu
69b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med do// 'di ltar shA ri'i de bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
69b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med de/ shA ri'i bu gang na mkha'i ma 'gro pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi
69b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas nas gnas ma len la byed kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi
69b4(dkon brtsegs): med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangasadapa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar
69b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad/ gsung ngo // ji ltar phyogs bcu'i na mkha' tshad medamatha' yas pa/ de bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas dang gnas
69b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin mkhyen mtha' yas// / 'gro ba'i gnas dang gnas min de bzhin rab mkhyen nas// ston pa chos mchog rgya chen yang dag rab tu 'chad// mi gang thar pa dag gis lam gyi snod gyur
69b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ston pas de dag spyod pa mkhyen nas chos kyang 'chad// sems can gang dag snod du gyur pa ma yin pa// gnas dang gnas min rig nas de dag btang snyoms 'jog/ nam mkha' 'di
69b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yos sa la 'bras bu byung ba ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas min gzhan mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pa las 'jig rten 'das pa stobs bcu ldan// yon tan mchog 'chang
70a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ye shes bsam mi khyab// shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de
70a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa 'am/ brgya byin nam/ 
70a3(dkon brtsegs): sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la
70a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las len pa rnam par
70a5(dkon brtsegs): smin pa gnas dang rgyu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ 'di la sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
70a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa'i las len pa dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ mi dge ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen
70a7(dkon brtsegs): to// las len pa gang mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ dge ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang
70a8(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la brten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na khyad par la bsten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin
70b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na khyad par du brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la bsten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// 
70b2(dkon brtsegs): las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na dman pa la brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyad par du bsten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// la len pa gang da ltar gyi dus
70b3(dkon brtsegs): na yang dman pa la brten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dman pa la brten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na yang khyad par du
70b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang khyad par du bsten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang 'das pa'i dus na sbyor ba dman la ma 'ongs pa'i
70b5(dkon brtsegs): dus na sbyor ba rgya chen por 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang rtsom pa chungal khyad par chen por 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs
70b6(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang rtsom pa che la khyad par chung ngur 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang nyan thos su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa
70b7(dkon brtsegs): de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang sangs rgyas su
70b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar sdug sa la 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par smin pa bde ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu
71a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar bde ba la ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang
71a2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar yang sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa na yang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// las len pa gang da ltar yang bde la ma 'ongs pa na yang rnam
71a3(dkon brtsegs): par smin te/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus na sems can thams cad kyi las gang dang / rgyu gang dang / 
71a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa gang de bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / gzhan ma yin par bsten/ pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// 
71a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs/ pa chos ston to// de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
71a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyis las len pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / gnas gang yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med do// 'di lta
71a7(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na shA ri'i bu na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de yang mtha' yas mu med do// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin
71a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin
71b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i las rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang yid ches rab tu rtog som nyi med the tshom mi za rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed na nam
71b2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes bskyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu dang smin la mkhas
71b3(dkon brtsegs): spyan ldan las rnams kun gyi bsgrub pa mkhyen// dus gsum la ni rgyal ba chags pa med// sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// 'gro ba lnga yis sems can thams cad kyi// bde dang
71b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal rgyu ni gang 'gyur dang // 'jug pa gang dag sdug bsnga/ la rgyur 'gyur ba// de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen// dkar nag las rnams kyi ni rnam smin dang // rgyu
71b5(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam smin ji ltar 'gyur ba yang // de dag de bzhin gar ni gas pas rab mkhyen te// phyag gi 'thil na yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// las gang rnam sman chung ngu'i rgyu dag/ 
71b6(dkon brtsegs): las// 'bras bu dag ni tshad med 'byin pa dang // tshad med gang dag chung ngu'i rgyur 'gyur ba// de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// nyan thos nyid du 'bras bu smin 'gyur dang / 
71b7(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal byang chub rgyur ni gang 'gyur dang // bla med ye shes stobs ni sbyin 'gyur ba// de dag ma lus bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen// las kyi rgyu gang sdug bsngal smin byed dang // las kyi
71b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gang bde ba sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal 'bras bu bya ba thams cad mkhyen// sdug bsngal rgyus ni sdug bsngal nyid gnas dang // bde ba'i rgyus kyang bde ba nyid gnas dang // las kyi rang
72a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rang bzhin ma yin pa/ rgyu ldan bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad kyi// dus gsum sdug bsngal bgrod pa
72a2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'jug pa// nyams med de nyid de bzhin gzhan min par// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
72a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs gnyis pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du/ seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ 
72a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa gang gis kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa ru ma bskor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// / bam po lnga pa// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de
72a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs papo du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi mos pa du ma dang / mos pa
72a6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// skyes bu gang zag gang 'dod chags la gnas shing / zhe sdang la mos pa'ang rgyas par bya ste/ gti mug la gnas shing / 
72a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag gang mi dge ba la gnas shing mi dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mkhyen to// 
72a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing rgya chen po la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag gang sbyor ba rgya che ba dman pa la mos pa de
72b1(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing khyad par la gnas shing 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
72b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis khyad par la sbyor ba dman pa gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos
72b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la gang gis log pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges par
72b4(dkon brtsegs): khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegasadapas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos dpa gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i rnam par grol pa
72b5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis 'dod pa'i kham su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de
72b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis gzugs kyi kham su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
72b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis gzugs med pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis khams
72b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis dman pa la sten cing dman pa nyid gnon pa dang / khyad par la
73a1(dkon brtsegs): sten cing khyad par la gnon pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis khyad par du song nas dman pa la
73a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis skye ba tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / yong su long spyod tha dad pa rab tu
73a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis rtse mo las nyams par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa
73a4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mos pa gang gis rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen
73a5(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stong gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang / 
73a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas/ mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom
73a7(dkon brtsegs): mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya
73a8(dkon brtsegs): cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tsha tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// 'jig rten 'di mos sna tshogs dang // de bzhin blo gros tshad med pa// de dag gi ni mos pa'i sems// thams cad 'dren
73b1(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen// gang dag 'dod chags mos pa la// ne sdang la ni gnas 'gyur dang // zhe sdang gnas shing gti mug la// gang dag mos pa rab tu mkhyen// gti mug gnas shing 'dod
73b2(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi// sems rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bar bar du ni 'jug pa dang // de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// gang dag sbyor ba dman gyur la// rgya chen la ni mos pa dang // sbyor ba dam pa
73b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi/ dman par 'gyur ba 'dren pas mkhyen// log pa'i rje su song ba dang // 'gro ba med par 'byung ba dang // khams gsum las ni rnam grol ba'i// mos pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen// 
73b4(dkon brtsegs): skye dang kha dog tha dad dang // nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par dang // / gang dag spyi bo las nyams pa// rkang gnyis gtso bos pa butu mkhyen// mos pa sna tshogs rab mkhyen nas// 'dren
73b5(dkon brtsegs): ba chos rnams ston pa mdzad// sangs rgyas kyi ni stobasagasum la// rgyal ba'i thugs sras rab tu mos// shA ro'i bu 'od ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
73b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stobs de dag ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal
73b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'che zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs
73b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab
74a1(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to// khams gang gis 'jig rten bsod nams kyi 'du byed sogs pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// khams
74a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed sogs pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// khams gang gis mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed sogs pa de yang de
74a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// khams gang gis 'byung ba'i kham su 'jog par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
74a4(dkon brtsegs): mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
74a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// yid kyi khams/ dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rab/ tu mkhyen te/ ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa
74a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen
74a7(dkon brtsegs): ce na/ na mkha'i khams ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ 
74a8(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rtog pa las byung bar rab tu mkhyen to// 'dus byas kyi khams mngon par 'du byed ba'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du mi byed ba'i mtshan
74b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams ni phyis 'byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam par byang ba'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid
74b2(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu mkhyen to// 'du byed kyi khams ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni tshul bzhin rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to// / 
74b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'jig rten gnas pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten gnas pa'i khams gang la gnas pa dang / khams gang la rje su chags pa dang / khams gang la gnas pa dang / khams
74b4(dkon brtsegs): gang la gnas pa dang / khams gang la sbyor ba dang / khams gang gis bsam pa dang / khams gang la nges pa dar sems pa dang / khams gang la brten pa de yang de
74b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams du ma dang / khams
74b6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de na mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen
74b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs la mngon par dad yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir
74b8(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ 'di la 'di skad ces bya'o// 'jig rten kun na sems can gang // sna tshogs khams la gnas
75a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dag/ khams gang 'jug pa ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen// bsod nams bsod nams min ni g.yo// 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang de bzhin te/ 
75a2(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams gang la gnas nas su// mya ngan 'das bzhi la reg/ mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams// mig gi rnam par shes nyid dang // rna ba sna dang lce dang lus// yid kyi khams kyang
75a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen// chos kyi khams dang yid kyi ni// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mkhyen// nang gi khams ni stong pa dang // phyi rol dag kyang stong par mkhyen// sa dang chu dang me dag dang // rlung gi
75a4(dkon brtsegs): khams kyang de bzhin te// khams rnams bzhi po de dag da ni// na mkha' mtshungs par rab tu mkhyen// 'dod dpa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams// gzugs med pa
75a5(dkon brtsegs): yi khams nyid kyang // kun tu rtog las byung bar ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar na mkha' mtha 'ayas pa// de bzhin khams rnams mu med de// thad sangs
75a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rab mkhyen kyang // mkhyen to snyam du rlom sems med// khams ni skye ba ma yin zhing // rnam pa kun tu 'gag med de// khams 'di mya ngan 'das par ni// skyes bu dam pas rab tu mkhyen// 
75a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na mkha' mtha' yas pa// sangs rgyas yis de 'dra ste// mos pa sna tshogs rab sprul pa// ye shes des ni rab tu mkhyen// mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen ni su// sems can bya ba rnam par
75a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dul// sangs rgyas stobs ni bzhi pa la// rgyal ba'i thugs sras dad par byed// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bzhi pa ste/ sus kyang 'jig
75b1(dkon brtsegs): rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis sems can
75b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ dbang po brtul ba'ang rab tu
75b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// dbang po bar ma yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rno ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po dman pa yang rab tu mkhyen to// 
75b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus mthar phyin pa'i 'dod chags skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i zhe sdang skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i gti mug skye de yang de bzhin gshegs
75b5(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// yongasu rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug brtan pa skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang / 
75b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// yong su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
75b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// yongasu rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus snrel zhi'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// yongasu
75b8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus tshar bcad cing / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po gang dag
76a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag 'byung ba'i rgyu
76a2(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang shA ri'i de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen
76a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nas/ gong ma bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// pho'i
76a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang // / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid la bde ba'i dbang po/ 
76a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi na rab tu mkhyen to// dang po'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi/ 
76a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan
76a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po gang mig gi dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ rna ba'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur te/ sna la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus
76a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang po la ma yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te// gang gis dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ sna'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang sna'i
76b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ lce'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang lce'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la/ lus kyi dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji
76b2(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gang sbyin pa'i dbang po can yin la de yang tshul khrims la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gsheg pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas de la sbyin pa'i
76b3(dkon brtsegs): gtam ston to// gang zag tshul khrims kyi dbang po can yin la de la sbyin pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas tshul khrims kyi gtam ston
76b4(dkon brtsegs): ton/ sems can gang bzod pa'i dbang po can yin la de yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas bzod pa'i/ 
76b5(dkon brtsegs): gtam ston to// sems can gang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po/ can yin la de yang bzod pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhi/ na gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
76b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas brtson 'grus kyi gtam ston to// sems can gang bsam gtan gyi dbang po can yin la de yang shes rab la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma
76b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa mkhyen pas bsam gtan gyi gtam ston to// sems can gang shes rab kyi dbang po can yin la de yang shes rab la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog
76b8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa mkhyen pas shes rab kyi gtam ston to// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la yang bya'o// sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la// 
77a1(dkon brtsegs): de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to// 
77a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la de yang nyan thos kyi thag pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas
77a3(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to// sems can gang theg pa chen po'i dbang po can yin la de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po
77a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas thag pa chen po'i gtam ston to// sems can gang tha ma'i dbang po can yin la de yang theg pa chen po la sbyor ba de la/ de bzhin
77a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhye/ na pas dbang po tha ma'i gtam ston to// sems can/ gang skal ba med pa'i dbang po can skal ba med par snang
77a6(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas skal pa med cing snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyomasasu 'jug go/ sems can skal pa yod pa'i dbang po can skal pa yod par snang ba dag la/ da
77a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas skal pa yod cing snod du rig nas ri mor byas shing chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu smin pa rnam
