77a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu mkhyen/ dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 'byung ba'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 'byung ba ma yin pa'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// 
77b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi dbang po'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang / sbyor ba gang yin pa dang / bsam pa gang yin pa dang / gang gi rgyu las byung ba dang / rkyen gang yin pa dang / dmigs pa gang yin pa dang // 
77b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu 'thun pa gang yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i mtha' gang yin pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// bcom ldan 'das
77b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung// 'gro ba'i dbang po de ni dbang po'i pha rol song // sems can rnams kyi spyod dang
77b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa'i cho ga mkhyen// 'gro ba gang dag gi ni dbang po ci 'dra ba// de 'drar mi yi seng ge de la chos 'chad do// / dbang po dag ni rab 'bring tha mar gyur pa rnams// de la
77b5(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs ye shes rmad du byung ba 'jug/ sems can bsam pa thar pa'i snod du gyur mkhyen nas// spyod pa mkhyen cing mkhas pa mchog gi chos ston to// gang dag
77b6(dkon brtsegs): mthar byin skye zhing nyon mongs brtan pa dang // mi gang rnams kyi dbang po yang bar gyur pa dang // skyes bu gang gis dbang po snal zhir gyur pa yi// spyod pa mkhyen nas de ltar 'thun pa'i chos
77b7(dkon brtsegs): ston to// skyes bu gang gi dge ba'i dbang por gyur pa dang // mi dge ba yi dbang por gyur pa rnams kyang de bzhin mkhyen// mig nas gzung ste yid kyi bar gyi dbang po dang // yid mi bde dang
77b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dbang mkhyen chos kyang ston// dad brtson dran dang ting nge 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang // skyes bu gang la dbang po 'di dag yod pa ni// de la dad pa'i gtam ston de bzhin
78a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang dam pa'i don du ston// mi yi dbang po rnam pa spyod pa'i bye brag gang // mi gang bsam pa ci 'jug de yi dbang
78a2(dkon brtsegs): po yang // chos mchog rtogs pas de dag gi ni spyod pa mkhyen// sdug bsngal kun las thar par byed pa'i chos 'chad do// gang gi dbang po sangs rgyas byang chub phyir nges la// nyan thos
78a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i rjes 'jug cho ga mi shes la// de la byang chub reg 'gyur rgya chen gtam rab ston// bde gshegs stobs ni mtha' yas thul dka' lnga pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
78a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa ste/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i dbar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad du
78a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// ji
78a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ yang dag par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ yang dag par ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ log par nges pa'i sems can
78a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// rgyu'i stobs can sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa zur tsam gyi go ba/ dbang po rno ba'i
78a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung / ma bstan kyang ru/ de rnam par grol ba'i skal ba yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu'i
78b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs mkhyen nas de bzhin du 'thun par chos ston to// ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rkyen gyi stobs can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can gal te 'thun par 'doms shing
78b2(dkon brtsegs): rje su ston pa dang / phrad na rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi/ rjesu ston pa dang ma phrad na rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la yang / de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar rkyen dang / rgyu dang ldan
78b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gtam yang dag par gsungs te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa las chos de thos nas tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor bas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/ de dag gi don du sangs rgyas bco
78b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung // log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams yongasu sbyang ba ma byas na/ kho re chung ba/ blun pa snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can de dag la/ 
78b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung ma bstanakyang rung ste/ rnam par grol ba'i skal ba med pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas snod ma yin par
78b6(dkon brtsegs): rig nas btang snyomasu 'jog ste/ de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams go gyon to// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags kyi lam rnam pa gsum rab tu mkhyen
78b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'dod chags kyi lam sdug pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/ 'dod chags kyi lam rjes su chags pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/ 'dod chags kyi lam sngon gyi rgyu las skye ba
78b8(dkon brtsegs): yang yod do// zhe sdang gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/ zhe sdang gi lam khong khro ba'i mtshan ma las skye ba yang yod/ bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa las skye ba yang yod/ sngon
79a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi bag la nyal ba las skye ba yang yod/ gti mug gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/ gti mug gi lam ma rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/ gti mug gi lam
79a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/ gti mug gi lam the tshom gyi rgyu las skye ba yang yod do// de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// 
79a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu dbang po rno ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po brtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la
79a4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rno ba'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul
79a5(dkon brtsegs): la dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// dmigs pa bor ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la bul ba'i lam ya nga rab tu mkhyen to// lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa'i phyir/ mngon
79a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa myur la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// yongs su thug pa med par dbugs 'byin pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la myur ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// de la ma chags
79a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la bsgom pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ 
79a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la so sor rtog pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ bsgoms pa'i stobs dang so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i lam
79b1(dkon brtsegs): yang yod/ so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang bsgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par mi byed pa'i lam yang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
79b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// bsam pa phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod// 
79b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin la sbyor ba yang phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ bsam pa yang phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba yang phun sum tshogs pa'i lam yang
79b4(dkon brtsegs): yodanade yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// lus sbyong la ngag la ma yin/ sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ ngag sbyong la lus
79b5(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sems sbyong la lus la ma yin ngag la ma yin pa'ilam yang yod/ lus la ma yin ngag la ma yin la
79b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang mi sbyong ba'i lam yang yod/ lus dang ngag dang sems sbyong ba'i lam yang yod de// de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar
79b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu dang / ldog pa'i rgyu'i lam ji snyed pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs pa med par 'jug go/ de ltar shA ri'i bu da
79b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med na mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyamo// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dad / yid ches
80a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes bskyed// 
80a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ dri'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// thams cad lam ni bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen// sems can khams ni nges
80a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu bcas pa mkhyen// yongasu smin pa'i mtshan nyid ma nges dang // de bzhin dbang po rgyu dang ldan pa mkhyen// 'dod chags lam ni rnam pa gsum dang ldan// zhe sdang lam gsum de bzhin
80a4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug ldan// rnam gsum rgya chen mtha' yas nyon mo/ dngas ldan// lam la rkyen dang rgyu ni ston pas mkhyen// dka' ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin dbang
80a5(dkon brtsegs): po brtul zhing bul ba dang / sla ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyurar ba dang // de bzhin bul ba'ang 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen// bul ba'i lam la sbyor ba bul ba yod/ 
80a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bul ba yin la sbyor ba rno// myur ba'i lam la bul bar 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin de la ma chags myur ba'ang yod// lam ni so sor rtog pa skyed byed la// yang dag bsgom pa
80a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ma yin dang // bsgom pa dag ni skyed par byed pa dang // gnyis ka khyad par sbyor ldan bskyed pa yod// lam ni bsam pa yongs su sbyong byed lo// sbyor ba dag ni sbyong bar mi byed
80a8(dkon brtsegs): yod/ ras 'ga' gnyis ka sbyong bar byed po'ang yod// de dag sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas mkhyen// lus ni rnam par sbyong la ngag mi sbyong // sems kyang rnam par sbyong ba ma
80b1(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / ngag rnams dang ni lus kyang rab sbyong la// sems ni res 'ga' mi sbyong ba yang yod// sems ni rab sbyong ngag la ma yin te// lus kyang rnam par sbyong ba ma yin dang // ngag dang
80b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sems kyang rab sbyong la// res 'ga' lus ni sbyong bar mi 'gyur yod// lus dang de bzhin ngag sems sbyong lam dang // ji ltar ldog dang 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams// sangs rgyas
80b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gzigs pas rab mkhyen te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs drug pa// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs drug pa ste stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin
80b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gan su zhal gyis 'chi ba nas dasus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i dbar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang / 
80b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba da nga ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu
80b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag dang / pha rol gyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang
80b7(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa de yang de bzhin
80b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji
81a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// de la rgyu gang rkyen gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o// 
81a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen ni ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa ni rgyu'o// 'du byed ni rkyen to// 'du byed ni rgyu'o// rnam par shes pa ni rkyen to// rnam par shes pa ni
81a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'o// ming dang gzugs ni rkyen to// ming dang gzugs ni rgyu'o// skye mched drug ni rkyen to// skye mched drug ni rgyu'o// reg pa ni rkyen to// reg pa ni rgyu'o// tsher ba ni rkyen to// tsher ba ni rgyu'o// 
81a4(dkon brtsegs): sred pa ni rkyen to// sred pa ni rgyu'o// len pa ni rkyen to// delen pa ni rgyu'o// srid pa ni rkyen to// srid pa ni rgyu'o// skye ba ni rkyen to// skye ba ni rgyu'o// rga shi ni rkyen to// nyon
81a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa ni rgyu'o// las ni rkyen to// lta ba ni rgyu'o// sred pa ni rkyen to// bag la nyal ba ni rgyu'o// kun nas ldang ba ni rkyen to// sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon
81a6(dkon brtsegs): mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'di/ rkyen ni 'di yin te/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// de la sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag
81a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang / rkyen gang zhe na/ sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gnyis rkyen gnyis te/ gzhan las rje su 'thun pa'i sgra dang / so so bdag nyid
81a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// 'di lta ste zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ 'gro ba med par shes pa dang / 
81b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med par shes pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ skye ba med par rab tu rtog pa dang / nges par 'gyur ba la mi rig pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis
81b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ rkang pa dang ldan pa dang / rig par rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo la bsgom pa dang / rang bzhin
81b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis rnam par grol bar shes pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ bden
81b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / bden pa rje su 'thob pa'o// rgyu de dang rkyen de dag ni sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs
81b5(dkon brtsegs): bas yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang tshad med/ rnam par dag par dmigs
81b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang tshad med de/ yang dag ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa la 'jog pa yang yod do// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
81b7(dkon brtsegs): du so sor rtogs pas rnam par dag pa dmigs pa yang kun nas nyon mongs par dmigs pa la 'jog pa yang yod/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'dzin pas kun nas nyon mongs par dmigs/ 
81b8(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jog pa dang / rnam par dag pa dmigs pa la 'jog pa'ang yod de/ de la snrel zhi'i rnam grangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug go// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
82a1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'dod pa dag la dben pasdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las
82a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas nas 'gog pa las ldang ba dang / 'gog pa la snyoms
82a3(dkon brtsegs): por zhugs nas bsam gtan dang po las ldang ba'i bar du'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad la rjes su 'thun par snyoms par 'jug go// mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug go// rje su 'thun
82a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par
82a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug pa'i rnam par/ thar pa la sdug pa nyid du mos par 'gyur ba de ni rnam par
82a6(dkon brtsegs): thar pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par
82a7(dkon brtsegs): thar pa lnga pa'o// ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes mang 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par
82a8(dkon brtsegs): thar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor rab 'gog pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la rjes su 'thun pa dang / mi mthun par yang snyoms par
82b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug snrel zhir yang snyoms par 'jug go// ting nge 'dzin la yang ting 'dzin ston la/ snyoms par 'jug pas rtogs par ston kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin la tha dad par
82b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gang yang med/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting 'dzin la dmigs pa las ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya ba med/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gcig gis
82b3(dkon brtsegs): tingange 'dzin thams cad 'grub po// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting 'dzin las ma bzhengs par ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems gcig/ 
82b4(dkon brtsegs): nas gcig tu 'jug pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dal sems mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin de sus kyang lta mi nus
82b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ nyan thos kyi ting 'dzin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge/ 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to// rang sangs rgyas kyi ti nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zil
82b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis non to// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zil gyis ma non pa ste/ de bzhin
82b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes ni zil gyis ma non par 'jug go// gdams pa gang dang rje su bstan pa gang gis nyan thos rnams ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu
82b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi dang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du 'doms shing de
83a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rje su ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun
83a2(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba'i mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med na mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon
83a3(dkon brtsegs): par dad / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes
83a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis sems can nyon mongs shing // gang gis sems can rnam dag 'gyur// de yang dpa' bo
83a5(dkon brtsegs): chen pos mkhyen// mkhyen nas gtam rnams ston par mdzad// gang du ma rig skye 'gyur ba// nyon mongs rgyu/ ni tshul bzhin min// de yi rkyen ni 'du byed de// sdug
83a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal rab tu skye bar 'gyur// srid pa'i yan lag bskyed pa yi// thams cad rtsa ba tshul bzhin min// de nyid sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas// de bzhin du yang ston par mdzad// las kyi
83a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba nyon mongs pa// mi mkhas mngon par 'du byed de// sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bar// de yi rkyen ni rnam par shes// gang gis sems can dag 'gyur ba// rgyu
83a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang ni rkyen gnyis te// gzhan las rje su 'thun sgra dang // nang du tshul bzhin lta ba'o// tshul bzhin rgyu ni zhi gnas te// lhag mthong yang ni rkyen yin no// sems can gang
83b1(dkon brtsegs): gis grol 'gyur ba// de yang 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// tshul khrims la ni rnal 'byor gnas// chos rnams stong par rab tu rtogs// thar pa'i sgo ni bsgoms pas na// srid pa dog las thar
83b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas// rnam sbyong skyes bu bud med la// stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang // rnam par thar pa rab tu ston// bsam gtan la ni snyoms zhugs pa// 
83b3(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal dang ni nyan thos rnams// de dag rnams kyang dog par bshad// de yi 'gran zla yod par gsungs// sangs rgyas bsam gtan rnam thar la// dag dang bcas med dog pa med// 
83b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs bdun pa// pha rol rgol bas thul bar dka'// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rna mas kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bdun pa ste/ stobs
83b5(dkon brtsegs): de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de
83b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang
83b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjesu dran no// 'di lta ste skye ba gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ 
83b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ skye ba brgya 'am/ skye ba stong ngam/ skye ba brgya stong nas skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du rje su dran no// 'jig pa'i
84a1(dkon brtsegs): skal ba 'am/ 'chags pa'i skal ba 'am/ 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa 'am/ 'jig pa'i skal pa du ma 'am/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa dum
84a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma zhig na nga sngon che ge mo zhig tu byung ste/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za
84a3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog ni 'di lta bu/ mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu/ dbyibs ni 'di lta bu/ tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/ yun ni 'di srid cig gnas/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ste/ 
84a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig du skyes so// bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so// zhes 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi
84a5(dkon brtsegs): ci las gyur pa dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas du ma rje su dran no// sems can gang gi sngon gyi rgyu ji lta bu dang / rgyu gang gis sems can du 'gyur ba'i
84a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te/ mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// 'das pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen no// sems
84a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gi 'og tu gang la dmigs pa'i sems skyes pa dang / dmigs pa gang ma tshang bas 'gags pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar shA ri'i
84a8(dkon brtsegs): bu gang sems can gcig gi sems gcig nas gcig tu sems 'di lta bu zhig gi 'og tu sems 'di lta bu zhig byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang
84b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis bshad pas ston par mi nus te/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi yang thams cad de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi bskal
84b2(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems rnams bshad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
84b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ tshad med grangs med brjod du med de/ de'i mtha' gnas ni bde bar
84b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog du gyur pa das de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag la/ kye sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / de sangs
84b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la bskyed pa 'am/ nyan thos la bskyed pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas la bskyed pa 'am/ chos la bskyed pa de dag dran par gyis shig ces dran par mdzad do// 'di
84b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa de las chos 'di lta bur ston te/ ci nas sems can de
84b7(dkon brtsegs): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pas/ la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
84b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa mngon
85a1(dkon brtsegs): sum du byed pa shes pa'i stobs ni mtha' yas mu med namakha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu
85a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ 
85a3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // bdag gi dang ni de bzhin gzhan dag gi/ 'jig rten sgron mas sngon gyi dran pa ni// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pa// skyu ru ra lnga lag mthil bzhag pa
85a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ ming rus de bzhin kha dog rnam par rtog/ tshe dang ga nas dang mchi ba 'gro ba dang // gang gi rgyu la sems can brtson ldan pa// de mkhyen pa ni de la chos kyang 'chad// 'gro
85a5(dkon brtsegs): pab rnams kyi sems dang sems byung chos// gang dag 'das pa mtha' yas mu med pa// gang gi 'og tu sems gang / byung ba kun// rgyal ba'i ye shes chen po mnga' bas
85a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// sems can gcig gi sems rgyud sngon 'das pa// bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen pa ni// bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed du// bshad kyang de yi mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur// 
85a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi spyod pa ji snyed de dag gi/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du ngas bshad kyang // mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes mi zad de// bcom ldan ye shes rgya mtsho 'di 'dra'o// sngon gyi rgyal la bsti stang
85a8(dkon brtsegs): gang byas shing // sems can gang dag dge ba'i bsar gyur pa// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi shugs la gnas// sngon dag dge ba byas pa rnams kyang dran// sngon ni bsod nams byi 'dra
85b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa rnams// de dag rnams kyang ston pa'i mthus dran te/ de dag dran nas gnas ni gsum la 'khod// thar pa'i gnas las phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur// bde gshegs sngon gyi sbyor ba/ 
85b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas te// sems can thams cad kyis ni bsam mi nus// mtha' yas grag pa'i stobs ni brgyad pa la// rgyal sras bdag nyid chen po dad par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin
85b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa ste/ stobs de dag ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig
85b4(dkon brtsegs): rjesu dran pa mngon sum du byed pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na de med pa'i ye shes dang / mi las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i
85b5(dkon brtsegs): mig rnam par dag pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / kha dog mdzes pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bde 'gror
85b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams gzigs so// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan// yid kyi nyes par spyod pa
85b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan
85b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang de bzhin no// yang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang
86a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba ste/ de dag
86a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lhar skye'o zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to// 
86a3(dkon brtsegs): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa brjod du med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang shin tu 'das pa tham
86a4(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de dgra thams cad ni 'tshig pa dang / 'jig pa dang // 'chags par gzigs so// sems can gang dag kha cig
86a5(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bar gzigs so// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kha cig ni snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni
86a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan gnas nas 'chi 'pho ba dang / ma'i rum du 'jug pa dang / btsa ba dang / gom pa bdun 'dor ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mngon par 'byung bar
86a7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gzigs so// chos kyi 'khor lo
86a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bskor ba dang / tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gzigs so// nyan thos gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni shin tu yeng du
86b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gzigs so// rang sangs rgyas gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rdzu 'phrul ston cing yon sbyong bar gzig so// 
86b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag snang bar ma gyur pa// phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam du mi 'gro ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
86b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig gis gzigs so// yang de bzhin gshegs pas shing rta'i phang le'i tshad tsam la
86b4(dkon brtsegs): snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs pa de dag ni shin tu mang gi/ stong gsum gyi stong dran po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams ni de ltar
86b5(dkon brtsegs): mi yin te/ de ltar mi snang bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang ched med do// 'di ltar shA ri'i du de bzhin gshegs pa ni lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
86b6(dkon brtsegs): na sems can gang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur zhes sems can gyi khams la gzigs te/ sems can ji tsam sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur de dag gi mdun na de bzhin
86b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bzhugs shing / sems can de dag 'dul yang sems can gzhan gyis mi sheso// de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig rje su dran pa mngon sum du byed
86b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni mtha' yas mu med de na mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dad pa nas na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi
87a1(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshig su bcang ba 'di dag gsung so// bde bar
87a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i lha'i mig dri med de// bskal pa du mar dge ba'i las kyis sbyangs// des ni rgyal bas phyogs bcu sangs rgyas zhing // rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyang gzigs/ 
87a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa ji snyed pa// kha cig me yis 'khor cing sems can gnas// kha cig sangs rgyas ldan zhing kha cig stong // thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs// sems
87a4(dkon brtsegs): can khams ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab// gzugs can gzug/ med gang dag ji snyed dang // gang dag ngan 'gror 'gro/ dang bde 'gro ba// thams cad rong byung gi ni spyan gyis
87a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// sangs rgyas bye ba mang po gang gzhugs dang // rang byung 'dren pa mya ngan gang 'das dang // rang rgyal gang dang nyan thos gang yod pa// thams cad rang byung gi ni
87a6(dkon brtsegs): spyan gyis gzigs// byang chub sems dpa' srog chags phan 'dogs pa// gang dag byang chub spyod pa mchog spyod cing // la la gzhi med gnas ni rtogs gyur pa// thams cad rang
87a7(dkon brtsegs): byung 'dren pa dag gis gzigs// gang gis srog chags shin tu phra mthong ba// bde gshegs mig ni 'di 'dra dri ma med// mig stobs bsam gyis mi khyab dgu pa ste// rgyal sras nges pa
87a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mngon par dad // shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas na khyu mchog gi gnasu zhal gyis 'tshe zhing
87b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgeg pa nas sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed/ 
87b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyi zag pa thams cad zad pas bdag skye ba ni zad
87b3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa la ni bsten par bya ba ni byes/ 'di las srid pa gzhan mi sheso zhes zag pa med pa/ sems rnam par grol ba/ rang gi mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas nas/ 
87b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de la de bzhin gshegs dpa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni bag chadags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par btso
87b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i zag pa zad pa ni tshad du byas ba'i bag chags yang dag par bcom pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa zad pa ni tshad yod pa ste/ snying
87b6(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po dang bral ba spobs pa dang bral ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang
87b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par bcom pa/ snying rje chen pos kun tu bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa dang spobs pa la lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa ste skad cig tsog dang ldan pa'o// de
87b8(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi bag chags med/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags med/ spyod lam 'khrul pa'i bag chag med do// 'di lta ste shA ri'i bu na mkha' yongasu dag
88a1(dkon brtsegs): pas rdul dang du ba'i 'khrug pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang nyon mongs pa'i bag/ 
88a2(dkon brtsegs): chags thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so// de zag pa zad par mkhyen pa de lta bu la rab tu gnas nas zag pa dang bcas pa/ len pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams la zag pa zad
88a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// len pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ kye ma sems can rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las byung ste/ zag pa dang len pa rnams mi skyed pa'i
88a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyis rab tu rtogs shig/ ces de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas dpe dang tshul gyis ci nas kyang zag pa rnams yang dag pa ma yin pa'o// 
88a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par 'gyur zhing / shes nas kyang chos gang yang mi len te/ len pa med par yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta
88a6(dkon brtsegs): bur chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi zag pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa kun 'byung ba dang / zag pa 'gag pa dang / zag pa 'gag
88a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed
88a8(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas mngon par dad yid chas rab tu rtog/ som nyi med cing / the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ 
88b1(dkon brtsegs): del 'di skad ces bya'o// 'dren pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes ni// rgya chen sgrib med dag pa tshad med de// stobs bcu'i stobs ni de dang ldan pas na// zhi ba'i byang chub mchog 'dri rab tu gsung
88b2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams kyi zag zad de shes ni// bag chags ma bcom tshad dang ldan pa yin// mi yi dam pa 'dran pa mchog rab kyi// bag chags bcom zhing tshad dang ldan ma yin// de bzhin rang rgyal
88b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub gang reg pa// de la snying rje che dang spobs pa med// bcom ldan 'das ni zag pa yongs zad pa// snying rje che dang spobs pa tshad med do// sangs rgyas zag zad mkhyen la gnas nas ni// 
88b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i zag pa yang dag ma yin zhing // rigs pa'i gnas kyi tshul 'di ma shes pas// chos 'di thams cad lo dag par zhugs mkhyen te// de la rgyal ba snying rje cher bskyed
88b5(dkon brtsegs): nas// chos 'di mi rtag stong pa bdag med chos// dngos med gsog ste mchog tu zhi ba yi// sa la rtogs shig ltos shes rab tu ston// 'di la skyes bu srog dang gang
88b6(dkon brtsegs): zag dang // shed skyes shed bu byed pa po yang med// chos 'di thams cad log par chags pas na// ston pa snying rje bskyed nas thar ston kyang // bde bar gshegs la skyo ba yong med de// yang
88b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ye shes nams kyang nyams pa med// de phyir rgyal ba rtag tu rnal 'byor spyod // 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams rab tu ston// 'di ni pha rol smra ba 'joms pa'i stobs// mtha' yas nam
88b8(dkon brtsegs): mkha' 'dra ba bcu pa ste// mgon po stobs bcu de la gnas gyur nas// mtshungs med 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
89a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs bcu pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ 'jig rten 'dir dge sbyong ngam/ 
89a2(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i bar du sus kyang chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis
89a3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// 
89a4(dkon brtsegs): bam po drug pa// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sem/ su dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin/ gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
89a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'dushes bskyed ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
89a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyis nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / khyu mchog gi
89a7(dkon brtsegs): gan su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// bzhi gang
89a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ 'khor gyi nang du nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyaso zhes zhal gyi 'a
89b1(dkon brtsegs): bde la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod kyis chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyaso zhes chos dang 'thun par rgol bar mi nuso// de ji ltar na de bzhin
89b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mi mnyam pa med par yang dag par mngon par sangs rgyas te/ so so'i skye
89b3(dkon brtsegs): bo'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos
89b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten
89b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das/ pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / kha na ma tho ba/ dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa
89b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas de dag thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs
89b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya'o// de la mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/ lta ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du mnyam mo// mtshan
89b8(dkon brtsegs): ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma med par mnyam mo// khams gsum pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis smon pa med par mnyam mo// skye ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye bar mnyam mo// mngon par 'du byed/ 
90a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par 'du mi byed par mnyam mo// 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'byung bar mnyam mo// kun gzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis kun gni med par mnyamo/ 
90a2(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum gyis ngo bo nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam mo// ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rig pa dang rnam par grol bar mnyam mo// 'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis
90a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das par mnya mo// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang
90a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya'o// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pas 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 
90a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa bskyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa// 
90a6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa de kho na nyid de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med
90a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa/ 'thab pa med pa'o// 
90a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing / chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o// ji ltar de bzhin
90b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas 'di lta bu'i chos zab mo phra ba shes par dka' ba de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/ snying rje chen po la gnas nas bstan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam
90b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs sna tshogs kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos thams cad yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de'i chos de yang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad
90b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir 'byung ngo // gang ston pa ma yin la/ ston pa'o zhes khas 'chi ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes khas 'che ba de
90b4(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pas zil gyis non nas/ de dgra rgyags pa chad de phan tshun du 'bres so// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
90b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med de/ 'di lta ste na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu da bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa yang mtha' yas mu
90b6(dkon brtsegs): med de/ shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa ni na mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i bsam/ 
90b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// 'di ni mi 'jigs pa drang po'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de
90b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas nga zag pa zad do zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/ de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di
91a1(dkon brtsegs): dgas zad do zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang 'thun par rtsod par byed pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag bzang
91a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni 'di dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par 'grol bas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo// srid pa'i zag pa las sems
91a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol bas zhe sdang la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo// ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas gti mug la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo
91a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas nyon mongs pa ral spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob gzung ste de bzhin gshegs/ 
91a5(dkon brtsegs): pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o// don dam par na 'phags pa'i/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi bdun na chos gang yongasu shes pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ mngon
91a6(dkon brtsegs): du bya bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zad pa zhes bya ba de ni nam du yang mi zad pa ma yin no// de ni shin tu zad pa nyid yin gyi/ gnyen pos zad pa
91a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes mi bya ste/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa'o// gang ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa de la zad pa gang yang med do// gang la zad pa gang yang med pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'o// de la skye ba med pa
91a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med pa/ gnas med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid de/ de bzhin du de la ye shes zhugs so// / 
91b1(dkon brtsegs): gang la 'jug pa med cing mi 'jug pa yang med pa yang de ltar zhugs te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyis zag pa dang zag pa spong ba mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying rje chen po la
91b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas zag pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de ni 'khor thams cad shes par byed de/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad
91b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par bskyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang dad pa bskyed pa/ snying rje chen po sbyor ba de bzhin nyid
91b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mnyam pa de kho na de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung / da ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa
91b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'o/ gas pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin
91b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis mnyam zhing / chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ched med bsam
91b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab/ grangs med dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyi zag pa spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to// de ltar shA
91b8(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de na mkha'i mtha' 'dod
92a1(dkon brtsegs): do zhes pa'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad / yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa
92a2(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan zhes bya
92a3(dkon brtsegs): ba nas 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ 'khor
92a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du gshegs nas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams la dbar du gcod do zhes zhal gyis 'tsha ba de la gong ma de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas
92a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di ni bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos ma yin no zhes rgol bar byed pa med pa'i bar du'o// de la bar du gcod pa'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
92a6(dkon brtsegs): bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bag med pa'i sems so// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos nyid te/ ngo tsha mi shes pa dang khrel med pa'o// 
92a7(dkon brtsegs): bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gsum ste/ lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos
92a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba bzhi la/ 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin// 
92b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / chang
92b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thung ba'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas la ma gus pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gtong ba
92b3(dkon brtsegs): lam gus pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal
92b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / log pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
92b5(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i rtog pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / log pa 'i 'tsho ba dang / log pa'i rtsol ba dang / log pa'i dran pa
92b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / log pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bdag la gnod pa byas so zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang / gnod
92b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byed do zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang / gnod par byed par 'gyu ro zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas so byed do byed par 'gyur/ 
92b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa dang / bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byas so// byed do byed par 'gyur zhes kun nas mnar sems bskyed pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos
93a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem
93a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig rgyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid
93a3(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ji snyed pa'i chos de dag gis ro myong ba la rje su lta zhing / gnas pa dang / phyin ci log dang ldan pa dang / 'byung ba la kun nas ldang ba dang / sred pa dang / 
93a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i zang zing dang bcas phung po dang bcas pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang // yid kyi las de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas
93a5(dkon brtsegs): bar du gcod par mkhyen to// bar du gcod par mkhyen nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston to// chos bcu po de dag ni bar du gcod par 'gyur ba ste/ de dag
93a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par
93a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa bskyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu
93a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 
93b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med
93b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs/ 
93b3(dkon brtsegs): pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyis bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams zhi
93b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med pa nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
93b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de na mkha'i mtha' 'dod ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
93b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de thos nas mngon par dad / yid chaches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
93b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa gsum pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas zhes bya ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par zhes bya
93b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sems can rnams gang la brtan pas nges par 'byung bar
94a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu mkhyen te/ de la 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ma
94a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed mi nus so// nges par 'byung ba'i lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bgrod pa gcig
94a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i lam ste/ gang sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos nyid te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ngo nges par 'byung
94a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
94a5(dkon brtsegs): lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / tsher bar gtog pI dran/ ba dang / sem su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / cho su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i
94a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang
94a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjesu dran pa
94a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rje su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rje su dran pa ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug go// nges par 'byung ba'i
94b1(dkon brtsegs): chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan
94b2(dkon brtsegs): lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang
94b3(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste 'di bdun yang gong ma bzhin no// nges par 'byung ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'di lta ste yang
94b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag/ pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / dayang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang
94b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di brgyad kyang gong ma bzhin no// mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di
94b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / bde ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 
94b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rnam par grol ba ste/ 'di dgu yang gong ma bzhin no// nges par 'byung ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo// 'di
94b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ste srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / ma byin par len pa spangs pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spangs pa dang / phra ma spangs pa dang / ngag rtsub po
95a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa dang / tshig kyal pa spangs pa dang / brnab sems spangs pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ste/ 'di yang gong ma bzhin te/ lam de ni nges par
95a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dge ba ji snyed pa/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab kyi phung
95a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges par
95a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i lam zhes bya'o// gzhan yang nges par 'byung ba da zhes pa ni yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ gang yang dag par bsgrub pa de la ni chos gang yang sogs pa 'am/ 
95a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bri ba 'am/ blang ba 'am/ dor ba 'am/ gzung ba 'am/ spang ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par bsgrub pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ chos thams
95a6(dkon brtsegs): cad gnyi su med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par
95a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor
95a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems tshim pa bskyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid// 
95b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la
95b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab
95b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa'i chos
95b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos zin pa'i sems kyis sem dus can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de so sor rtog pas sems can der
95b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa rnams de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs
95b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnasu zhal gyis 'cha ste/ 
95b7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de ltar
95b8(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas mu med do// 'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
96a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa bzhi yang mtha' yas mu med do// sems can thams cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i
96a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' 'dod pa de ni na mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas
96a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi
96a4(dkon brtsegs): bapar du 'du shes bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das da kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// chos kun mnyam pa nyid mnyam par// rang byung bas ni rjes su
96a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs// de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam pa gzigs// so so'i skye bo'i/ chos gang yin// de dag sangs rgyas chos dang mnyam// 
96a6(dkon brtsegs): slob dang mi slob chos rnams dang // rang rgyal gyi ni chos nyid dang // gang dag 'jig rten chos rnams dang // gang dag 'jig rten 'das chos dang // dge dang mi dge mi g.yo rnams// / 
96a7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang 'dra// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// smon lam dag ni rnam par spangs// ma skyes mngon par 'du mi byed// 'di ni mnyam pa nyid du bstan// 'di dag
96a8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas// thub pa chen po mi 'jigs pa// gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba// de bzhin du yang rab tu ston// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par grol// rnam
96b1(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa rab tu ston// mi dbang gi ni me 'jigs pa// gnyis pa yang dag rab tu bstan// rgyal bas gang chos rjesu sangs rgyas pa// ma sten par ni rnam par grol mi 'thob// bag med
96b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang khrel ba med gyur dang // gang la ngo tsha ci yang med pa dang // lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyi su// gang dag sdom pa nam yang yod min dang // 'dun dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs
96b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // srog gcod pa dang gzhan la 'tshe ba dang // gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin brdzun dang chang // nga rgyal mi gus de bzhin bdun pa'o// gang dag log par smra ba brgyad pa ste// thams cad
96b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i lam rgyud gcod// gang dag mnarasems dgu dang nyes mang dang // mi dge bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang // gang dag tshul min zhi ba mi shes pa// 
96b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni nam yang thar pa med// phyin ci log la zhu gas par rig gyur nas// bag med yang dag ma yin/ smra la chags// rgyal ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs gsum pa ste/ 
96b6(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid 'di dag la ni bsnyen par bya// gang dag rnam sbyong sgo ni tshad med la// mi gang ston pa byang chub reg par 'gyur// rgyal ba nyid kyi ma thos thams cad rig/ shes nas mi
96b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chir 'gro ba'i chos 'chad do// ji tsam dge ba'i chos ni mang yod pa// byang chub phyogs dge rgyal bas bsngags pa la// bsten pa rnam par thar pa mi 'thob pa// gnas med par ni
96b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu rnams kyis bshad// tshul bzhin gyis ni nyon mongs mang po ni// yang dag chos dge mnyam pa med ldan zhing // chos dang chos ma yin la de mi chags// zhi ba mya ngan med/ 
97a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam grol rig/ gsog gsob na mkha' 'dra zhing ya ma brla// sgyu ma'i gzugs 'dra na mkha' lta bu dang // dge chos rnam pa gang gis rab shes pa// de ni srid pa'i mtsho
97a2(dkon brtsegs): las thar par 'gyur// thub pa stobs bcu rnams kyi chos 'di ni// 'gro ba gang mos srid par 'gro ba la// snying rje snying brtse byas nas thar byed de// mi 'jigs bzhi pa na mkha' 'dra ba'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu
97a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad// yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam
97a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
97a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yad ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ 'di la
97a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad rje su mi gtong zhing rtag tu 'jug pa/ sems can yongasu smin par 'gyur ba ste/ mi ldog par rig par
97a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de yang / ji ltar ngag gis las kyis kyang khong du chud par bya ba sla ba ma yin pa de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab/ de ltar mtshungs pa med pa
97a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar dpag tu med/ de ltar brjod du med/ de ltar mi bzad cing khong du chud par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can la de bzhin
97b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas snying rje chen po 'jug ste/ byang chub ci 'dra ba snying rje chen po yang de 'dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa gnas med
97b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub thob bo// de la rtsa ba gang gnas gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o// yang dag pa ma yin pas kun tu rtog pa ni gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyi
97b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir de dag mnyam par mkhyen te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa gnas med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ sems can 'di dag ni rtsa ba
97b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ gnas med par mi shes pa de dag shes par bya'o/  zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub
97b5(dkon brtsegs): ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'o// de ji ltar zhi/ ji ltar nye bar zhi/ zhe na/ nang zhi ba'o// phyi rol nye bar zhi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang
97b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'di yin pas na 'di phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas na de'i phyir zhi ba zhes
97b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ de mig stong par yongasu shes nas gzugs la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// yid kyi bar du yang stong par yongs su shes nas chos la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi zhes bya/ 
97b8(dkon brtsegs): na sems can 'di dag ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba 'di mi shes te/ de dag shes par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhan yang shA ri'i
98a1(dkon brtsegs): bungs ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ji ltar 'od gsal zhe na/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon
98a2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bu'o// na mkha'i rang bzhin no// nam mkha' ni rje su 'brang ba'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'od gsal
98a3(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams blo bur gyis nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs te/ sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis
98a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal ba 'di mi shes pas/ de dag rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can na/ dmas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug/ 
98a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la blang ba med pa gang / dor ba med pa gang
98a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o// dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa med pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pas blang ba med pa dang / 
98a7(dkon brtsegs): dor ba med pa'i chu bo mnyam pa nyid du gzigs te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshu rol med pa dang / pha rol med par gzigs pa de ltar chos thams cad tshu rol dang pha rol
98a8(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa 'di sems can
98b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas mtshan ma med pa dang // 
98b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la mtshan ma med pa gang dmigs pa gang zhe na/ mig gis rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med
98b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// gzugs yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // 
98b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni mi dmigs pa med pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu mtshan mamed pa dang / dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod
98b5(dkon brtsegs): yul gang zhe na/ khams gsum pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ gang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod
98b6(dkon brtsegs): yul ma yin pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gang shA ri'i bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma
98b7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa 'khor gsum yongasu chad pa'o// de la 'khor gsum yongasu chad pa gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang / 
98b8(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa la rnam par shes pa rje su mi rgyug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yid la byed pa mi 'jug pa ste/ de sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pas 'das pa la mi
99a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog rnam 'ongs pa la rlom semasu mi byed/ da ltar byung ba la spros par mi byed pa 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin na/ 
99a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub ni lus med pa/ 
99a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te de ni mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis rnam
99a4(dkon brtsegs): par shes par bya ba ma yin no// 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ni gang ma skyes pa/ mi 'jig pa/ mi gnas pa de ni 'khor gsum dang bral ba 'dus ma byas shes bya'o// 
99a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas kyang de ltar khong du chud/ par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de ni dngos po med pa'o// gang dngos po med pa de
99a6(dkon brtsegs): la gnyi su med de/ lus med pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
99a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub ni dbyer med pa'i gnasu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la dbyer med pa gang zhe na/ de la de bzhin nyid ni gnas so// gnas med pa ni
99a8(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med pa'o// chos kyis dbyings ni gnaso// tha dad pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas so// g.yo ba med pa ni/ dbyer med pa'o// stong pa nyid ni gnas so// dmig su
99b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so// rnam par mi rtog pa ni dbyer med pa'o// smon pa med pa ni gan so// 'jug pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// sems can med pa ni gnas so// 
99b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa'i rang bzhin ni dbyer med pa'o// nam mkha' ni gnas so// mi dmigs pa ni dbyer med pa'o// mi skye ba ni gnaso// mi 'gag pa ni dbyer med pa'o// 'dus ma byas ni gnas so// 
99b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// byang chub ni gnas so// nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// mngon par mi 'grub pa ni dbyer med pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu dbyer med
99b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu
99b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni lus kyis mngon par rdzogs par sang / sa rgyas te/ sems kyis kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni bems po g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ 
99b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / shing dang / rdo dang / mig yor lta bu'o// sems ni sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla lta bu ste/ gang gis lus dang sems de ltar khong du chud pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o// byang chub ni tha
99b7(dkon brtsegs): snyad tsam du bzung ba ste/ byang chub ni lus sam/ sems sam/ chos ma yin pa 'am/ yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am/ bden pa'am/ brdzun pa gang gis kyang brjod par
99b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ byang chub la gang gis kyang tshig gi tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i gnas cung zad kyang med do// 
100a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na mkha' gnas med cing tshig med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang gnas med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
100a2(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba na chos thams cad tshig med pa ste/ chos la tshig med tshig la yang chos med do// de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems
100a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ni bzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa'o// de la bzung ba med pa gang kun gzhi med pa gang zhe na/ 
100a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste mig yongasu shes pa ni gzung ba med pa'o// / gzugs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba ni kun gzhi me du ba'o// yid kyi bar du yongasu shes pa ni bzung ba med pa'i'o
100a5(dkon brtsegs): chos mi dmigs pa ni kun gzhi med pa ste/ de ltar shA ri'i/ bu de bzhin gshegs pas gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
100a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mig mi 'dzin pa dang / gzugs kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so// yid kyi bar du mi 'dzin cing chos kun gzhi
100a7(dkon brtsegs): med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so// de rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas shes so// ji ltar shes she na/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas
100a8(dkon brtsegs): ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gzugs ni sems kyi gnas so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/ 'di bzhi ni sems can
100b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sems kyi gnas so// gnas de yang gnas pa med par de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud
100b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dag so// stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong
100b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ste/ de dag stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi/ stong pa
100b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas dpa ni ma yin pas/ stong pa nyid dam byang chub ces bya/ dab 'di ni tshul gcig pa'i ye shes so// de la gnyis po
100b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis stong pa nyid dang / byang chub tu gnyisu dbye ba'iganyis gang yang med do// chos de ni gnyi su med cing gnyi su dbyar med de/ ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ 
100b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa med pa/ rab tu rgyu ba med pa/ spyod pa med pa'o// gang stong pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par chags pa dang / 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o// don dam par chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ stong
100b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid gang yin pa de stong pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar na mkha' na mkha' zhes kyang bya la/ nam mkha' ni brjod par bya yang ma yin no// de bzhin du stong pa stong pa zhes kyang bya la stong pa nyid brjod
100b8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba ma yin no// 'di lta ste ming tsam du tha snyad 'dod pa 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa ste/ ming de yang yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas so// ji ltar ming yul na mi gan
101a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs na mi gnas pa de bzhin du/ chos ming gi tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i chos de yang yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos
101a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen to// thog ma nas ma skyes pa ma byung bar de ltar mkhyen pas de ltar rnam par grol te/ bcings pa yang med/ grol ba yang med na/ de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis
101a3(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ni na mkha' dang mnyam ste/ na mkha' ni mnyam pa
101a4(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin no// byang chub kyang mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin te/ de ji ltar chos rnams yang dag par rje su grub pa med de/ 
101a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'am mi mnyam pa zhes brjod pa ma yin no// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos tha mas cad mnyam pa yang ma yin mi mnyam pa yang ma yin par
101a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// ji ltar chos rdul tsam yong mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin/ mi mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin pa de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 
101a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ji snyed pa de dag kyang yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis shes so// yang dag pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ chos ma byung ba rnams 'byung ba dang / byung nas 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag
101a8(dkon brtsegs): po med par 'byung / bdag po med par 'jig ste/ rkyen gyis 'byung ba dang / 'jig par 'gyur zhing / 'di la 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa gang yang med de/ lam bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin
101b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa chos ston to// lam bcad pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug
101b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas so// byang chub ji ltar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes da / 
101b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
101b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzu dgas kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
101b5(dkon brtsegs): nas yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'o// chos rnams kyi btags pa ni ming tsam du zad de/ de ni phung
101b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i khams dang / skye mched rnamasu btags pa ste/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// phyin ci ma log par mngon par rdzogs par
101b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas pas na/ sngon ci lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du yang de bzhin te/ sngon gyi mtha' nas ma skyes/ phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho'o// bar du'ang dben pa ste/ de ltar de dag ni ji lta ba bzhin
101b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas yin no// gcig ci lta ba bzhin thams cad kyang bzhin no// thams cad ji lta bar gcig kyang de bzhin te/ ji lta ba bzhin ni gcig gam mang por mi 'gyur ro// ji lta ba bzhin
102a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas de sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA
102a2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu byang chub ni rnam pa la 'jug pa/ rnam pa med pa la zhugs so// de la rnam pa gang rnam pa med pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu rnam pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams rtsom pa'o// rnam pa
102a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o// rnam pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i sems kyi gnas so// rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting
102a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin to// rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sems gzhal ba dang / bgrang ba dang / so sor rtog pa'o// rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa'o// gzhal
102a5(dkon brtsegs): ba las yang dag par 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang na rnam bar shes pa'i las med pa'o// rnam pa zhes bya ba ni gang na 'dus byas la so sor rtog pa'o// rnam pa med pa ni
102a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas mngon sum du byed pa ste/ rnam pa dang rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la
102a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug/ shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zag pa med pa len pa med pa'o// de la zag pa med pa gang len pa med pa gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni zag pa
102a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'o// nye bar len pa med pa
102b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni len pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i len pa dang bral ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul shugs kyi len
102b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bral ba'o// de la nye bar len pa bzhi po de dag thams cad ni ma rig pas mdongs par byas pa dang / sred pa'i chus g.yogs pa dang / bdag tu mngon par chags pas phung po dang / 
102b3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / skye mched len to// de la de bzhin gshegs pas/ bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba yongasu mkhyen pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa mkhyen to// 
102b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de la yongasu rtog/ pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yongasu rtog pa gang yang med de/ de ni tshul
102b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pas/ ma rig pa kun nas mi slong ngo // ma rig pa kun nas mi slong bas srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de ni skye ba med pa'o// 
102b6(dkon brtsegs): gang skye ba med pa de ni nges par gyur pa'o// gang nges par gyur pa de ni nges pa'i don to// gang nges pa'i don de ni don dam pa'o// gang don dam pa de gang zag med pa'i don to// gang gang zag
102b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i don de brjod du med pa'i don to// gang brjod du med pa'i don te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to// gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don de chos kyi don to// gang chos kyi
