102b8(dkon brtsegs): don de de bzhin gshegs pa'i don to// de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo // sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar de/ 
103a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid du btsal na ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo // de la ci yang zhes bya ba gang she na/ 'di lta ste mtshan ma med pa dang dmigs pa med pa'o// gang gis mtshan
103a2(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa dang dmigs pa med pa mthong ba des yang dag pa mthong ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// / 
103a3(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa dang len pa med pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas da khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po
103a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go// shA ri'i bu byang chub ni dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de la dag pa gang dri ma med pa gang / nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni
103a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// skye ba med pa ni dag pa'o// mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni dri ma med pa'o// 
103a6(dkon brtsegs): bar len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// rang bzhin ni dag pa'o// yongasu dag pa ni dri ma med pa'o// 'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// spros pa med pa ni dag pa'o// ma spros pa ni
103a7(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa'o// spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ni dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// go 'byed pa ni dag
103a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// na mkha' ni dri ma med pa'o// nam mkha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// nang yongasu shes pa ni dag pa'o// phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dri ma med pa'o// phyi dang nang mi dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa med
103b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// phung po yongasu shes pa ni dag pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin ni dri ma med pa'o// skye mched spong ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// 'das pa la zag pa shes pa ni dag pa'o// ma 'ongs
103b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la mi skye ba shes pa ni dri ma med pa'o// da ltar byung ba la chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i ye shes ni nyon mongs pa med pa ste/ de ltar dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa
103b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa gnas cig tu 'jug par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste zhi ba'i gnas so// gang zhi ba de ni rab tu zhi ba/ da ni nye bar zhi ba ste thub pa zhes bya'o// da lta bas na ji ltar na mkha' ji lta
103b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub ji lta bar chos kyang de bzhin no// chos ji lta bar sems can yang de de bzhin no// sems can ji lta bar zhing yang de bzhin no// 
103b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing ji lta bar mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no// de bas na chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ mthar thug pa'i rnam pas
103b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po med do// gnyen po med pa'i rnam pas thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// thog ma nas dri ma med pa'o// thog ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di
103b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar gzugs can dang gzugs med pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi khams la rnam par gzigs shing sems can rnams la dag
103b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po la 'jug go// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dag pa dang / 
104a1(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par lhun gyis grub pas rtag tu 'jug ste/ phyis btang bar bya ba med cing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma
104a2(dkon brtsegs): lus par thogs pa med do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni mtha' yas mu med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni na mkha'i
104a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med the tsom mi za ba nas// 
104a4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs/ 
104a5(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// rtsa ba med cing gnasamed par/ sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ ji ltar rtogs pa de bzhin du// srog chags rnams ni kun
104a6(dkon brtsegs): la ston// nang gi mig ni stong pa ste// phyi rol gzugs kyang stong pa'o// zhi dang nye bar zhi ba dang // sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ zhi dang nye bar zhi ba ste// sems can khong du ma chud pas// 
104a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig den rtogs nas sems can la// de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // rnam dag na mkha' 'dra ba de// sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas// de dag la
104a8(dkon brtsegs): yang snying rje 'jug/ chos rnams kun la 'dzin pa dang // rab tu 'dzin pa yod ma yin// blang med dor ba med pa yi// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ sems can 'di dag mi shes pas
104b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ mtshan ma med cing dmigs pa med// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di// byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ gang dag mi
104b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas bcings pa yi// so so'i skye bo mi shes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la// snying rje chen pos rab tu 'jug/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'dus ma byas// skye ba med cing 'jig pa
104b3(dkon brtsegs): med/ de la gnas pa yod min to// mtshan nyid gsum las rnam par grol// 'dus byas rnams kyi rang bzhin no// byis pas khong du mi chud pas// de dag la yang snying rje 'jug/ tshul
104b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di gang gis sangs rgyas pa// byang chub las kyis mi rtog/ nga ste// sems kyis kyang ni 'tshang mi rgyu// lus ni khams dpo'i rang bzhin te// sems kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o// lus dang
104b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rang bzhin te// byis pas khong du ma chud pas// tshul 'di khong du chud gyur nas// de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ rang byung ba ni byang chub dam pa rgya chen mchog
104b6(dkon brtsegs): reg ste// shing mchog drung du bzhugs nas sems can khams la rnam par gzigs// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor zhugs shing 'gro rgyud sna tshogs 'khyam gyur pa// de dag gzigs nas
104b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug/ nga dang rgyags pa dag la chags shing lta ba'i dra bas gzigs// sdug bsngal bde dang mi rtag rtag dang sdug par 'du shes shing // bdag
104b8(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can dang ni srog du lta bar chags pa rnams// gzigs nas de dag la ni sangs rgyas snying rje mi bzad 'jug/ sems can khams ni gti mug ling rtog khebs shing bsgrib
105a1(dkon brtsegs): pa kun na nyi ma sprin khebs bzhin du snang med lam med mi 'gyur ba// de dag gzigs nas ye shes smra ba dri med 'ong bya zhes// de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni
105a2(dkon brtsegs): snying rje mi bzad 'jug/ ngan song 'gro bar zhugs shing lam stong rab tu 'khyams pa rnams// sems can sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yod btags rgyu lhung ba// de dag gzigs
105a3(dkon brtsegs): nas sngon gyis rgyal bas bsnyen pa'i lam bstan ces// de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi bzad 'jug/ de bzhin nyid ltar de bzhin nyid du chos rnams thad ni// na mkha' mtshungs
105a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra de dag ma bcings ma grol rab mkhyen te// 'gro ba dag cing bzang ba'i chos rnams mi shes gzigs na su// de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snyi rje ma bzad 'jug/ 
105a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad // yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi med
105a6(dkon brtsegs): the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// 
105a7(dkon brtsegs): bam po bdun pa/ yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ 
105a8(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag ste/ chos de dag dang ldan pas
105b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gan su zhal gyis 'chi ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig
105b2(dkon brtsegs): rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir lus kyi 'khrul
105b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang 'thun par rgol bar byed pa'i lus kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
105b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni lus kyi las 'khrul pa med pa ste/ de bzhin gshedags pa'i spyod lam mdzes pas kun tu gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / skum pa dang
105b5(dkon brtsegs): brkyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa dang / mngon du gshegs pa dang / slar gshegs pa dang / byon pa dang
105b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung ba na zhabs kyi mthil swa la mi reg ste/ 'khor lo rtsibs
105b7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa sa las 'byung zhing dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad+ma mngon par 'byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'jog go// de la gang dud 'gro'i skye gan su song ba'i sems can dag
105b8(dkon brtsegs): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la reg na/ de dag zhag bdun du rab tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ras kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// 
106a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg mod kyi/ rnam par 'thor rlung gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so// sku'i 'od kyis mnar med
106a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// yang shA ri'i bu gang gis phyir ngag 'khrul pa gang
106a3(dkon brtsegs): las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang 'thun par rgol bar byed pa'i ngagi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus su
106a4(dkon brtsegs): smra ba/ yang dag par smra ba/ bden par smra ba/ tshig su smra ba/ ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'o// shin tu nges dpa'i tshig go/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i
106a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig go// mi bzlos pa'i tshig go// don dang yi ges shin tu brgyan pa'i tshig go// skad cig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/ de'i
106a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// yang shA ri'i bu sems 'khrul pa gang las byis pa'am/ mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pas rgol
106a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po mi 'dor zhing
106a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi gtong zhing chos thams cad la de'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la
106b1(dkon brtsegs): sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul pa med pa de ltar sems can rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ 
106b2(dkon brtsegs): dang po'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ca co gang las bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu'am gzhan mu stegs can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba'i ca co de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// 
106b3(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co 'am/ rje su ca co 'byin pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rje su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba ste/ sems can thams cad
106b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bkur bsti byas kyang thos par mi sems/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur bsti ma byas kyang 'khrugadapa med do// de gang las 'gyod pa 'am/ rje su ca co
106b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byin par 'gyur ba'i bya ba mchog gam/ mthar phyin/ pa ci'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod pas de'i phyir de
106b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ste/ nga'i ba med 'dzin pa med len pa med mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / 
106b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do// ji ltar de la ca co med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi
106b8(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'das pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bsnyel ba gang las chos gang la yang rmongs par 'gyur ba'i bsnyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// bsam gtan
107a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba la rnam
107a2(dkon brtsegs): par blta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rmongs pa med do// so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir kun tu nyams pa med do// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar la thogs
107a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa la kun tu nyams pa med do// ji ltar bdag kun tu nyams pa
107a4(dkon brtsegs): med cing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar la tho gas pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de ltar sems can thams cad brjed ngas par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i
107a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs
107a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal tam/ bshos gsol lam/ gsung ngam/ cang mi gsung bar gyur kyang rung ste/ rtag tu mnyam par
107a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhag cing ting nge 'dzin zab mo dam pa'i mthar phyin pa sgrib pa med pa'i bas gtan la bas gtan byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na// 
107a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang mnyam par gzhag kyang rung / mnyam par ma gzhag kyang rung ste/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems lta bar nus pa med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag/ 
107b1(dkon brtsegs): tu mnyam par bzhag pa de ltar ting nge 'dzin la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang shA
107b2(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang las/ sems mi mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' bzhin du
107b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can tha dad pa'i 'du shes
107b4(dkon brtsegs): med do// chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas dkyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// 'dod chags dang
107b5(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la chos tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems can la yang
107b6(dkon brtsegs): rje su chags pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang khong khro ba med/ phan par gyur pa yang lan du phan 'dogs pa med/ gnod par gyur pa la yang gnod par byed pa med/ 'dul
107b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'os pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du ma yin/ log par nges pa'i sems can la yang smon pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos tha~Md mnyam par gnas te/ de'i phyir de
107b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi tha dad pa'i 'du shes spang
108a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtag
108a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i btang snyoms med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni lam bsgoms pa ma yin te/ lam ni bsgoms pa'i ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang
108a3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms ni sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa yin te/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni
108a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang ldan pa yin te/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i rnam par
108a5(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba yin la 'phags pa ma yin pa nges par mi 'byung ba ma yin no// de
108a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ sems can la snying rje dang bral ba ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni rang gi ngang gis
108a7(dkon brtsegs): grub pa ste/ gnyen po'i rje su song ba ni ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de ni mtho ba yang ma yin/ dma' ba yang ma yin ste/ mtho dman med par gnas
108a8(dkon brtsegs): pab mi g.yo bar gyur pa/ gnyis dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa dus las lta ba dus las ma yol ba/ mi g.yo ba/ rlom sems med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam
108b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi brtags pa/ ma bsgoms pa/ bstan du med pa/ yang dag pa de kho na de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni
108b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i btang snyoms phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
108b3(dkon brtsegs): pa drug pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// de la 'dun pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o// de yang gang zhe na/ de bzhin
108b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa byams pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// snying rje chen po la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// chos ston pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// sems can 'dul ba/ 
108b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// byang chub sems dpar yang dag par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// dkon
108b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
108b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa'o// sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// 
108b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can la yal bar mi
109a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sde snod nyan pa gang bskal par
109a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu brnyes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston cing zhal zas dang bral ba'i rgyud kyi skal par yang mi bzhengs so// de bzhin gshegs pa sems
109a3(dkon brtsegs): can la blta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhud de/ de bzhin gshegs
109a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la lus ngal ba 'am/ ngag ngal ba 'am/ sems ngal ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o// 
109a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa gsung ba de/ brtson 'grus/ kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba gang gis sems can 'phags pa'i rnam par grol pa thob par 'gyur
109a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngags par mdzad de/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i
109a7(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad du/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dran pa nyams pa med cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni bsnyel ba med do// / 
109a8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
109b1(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis shin tu dran pa bsnyel ba med do// sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du
109b2(dkon brtsegs): shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyis btang bar bya ba med do// phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang / sems
109b3(dkon brtsegs): can gyi bsam par 'jug pa la sems kyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa yongasu nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni dran par bya
109b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtag par bya ba med kyang sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'bri bar ma 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i dran pa la
109b5(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med do// de ji ltar dran pas bdag dran cing ma brjed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
109b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin de ni chos thams cad
109b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa nyid de/ chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin las mi nyams she na/ de
109b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyamo// ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la bzhugs pas de'i phyir
110a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam par 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' de dang mnyam mo// zhe sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa zhe sdang med pa'i
110a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha'ang de dang mnyam mo// gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa/ gti mug med pa'i mtha'ang de dang mnyam mo// 'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dus ma byas kyi mtha'ang de dang
110a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam mo// 'khor ba'i mtha' gang dag mnyam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' de dang mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin
110a4(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med ces bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid de las mi nyams pa/ yongasu mi nyam so// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mig dang ldan pa ma yin/ 
110a5(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang ldan pa ma yin mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po/ ma tshang ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin ni sa'i khams la mi
110a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te/ mi gnas pas na nyams pa med do// / 
110a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni
110a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang mnyam pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab
110b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par shes pa'o// sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o// so so
110b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o// tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o// tshig gcig la 'jug pas/ bskal pa brgya stong du mi chad par ston par shes
110b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// ji lta bu ci 'dra zhes dris pa ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa'i shes pa'o// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o// theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o// 
110b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi steng yongasu shes pa'i shes pa'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ci rigs par yang dag par rab tu ston par
110b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o// 'di ni shes rab mi zad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha' yas mu med zad mi shes pa'o// gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i
110b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab nyams pa med pa de bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
110b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu gcig pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos rnams kyi rnam pa
110b8(dkon brtsegs): grol ba ni sgra'i rje su 'gro ba'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni rkyen khong du chud pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni chags pa dang gnyis su
111a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ste/ sngon gyi mthar yang ma bcings/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi 'pho// da ltar byung ba la yang mi
111a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ mig dang gzugs la gnyi su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / sgra dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya la gnyis su
111a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa las rnam par grol te/ mi 'dzin mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i rnam par grol ba'o// sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas de'i phyir sems kyi skad
111a4(dkon brtsegs): cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya'o// ji ltar mngon par rdzogs
111a5(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas pa da ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems/ can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
111a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo // lus kyi las de dang ldan pas de
111a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pas kyang sems can 'dul/ gsungs pas kyang sems can 'dul/ cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ bshos gsol bas kyang sems
111a8(dkon brtsegs): can 'dul/ spyod lam gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ dpe byad bzang pos kyang sems can 'dul/ gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang / bltas
111b1(dkon brtsegs): patsam dang / 'od gtong ba dang / gom pa 'dor ba dang / 'jog pa dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod/ 
111b2(dkon brtsegs): lam gang gis kyang sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo // 
111b3(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du
111b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o// khyad par lung ston pa'o// shin tu nges
111b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig smra ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag da yang kun shes par byed pa rnam par shes par byed pa/ mi mtho/ mi dma' ba/ ma yo/ 'dar 'dar po ma yin
111b6(dkon brtsegs): pa|gya gyu med pa/ mi brlang ba/ mi rtsub pa/ gzing gzing ba ma yin/ gnyen pa/ yid du 'ong ba ma 'chal pa/ lag log med pa/ mi 'tshe ba/ mi myur ga/  rab tu myur ba ma yin pa
111b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu nges pa'i tshig rab tu gnyen pa/ shin tu snyan pa/ dbyangs snyan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ bsgrags pa/ des pa/ 'jam pa/ phan pa dang bcas pa/ 
111b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur ba/ mchod par 'gyur ba/ mdzes pa/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ tha ba med pa/ dri ma med pa/ ma rmongs pa/ gsal ba/ thogs pa med pa/ yang dag par
112a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba/ 'od gsal ba/ drang ba/ 'jungs pa ma yin pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/ dig rig po ma yin pa/ bde ba bskyed pa/ lus sim par byed pa/ sems tshim
112a2(dkon brtsegs): pabapar byed pa/ 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa/ zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/ gti mug sel ba/ bdud 'joms pa/ sdig pa sel ba/ rgol ba 'dul ba/ go bar byed pa/ rnga'i sgra mkhas pa/ 
112a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed pa/ ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs/ dbang po'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sgra/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra/ sprin gyi sgra/ sa'i sgra dbyangs/ khrung khrung gi sgra/ rma bya'i sgra/ khu byug gi sgra
112a4(dkon brtsegs): shang shang ti'u'i sgra/ ngang pa'i sgra skad/ ri dgas kyi nga rgyal po'i sgra/ khong duhu dang pi bang dang / mkhar rnga dang / dung dang / sil snyan dang / rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra/ 
112a5(dkon brtsegs): kun shes par 'gyur ba/ rnam par shes par 'gyur/ ba/ zur phyin pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mnyan par 'o sa pa/ zab pa/ lkugs shing dag pa/ ma yin pa/ bde ba/ 
112a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ tshig dang yi ge ma nyams pa/ shin tu nges par smra ba/ tshig 'bru dang / don gyi tshig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/ dus dang ldan pa/ tshod dang ldan
112a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dus las mi 'da' ba/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bstan pa/ sbyin pas brgyan pa/ tshul khrims kyis sbyangs pa/ bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus kyis
112a8(dkon brtsegs): 'bar bar byas pa/ bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/ shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa/ byams pas shin tu bsags pa/ snying rje mi skye ba/ dga' ba'i 'od gsal
112b1(dkon brtsegs): ga btang snyoms nges par brtags pa/ theg pa gsum rnam par 'jog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa/ phung po gsum 'jog pa/ rnam par thar pa gsum sbyong
112b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bden pa yongasu bsgoms pa ye shes yongasu bsgoms pa/ mkhas pas ma smad pa/ 'phags pas bstod pa/ na mkha' tshad med pa'i rjesu song ba/ rnam pa'i mchog thod
112b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de 'dra ste/ de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
112b4(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gdagus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu de bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
112b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems kyis brjod pa ma yin// 
112b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
112b7(dkon brtsegs): shes de yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rje su song ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rje su zhugs pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa las rab tu dben pa'o// 
112b8(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o// dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o// rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o// srid pa gsuM
113a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'gro ba sel ba'o// nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'o// bdud kyi las thams cad las nges par grol ba'o// sgyu dang g.yo thams cad dang bral
113a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spangs pa'o// ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang ling tog med pa'o// lam gyi yan lag shin tu yongasu bsgoms pa'o// nam mkha' dang
113a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las so// shA ri'i bu 'di na
113a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i dus ral de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchags ma thogs pa'i
113a5(dkon brtsegs): shas mthong ba 'jug pa'o// ji ltar 'jug ce na 'di la shA/ ri'i bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis
113a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtsa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to// sangs rgyas
113a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi tshogs sems can du btags pa byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to// de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa la
113a8(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa rgyas par bya ste sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan cing brjod pa ji snyed pa yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro// sems can ji snyed nyan thos
113b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pas btul ba dang / ji snyed rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pas btul ba yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// dge slong gi dge 'dun
113b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par phye ba dang tshe'i tshad rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// chos gnas pa rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// zas kyi mchog
113b3(dkon brtsegs): gi longs spyod kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po tha dad pa
113b4(dkon brtsegs): dang spyod pa tha dad pa dang bsam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu mkhyen te// sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag
113b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum gyi ye shes dang rje su 'gro ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu ma khyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa la 'das par gtong // 
113b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems can gyi bsam pa la nyams pa med par chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de
113b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong
113b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'jug// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang 'byung ba mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to// bskal
114a1(dkon brtsegs): bas tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par
114a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / rtsa dang shing gel pa dang sman drang nags tshal ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba
114a3(dkon brtsegs): dang skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs
114a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji skyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / zas kyi longs spyod dang
114a5(dkon brtsegs): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang / 'chag pa dang 'dug pa dang / spyod lam ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab 'byam re re las sems
114a6(dkon brtsegs): can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang / sems can ji snyed thag pa chen po'i rnam par thar par 'gyur ba de dag zad
114a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re na sems can skye ba'i gnas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sems dang sems las 'byung
114a8(dkon brtsegs): ba skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag zad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs
114b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyi rgyud la bskal par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa la gzigs pas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
114b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug// ji ltar 'jug
114b3(dkon brtsegs): cen 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum gyis rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi chos thad rab tu mkhyen to// 
114b4(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de ba bzhin du da ltar gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs tham/ 
114b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi rtsa dang shing gal ba dang sman dang nags tshal thams cad kyang rab tu ma na to// da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab
114b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdul gyi char blags pa thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams skra'i rtse mos blangs pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu
114b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen ton phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba skyes pa dang / 'gags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad
114b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzugs kyis bsgrub pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i khams thams cad skra'i rtse mo'i cha shos kyis bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// 
115a1(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gyi sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i
115a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi dud 'gro'i skye gan su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// / 
115a3(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu
115a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// da ltar gyi mi'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// 
115a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen// to// de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'ang rab tu
115a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to// 'dul ba ma yin pa'i
115a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rje su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med do// gnyi su med pa la
115a8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
115b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad du 'khor gyi nang du gzi brjid dang / grags
115b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang dpal dang / ngo mtshar dang / smad du byung ba'i chos nyid kyi 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas lham mo ldan ne lha de'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
115b3(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha' yas mu med do// 'di lta ste shA ri Ta na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de yid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang mtha' yas mu
115b4(dkon brtsegs): med do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dam 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni na mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
115b5(dkon brtsegs): chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag thos nas mngon par dad yid che sa/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi mi byed/ the tshom mi za/ rgya
115b6(dkon brtsegs): cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing na mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas
115b7(dkon brtsegs): don 'di bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo // 'dren pa la ni 'khrul pa yong med de// lus dang ngag rnams dong ni sems mi g.yo// de bzhin srog chags rnams la
115b8(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// khengs par mi 'gyur la dud par mi 'gyur te// khong khro rje su chags nas mngon par 'das// nyon mongs med la gnas shing nyon
116a1(dkon brtsegs): mongs grol// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'dren pa la ni dran pa snyel ba med// rnam par spyod yul chos ni mngon par mkhyen// so so yang dag rig pa snyel
116a2(dkon brtsegs): med de/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// mnyam par gzhag pas bzhugs shing bshos kyang gsol// 'chag dang mnal ba na yang mnyam par gzhag/ g.yeng ba med cing sems
116a3(dkon brtsegs): can 'du shes med// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rgyal ba dang ni zhing dang sems can la// tha dad 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med// bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la gan/ 
116a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// de dag la ni ma brtags btang snyoms med// shin tu nges pa'i lam ni rab bsgoms pas// de la rtog dang rnam par rtog med de// 
116a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med// ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor na/ sems can rgya chen dpag tu med pa 'dul// de ni
116a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// nam yang brtson 'grus la ni nyams pa med// 'dul ba mtha' dang pha rol med mthong nas// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis 'dul// de ni rgyal ba
116a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// byang chub snying por sangs rgyas byang chub par// de yi dran pa rnam par chud mi za// gang chos rtog pa de ni rtogs bya min// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos
116a8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog med par// rang byung ting 'dzin la mnyam gnas kyang // chos rnams kun la mi gnas bsam gtan byed// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'dren
116b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab kyis ni rab ston cing // sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing // de dag la ni bsam bzhin chos kyang 'chad// 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// nyan thos rnams
116b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grol sgra phyir 'gro/ rang rgyal gyi ni rkyen gyi 'du shes te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang snyoms bsam mi khyab// chags las rab 'das dri med na mkha' bzhin// sems kyi rgyud
116b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di rang bzhin rnam grol te// sems ni sngon nas bcing bar 'gyur ba med// ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos ston te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// gshegs dang bzhugs dang
116b4(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer 'jug pa dang // spyod lam dag ni mthong na mig kyang da'aphog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po dang // mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul bar bzhugs
116b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can snying po nam zhog 'od gtong che// srog chags bya ba mang po bde 'gyur te// 'od kyis reg pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gyur// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres
116b6(dkon brtsegs): chos// rang byung ba ni gsung shig brjod pas na// sems can bsam pa bzhin du gsung thos te// brag cha lta bur de yi gsung yang thos// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ye shes
116b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni 'dren pa'i las byas te// bde bar gshegs la sems las cung zad med// sems can bsam la ye shes rje su zhugs// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ting 'dzin bsam
116b8(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang ni rab ldan te// spros pa thams cad kyi yang rgyu ba med// na mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// 'das pa'i dus na de yi ye shes zhug/ 
117a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam 'byed shes pa yi// chos rnams kun la sgrib pa med par 'jug/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig
117a2(dkon brtsegs): rten du// 'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // sems can zhing dang rgyal ba bshad pa dang // de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus mkhyen// ma 'ongs de la rjesu rab lta zhing // 
117a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sems can rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen// de yi sems ni g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dag/ thaMd rgyal bas
117a4(dkon brtsegs): chags med rab tu mkhyen// 'dren pa'i spyod yul na mkha' da lta bu ste// de na rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad
117a5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin gshegs ba na mkha' 'dra bar ni// dad mkhas byang chub sem sa dpa' dad par byed// shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
117a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du
117a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs na seng+ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs cing khyu mchog gnasu zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun
117a8(dkon brtsegs): bar ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa
117b1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dad / yid ches/ rab tu rtog/ som nyi med byed/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
117b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // bam po brgyad pa// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs
117b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas de'i drung du gshegs
117b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par ston to// de lta bas na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang de lta ra dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
117b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rnam grangs kyi/ snod du rig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas
117b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i drung du gshegs te/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston pa de ltar rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pas kyang chas grang
117b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ yangs ga tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig
117b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig
118a1(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung ste/ gang 'di ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / 
118a2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/ bsgrubs nas gnaso// de chos ston te tshangs par spyod pa thog mor dge ba/ 
118a3(dkon brtsegs): bar du dge ba/ tha mar dag gdon bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// shA ri'i bu de
118a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khri dag phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi tshogs
118a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go// 
118a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de'i dus na rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung ngo // yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po chen po che rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal/ 
118a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa med pa bde ba lo legs pa dga' ba 'gro ba mang po dang mis gang ba zhig yod do// yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u
118a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba bya ba byas pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ gzugs
118b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mdog bzangs zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig/ 
118b2(dkon brtsegs): du bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos e ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub
118b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod do// e ma'o gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do zhes de de ltar rig nas bskyed mos tshal
118b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis ga la ba dang / gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stong gi bar snang la bzhugs te/ gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang
118b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu ston to// de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe/ na 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bsdu
118b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rje su 'jug pa ste/ de ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// de la sems can thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can
118b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams ji tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do// sems can gyi ji tsam zhe na/ na mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems kyi khams kyang de tsam mo// gzhon nu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i
118b8(dkon brtsegs): khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do// gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang
119a1(dkon brtsegs): yang med do// 'di lta ste gzhonu sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bsgom pa yang dpag tu med do// 
119a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu de ltar na mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas pa/ sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so// gzhon nu yang sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi/ 
119a3(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams de lta ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang gzhon nu sems can chad med pa ji tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe
119a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// gzhon nu 'di lta ste dper na shar phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du phyogs
119a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten rgya khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad chus yongasu gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya
119a6(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur pa la yongasu brtag par gzung ste/ de la sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thig pa gcig blangs/ 
119a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gnyis pa blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus
119a8(dkon brtsegs): nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gsum blangs na/ gzhon nu yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po zad par 'gyur kyang / sems
119b1(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams ni tshad dang mtha' med de/ gzhon nu sems can gyi khams de ltar dpag tu med cing de ltar mtha' yas pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par
119b2(dkon brtsegs): byed do// gzhon nu de ji snyam du sems/ gang de ltar dpag tu med par byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad bzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags
119b3(dkon brtsegs): so/ bde bar gshegs pa ma lagaso// gzhon de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni dpag tu med pa yin te/ 
119b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu de'i byams pa ni bdag bsrung ba yin/ gzhan de la phan par gnas pa yin/ mchog tu gnod sems med/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba dang bral ba nye bar
119b5(dkon brtsegs): 'joms pa rje su chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ dad pa kun ston pa 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes/ par blta ba/ yongasu gdung ba med pa lus dang ngag dang
119b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bde ba bskyed pa/ gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad du ma lhung ba 'dzags pa thams cad dang bral ba/ 'phags pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ gshe ba dang / khros pa la dang ba
119b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/ g.yul thams cad las sgrol ba/ dbyig pa dang mtshon tsham thogs pa/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshul 'chos
119b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / kha gsag dang / 'drid pa dang / gzhogs slongs thams cad dang bral ba/ rang gi rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang tshigasu bcad pas nye bar 'tshe ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs
120a1(dkon brtsegs): bas phyag byas pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa/ mkhas pas bstod pa/ byis pa thams cad rje su bsrung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ 'dod pa'i
120a2(dkon brtsegs): khams la ma 'dres pa/ thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa/ theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ rdzas
120a3(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad du zil gyis mi non pa/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos yang dag pas brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams
120a4(dkon brtsegs): shing ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/ bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/ ngan song thams cad dang / mi khom pa brgyad las
120a5(dkon brtsegs): bzlog pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la ni dga' zhing mos/ pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang / dbang / po dang / rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba/ sems
120a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/ tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgro dang lam/ tshul khrims
120a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa thams cad kyi skyabs/ bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ yang
120a8(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i sbyor ba'i bya ba sgrol ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba nyon mongs pa las byung ba sems nges par rtog/ 
120b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thos pa 'dzin pas shes rab kyi rgyu bskyed pa'i byams pa bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba/ 'grogs na bde ba/ ldang ba
120b2(dkon brtsegs): dang slong ba dang 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam bsrung bar byed pa/ rgod pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad sel ba/ dri zhim pos byugs pa/ khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha/ 
120b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pas byugs pa/ mi khom pa dang nyon mongs pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa dang 'gro ba thams cad skyong ba'i byams pa chen po bdag gi bde ba btang ba/ sems
120b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa ste/ gzhon nu nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni sems
120b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la skyob pa'o// yang gzhon byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byam sa pa ni sems can la dmigs pa'o// byang chub sems/ 
120b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byamos pa ni chos la dmigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi byams pa ni dmigs pa med po// gzhon 'di
120b7(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad la byams pas
120b8(dkon brtsegs): khyab par byed do// de la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/ 
121a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di lta ste dper na gzhonu skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'o// gnyenu de
121a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di lta ste dper na gzhon nu 'khor las bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po
121a3(dkon brtsegs): che thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni 'khor lo rin po che yin no// gzhonu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba
121a4(dkon brtsegs): ni snying rje chen po yin te/ snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad rje su mi gtong ba'o// gzhon byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la
121a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'jug ce na/ gzhon 'di ltar byang chub sems/ dpas 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing lta/ bar gyur pa rnam pa mang po la chags pa'i sems can
121a6(dkon brtsegs): dag mthong na/ de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// 
121a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la
121a8(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na de dag gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyi / 
121b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems can de dag ma la
121b2(dkon brtsegs): yang g.yem pa dang / sring mo la g.yem par mthong na byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dus pa
121b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ mu cor smra bas yongasu gang zhing ngo tsha mi shes pas yongasu gang ngo // 'di ltar ma'i rum ma'i mngal gyi nang na 'dug ste/ de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung la de nyid dang yang
121b4(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu 'dod pa bsten par byed pa lta ga la srid/ mngal gcig na lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i srid da mo dang lhan cig 'du zhing 'khrig par byed pa lta ga la
121b5(dkon brtsegs): srid de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni brlago// rnam par brlago/ rab tu brlago/ 'dod chags kyis g.ye/ na spro'o// zhe sdang gis g.yen spyi'o// gti mug gis
121b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yen spro'o// mi shes pas g.yan spro'o// chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so// mi mthun pa'i chos la rab tu spyod do// sems can dmyal ba la spyod yul ba'o// 
121b7(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas spyod yul pa'o// gshin rje'i 'jig rten spyod yul pa'o// log pa'i lam la spyod yul pa'o// snyam mo/ gzhon nu 'di lta ste dbor na wa du khrod kyi mthar
121b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yang sa chen po dang nye ba zhig na mtshan mo khyis gtses nas g.yongs chen po nas lhung ba de bzhin du gzho nu sems can 'di dag kyang wa dang 'dra'o// gzhonu 'di lta ste dper na
122a1(dkon brtsegs): dmus long khyis gtses na g.yang sa chen po dang nye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du kye ma'o gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o// gzhon 'di lta ste
122a2(dkon brtsegs): dper na phag gi mi gtsang ba za zhing mi gtsang ba la spyod yul ba ste/ gzhon nu kye ma'o de gzhin du sems can 'di dag kyang phag dang 'dra ste/ de nyid ma yin/ de nyid sring ma yin na/ 
122a3(dkon brtsegs): de chung mar bya ba lta ga la srid snyam ste/ sems can nyon mongs pas g.yen spro ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba dang / bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang / 'dod pa'i
122a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dam bu bying ba de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad spang dpa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu
122a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sgrib pa lngas bsgri bas pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa/ mthong na skye mched drug la chags shing zhe na na/ mig gis
122a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mthong na mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mngon rtag su 'dzin pa dang / rna bas sgra/ snas dri/ lces ro/ lus kyis reg pa la reg nas/ mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon
122a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khong khro mang zhing phan tshun mi mdza' ste/ de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir ni mdza' bor yang mi shes gnod par 'gyur ba'i
122a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir ni gcig la gcig gsod do// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni gnyid dang rmugs pa mang ba ste/ zhan cing glen pa mi shes pa'i ling tog gis khyebs shing mi dge ba'o// / 
122b1(dkon brtsegs): kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni mgyod pas kun nas bskor ba ste blo bur gyi nyon mongs pas sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni the tshom gyis yongs su
122b2(dkon brtsegs): bkris pa chos zab mo la nges par ma gyur pa ste/ de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spang pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po
122b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis non pa che ba'i nga rgyal gyis non pa nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis non pa nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis
122b4(dkon brtsegs): non pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ log pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ dma' ba las bdag mtho bar sems pa
122b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa bas kyang bdag ches lhag par lta ba de ngag gzugs la bdag ces khas len pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag ces khas len pa khong du ma
122b6(dkon brtsegs): chud par khong du chud snyam du shes pa/ gus par smra bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba/ phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi 'tshal ba/ rgan pa dang / gzhon pa la mi 'dud pa bla ma la
122b7(dkon brtsegs): rim gro mi byed pa/ mkhas pa la dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / bsten par bya ba gang / bsten par mi bya ba gang / bya ba gang / mi bya ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang
122b8(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / lam gang / ting nge 'dzin gang rnam par grol ba gang zhes mi 'dri ba dang / bdag nyid la bdag ni gtso bo// bdag ni mchog go snyam du rlom sems su
123a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mthong na 'di ltar nga rgyal gyis rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug// 
123a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas srid pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/ sred pas 'khol ba/ chung ma dang / bu bo dang / bu mos zin pa/ gnod pas zin pa/ don med
123a3(dkon brtsegs): bas zin pa 'khro gtan pas zin pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyis zin pa/ srid pa'i bcing bas zin pa/ rang
123a4(dkon brtsegs): nyam med pa/ rang dbang med pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro
123a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnam sa la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i
123a6(dkon brtsegs): bshos gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i grogs pas 'khor ba de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos non pas mi dge ba'i lam la chags pa la 'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par
123a7(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang log par lta ba'i
123a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can mthong na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsdu ba dang / mi dge ba'i lam las bzlog pa dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung ste spyod par bya ba'i chos
123b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis bsgribs pa ma rig pa'i mun pa mun
123b2(dkon brtsegs): nag gi ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed
123b3(dkon brtsegs): ba po dang / tsher ba po dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang zhing lta
123b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa thad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes se mas can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
123b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ma/ thong na/ de dag phung po lnga'i gshed ma las rab tu/ thar par bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'breg dgon pa las
123b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'da' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhon nu
123b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa rtse mun dza dang / bal ba dza lta bur mi drang ba/ drang ba ltar 'chos pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol
123b8(dkon brtsegs): tu 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba la phyogs pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la phyir bltas pa mthong na de dag
124a1(dkon brtsegs): gi mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu de ltar byang chub
124a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems can gyi khams mthong na/ rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go// bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang g.yo ba med par
124a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug/ lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang mnyam par 'jug go// lam las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang drang po bcos ma ma yin
124a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug go// sems gya gyu med pa'i sems la shin tu gnas pa las byung ba'i phyir/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang gya gyu med par 'jug go// 'di lta ste sems can
124a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'dud pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi/ bde ba gtong bar 'jug go// 'di lta ste bdag gi sems
124a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang pha rol rjesu bsrung bar 'jug go// 'di lta ste g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba/ rab tu gnas pa'i sems las
124a7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang shes rab brtan par 'jug go/ 'di lta ste pha rol la bde ba sbyin pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba btong
124a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug go// brtson 'grus brtan pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer bar 'jug ste/ gzhonu 'di ltar byang chub sems
124b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'jug go// gzhon nu 'di ltar gang la la theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snying
124b2(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos 'byung ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// sbyin pa byed pa dang / tshul khrims byed pa dang / bzod pa byed pa dang / brtson 'grus byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa dang / 
124b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag par byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba byed pas snying rje chen po'o// dbang po dang / stob
124b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i las dang / mthar gyis snyoms pa/ dar 'jug pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / 
124b5(dkon brtsegs): tshig de dag thams cad kyis rgyas par bya'o// snying rje chen po ni rang byung gi ye shes bsgrub par byed pas na/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// rang gi bya ba dang / 
124b6(dkon brtsegs): legs par byed pa bya ba dang / mi 'gyur ba'i bya ba dang sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod snyam pa ste de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
124b7(dkon brtsegs): du yongasu rdzogs par byed pas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de dang ldan pas
124b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di 'dra ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na/ de dag la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje'i sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dge ba'i chos rnams
125a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang rje su dran pa dang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mi zhum pa dang / mi 'gong ba dang / yongasu mi skyo ba dang / mi dga'
125a2(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad spong ba dang / chos thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / lus rab tu tshim pa dang / blo rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu mgu ba dang / 
125a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun tu tshol ba la dga' ba dang / chos nyan pas yongs su mi skyo zhing dga'
125a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i nan tan la rab tu dga' ba da dang / rab tu dga' ba chos la mgu ba dang / sems ra can la khong khro ba med pa dang / byang chubo la dga' ba
125a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa sel bar sems bskyed pa dang / ser sna tshar gcod pa dang / slong ba la dga' ba dang / gtong ba la/ 
125a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dag sdud cing byams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongasu dag pas ngan 'gro dang / 
125a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu dga' bar dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / pha rol ngan du zer ba dang / ngan par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga'
125a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo bcad kyang bzod par nus te/ sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang / rgan rabs la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dga'
125b1(dkon brtsegs): bdang / rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang / khro gnyer med cing gsong por smra ba la dga' ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha bsag dang / gzhogs spongs med pa la
125b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i chos 'jug pa rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du bangs pa dang / chos la bdag bzhin du phangs pa
125b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du phangs pa dang / bla ma la pha ma bzhin du phangs pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du phangs pa dang / slob dpon la mig
125b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du phangs pa dang / nan tan la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la lag pa dang / rkang pa bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos
125b5(dkon brtsegs): smra ba la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos yongasu tshol ba la sman bzhin du phangs pa dang / bskul zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du phangs
125b6(dkon brtsegs): bar sems pa'o// gzhon nu 'di ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba de la rab tu gnas nas/ rtag tu chos tshol ba la dga' bar 'gyur te/ 
125b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa la mi skyo'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms gang zhe na/ btang snyems rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta
125b8(dkon brtsegs): ste nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rje su bsrung ba'i btang snyoms pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms
126a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ gang bkur bsti byas kyang mthor mi sems pa dang / bkur bsti ma byas kyang dma' bar mi sems pa dang / rnyed pas snyems pa med pa dang / 
126a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed pas yid mi 'chad pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa la blo mnyam pa dang / grags pa la dga' ba med pa dang / ma grags pa la zhum pa
126a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / smad pa la yid smod pa dang / bstod pa la chos nyid du shin tu gnas pa dang / sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bde ba la mi rtag par rtog pa'i stob
126a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rje su chags pa 'dor ba dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang // legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa la gnyisu
126a5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la mi lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' ba dang / mi dga' bar bya ba med pa dang / 
126a6(dkon brtsegs): snyan par smra ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba la rje su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa dang / kun myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongasu 'jal ba dang / bdag dang sems can gzhan
126a7(dkon brtsegs): la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems can rab 'bring tha ma la 'od zer mnyam pa dang / bsngags pa dang mi bsngags pa la chos nyid mnyam pa dang
126a8(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / mi bden pa la bdag gi bden pa yongasu dag pa ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar gang bdag la gnod par byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no// / 
126b1(dkon brtsegs): de la bdag dang gzhan rje su srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ gang yan lag dang / nying lag gi sha bcad kyang btang snyoms pa yin no// yan lag dang / nying lag gi sha bcad kyang
126b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa med cing / tshol ba med de/ btang snyoms pa yin no// lus kyang mi 'gyur/ ngag kyang mi 'gyur te/ gnyis ka bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// mig gi rnam pas ma
126b3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ gzugs kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyis kas kyang rma mi phyin pa nas yid kyis rnam pa dang / chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir tang snyoms zhes bya'o// rma mi phyin
126b4(dkon brtsegs): cing snad pa med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// rma byung ba la rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms da zhes bya'o// bdag dang pha rol gnyis ka las bzod pas
126b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// phan par byed pa dang / phan par mi byed pa la mnyam par spyod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// btang snyoms ni rtsod pa
126b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa lhur byed pa'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems nges par rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni bdag la so sor rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o// byang chub sems
126b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang snyoms pa gnang
126b8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'bad par bya'o// rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dag pa yongasu btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/ dus du su btang snyoms
127a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par bya'o// de la dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang
127a2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang ma smad pa dang ma grags pa dang sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / 
127a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims
127a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtson 'grus nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dus na tshul khrims kyi rjesu 'ju dag pa btang snyoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dus na sbyin
127a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang // shes rab kyi dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa ste/ 'di ni
127a6(dkon brtsegs): dus dus su btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o// de ltar gang mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa 'di na btang snyoms zhes bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i phyogs thams
127a7(dkon brtsegs): cad la btang snyomasu byed do// gzhon 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms zhes
127a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung pon po sa gzhon brtson 'grus spyod la byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms mdor bstan pa dang
127b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te/ rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// gzhonu brtson 'grus spyod pa des des de thos nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur to// byam
127b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi le'u ste lnga'o// // de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa drug/ 
127b3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol
127b4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
127b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag/ ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam so// de la sbyin pa'i pha/ rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub
127b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni dge sbyong dang bram ze dang phongs pa rnams kyi skyon bdag yin te/ 'di lta ste zas kyis phongs pa la zas/ skom gyis phongs pa la skom/ gzhon pa dang / gos dang / 
127b7(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / yo byad dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / mar me dang / sil snyan dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / 
127b8(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cad dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi
128a1(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams cad
128a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rtse dang / dga' ba thams cad dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mgro dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / rus pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
128a3(dkon brtsegs): yo byad gang yang slong ba la yongasu mi gtong ba med do// sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag pas sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi mthun
128a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i longs spyod yongasu tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ sems can la gno// pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig
128a5(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa la yongasu ma btang ba la 'gron du gnyeba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdong/ 
128a6(dkon brtsegs): du blta zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can tha dad par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
128a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sdang bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zhing tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can thams cad la sprin gnas ma yin zhes
128a8(dkon brtsegs): brnyas shing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongasu dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pade
128b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan rnam pa bcus yongasu dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
128b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bsam pa log par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongasu skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nas sbyin pa med/ byang
128b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la rje su mi dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan
128b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la bkur te sbyin pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal ba la de brnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par smin pa la re ba'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i
128b5(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yod/ su dag par sbyin par byed// gzhan yang shA ri 'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa
