128b6(dkon brtsegs): bcus yongasu dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smad nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin
128b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyon mongs pa med cing sbyin pa med/ khro ba dang phrag dog dang gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/ ri mor mi byed par sbyin pa med/ rang
128b8(dkon brtsegs): gi lag nas ma yin par sbyin pa med/ ji tsam du spags pa las dbri zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
129a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongasu dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongasu dag
129a2(dkon brtsegs): par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi brtan par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshed 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/ yongasu chad par sbyin
129a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ gzhan gyi dring 'jog ste sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/ gzugs dang longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub
129a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos
129a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngo zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams
129a6(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub
129a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongasu dag paro sbyin par byed de// bcu gang zhe na/ ji tsam du 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i
129a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ bza' ba byin nas tshe dang spobs pa dang bde ba dang
129b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang kha dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po// btung ba byin pas nyon mongs pa dang sred pa thams cad gsal ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gzhon pa byin pas bde/ 
129b2(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bge ba byin pas khral yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang gser ltar kha dog yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob
129b3(dkon brtsegs): bospos dang phreng ba byin pas tshul khrims dang thos pa dang ting 'dzin gyi dri dang byug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po// dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang / phye ma dang byug pa byin
129b4(dkon brtsegs): pas lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// ro byin pas ro bro ba'i nang na mchog gi ro bro ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phun sum tshogs
129b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu 'thob bo// gnas byin pas sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang rten dang gling dang skyabs dang dpung / gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po// nad pa
129b6(dkon brtsegs): la sman byin pas mi rgas mi 'chi shi ba med pa'i bde ba yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yo byad sna tshogs byin pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi yo byad
129b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su
129b8(dkon brtsegs): bzung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phan yon gzhan bcu rab tu 'thob po// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mar ma sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan
130a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// sil snyan byin pas lha'i rna ba yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gser dang
130a2(dkon brtsegs): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cad byin pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa phun
130a3(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ma tog sna tshogs byin pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob
130a4(dkon brtsegs): bo/ rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta byin pas rgyas pa dang yangs pa dang che ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'tho rab bo// skyed mos tshal dang dka' thub kyi nags tshal
130a5(dkon brtsegs): byin pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// 
130a6(dkon brtsegs): nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba byin pas chos rin po che thams cad kyi mdzod yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las
130a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i mi byin pas rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang rang byung gi ye shes yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bu pho dang / bu mo byin pas mdza' ba dang / sdug
130a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dod pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad byin
130b1(dkon brtsegs): bas byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu phan yon rnam pa bcu po de
130b2(dkon brtsegs): dag yongasu gzung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na sa yon gzhan yang bcu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan
130b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga byin pas tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu
130b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo// dga' ba'i rtse mo thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pas/ dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ba dang / rtse ba yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// 
130b5(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa byin pas chos kyi don gyi rkang pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// lag pa byin pas sems can thams
130b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la chos kyi lag pa rab tu byin pa yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po// rna ba dang sna byin pas dbang po ma tshang ba med cing yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa
130b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thob bo// yan lag dang nying lag byin pas kha na ma tho ba med cing / mdzes pa'i yan lag sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// mig
130b8(dkon brtsegs): byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi mig mi sgribs pa yongasu dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// sha dang khrag byin pas sems can thams cad kyi lus dang srog gi
131a1(dkon brtsegs): snying po med pa las snying po len pas nye bar 'tsho ba la mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rkang pa byin pas rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i lus 'thob pa phun
131a2(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi mchog bla na med cing ltag na med pa'i thams cad
131a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa ye shes yongasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ 'di
131a4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu rdzogs pa'i phan yo ngan de dag yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa zab po shes rab kyi snang
131a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag/ bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa/ 'dud rtsi 'dod/ snying po 'dod/ byang chub 'dod/ yang shA ri'i bu
131a6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong
131a7(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yang med do// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu khyim bdag chun pa zhing skam pa gnas nas pa glang dang / gnam sdod pa ma yin pa'i zhing gi rmo brko rdzogs par byas te/ sa bon btab na
131a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'dis gshol gyis 'tsho bas gser dang dngul yang 'grub bo// dngos po sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'bru dang / mtshungs pa'i nor medo// 
131b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri ri bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
131b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i dus dang tshod yod do// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu bas ni rtswa skam po dang gsher ba zes pa dang / chu grang mo dang dron mo 'thungs pa de las 'o ma 'grub ste/ zho dang mar gsar
131b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mar gyi snying po yang 'grub po// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi
131b4(dkon brtsegs): zang zing byin na de mi 'dod kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang yongasu 'grub po// brgya byin dang tshangs pa yang 'grub po// gnas de gsum yongasu grub nas byang chub
131b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sa bcu yongasu 'grub bo// de bzhin gshe gas pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongasu 'grub po// las stong gis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
131b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam kyang so su 'grub po// las stong gis 'grub pa'i rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa yang yongasu 'grub bo// las rgyas grub pa'i
131b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongasu 'grub bo// las nyis brgyas grub pa'i gtsug tor spyi bor 'grub po// rnam pa dang yon tan brgyas yongasu rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
131b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi dung chen po yang 'grub bo// rnam par bye ba dang yon tan brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa'i tshems kyi phreng ba dang thags bzang po phrag med pa snyoms shing dkar ba yang
132a1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'grub ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas mngon par 'grub bo// yang shA ri'i
132a2(dkon brtsegs): bu gang byams pa'i sems bskyed nas slong ba la sbyin pa byin pa da ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad pa gcig 'grub ste/ 
132a3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa spu'i bu ga re re nas ting nge 'dzin brgya gad+ma'i rgyun ltar mngon par sprul pa
132a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad la dbang thob pa'o// shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni de bzhin
132a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pas yongs su gzung ba yino// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mi
132a6(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba 'dod pa dang / byang chub 'dod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed do// shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis byang chub sems
132a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par gyis shig shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das
132a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus kyi bskal pa grags med pa shin tu grangs med pa/ tshad med pa/ bas mo gyis mi khyab pa gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
132b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chos mos shes bya ba rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ 
132b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos kyi tshe'i tshad ni le stong phrag
132b3(dkon brtsegs): bcur gyur to// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos de'i dge slong stong phrag brgya ni dgra bcom pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa na sems kyi dbang
132b4(dkon brtsegs): zad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste/ dgra bcom ra pa sha stag gi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo // shA ri'i bu da de'i tshe tha ga pa zhes bya ba thags 'thag pa gzugs bzang
132b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs
132b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas ha cang mi ring ba'i sa phyogs zhig na rang gi las byed do// de nyin ba re las byas nas nub kar khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe rtag tu dus thad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
132b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chos mos de'i drung du 'ongs nas ras kyi kha tshar gcig 'bul zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsdu ba'i gnas kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das la ras kyi kha
132b8(dkon brtsegs): tshar phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bsdu ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur/ 
133a1(dkon brtsegs): cig ces des rim gyis ras kha tshar stong lnga brgya phul te/ des bskal pa bye ba phrag bco lngar ngan 'gre log par ltung bar ma song ngo // dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ 
133a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo // de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis brgya byin gyi bdag po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo // dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jam pa yid du 'ong ba dang po
133a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas te/ des thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos
133a4(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba da na dang / gos dang / zhal zas dang / mal cha dang / ngan pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsti stang du byas// 
133a5(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas nas mchod do// da phyis bskal pa grangs med pa zhig bla na med pa yangadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
133a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nas/ rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
133a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das shes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de lo bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du gan so// de'i dgra bcom pa bya ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shu zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ 
133a8(dkon brtsegs): nas sems kyi dbang zad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar gyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag lnga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
133b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la bkod do// des chos bstan te/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i don byas nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// der bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan lnga
133b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas lo stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so// de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu nga da yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba bzhin no// / 
133b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu ras kyi kha tshar phul ba dang / sems bskyed pas kyang mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu rdzogs pa la ltos/ shA ri'i bu sems ni rgya che ba'i sbyin pa ni ma yin no// 
133b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gal te sbyin pa rgya che la sems kyis ma yin na ni/ sbyin bdag rtsub mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyurd ra te/ des sbyin pa de snyed byin yang sems yongs su ma
133b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs// shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gan sa te thams cad yongasu thob par 'gyur ba la lto sa/ shA ri Ta byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung
133b6(dkon brtsegs): yang mang por byed do// ye shes kyi stobs kyis lhag par byed do// shes rab kyi stobs kyis rgyas par byed do// bsngo ba'i stobs kyis dpag tu med par byed do// de nas bcom ldan
133b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// gzugs 'dod phyir ni sbyin pa sbyin mi byed// longs spyod mtho ris 'dod phyir ma
133b8(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas mchog 'dod phyir// daphyir sbyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyur// grags dang brjod pa dag dang sgra dag dang // g.yogs dang bde ba nam yang mi
134a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing // 'chi 'pho skye ba kun kyang mi 'dod de// de phyir sbyin nyung 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// zas dang sgom dang chos gos gang byin pa// srid pa'i 'gro ba 'dod
134a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin te// sbyin pas 'chi ba med pa'i sgo btsal phyir// des ni skra rtse tsam yang sbyin pa byin// 'char ba med cing khengs pa med par 'gyur// g.yo dang ser sna dag ni thams cad
134a3(dkon brtsegs): spong / de dag lo lo nam yang yod min te// de ltar de dag 'jig rten phan phyir spro// rgyal po'i srid dang nor dang 'bru srog gtong // de dag sems ni gzhan du mi 'gyur te// byin nas
134a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur// sbyin zhing gtong la byad chub rnyed mi dka'// pha dang ma dang bu ni sdug pa ltar// / slob dang 'jig rten kun la de bzhin te// gang gis byang
134a5(dkon brtsegs): chub mchog spyod spyad pa rnams// sbyin tshe rtag tu phrag dag med par 'gyur// de dag mthong nas mi khro ste// ji ltar sngon gyi bzhin du smra// mi mdza' dag dang rtag mdzar
134a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing // skrag pa rnams la 'jigs med bzhin// de la dngos po gang yod pa// slong ba la ni sri ba med// chos 'dod pa ni rtag 'gyur te// rgyal srid 'dod par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung bar
134a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu smra byed cing // chos kyi sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed// 'dod la brkam pa ma gtogs par// su zhig rgyal srid 'dod par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyal srid mi 'dod cing // mtho ris
134a8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba 'dod ma yin// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs tshol zhing // grags pa chen po sbyin pa sbyin// bdag dang nor rdzas gzhan dag kyang // mang po myur du gtong ba ni// de dag byang chub
134b1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa mchog/ nam yang gtong bar mi 'gyur ro// mkhas pa gzugs ni mi 'dod de// longs spyod dag kyang 'dod ma yin// mtho ris dag kyang de mi 'dod// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang 'dod ma
134b2(dkon brtsegs): yin// lam shes lam la mkhas pa gang // gang dag pa shes par 'gyur ba la// brtan pa dag tu mi byed de// srid pa med pa 'dod par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
134b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste drug
134b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// // / bam po dgu pa// de la gang la brtson pas byang chub sems dopa' byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i
134b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khri mas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di gsum ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs par
134b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ste// gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o// de la lus kyis legs par de nas spyod pa
134b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ ma byon par len pa spangs pa yin/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin te/ 'di
134b8(dkon brtsegs): ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/ phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa spangs pa
135a1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'dri ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni brnab sems med/ gnod sems med cing yang dag
135a2(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba yin te/ 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// de 'di snyam du sems te lus kyi legs par spyod pa gang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang / ngag gas lags
135a3(dkon brtsegs): par spyad pa gang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa gang yin snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te lus kyi las gang srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par
135a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yem par ma byas pa de ni lus kyis legs par spyod ba zhes bya'o snyam mo// de la ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te ngag gi las
135a5(dkon brtsegs): gang brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub mo dang // tshig kyal pa ma smras pa de ni ngag gis legs bar spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo// de la yid kyis legs
135a6(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa gang zhe na/ de la 'di snyam du sems te yid kyi las gang brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba ma byas pa de ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ 
135a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// de 'di ltar tshul bzhin so sor rtog ste/ las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang / las gang ngag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de ci gdags par nus sam/ de 'di ltar tshul
135a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis rtog pa ni 'di snyam du sems te las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang / las gang ngag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de/ sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar
135b1(dkon brtsegs): po 'am/ lebargan nam/ shel gyi kha dog du gdags par mi nus te/ mig gis shes par bya ba ma yin te/ rna bas shes par bya ba ma yin/ snas shes par bya ba ma yin/ lces shes
135b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba ma yin/ lus kyis shes par bya ba ma yin/ yid kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni skyes pa ma yin/ bskyed pa ma yin/ byung ba ma yin/ 
135b3(dkon brtsegs): zin pa ma yin te/ de ni las gang gis kyang shes par bya ba ma yin no// de 'di snyam du sems te tshul khrims de ni gang mngon par 'dus ma byas po'o// gang mngon par 'du mi byed pa
135b4(dkon brtsegs): gdags pa gang yang med do// gang gdags pa med pa de la bdag mngon par chags par mi bya'o snyam na/ das/ de 'di ltar legs par spyad pa'i tshul khrims
135b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // gang gi tshul khrims de dang / tshul khrims de gang du bsngo ba de yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // de de ltar mthong bas 'jig tshogs
135b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba gang gis tshul khrims sam/ 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims la so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i 'dzag tshogs la lta ba mi slong ngo // de de ltar mthong bas sdom pa dang / cho ga dang / 
135b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang / spyod yul shes bzhin du spyod par 'gyur te/ shes bzhin du spyod pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// de bdag du dmigs shing mi spyod/ pha rol tu dmigs
135b8(dkon brtsegs): shing mi spyod/ de tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin no// bdag tu dmigs na tshul khrimasu dmigs par 'gyur gyi/ gang bdag tu dmigs pa
136a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni tshul khrim su mi dmigs so// gang tshul khrimasu mi dmigs pa de ni bslab pa nyams par mi byed do// gang bslab pa nyams par mi byed pa de tshul khrims
136a2(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi byed de/ tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir mchog tu mi 'dzin ce na/ des gzhan las chos thams cad shes so// gzhan gang yin pa de la bdag
136a3(dkon brtsegs): med do// gang bdag med pa de la ci zhig yongasu gzung bar bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// lus kyis dag cing ngag gis dag pa dang / 
136a4(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis dag cing rtag tu spyod pa dag/ dag pa'i brtul zhu gas la ni rtag gnas pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan// shin tu bzang po'i las lam bcu
136a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di/ gang dag bsrung ba byang chub sems dpa' mkha/ sa// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang ma byas// da ni mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan zhes bya// gang dag
136a6(dkon brtsegs): ma byas ma bskyed mi len pa// de la kha dog med cing dbyibs kyang med// gang la kha dog med cing dbyibs med pa// de la gdogs pa nam yang mi dmig so// rtag tu tshul khrims ma
136a7(dkon brtsegs): byas 'dus ma byas// de ni mig gis blta bar mi nus te// rna ba sna dang lce yi shes ma yin// lus dang yid kyi shes par bya ma yin// gang de dbang pos shes par mi nus pa// de la
136a8(dkon brtsegs): snying rje 'jug par nus ma yin// de ltar tshul khrims yongs dag mthong ba de// nam yang tshul khrims dmigs par mi gan so// tshul khrims ldan zhes yid kyis mi snyems shing / 
136b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu 'dzin pa tshul khrims mi bsrung ste// tshul khrims bsrung yang tshul khrims 'du shes med// de ni khrims ldan byang chub spyad pa spyod// 'jig tshogs la ni lta ba gang sel
136b2(dkon brtsegs): ba/ da ni lta ba nam yang mi 'gyur ro// gang la lta med de la gnas med de/ tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims de mi snyems// chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa kun bsrung ba// de yi cho
136b3(dkon brtsegs): ga bsam du med par 'gyur// rab tu 'byung zhing rab tu bsrungs pa ni// tshul khrims ldan de gzhan la rtsod mi byed// bdag med 'du shes tshul khrims mi dmigs te// bdag med de la
136b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dmigs pa med// bdag dang de bzhin tshul khrims gang snyems pa// rtag tu 'jig pa'i mtha/ 'a zhes ngas bshad do// bdag med smra ba'i tshul khrims
136b5(dkon brtsegs): mi sems de// bdag med smra ba tshul khrims gnas ma yin// / bdag med smra ba tshul khrims mi sems te// bdag mad smra ba tshul khrims rtog ma yin// tshul khrims ma
136b6(dkon brtsegs): nyams tshul khrims skyon med pa/ bdag ni tshul khrims ldan zhes mi slong ngo // gang la bdag med tshul khrims 'du shes med// shes rab zab mo byang chub spyad pa spyod// 'jigs med
136b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag tshul khrims 'di 'dra ba// nam yang tshul khrims 'chal par de mi 'gyur// zad chos ni gang dag mi dmigs pa// de yi tshul khrims de ni 'phags pas bsngags// byis
136b8(dkon brtsegs): pas gang dag bdag du lta gnas te// bdag ni tshul khrims ldan zhes khrims bsrung zhing // bsrungs kyang tshul khrims 'bras bu myong ba de// ngan 'gro gsum po kun las mi thar to// / 
137a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bdag tu lta ba kun spangs pa// de ni nga dang nga zhes bya mi 'byung // tshul khrims ldan pa de la lta med pa// de ni phyir yang log ltung mi 'jig so// 'di 'dra ba
137a2(dkon brtsegs): yi tshul khrims gang shes pa// de la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims lta mi nus// srid pa gsum na de bdag mi mthong na// khrims dang tshul 'chal mthong 'gyur smos ci dgos// shA ri'i
137a3(dkon brtsegs): bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa chos bcu 'dus par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ dad pa'i bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi
137a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'dun pa dang // las kyi rnam par smin pa rgya chen po la dad pa dang // 'phags pa la ldang ba byed pa dang / bla ma la rim gro
137a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos tshol ba la 'jug par byed pa dang / byang chub yongasu tshol zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar byed
137a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ shA ri'i bud ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa chos bcu po de dag 'dus par 'gyur ro// de chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas nas dge ba'i chos
137a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag par bsgrub po// dge ba'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste legs par spyod pa gsum po 'di dag nyid do// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o// legs
137a8(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa gsum po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i tshe byang chub gang dang 'brel pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam
137b1(dkon brtsegs): grangs yong su tshol lo// 'di la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas dag gis bsngags pa yi// dge ba'i las rnams lus kyis byed// gang las thos pa
137b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed 'gyur ba'i// slob dpon dang yang rim gro byed// sems can thams cad don gyi phyir// byams pa'i sems ldan phrag do/  de// ches la brtsams te gang zag la// ri mo dag ni rab tu
137b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/  ngag ni shin tu sdom gyur te// de ni mi snyan tshig mi smra// 'di ni 'dun dang ldan pa'i mtshan// nam du'ang ngag rtsub mi smra'o// yid ni dge ba'i yid du 'gyur// nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod
137b4(dkon brtsegs): dad byams sems gus dang bcas pa yi// bsam pa nyid kyis rtag tu blta// rgyal bas bstan pa thos gyur na// chos 'di la ni gus dang bcas// chos la gus par
137b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pas na// myur du byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya// chos pa cu po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i snga snod kyi chos yongasu
137b6(dkon brtsegs): tshol bas slob dpon lo rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bu'o// gzhan yong shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa bcu bskyed de/ bcu gang
137b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni na ba ste/ khams kyi sbrul gdugs pa bzhin du rtag par phan tshun mi 'phrod do// sdug bsngal mang ba'o// nyes pa mang ba'o// spro ba dang / 'bras dang / phol
137b8(dkon brtsegs): mig dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang / 'khris pa dang / bad kan gyis gang ste nad dang 'dra/ phol mig dang 'dra/ zug rngu dang 'dra/ chu bo dang 'dra/ gnod pa dang 'dra/ 
138a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba/ 'jig pa/ snying po med pa/ nyam chung ba/ shig shig po yun thung ba/ skad cig pa dur khrod du 'jig pa ste/ snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang
138a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa dang po de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu
138a3(dkon brtsegs): bor gang tsam yang 'bu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // khams ni sbrul du/ 
138a4(dkon brtsegs): ma rungs pa// bzhi po gcig la gcig rten te// re re ya/ nga ni 'khrugs pa las// nad po che ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mig nad dang ni rna nad dang // sna nad dang ni de
138a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ so nad dang ni mchu nad rnams// gzhan yang lus las 'byung bar 'gyur// smyo dang 'bras dang phel mig dang // ma dpal g.yan pa rnams dang ni// 
138a6(dkon brtsegs): nad gzhan rnam pa mang po dag/ lus las su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lus 'di nad dang mtshungs po ste// lus ni 'brum bu 'dra ba'o// lus 'di gnod pa 'dra ba ste// yun thung skad
138a7(dkon brtsegs): cig 'dug pa'o// dur khrod du ni 'gro zhing 'jig/ mi rtag mi brtan g.yo ba ste// rab tu 'jig cing na ba dang // lus 'di rnag gis gang ba ste// shig shig po dang yun zung ba/ 
138a8(dkon brtsegs): rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku yi phyir// dge ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya// zad du ni rab zag pa// rnag gis gang po'i lus 'di yis// chos sku
138b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni sgra 'grub bo// gang na gzhan gyis thob med pa// de 'dra'i lus ni thob par bya// tsha ba dag kyang gang sgrib dang // bsil ba dag kyang rab bsrung ba// 
138b2(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di yang ni rga ba dang // 'chi ba dag gis gzhom par 'gyur// gang dag gang dang tsha bzod pa// lus kyis su ni thad du// skyes bu'i bya ba byed pa yi// mchog gi lus ni thob par
138b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na 'jig rten grags pa'i bla ma la// rim gro dag ni rab byas te// snying po med pa'i lus la su// snying po dag ni blangs por 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa des bya cul na
138b4(dkon brtsegs): sa dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la ni rim gro dang bsnyen bkurabyed pa de tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bulo// gzhan
138b5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sem sa bskyed de/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ rtag tu brel ba dang / bkru ba dang / mnye ba dang / 
138b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / dpral ba'i chos cano// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na ji tsam du rdza mkhan gyi bum pa chung tshad dang / cha ched byas pa zad kyang mthar 'jig go// 
138b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di yang snying po med/ so ma btang ba'i snod bzhin te mthar 'jig pa'o// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na shing gi yal ga'i mdab ma dang / me tog dang / 
138b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mthar ltung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med de 'bras bu smin pa bzhin du ltung chos can// shA ri'i bu
139a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na rtswa'i rtse mo'i zil pa'i theg pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi mas phog na ring por mi gnas so// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus
139a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ zil pa'i thigs pa bzhin du ring por mi gnas so// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po dang 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu'i rgyun la lbu ba rdos pa
139a3(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ji snyed pa de dag zad kyang snying po med de rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ lbu brdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis
139a4(dkon brtsegs): nyam chung ba'o// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ char 'ab dab pa'i chu'i chu bu re gzhan skye zhing gzhan 'gago// / shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med
139a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ chu'i chu bur lta sa bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o// 'di ltar snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa gnyis pa de bskyed nas// 
139a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don
139a7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid rgya cher rab tu bston pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// ji ltar rdza ma'i mkhan po yis// sa las snod rnams byas pa dag/ de dag thad mthar 'jig
139a8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sems can srog kyang de dang 'dra// ji ltar shing gi yal ga yi// lo ma me tog 'bras bu rnams// thams cad ltung ba'i chos can te/ me yi srog kyang de bzhin no// rtsa mchog
139b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi zil pa'i thigs// nyi ma yongasu bab pa na// yud tsam gyis ni med 'gyur te// de yi srog kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'brab chu'i rgyun rnams kyi// lbu ba rdos pa nyam chung ba// de ltar/ 
139b2(dkon brtsegs): lus ni nyam chung ste// snying po med pa lbu ba 'dra// ji ltar char pa bab pa yis// chu yi chu bur skyes pa yang // skad cig gis ni de 'jig 'gyur// de bzhin lus kyang snying po med// snying po
139b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin snying po shes// snying po ma yin snying por 'dzin// de dag log rtog spyod yul te// snying po khong du chud ma yin// snying po med la snying po med// snying po snying por shes pa ni// de dag
139b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag rtog pa'i yul// snying po khong du chud pa yin// snyi dang por 'du shes byas gyur te// rdza gang tsam gyi chu 'bul ba// snying po med pa'i lus las ni// snying po dag ni/ 
139b5(dkon brtsegs): len par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gnyis pa 'di bskyed nas// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos rnam grangs yongs su
139b6(dkon brtsegs): tshol bas sleb dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de// tha na chu bor gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de// bdag
139b7(dkon brtsegs): yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing mi dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song ste/ le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pa log par lta ba ste
139b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod sbyin yang med/ sbyin bsreg kyang med/ legs byas dang nyes byas kyi las rnams byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa bsags pa yang med par lta ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil/ 
140a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis non te/ bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ 'di lta ste yid btags kyi yul du sbyin
140a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas thams cad gso ba ma yin pa 'jig su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas de nas bdag yid gsu gyur te/ lo mang po lo stong phrag mang / 
140a3(dkon brtsegs): po/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por me ma ra mur za zhing chu'i sgra yang mi thos na/ lus kyis lta ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis ni de ltar mnyes par byas pas bdag dge ba'i lus thob
140a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe bar bya zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su btsal ba'i phyir
140a5(dkon brtsegs): slob dpon la rim gro bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa gsuM pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon/ la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam
140a6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'bul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ji ltar grogs po bstan pa dang // ji ltar nye bar bsten pa ltar// de dag yang dang yang bsten pas// / 
140a7(dkon brtsegs): de yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang song nas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam par spangs// le lo che zhing brtson 'grus nyams// g.yo dang phrag dog sar sna can// 
140a8(dkon brtsegs): byin pa yod par gang blta ba// thad du ni rnam spangs nas// bdag ni yi btags skye gnasu// 'jig su rung ba'i lus thob bo// yun ring dus su 'khor ba yi// mun nag phung po 'jigs pa na/ 
140b1(dkon brtsegs): bkres pa dang ni skom pas gzir// sdug bsngal mang po rjesu myong // sbyin gnas rnams ni mthong zhing // bdag gis 'di 'dra'i dal ma thob// le ni mang po sbyong rnamasu// chu yi sgra yang yong
140b2(dkon brtsegs): ma thos rna da ltar bdag gis 'jig rten na// shin tu dkon pa rab snyed de// bdag gis slob dpon mnyes byas pas// dal pa 'byor pa bdag gis thob// sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa// 
140b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis dag pa'i bshes gnyen rnyed// byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir// lus dang srog la mi lta'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// slob dpon bla ma mchod gnas la// rnam par dang
140b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyi su// bsti stang gus par rab tu bya// shA ri'i tshong bu sems bskyed pa gsum po 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi
140b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de// tha na chu bum po gang tsam yang/ 'bu'o// gzhazhon yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
140b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshos gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i glegs pos zin pas le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa snyoms las can blun pas/ 
140b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can la khu tshur dang thal mos brdegs shing gtses nas bsdus shing tshe nge 'don te/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa yang med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa 'byung ba yang med de zhes de ltar
140b8(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / de ltar bzod pa dang / de ltar mos shing zhe sdang gi zil gyis non pas/ mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des// 
141a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dud 'gro'i gan su sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba ma yin pa 'jig su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mgu ba ma byas pas de
141a2(dkon brtsegs): na bdag rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bur gyur te/ rtsa za zhing dbyug pas bsdigs shing 'jigs pas bsdig pa nas mi 'dod bzhin du khal bka'o// bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par
141a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ lus dang srog la mi blta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi po de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems
141a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ ngan chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bu'o// 'di'i chos nyid da ni 'di yin to// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// yun ring por ni
141a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam// ma rig par ni gnas pas na// rnga mo dag dang bong bur gyur// sdug bsngal mang po rje su myong // mir gyur pa yang bdag gisau rnyed// gang gis byang
141a6(dkon brtsegs): chub reg 'gyur ba'o// bzang po yi ni las byas te// de ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas chos ni rab gnas shing // gus pa dang ni ldan par bya// byang chub phyir ni slob dpon la/ 
141a7(dkon brtsegs): rim gro dang ni bsti stang bya// 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa bsam med nas// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongasu 'khyam pa na// skye mched dag ni don med 'das gyur te// sbyin gnas dag ni nya
141a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tshe ba yin// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongasu spangs gyur nas// rtag du sdig pa'i grogs po rab bstan to// de dag gos ni bstan pa'i rjes 'jug cing // rgyun mi 'chad par ngan song/ 
141b1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas// btson ra dang ni bcing zhing brdegs pa rnams// byed du 'jug cing gzhan la spyod byas nas// de'i 'bras bu ngan song skye gnas 'gro/ sdig pa'i las kyis sdug bsngal rjesu myong
141b2(dkon brtsegs): dge pa'i bshes gnyen rnams ni ma bsten pas// rnga mo ba lang de bzhin bong bu yi// ngan pa'i mtshams kyi skye mched gzung gyur nas// dbyug pa dag gis brdegs shing khal kyang
141b3(dkon brtsegs): bkal// mir gyur pa ni shin tu rnyed dka' dang // 'thun pa'i yul dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// shin tu yun ring dal ba rnyed gyur tA// dka' ba'i las kyis bu gar chud pa bzhin// 
141b4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag ni shin tu bsdams gyur nas// zhan pa ma dad pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la g.yo med pas// bdag gi lus
141b5(dkon brtsegs): ni nye bar 'tshe bar bya// bdag gi slob dpon bla ma gang dag dang // gang dag bdag gi byang chub sems bskyed pa/ byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam ston pa// ston pa bzhin
141b6(dkon brtsegs): du dga' bas bsnyen bkur bya// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi byug pa dang // dri dang phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang // gos dang me tog dag gi chun po yis// rkang gnyis dam pa la ni mchog
141b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/  phyog zhu dag na sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa// sems can don la brtson zhing don dam gzigs// gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od mdzad pa// kha dog mtha' yas pa la mchod
141b8(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ sangs rgyas mi yi kha lo bsgyur rnams la// 'jig rten spyod dang mchod pa char byas pas// gang gis byang chub snying por bdag 'gro ba'i// byang chub lam ni shin tu sbyangs pa
142a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa 'di skyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob
142a2(dkon brtsegs): dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ zan chu bum gang tsam yong 'bu'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge
142a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa la lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyom las can blun pas 'di lta bu'i lta ba dang / 'di lta bu'i 'dod pas
142a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dang / srog chags thaMd kyi sha dgacig tu spangs shing / sha gcig tu gcer te/ debasod nams ma yin pa'i las byed kyang de'i gzhi las
142a5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa medo// rgya mtsho'i tshu rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thad sbyin pas tshim par byas kyang de'i gzhi las bsod
142a6(dkon brtsegs): nams med/ de'i gzhi las bsod nams kyi rnam pa mdo// rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thad bsad cing gtubs kyang de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/ de'i gzhi
142a7(dkon brtsegs): las sdig pa'i rnam pa mdo snyam pas de ltar byas kyang bsod nams dang sdig pa yongasu shes par ma nus te/ sdig pa'i lta ba bsnyen pa dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non pas// 
142a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba de'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ 'di lta ste sems can dmyal bar dman pa 'jig su rung
142b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lus thob ste/ de la 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ de na bdag ni sems can dmyal bar gyur pas lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa za zhing gcig tu sdug
142b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba/ rtsub pa mi bzad pa/ 'tshig pa/ 'chi ba'i mthar khrid pa myong zhing lo stong phrag mang po'i bar du bde ba'i sgra yang mi thos na/ lus kyis lta ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag
142b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas/ dge ba'i lus thob kyis sbyin gnas rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba bya zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya
142b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i snga snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu tshol bas slob dpon
142b5(dkon brtsegs): la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 
142b6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i grogs po bsnyen pa dang // / sdig pa'i sems kyis bslus pas na// sdig par lta la rten gyur te/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so// rgya mtsho yi ni tshu rol na/ 
142b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa// zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang // bsod nams dag gi 'byung gnas med// rgya mtsho yi ni pha rol na// sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa// thams cad/ 
142b8(dkon brtsegs): bsad cing bcom gyur kyang // sdig pa'i 'byung gnas mdo zhes// sdig pa'i lta ba 'di lta bu// yang dang yang du bsten pas na// gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa'i// sems can dmyal
143a1(dkon brtsegs): bar ring du dengs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi// yongasu 'dren pas ma mthong bas// bdag gi lus ni stong rnams kyang // ngan 'gro dag ni gsum du dang
143a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba ste// de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas// bdag gis mi yi dngos thob kyis// bzang po yi ni las bya'o// mir 'gyur ba ni dka' ba ste// mi srog thob pa'ang dka' ba yin// 
143a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos thos dka' ba ste// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang dka' ba yin// bdag gis mir skye dka' ba yin// tshe thob pa ni g.yo zhing 'gyur// bdag gis sang+yas 'byung ba dang // rgyal
143a4(dkon brtsegs): ba kun mkhyen bstan pa rnyed// lus kyi las dang ngag gi las/ yid kyi las kyang sdig pa can// mi 'dod mi bzad 'bras bur 'gyur// phyin chad spyad par mi bya'o// bas
143a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par dag pa yi// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi/ 'jig rten rab tu dka' spyod pa// bzang po dag gi las bya'o// sangs rgya kyi ni byang chub phyir// bdag ni bla
143a6(dkon brtsegs): mar gang grags pa'i// dka' las 'da' bar mi bya ste// bsnyen bkur dag ni rab tu bya// lam ni drang po zhes bya ba// g.yo med pas ni rab bstan te// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// sgyu
143a7(dkon brtsegs): mar 'gyur bar mi bya'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa// de lta bur ni sems bskyed nas// snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul// shA ri'i bu sem
143a8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa lnga pa 'di bskyed nas// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chol gyi ma thas 'di yongasu tshol bas/ slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bus
143b1(dkon brtsegs): ba gang tsam yang 'bu'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing / sdig pa'i grogs pos zin
143b2(dkon brtsegs): bas/ 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa drang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa medo zhes de ltar mos pa'i bar gyis nga rgyal
143b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis zil gyis non pas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ 'di lta ste mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thad nye bar 'tsho ba ma
143b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa smad pa'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes dpar ma byas pas der bdag mir gyur pa na/ mi bkren da pa dang / mi dbul po dang / bran du 'gyur ba dang / gzhan
143b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang du song ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa'i sems can rnam sa dang / 'dod pa la chags pa rnams dang / mi rig sa pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnams dang / log par lta
143b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams dang / tshul khrims log par zhugs pa rnams dang / lta ba log par zhugs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / 'gro bar bya ba ma yin
143b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'gro ba bzhi la 'gro bar zhugs pa rnams dang / sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa rnams dang / bla ma drug la gus par mi gnas pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa bdun la 'jug pa
143b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / log pa brgyad la log par nges pa rnams dang / gnod pa dgu'i dngos pos gnod par gyur pa rnams dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams
144a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam la mngon par phyogs pa rnams dang / mtho ris kyi khal ma phyogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba rnams dang
144a2(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu song ba rnams dang / bdud kyi dbang du song ba rnams dang / dge ba'i chos yongasu spangs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa rnams dbyug pas bsdig/ 
144a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pas bsdigs nas/ mi 'dod bzhin du byed cing rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur te/ bdag gis ni de dag mnyes par byas pas dge ba'i lus thob kyis sbyin gnas
144a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o// lus dang srog la mi dbalta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa drug pa de bskyed nas
144a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya che rab tu rtog
144a6(dkon brtsegs): tu gzhug pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// sdig po'i grogs ni nga rgyal rgyags 'phel ba// bskal pa mang po brgya mtsho bstan pas na// mi yi nang du skyes kyang bran du/ 
144a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rgyun du yun ring dusu 'khor// mi lus rab tu rnyed par dka' ba yang // de ni bdag gis dka' bar thob gyur te// gnas pa'i yul ni 'thun pa bzang po dang // sangs rgyas/ 
144a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung dang dal 'byor de bzhin no// grogs po gang dag mchog tu rab bzang ba// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod dang lam ston cing // byang chub sems ni rin chen 'phel byed pa// de dag bskal
144b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba mang pos rnyed// lus ni nyam chung mi rtag mi brtan te// lbu ba rdos dang chu yi chu bur 'dra// sgyu ma lta bur gar la lha dang mtshungs// rmi lam mthong dang 'drid par smra ba bzhin// srog ni
144b2(dkon brtsegs): yun thung tshe yang zad par 'gyur// ji ltar sprin dang glog ni mi gnas ltar// skad cig du ni de bzhin srog kyang 'gyur// snying po med pas snying po len par byed// gang gis 'das pa'i dus kyi
144b3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa yang // rgya mtsho brgya phrag bsam yas bslus gyur pa// nga rgyal ri bo ma 'dar gzhom pa yi// dus dang tshe dang man ni nyer gnas kyis// lus la sdug pa thad rab spangs nas// srog
144b4(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa med pa'i yid kyis ni// nga dang rgyags dang / dregs pa spangs gyur na// yon tan ldan pa gus bcas rim gro bya// nga dang rgyags pa dregs pa spangs gyur nas// pha
144b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ma dang bu pho rnams dang ni// 'jig rten bla ma mchogatu gang grags la// gus dang bcas shing mchog gi rim gro bya// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog zhugs
144b6(dkon brtsegs): gagang dad padag dbyang nus su/ spyod gag/ 'ad shus pa gad pa phyed ma// rim gro bya ba'i phyir ni brtson par bya// skye dgu nga rgyal ldan pa nga rgyal spangs// mi mkhas nga rgyal bcad cing 'dul ba'i phyir// ye shes rdo rje
144b7(dkon brtsegs): ngadag gis bcom byas nas// rgyags dang nga rgyal ri ni bsnyil bar bya// byang chub spyod pa yongasu rdzogs byas te// byang chub snying po mchog la gnas gyur nas// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rtsod pa
144b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams brtul te// chu bo bzhi las srog chags bsgral bar bya// phyogs bcu dag na mi gang na ba rnam so// rang gi mi gtsang bar lhung smad pa la// byams pa dang ni snying rje'i yid kyis// mgon
145a1(dkon brtsegs): dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dus la bab// sangs rgyas yon tan bslab pa bsgrub nus shes// bzod pa bsgom par bya ba phun sum
145a2(dkon brtsegs): tshegs// mdud pa med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya// bsam gtan pha rol phyin thob phun sum tshogs// sems 'dul ba yi dus ni nye bar gnas// thabs dang shes rab mkhas la gnas
145a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te// bla ma zad la ni bskor bar bya// de ltar bsod nams stobs dang gzi brjid spel// shes rab ye shes mkhas pa bsam mi khyab// rang dbang dam pa dag gis mngon 'phags
145a4(dkon brtsegs): byu bur yongasu bkang ba'i snod byin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
145a5(dkon brtsegs): yengasu tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bcu ra byed de tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bu'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sam
145a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de// bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grog po dang phrad pas le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can blun pa lkugs par gyur te/ las
145a7(dkon brtsegs): nag pa dang nag po'i rnam par smin pa yang med/ las dkar po dang dkar po'i rnam par smin pa yang med/ las dkar nag deng dkar nag gi rnam par smin pa yang med/ mi gnag cing
145a8(dkon brtsegs): dkar ba'i las dang mi gnag cing dkar ba'i rnam par smin pa'ang med do zhes de ltar lta/ de ltar bzed de ltar mos pas dge sbyong 'am/ bram ze la btsun pa dag dge ba gang / mi dge
145b1(dkon brtsegs): bgang kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa gang // kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / bsten par bya ba gang / bsnyen par mi bya ba gang / bya ba'i rigs pa gang / bya ba'i mi rigs pa gang / ci byas na yun ri
145b2(dkon brtsegs): por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur/ ci byas na don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang / nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas sdig po mi dge ba'i lha/ 
145b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste sbyin gnas thad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba'i mir gyur nas 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas ma
145b4(dkon brtsegs): par ma byas pas bdag mir gyur pa na yang / long ba/ lkug pa blun pa/ rku ga dig pa/ rmongs pa/ 'on paragyur te/ legs par bshad pa dang nyes por bshad pa
145b5(dkon brtsegs): don shes par mi nus// bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes pabyas pas/ 'di lta ste dbang po tshang ba/ dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyin gnas thams cad kyis nye bar 'tshe
145b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ lus dang sreg la mi lta bar bya/ lags par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don kun shes pa'i mthu yod par bya/ slob dpon la btsun pa dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / 
145b7(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa grang / bsten pa gang / mi bsten pa gang / bya ba gang / mi bya ba gang / ci byas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon du 'gyur/ 
145b8(dkon brtsegs): ci byas na byang chub sems dpa'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhes 'dri zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir/ slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed/ 'di ltar snying po
146a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo snyam nas/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bulo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de/ 
146a2(dkon brtsegs): skad bka' stsal gnas/ ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo // phan pa 'dod phyir bskal pa brgya mang por// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongasu spangs gyur nas// dge dang mi dag kha na ma
146a3(dkon brtsegs): tho dang da kha na ma tho med bcas 'bras mi 'dri// lhag pa'i nga rgyal dbang gis song ba ni// sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i dbang du song // sdig sems grogs po bsten par byas
146a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ bskal pa brgya mang nas ni ngan 'gror 'phos/ dmi yi 'jig rten dbang po ma tshang gyur// bskal pa stong phrag mang por 'khyams pa'i lus// dge dang mi dge
146a5(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho dang // kha na ma tho med byas 'bras mi shesarus sbal mgrin pa shing mig chud 'dra ba ra// mi yi lus ni shin tu dka' bar thob// dbang po dag ni tshang
146a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing skye mched dag/ mi dal yongasu spangs nas dal ba rnyed// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa mnyes byas nas// rgyal bas bstan bcos 'dod chags bral ba thos// dge dang mi dag byas
146a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'bras bu dag/ 'jig rten gtso bo bdag dri dus la bab// 'go bar ser sna'i mir 'gyur ji lta bu// ji ltar sbyin bdag ser sna med par 'gyur// ji ltar g.yo ngan rkam pa tshul
146a8(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal// tshul khrims nor kun bsrung ba ji lta bu// mi ni khri dang 'khrug pa ji ltar 'gyur// khro med bzod pa'i stobasu ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar la lo can dang g.yeng yid 'gyur/ 
146b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'phags bsam gtan dga' ba ji lta bu// ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab blun lkugs 'gyur// ji ltar shes rab ldan zhing bden gtam dga'// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa gcig
146b2(dkon brtsegs): sems pas// spyod pa bzang po zad tshol bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'gro ba ma lus pa la byams pa bgyid// ji ltar ngan song song ba'i sems can 'dren// ji ltar chos kyi dga' bas mi
146b3(dkon brtsegs): ngoms yid// byang chub spyod pa sde snod yongasu tshol// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab 'jam zhing rnams na// 'jig rten bla ma bzhugs par ji ltar 'gro// phyag 'tshal bsod nams
146b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ji lta bu// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra 'di// slob dpon bla ma drag la bdag 'dri ba// de yi dus/ ni de ring nyar gnas te// bla mi'i gan su gnas las nyan
146b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ste slob dpon yid mgu byed pa ji lta bu// sas rgyas sras kyis sems 'di bskyed gyur nas/ stobs dang bsod nams yangs pa'i blo gros can// nges
146b6(dkon brtsegs): par mchog gi ye shes stobs ldan pas// dga' ba'i yid kyis snod gang chu yang 'bul// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bdun pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
146b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir/ slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bu'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di
146b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grog bro zin pas/ le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyems las can/ lkug pas/ 
147a1(dkon brtsegs): gang tshig dang / yi ge dang / don dang / tshig tu ldan pa dang / chos dang tshig tu ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang
147a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / 'gog pa dang zhi ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad la bya ste/ de dag spangs nas don/ 
147a3(dkon brtsegs): dang tshig tu mi ldan pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang mi ldan pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i bar gyi tshig dang yi ge de dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
147a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ stobs med/ brtson 'grus da med/ skyes bu'i stobs med/ skyes bu'i mthu med/ skyes bu'i brtul ba med/ spyod pa med/ rtul ba med/ spyod
147a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mthu med/ rgyu med/ rkyen med de/ sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa yang rgyu meng rkyen med parasems can kun nas nyon mongs par gyur te/ rgyu med do// / 
147a6(dkon brtsegs): rkyen med do// sems can rnams rnam par dag pa yang rgyu med/ rkyen med par sems can rnam par dag go zhes 'di ltar rgyu med par lta ba la gnas nas/ bdag gis mi dge ba'i las
147a7(dkon brtsegs): mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste mi'i nang du sbyin gnas zad nye bar 'tshe ba ma yin pa dbang po ma tshang ba'i mi'i lus thob ste/ de na bdag glan
147a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ g.yeng ba/ dag pa lkug pa/ rmongs pa/ blun pa/ long ba/ 'on par gyur pas/ gang tshig dang / yi she don du ldan pa nas mya ngan 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du de dag 'dzin pa dang / 
147b1(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa'i mthu med pas 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas so// bdag gis ni da ltar sbyin gnas mnyes par byas kyis/ lus dang
147b2(dkon brtsegs): srog la mi lta ba'i bar du byas te/ gang tshig dang yi ge dang don du ldan pa nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi
147b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grags 'di nyid gzung ba nas kun chub par bya ba'i bar du nus kyis/ 'o na bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams te/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam
147b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di nyid blang ba'i phyir lus kyis slob dpon lad rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// 'dzin pa dang / daklog pa dang / kha ton dang / bsnyen bkur byas pas snying
147b5(dkon brtsegs): bo med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi
147b6(dkon brtsegs): stobs des nye bar brtan pas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di dang nye bar 'gyu ro snyam nas ched du bsams te/ slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang
147b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang 'bu'o// 'di la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// chos gang don dang ldan pa dang // lam gyi yan lag lam bsgom dang // 'gog pa mngon du byed pa
147b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / mya ngan 'das lam snying po can// chos de dag ni yongs spangs nas// gang chos phan pa med pa dang // don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa// chos de dag ni bdag gis bsnyen// brtson 'grus
148a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni stobs med de// skyes bu yi ni mthu yang med// shin tu brtul ba mchog rnams dang // de dag thams cad mi dmig so// sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang med// pha ma/ 
148a2(dkon brtsegs): med de de bzhin du// dkar po dang ni nag po'i las// rnam par smin pa kun med ces// de 'dra'i sdig par lta ba dag/ yang drang yang du bsnyen pas na// gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pas// 
148a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal bar yun ring gnas// de bzhin dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang // gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdig can te// nam tshe mir ni skyes gyur kyang // blun zhing lce ni med par gyur// 
148a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba dang ni 'on par 'gyur// rig pa lkug pa rmongs dpar 'gyur// yun ring sems dmyal ma rungs pa // mi shes pas ni rab tu ltung // dbang po thad phun tshogs
148a5(dkon brtsegs): shing / bdag gi lus ni rab mdzes pa// yun ring dus na bdag gis thob// 'di ni bdag brtson bya ba'i dus/ chos gang don dang ldan pa dang // mya ngan 'da' ba'i grogs
148a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ byang chub lam dang byang chub la// bdag ni 'bad par bya ba'i dus// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni// zab mo'i don dang ldan pa ste// bskal pa stong phrag bye bar yang // de na
148a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu thob par dka'// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// sangs rgyas chos mang 'od dang ni// gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab la// rab tu 'jug cing gzung bar bya// slob dpon la ni
148a8(dkon brtsegs): gus bcas shing // bsnyen bkur dag ni byas pas na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// thos pa de ni rnyed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa// thabs dang shre
148b1(dkon brtsegs): rab ldan pa yin// 'di lta bur ni sems bskyed nas// rdza gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa brgyad pa 'di bskyed nas// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
148b2(dkon brtsegs): snga snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bu'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed do// kye ma'o sems
148b3(dkon brtsegs): can de dag ni don med pas yongasu bskor bdus dang / srog la lta ba'o// don gyis yongasu bskor ba ni lus dang srog la mau blta ba'o// don med pas yongasu bskor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
148b4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la lta'i/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos da rnams la mi lta zhing nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro dbas bdag sbed pa dang / dril ba dang / mnye ba dang / bkru ba
148b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / brdzi bas yongasu bskor ba de ni don med pas yo ngasu bskor ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don med pas yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la
148b6(dkon brtsegs): lta zhing nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams sbed pa dang / dril ba nas yo byad dang longs spyod
148b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi bar gyis yongasu bskor ba de ni don med pas yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba nas bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i mi
148b8(dkon brtsegs): sbed pa dang / mngag pa dang / kun tu bsrung ba de ni don med pas yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o// de la don gyis yongasu bskor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus dang srog la mi lta'i/ byang
149a1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang yid kyi las kyis yongasu bskor ba de ni don gyis yongasu
149a2(dkon brtsegs): bskor bar zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don gyis yongasu bskor ba ni 'di lta ste lus dang srog la mi lta'i/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin
149a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa'i bar gyis yongasu bskor ba de ni don gyis yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don gyis yongasu bskor
149a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni lus dang srog la mi lta yi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos del lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i skyon ra ba dang snyan par smra ba dang don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas
149a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad sdud pas yongasu bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don gyis yongasu bskor ba ni 'di lta ste lus dang
149a6(dkon brtsegs): srog la mi lta'i/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / 
149a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam bsgom pas yongasu bskor ba da ni/ don gyis yongasu bskor ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don gyis yongasu bskor ba ni
149a8(dkon brtsegs): lta ste lus dang sreg la mi lta'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i ba ma dang / slob dpon la rim gro byed cing / bla ma'i gnas la bsnyen
149b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed pa dang / 'dud pa dang rab tu 'dud pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang thal mo sbyor ba'i las kyis yongasu bskor ba ni/ don gyis yongasu bskor
149b2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don gyis yongasu bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta yi// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i dkon
149b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog gsum gyi zhal ta byed pas yongasu bskor ba'o// de ltar kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni don med pas yongasu bskor ba/ lus dang srog la lta'o// kye ma'o bdag ni don gyis
149b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bskor bas yongasu bskor gyis bdag da brtson 'grus brtsams la/ slob dpon la lus kyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ de ltar na snying po med pa'i
149b5(dkon brtsegs): lus las snying po blangs pa dang / bsod nams dang ye/ shes kyi stobs kyi nye bar brtan pa byas para'agyur te/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs des nye
149b6(dkon brtsegs): bar brtan pas byang chub kyi snying po dang nye bar 'gyu ro snyam pa de ni shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de tha na chu rdza
149b7(dkon brtsegs): gang tsam yang 'bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// byis pa so so'i skye bo kun// lus dang sreg la
149b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ldan zhing // byang chub phyogs la mi lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs las kyang byed// so so'i skye bo de dag ni// bdag gi don dang chung ma'i don// bu po dang ni bu mo'i phyir// don med pa la
150a1(dkon brtsegs): chags par 'gyur// dran dang las byed mngag pa dag/ mi mkhas pa ni kun du mngags// rkang bzhi pa dag gso byed de// de dag don med chags par 'gyur// nor dang
150a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bru rnams rab bsogs shing // sbyin pa mi byed mi spyod de/ don mad chags pa de dag ni// gter gyi bsrungs mar brjod pa yin// 'di ni don med chags pa ste// so so'i skye bo de la chags/ 
150a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan no// don la tshogs shing brtson par byed// lus dang srog la mi lta yi// byang chub phyogs la lta byed cing // rnam pa sna tshogs las byed po// don la yod
150a4(dkon brtsegs): su chags shes bya// sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus bzod// bsam gtan shes rab de bzhin du// thab das dang rab tu ldan pa ni// don la yongasu chags shes bya// 
150a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ma la bsnyen bkur byed// bla ma rgan rabs rje su bskyangs// dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal ta byed/ don la yongasu chags shes bya// chos kun yang dag bsdud/ 
150a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yid byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di// klog cing rab tu ston pa ni// don la yongasu chags shes bya// don la chags pa de dag ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa ste// de la brtson
150a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ni// rgyal sras 'jig pa med pa'o// de lta bu'i sems bskyed nas// rab tu drang ba'i sems kyis ni// bla ma rnams la bsnyen bkur byed// snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul// 
150a8(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang
150b1(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang 'bu'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni bka' blo mi bde ba ste/ slob dpon gyi rje su bstan pa dang mi
150b2(dkon brtsegs): mthun par 'dzin pas de dag khong du mi chud do// ci khong du mi chud cen 'di lta ste/ slob dpon gyi nor khong du mi chud do// slob dpon gyi nor gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i nor dang / tshul
150b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi nor dang // thos pa'i nor dang / khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i nor dang / gtong ba'i nor dang / shes rab kyi nor de dag ni slob dpon gyi nor zhes bya ste/ de dag khong du ma
150b4(dkon brtsegs): chud pa ni rab tu dbul ba zhes bya'o// bdag ni bka' blo bde zhing slob dpon gyi rje su bstan pa dang 'thun par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni shin tu
150b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' blo bde ba ste/ slob dpon gyi rje su bstan pa dang 'thu na par 'dzin khong du chud par byed do// ci khong du chud ce na 'di lta ste/ slob dpon gyi nor ro// byang chub
150b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i slob dpon gyi nor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangaso// slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thad du bka' blo bde
150b7(dkon brtsegs): bar rig nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ba ston to// rab tu ston to// rab tu 'chad do// rab tu gzhog go rnam par 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// 
150b8(dkon brtsegs): gsal por go bar byed do// yang dag par rab tu ston to// / bam po bcu pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbul
151a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu chad pa khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// de de ltar sems bskyed de bka' blo bde zhing slob
151a2(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyi bstan pa dang 'thun par 'dzin pa ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyu ro snyam pa nas slob dpon gyi rim gro dang bsnyen bkuro byed do// tha na chu rdza gang tsam
151a3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'bulo// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bcu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongasu tshol bas slob dpon la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed
151a4(dkon brtsegs): do tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dade skad gsungs te bod par gshegs pas de ska du bka' stsal nas ston pas yang 'di skad gsung ngo // 
151a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' blo mi bde sems can gang // mi drang sgyu dang g.yo ngan cing // bla ma rnams dang mi mthun pa// tshig bzhi na du ni byed par 'gyur// bstan pa dang ni mi mthun cing
151a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' blo mi bde shes gyur nas// drang srong nar ni gang yin pa// de ni de la mi ston to// dad pa'i nor dang tshul khrims nor// khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa'i nor// thos pa'i nor dang gton
151a7(dkon brtsegs): nor dang // shes rab nyid ni nor bdun pa// nor gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni// mi zad pa yi gtar bdun te// snod ma yin par rig nas ni// de ni de la mi ston to// sems can gang dag rnam
151a8(dkon brtsegs): pa kun/ sangs rgyas chos ni snod gyur cing // g.yo med tshig 'jam sgyu med la// bka' blo bde zhing rab 'thun pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// lus dang srog la mi lta bar// 
151b1(dkon brtsegs): gus dang bcas pas chos 'dod cing // brtson 'grus rtsom par rab tu sems// tshul 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba yi// snod du rung bar rig gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pa// 
151b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa yang dag rab tu ston// gang la byang chub gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying po'i nor// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni// rgyas par rab tu ston par byed// chos rnam
151b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdug med de// mtshan med stong pa'i mtshan nyid can// srog kyang med cing 'gyur ba med// spros pa med de kun gzhi med// chos rnams thaMd rang bzhin gyis// ma skyes shing
151b4(dkon brtsegs): ni mtshan nyid med// byung ba med cing grub pa med// mtshan ma med pas phye ba te// mi gang bka' blo bde zhing mi 'gal ba// bstan pa la ni rje su 'thun 'dzin pa// de dag
151b5(dkon brtsegs): la yang rgyal ba rang byung rnams// bar sgo slob shes rang ni/ spyod yul ston// dad nor tshul khrims nor dang khrel yod dang / ngo tsha shes dang thes gtong shes rab
151b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de la nor de rnams ni kun 'gyed cing // bdun po mi zad chos kyi mdzod kyang 'byed// mi 'gal bka' blo bde zhing rje su 'thun// dge ba'i bshes gnyen snyam du rtag bsams
151b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol ba'i phyir// bla ma dag la bdag gis rim gro byo// de lta bu'i sems ni bskyed byas la// snying rje dga' ba rgya cher rab bskyed de// kham snod dang
151b8(dkon brtsegs): nga chu yis bkang ba yang // skom pa dag lo nye bar sbyin par bya/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bcu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yong du
152a1(dkon brtsegs): tshol bas slob dpon la lus kyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de// tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi
152a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ myur du dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / slob dpon gyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ba dang / nan tan gyis bsgrub kyi log pa'i nan tan gyis ma yin pa dang / chos kyi
152a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir sdug bsngal gyis gzhan du phyogs par mi 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mir gyur pa na chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang chos bzhi thob par
152a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ skye bo mang po'i rjesu bslabs denas dkar po'i chos la gnas pa dang / sbas shing bzhag pa'i gnas skye bo mang po mgu ba dang / rab tu dga'
152a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa myur du thob pa dang / sems dpa' bzhin du nyin mtshan zad par 'gyur ba dang / kun nas ldang ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bde 'gro mtho risu
152a6(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar gyur pa na chos bzhi thob par 'gyur ba te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lha'i 'khor gyi stan
152a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i 'khor thams cad de'i gdong du blta zhing ci bshad pa de dag thos nas shes par bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ba dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin
152a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan yang de'i drung du 'ong gi de lha'i bu gzhan gyi drung du the tshom yongasu 'dri zhing gcod pa'i phyir 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / de'i longs spyod kyi phyir gzhal
152b1(dkon brtsegs): med khang chen po 'byung ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ lhar gyur pa na chos kyi sgo brgyad stong phrag dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur
152b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// de yi stan ni mthon por 'gyur// lha yi mngon par phyag byas nas// gang dag chos 'di 'chad pa la// lha
152b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams de la lta bar 'gyur// mkhas pa ser sna bral ba la// kun gyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur// brgya byin de gan 'dir 'ong zhing // gzhal med khang yang yid 'ong bzang // lha yi
152b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gnas 'phos te// mi yi srid par 'ongs gyur na// 'khor los bsgyur ba ser sna maud// rgyal dpo rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten 'phos
152b5(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang lha yi nang du yang 'gro ste// bla ma dag la gu sa byas pas// nam yang sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro// zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis su// bla ma dag la gus
152b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pas// gnas bzhi pa ni de dag rnams// rgya cher rtag tu rnyed par 'gyur// dga' ba dang ni gus pa yis// snod gang tsam gyi chu byin na// lha dang mi dang klu rnams kyis// mchod pa
152b7(dkon brtsegs): dag du 'os pa yin// de ltar gyur pa na gzhan yang chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis skyes pa rab tu
152b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / de na dge ba'i chos rnams yongasu 'bri ba yang rab tu shes pa dang / de nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes pa dang / lha'i 'khor la
153a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas lha'i 'jig rten
153a2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur
153a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ de lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye ba dang / de mir gyur na btsun par byed pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
153a4(dkon brtsegs): de rigs btsun par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs bcu ngan par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims btsun par 'gyur pa dang / de'i 'khor btsun par 'gyur ba dang / de'i
153a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can btsun pa rnams la byams pa bsgom par 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu btsun par byed pa'i tshe// sa lnga po de dag thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang mi byed
153a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i chos lnga thob par 'gyur te lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de'i mdza' mi phyed pa dang / lus myur du 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i longs spyod yongasu nyams par
153a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar mi nus pa dang / chos kyi mu go 'byung ba na de la chos kyi lo legs par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu mi phyed par byed pa'i chos lnga
153a8(dkon brtsegs): bode dag thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ngo mtshar yongasu rdzogs pa'i chos lnga thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gang snod stong pa gsog bzhag par 'gyur ba'i rnam
153b1(dkon brtsegs): mu de'i lag pa gang du bcug pa de dag zad rin po ches yongasu gang bar 'gyur te/ ngo mtshar yongasu rdzogs pa dang po 'od thob par 'gyuraro// de sgom par gyur na yan lag brgyad
153b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i chu'i rdzing bu 'byung ste/ ngo mtshar yongasu rdzogs pa gnyis pa 'di thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang de'i lus la gzhan gyis gnod pa bya bar mi 'gyur te 'di lta ste/ 
153b3(dkon brtsegs): dug dang mtshon dang me dang / chu dang mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin gyis gtse ba med pa ste ngo mtshar yongasu rdzogs pa gsum pa 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mtshon gyi bskal
153b4(dkon brtsegs): ba bar ma byung ba 'am/ nad kyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ me'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ chu'i bskal pa
153b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ra ma byung ba 'am/ rlung gi bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'a ma/ skom pa'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ kun tu gdung ba'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ gnod sbyin
153b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur gyi de lhar skye ste/ de dge ba dang mthu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang mthu mang bar 'gyur te/ ngo mtshar
153b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs pa bzhi pa 'di thob par 'gyur ro// gzhon yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mi dal bar mi skye/ ngan 'gror mi skye/ sems la 'gyod
153b8(dkon brtsegs): pas kun nas bkri bar mi nus shing / nges par 'byung ba myur du mthong bar 'gyur te/ ngo mtshar yongasu rdzogs pa lnga pa 'di thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
154a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar yongasu rdzogs pa'i chos lnga po 'di dag thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyi chos bzhi dang mi
154a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal ba'i sems can mthong ma thag tu snying rje chen po 'thob pa dang / de la de'i bu dang bu mo gus pa dang bcas
154a3(dkon brtsegs): shing zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang / rga bas bcom yang brnyas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de las kyi mtha' gang byed pa de dag kyang nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur du thob par 'gyur te/ chos
154a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'bral ba dar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sem sa dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas chos gsu
154a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi 'phrogs te gsum gang zhe na/ chags pas mi 'phrogs pa dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ chos gsum po de dag gis mi
154a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrogs pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas nad med par byed pa'i chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na nad rgyun
