252a4(dkon brtsegs): khas byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi nga rgyal gyis byas pa ni ma yi na no// mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa de sems yod su dag pa dang / yongasu byang ba dang / 'od gsal ba
252a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang nga bral ba dang / shin tu dul ba dang / shin tu zhi ba dang / shin tu sbyang ba byas pa dang / bsam gtan/ 
252a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas kyang bsams bzhin du skyes te/ bcings bzhin du skye ba ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba ma
252a7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ bcings bzhin du 'byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i/ kun rtogs pa las grol ba'o// de ni nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad
252a8(dkon brtsegs): las grol ba'o// de ni phyin ci log gi rtse mo'i gnas las grol ba'o// de bas na de grol bzhin du skye/ grol bzhin du 'chi 'pho// grol bzhin du 'byung ngo // de skye yang theg
252b1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen pos phongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang phyogs bcu kun tu btsal kyang mi
252b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed mi dmigs la/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes su 'jug go// de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos thams cad ni chos kyang ma yin la/ chos ma yin
252b3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// chos gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed pa de la bgrang ba gang yang med de/ chos thams cad ni bgrang ba'i lam las shin tu 'das pa'o// 
252b4(dkon brtsegs): gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni chos dang / chos ma yin pa la mngon par chags par mi byed pa'o// mngon par chags pa med pa
252b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos thams cad kyi don to// gang don la rlom sem sa su byed pa de ni de'i gnod pa chen po'o// gang don la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i mdun na ni
252b6(dkon brtsegs): don nam don ma yin pa mi gnas so// don mthong ba las gang du'ang blo thogs par mi 'gyur te/ de'i blo thogs pa med do// gang blo thogs pa med pa de yongs su mi 'dzin
252b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yongs su mi 'dzin pa de mi chags so// gang mi chags pa de dag nas med do// gang gnas med pa de nyamam pa med do// gang nyams pa med pa de'i rtsol ba'i 'bras bu
252b8(dkon brtsegs): yod pa'o// gang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yod pa de la gti mug med do// gang gti mug med pa de la nga'i ba med do// gang la nga'i ba med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang la rtsod pa med pa
253a1(dkon brtsegs): de dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa de lhag pa'i namakha' dang mtshungs so// gang lhag pa'i na mkha' dang mtshungs pa de 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ 
253a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no// gang thams cad du gtogs pa de ma yin pa de la kha dog med/ mtshan ma med// 
253a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs med do// gang kha dog med/ mtshan ma med/ dbyibs med pa de'i rje su gtogs pa ni de 'dra'o// de'i rjes su gtogs pa ci 'dri bar gtogs pa'ang de 'dra'o// 
253a4(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir rjes su gtogs pa dang / gtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/ gang gi phyir rjes su gtogs par bya ba dang / gtogs par bya ba'i chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs
253a5(dkon brtsegs): pas de'i rjes su gtogs pa dang / gtogs pa zhes bya'o// de ltar rjes su gtogs pa dang / gtog sa pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
253a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang zhe na/ gang byams pa dang / bdag med pa
253a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / snying rje dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / srog med pa nyid dang / btang snyoms dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i sems nyid dang // 
253a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang bzhi pa'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa dang / mi zad pa'i sems nyid dang / brtson 'grus dang dben pa'i sems nyid dang / bsam gtan dang nges par rtogs pa'i sems
253b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / shes rab dang spros pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dang skye ba med
253b2(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang spros pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dad pa dang chags pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa dang rang byung gi sems nyid
253b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ta ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang dbang po med pa'i sems nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub
253b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag dang byang chub rab tu dbye ba dang / lam pa/ sgom pa dang bsgoms pa'i sems nyid dang / zhi gan sa dang nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / lhag mthong dang mthong
253b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bri ba med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa dang / shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / thog ma nas
253b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa nyid dang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang / mi skye ba la bzod pa dang mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
253b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sems nyid dang / mtshan rnyed pa dang mtshan med pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang khams gsum gyi snying pa'i sems nyid dang / bdud char gcod
253b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub dang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtog pa'i sems nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang
254a1(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa'i sems nyid dang / 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mnyam pa'i sems nyid de/ shA ri'i
254a2(dkon brtsegs): bu de ltar na rjes su gtogs pa dang / gtogs pa'i don la snyoms par zhugs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos ni 'di dag dang gzhan dag ste/ de'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / rmad du
254a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag de 'dra zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de la bsam gtan zhes bya ba ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni de bzhin
254a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de'i phyir de la ma chags pa'o// byang chub sems dpa rab rnams kyi bsam gtan ni bdag bde ba la chags
254a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir myong ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'o// byang chub
254a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni 'dod pa'i khams la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las mi ldog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems
254a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa sbyong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems kyi dbang phyug shes pa'i phyir de
254a8(dkon brtsegs): kho na la 'gro ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyi phyir snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'o// byang
254b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis non pa'i phyir zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 
254b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsam gtan ni shin tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa'i phyir gnyen
254b3(dkon brtsegs): po'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi mchog go// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems can
254b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i phyir sems can la bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul zad mi shes pa
254b5(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni rtag tu mnyam/ par gzhag pa'i phyir mngon par 'phags pa'o// 
254b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dbang byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ye shes che ba nyid kyi phyir
254b7(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan no// shA ri'i bu de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi sngon du 'gro zhe na/ 'di lta/ 
254b8(dkon brtsegs): ste sems nges par rtog pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// sems rtse gcig pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// sems gnas pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// sems zhi gnas kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi
255a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sngon du 'gro ba'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa'i sngon
255a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'gog pa dgu'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// dge ba'i chos kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'dul ba
255a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// de
255a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag dang zhi bar byed pa'i chos gzhan rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/  shA ri'i bu 'di'i ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
255a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste// de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de nas
255a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i don rgyal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gtan dang ni rnam thar pha rol phyin/ pad+ma chu yis gos pa med pa
255a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ yid ni chags med dag pa'i 'jig rten na// bskal mang rgya mtshor rtag tu spyad pa spyod// gang du ting nge 'dzin pha rol son pa yis// rnam par snang mdzad zhi ba ting 'dzin
255a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / zla 'od ces bya ting 'dzin rnam bkod pa// de nyid grogs gis rab tu brgyan pa dang // mngon par 'phags dang de bzhin sems pa dang // dri ma med dang snang ldan ting 'dzin
255b1(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan 'od dang grub 'ong mya ngan med// chos rnams thams cad la ni dbang bsgyur dang // chos sgron dang ni de bzhin chos pa dang // ting 'dzin chos kyi dbang phyug ri rab dang / 
255b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes dbang byed dang // dam chos kun 'dzin shin tu rnam dag dang // gzhan gyi sems la rnam spyod ting 'dzin dang // dam chos dkon mchog ting 'dzin 'od zer 'dzin/ 
255b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan rtse mo dpung rgyan nyon mongs sel// bdud kyi stobs rnams 'joms pa'i ting 'dzin dang // stobs bcu dang ni stobs las mngon 'phags dang // kun bcad chags med
255b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'i ting 'dzin dang // lag na sgron ma bdud sbyin pa dasgrags pa dang // sa 'dzin legs par gnas pa'i ting 'dzin dang // ri rab sgron dang rgyal ba mi 'pham dang / 
255b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes sgron dang de bzhin mig gtsang dang // rgyal ba thams cad pa'i ting 'dzin dang // chos dran dang ni yon tan ye shes 'jug/ stong par 'jug dang de
255b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mtshan med dang // smon med ting 'dzin de bzhin zhi ba yis// 'du shes sna tshogs bral zhes bya ba dang // rab dul klu dbang stag ces bya ba dang // 'khyil pa dang ni rnam par
255b7(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa dang // 'dzums pa med dang stobs dang mig dag dang // ting 'dzin rdo rje 'dra dang rdo rjes// mngon 'phags mi 'dzums lhun po lta bu dang // kun nas klong 'khyil rnam
255b8(dkon brtsegs): bar dag sgra dang // nges rtog nyon mongs bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // nam mkha' 'dra dang rnam pa'i bar skabs dang // yon tan thams cad gus par len pa dang // blo gros dran
256a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs blo 'phel stobs mi zad// nges tshig bstan pa mtha' yas mi zad dang // legs byas byas pa chud mi za ba dang // lta ba dang ni 'gro ba tshim byed
256a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byams pa mngon 'phags snying rje yangs pa'i rtsa// dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba 'jug pa dang // btang snyoms dang ni gnyis la chags grol dang // chos dang chos kyi
256a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer ting 'dzin dang // 'jug med ye shes mtsho// rnam grol snying po 'gro ba tshim byed dang // rdo rje rgyal mtshan pad+ma'i dam pa dang // chos kyi rgyal dang mi g.yo ting 'dzin dang / 
256a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rtsibs dang zhi ba sangs rgyas mtsho// 'od zeramatha' yas rnam grol sbyin pa dang // ye shes ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs kyi rgyan// bkod pa chen po zhing
256a5(dkon brtsegs): bkod snang ba dang // sems can bsam pa yongs rangs dga' ba dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma la rtag 'thun dang / pha rol phyin pa rgyan dang dkon
256a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog gtsug/ ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag me tog sbyin// rnam grol snying po bdud rtsi sbyin pa dang // rlung dang rlung bzhin 'gro ba mi dmigs dang // rgya mtsho shugs
256a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin rin chen mdzod ldan dang // brag dang ri 'thab rgyal po zhes bya dang // rdzu 'phrul yangs dang shin tu don 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas yul ston ting nge 'dzin dag dang / 
256a8(dkon brtsegs): de dang gzhan yang rgya chen mtha' yas pa'i// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bye ba khong du chud// gang dag bsam gtan pha rol phyin spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dpag med
256b1(dkon brtsegs): de/ mnyam par gzhag nas bsam gtan spyod yul 'greng // mnyam par gzhag nas rgod pa med par 'chag/ mnyam par gzhag nas 'dug cing nyal bar byed// de yi spyod
256b2(dkon brtsegs): lam mnyam par ma gzhag med// mnyam par gzhag pas sgra ni 'byin de// chos 'di thams cad zhi dang rab zhi ba// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med// bdag med srog
256b3(dkon brtsegs): med dbang phyug dag kyang med// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rje can// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa spyod byed pa// yon tan rgya mtsho de yi yon tan ni// 'di dang gzhan yang
256b4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol mtha' yas pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// da shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
256b5(dkon brtsegs): po gang la brtson na// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 
256b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu nyan par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub
256b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ gzhan dag la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
256b8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mnyan/ blangs/ bzung / bklags/ gzhan dag la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ shes rab kyi rnam pa 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
257a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab de yang rnam pa gang / 'jug pa gang zhe na/ de la shes rab kyi thos pa ni rnam pa'o// tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'jug pa'o// thos pa yang rnam
257a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dun pa'i rnam pa dang / bsam pa'i rnam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang / nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang / rab tu
257a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dud pa'i rnam pa dang / ri mor byed pa'i rnam pa dang / mthun pa'i rnam pa dang / bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rnam pa dang / rna blags te nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / 
257a4(dkon brtsegs): bkur bsti byed pa'i rnam pa dang / yid la byed pa'i rnam pa de dang / mi g.yeng ba'i rnam dang / rin po cher 'du shes ra ba'i rnam pa dang / sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 
257a5(dkon brtsegs): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang / dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang / rtogs pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang / 
257a6(dkon brtsegs): blo la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pas mi ngoms pa'i rnam pa dang / gtong ba spel ba'i rnam pa dang / byin nas mi smod pa'i rnam pa dang / mang du thos pa bsten/ 
257a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam pa dang / gus par dga' ba myong bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang / lus sim pa'i rnam pa dang / sems rang pa'i rnam pa dang / mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / don nyan pa'i rnam/ 
257a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / nan tan nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems
257b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / thabs mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par shes pa
257b2(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / yang dag par spong ba nyan pa'i rnam pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyan pa'i rnam
257b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi rtag pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma
257b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa nyan pa'i
257b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dang / rang dbang du gyur pa'i rnam pa dang / kun tu chos nyan par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / kun tu 'dre ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon
257b6(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / mkhas pa la mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa bsten pa'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su spong ba'i
257b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dang / 'phags pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dbang po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rjes su dran pa bsgom pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / 'phags
257b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms po chen
258a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams nyan pa'i rnam pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar gang na thos shes pa'o// gang na
258a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni nan tan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la mos pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan
258a3(dkon brtsegs): byed do// gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la bsam pa yod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang byang
258a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la skyo ra ba yod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dge ba'i bshes
258a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen la brten par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyuraro// thos nas rab tu sheso// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang nga rgya la med pa de ni thos par 'gyu ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// 
258a6(dkon brtsegs): shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa la rab tu 'dud pa de ni thos par 'gyuraro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang tu thos pa la ri mor byed pa de ni
258a7(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'gyuraro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang 'thun par 'dzin pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bka'
258a8(dkon brtsegs): blo bde ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa de thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// / 
258b1(dkon brtsegs): shes nas nan tan byed do// gang rna blags te nyan pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa la bkur bsti byed pa de ni thos pa
258b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang 'chad pa dang / gang mang du thos pa yid la byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan
258b3(dkon brtsegs): tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa rin po cher 'du shes pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa la rtsir 'du shes pa de ni
258b4(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa thos nas/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug rab tu zhi bar rab
258b5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'du shes pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa thos nas 'dzin par 'du shes pa de ni thos par
258b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang chos rnams rtogs par khong du chud pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed
258b7(dkon brtsegs): do/ gang mang du thos par blo gros 'dod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos nas blo rnam par g.yo ba de ni thos par 'gyuraro// / 
258b8(dkon brtsegs): thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang thos pas mi ngoms pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed
259a1(dkon brtsegs): do// gang sbyin pa'i gtam thos nas gtong bar gtogs pa de ni rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang tshul khrims kyi gtam thos nas tshul
259a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims bsrung bar 'gyur ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bzod pa'i gtam thos nas bzod par byed pa de ni thos par
259a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// zos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang brtson 'grus kyi gtam thos nas brtson 'grus ma nyams par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas
259a4(dkon brtsegs): tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bsam gtan gyi gtam thos nas sems mi g.yeng bar byed/ ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes// shes
259a5(dkon brtsegs): nas nan tan byed do// gang shes rab kyi gtam thos nas zag/ zad pa las sems gzhol bar byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu sheso// shes nas nan tan byed
259a6(dkon brtsegs): do// gang mang du thos par dga' ba skye ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu sheso// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang chos thos nas lus sim par byed pa de ni thos pa
259a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu sheso// shwen+da nan tan byed do// gang chos thos nas rangs par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// 
259a8(dkon brtsegs): gang theg pa chen po thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bsdu
259b1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po zos nas gang bsdu bar sems bskyes pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam
259b2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas dran pa lus la zhugs pa dang / dran pa cher ba la zhugs pa dang / dran pa sems la zhugs pa dang / dran pa chos la zhugs pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab
259b3(dkon brtsegs): tu shes// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang yang dag par spong ba'i gtam thos nas mi dge ba skyes shing byung ba dag la khrel zhing ngo tsha bar 'gyur ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu
259b4(dkon brtsegs): shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dge ba'i chos skye sa shing byung ba la mi gtong bar blo 'jug pa de ni thos bar 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan
259b5(dkon brtsegs): tran byed do// gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gtam thos nas/ lus yang ba dang sems yang ba dang / 'dun pa la/ nga ba skye ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu
259b6(dkon brtsegs): shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bsam gtan gyi gtam thos nas nges par rtog pa la sems gtong ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas
259b7(dkon brtsegs): nan tan byed do// gang tshad med pa'i gtam thos nas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / phongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje chen po dang / chos la dga' ba dang / mi dge/ 
259b8(dkon brtsegs): ba la btang snyoms pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dbang po'i gtam thos nas dad pa'i dbang po dang
260a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po la sems 'jug par byed pa de ni
260a2(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam thos nas chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems
260a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang lam gyi gtam thos nas mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la sems 'jug
260a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang de bzhin ga shegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byams
260a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sa sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par
260a6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 'jug ste/ de thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// 
260a7(dkon brtsegs): shes nas nan tan byed do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni thos pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig ces bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de ltar na shes rab kyi
260a8(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu
260b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyan blangs/ bzung / bklags/ kun chub par byas/ gzhan la bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan nas/ nan tan snying por byed pa yin no// chos rnams la nan
260b2(dkon brtsegs): tan byed pa gang zhe na/ gang ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de ni chos la nan tan byed do// gzhan yang chos la nan tan byed pa ni gang chos thams cad mi len pa'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
260b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ chos rnams len yang log pa'i nan tan du 'gyur te/ gang zag gang chos len par gnas pa ni/ de chos de dag las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gnas dang skabs med de/ de
260b4(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas med pa'o// gang zag mi len par spyod pa rnams kyang bsal ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la nan tan du gan dag pa the tshom du 'gyur na/ chos len par spyod pa rnams lta smo/ 
260b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na chos thams cad mi len pa'i// nan tan no// gzhan yang gang chos rnams la mi sgrib pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gang chos rnams la rlob sems
260b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gang chos rnams mi len pa dang / mi rlom pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gog pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos rnams la bsnan pa med pa dang / bsal ba
260b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / bsal ba med pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang du cung zad kyang ma bshadadu/ ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du mi snang ba de lta bu ni chos thams cad mi blang ba
260b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid ces bya ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ de ni gnyi ga las 'gyur ro// 
261a1(dkon brtsegs): / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun brtags pa 'am/ yang dag par brtags pa de nyid mtshan nyid med par bshad pa yin no// 'di na mtshan nyid do// 'di ni mcha
261a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma yin pa'o zhes 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mtshan nyid pa mi snang ba/ blang ba med par rtogs pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// nan tan la brtson par gyis shig/ chos
261a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi sgrib par snang ba thob par gyis shig/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la// shin tu
261a4(dkon brtsegs): nges par nan tan gnas byed pa// mkhas pa de ni chos la 'dzin mi byed// mi 'dzin pas na nan tan de 'dra'o// mis/ ni chos rnyed stong par mi byed de// chos la'ang de ni stong par
261a5(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems med// stong pa'i chos la rlom sems gang yang med rlom sems med phyir nan tan de 'dra'o// chos la len pa med cing 'dor ba med// chos ni chos la len par
261a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med// len pa med phyir 'di ni chos kyi mtshan// de 'dra ba ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gang phyir chos la nam kyang de mi chags// de la de yi ye shes blangs mi 'gyu// ye shes ma blangs
261a7(dkon brtsegs): de la'ang rlom sems med// de 'dra ba la'ang nan tan zhes bya'o// mkhas pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan gnas par gyis// chos 'di dag la shin tu brtson par gyis// cho ga spyod pa dag la
261a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas gyur na// de tshe de yi sgo ni dag par 'gyur// sgo dag na ni chos 'di 'dra ba shes// de na sems la bsam pa'ang shes par 'gyur// mkhas pa de tshe bsam pa shes nas ni// 
261b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra ba yi chos kyang 'chad par 'gyur// zab mo'i chos la don dam mkhas gyur nas// rtag tu don la rnam par gdon mi za// spyod pa mtha' yas yon tan rnams kyis 'phags// mkhas
261b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mang du thos pa rgya mtsho 'dra// de yi don dang tshig 'bru dag la yang // mtha' ma rtogs par rung ba ma yin zhing // don kyang mtha' yas tshig 'dra mtha' yas te// nan tan snying por
261b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mi 'khrugs 'gyur// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
261b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu nyan pa nas gzhon la rgya cher bsta na pa'i bar du byas nas/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag mun
261b5(dkon brtsegs): parab rib stug po bsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad la snang bathob ste/ shes rab kyi snang ba'o// de snang ba de thob/ pas dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes te/ 
261b6(dkon brtsegs): de srog gi phyir yang mi dge ba'i chos la mi gnas te/ de mi dge ba'i chos rnams spang ba'i phyir ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rtogs pas na dge ba thub pa zhi ba zhes bya'o// de nas bcom
261b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ji ltar mun pas khyab bsgribs pas// khyim du zhugs par gyur na ni// yod par gyur pa'i gzugs rnams kyang // 
261b8(dkon brtsegs): mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ni 'di la yang // la la'i mi dag skyes gyur kyang // dge ba dang ni sdig pa'i chos// ma thos par ni shes mi 'gyur// 
262a1(dkon brtsegs): thos nas chos rnams rnam par shes// thos nas sdig pa bsten mi byed// thos nas gnod pa spong bar byed// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob// thos par 'dod
262a2(dkon brtsegs): pas thos pa 'phel// thos pa shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni don rnams sbyong // don thob de ni yid no ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos la sbyor zhing gtsang la
262a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas// shin tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni// thos nas chos nyid gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten la ni snang gyur nas// byang chub kyi ni spyad// 
262a4(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol
262a5(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa'i gang zag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
262a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la shin tu byang bar byed/ rnam par dag par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sde snod 'di'i don gyi phyi 'dun pa bskyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus
262a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsom par byed/ sems la rab tu 'dzin par byed/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed de/ de yang dag par spong ba zhi la rab tu zhugs pas chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa
262a8(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos smra ba ni gang yin pa/ de la dge ba'i bshes su sems/ rtag par nan tan gnas
262b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// chos la nan tan byas te nAn// rtag par 'dun pa 'bri mi byed// rtag par brtson 'grus shin tu 'phags// rnam rtag shes rab rnam par spyong// ye shes la ni
262b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gnas// de ni bdag nyid chos shes te// dad pa'i phyir ni 'gro mi byed// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa// mi g.yo ba yi chos shes so// mkhas pa de dag tshig rnams// 
262b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byed la mkhas// bslabs pa don la khong du chud par byed// de dag dkar po'i phyogs ni rtag par spyod// nag po'i phyogs ni rtag tu spong bar byed// de yi sems la rnams
262b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang nyams pa med// de ni chos rnams gang la'ang zhum/ pa med// lus kyang de bzhin sems dang brtson// 'grus drang // 'dun pa yang ba'ang myur du thob par
262b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// chos thos nas ni shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// ye shes rnam par rtogs nas dran mi nyams// dran dang ye shes la ni rtag gnas nas// dge dang mi
262b6(dkon brtsegs): dge'i chos ni rab tu shes// bla na med pa'i chos rnams bslabs nas ni// rtogs dang dran pa shes rab stobs mchog thob// ji ltar bdag nyid yun ring bslabs pa bzhin// 
262b7(dkon brtsegs): des ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes// chos bslabs nas ni khyad par 'thob 'gyur te// khyad par thob cing ye shes dag gyur nas// de ni sems can rnams kyi bsam
262b8(dkon brtsegs): pa shes// de phyir bsam pa bzhin du chos ston to// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
263a1(dkon brtsegs): bam po bcu bdun pa// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar blo sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i
263a2(dkon brtsegs): sgo shin tu yongasasu dag pas 'di ltar slob ste/ 'phags pa'i yang dag par lta ba 'byung ba ni rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid
263a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// da 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan gyi sgra de gang bdag nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de gang zhe na/ de de ltar tshul bzhin yi la byed pa na 'di snyam
263a4(dkon brtsegs): du sems par 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba ma thos
263a5(dkon brtsegs): par ting nge 'dzin tsam gyis dga' ba rnyod nas/ nga rgyal gyi dbang gis che ba'i nga rgyal du lhung ba de dag ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
263a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi thar sdug bsngal gyi phung po las yongasu mi thar te/ de dag la de bzhin gsheg
263a7(dkon brtsegs): pas dgongs nas 'di skad gsungs so// pha rol la rje su 'thun pa thos pa ni rga ba dang 'chi ba las rnam par grol ba'o// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// chos rnams thos
263a8(dkon brtsegs): nas rnam par shes// thos nas sdig pa mi byed// thos nas gnod pa spong bar 'gyur// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob// thos 'dod thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur// thos pas shes rab
263b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar 'gyur// shes kyis ni don rnams spyod// don rnyed nas ni bde thob 'gyur// don rnyed de ni yid rno ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos gtsang mkhas pa gtsang ba dang // mchog tu
263b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shin tu mnyam par bya/ 
263b3(dkon brtsegs): blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grong
263b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di mi nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor bar mi byed pa de dag ni/ 'opha gas pa'i laM lnga yongasu nyams par 'gyur te/ de la dgod nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad du bdag nyid tshul
263b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yid la byed pa ni rga ba dang / 'chi ba las grol ba'o zhes gsung so// de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dang / 'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ni gang / ji ltar byang chub sems
263b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba yin snyam nas de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la'ang sbyor bar mi byed/ rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do// tshul bzhin
263b7(dkon brtsegs): du sbyor ba zhes bya ba de ni mi sbyor ba'i tshig bla dgas so// gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni sgra 'byin par mi byed/ bzlas pa 'byin par mi byed/ gang
263b8(dkon brtsegs): nas sgra 'byung ba de yang mi dmigs/ sgra de nyid gang nas 'byung / gang du 'gag ces sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog par byed de/ gang smras pa dang / gang
264a1(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / gang smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis smras pa dang / gang gis sgru ba dang / gang gis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smras
264a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang
264a3(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba de thams cad yongs su btsal na 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par mi dmigs pa de ni de'i tshul bzhin
264a4(dkon brtsegs): du sbyor ba'o zhes de de ltar slob po// byang chub sems dpa'/ de ltar tshul bzhin du sbyor bas ji ltar tshul bzhin du mtho/ nga zhe na/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ gang gi tshe na byang chub sems
264a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gags par ma thong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos tha mas cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin/ 
264a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // gang gi tshe tshul thams cad rnam par zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong // gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par ma zhugs par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul
264a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma skyes pa mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos
264a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad shin tu yang dag par ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // de gang
264b1(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong ba de la yang rtog ste/ ci nas kyang mi mthong ba dang / mi rtog pa de ltar mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// yang 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems
264b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang the tshom dang rmongs pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang sgrib pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang
264b3(dkon brtsegs): la yang thar pa'i sgor mi 'gyur ba med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do// gang tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang
264b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do// chos ga/ nga chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba de ni yang dag par lta ba'o// 
264b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ji ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ma mthong ba'o// mthong ba zhes bya ba de ni ma/ skyes pa'i tshig bla dgas so// ma skyes pa zhes bya ba de
264b6(dkon brtsegs): ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i tshig bla dgas so// yang dag par ma byung ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi snang ba'i tshig bla dgas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la dgongs nas 'du
264b7(dkon brtsegs): byed thams cad mi skye bar mthong na/ yang dag pa nyid nges pa la 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa de ni yang dag par lta ba'o zhes de skad gsung ngo // 
264b8(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya zhes de la 'di ltar slob ste chos thams cad gang dang mnyam pa sangs rgyas
265a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos de dang mnyam ste/ de bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam
265a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di nyid shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la'ang tshul bzhin du/ 
265a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyar bar bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
265a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de ltar blo shin tu sbyangs pa dang / de ltar snang ba'i sgo shin tu yong su dag pas tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la ba rtson na tshul bzhin gyi tshig mthong ngo // de la tshul bzhin du 'jug
265a5(dkon brtsegs): po gang tshul bzhin gyi tshig gang zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin du 'jug pa ni 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang / lhag mthong rnam par
265a6(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa la ni tshul bzhin du 'jug pa'o// lus dben par 'jug pa dang / sems yid du 'ong bar 'jug pa dang / chad pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang / rtag pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang / rgyu dang
265a7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs ma phyin mi gnas
265a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug pa dang / mi 'pho ba dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / rgyu stong pa nyid du rnam par 'byed sa 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma med pa 'dris par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / smon pa med
265b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu shes pa la 'jug kyang / stong pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa len par 'jug pa ma yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa la len pa la 'jug kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi
265b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis skye ba la mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes len pa la 'jug kyang zag pa zad pa la mi 'jug pa dang / mi skye bar rtog pa la 'jug kyang nges par gyur par 'gro ba la mi
265b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang // sems can thams cad bdag med par rtog par 'jug kyang snying rje chen po gtong ba la mi 'jug pa dang / skye ba thams cad 'jigs par mthong bal 'jug pa dang srid pa bsam gyi
265b4(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa len pa la 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa la 'jug kyang chos mngon du bya ba la mi 'jug pa dang / 'dod dpa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba btang snyoms la 'jug kyang chos kyi dga'
265b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dor ba la mi 'jug pa dang / rtog pa spros tha~Mng gtang ba la 'ju ga kyang thabs mkhas pa gtong ba la mi 'jug pa ste/ shAri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin du 'jug pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de la tshul
265b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi tshig ces bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs pa'i tshig de ni tshul bzhin gyi tshig go// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang tshul bzhin gyi tshig de ni tshul gyi tshig go// de ni sgo'i tshig go// de ni kha'i tshig go// de'i rgyu'i tshig go// de ni rab
265b7(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig go// de ni mi 'gal ba'i tshig go// de ni mi rtsod pa'i tshig go// de ni btang snyoms kyi tshig go// mi len pa'i tshig go/ mi 'dor ba'i tshig go/ ma spros pa'i
265b8(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / mi bsnan pa'i tshig dang / ma bri ba'i tshig dang / mi skye ba'i tshig dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi med pa'i tshig dang / mi ldog pa'i tshig
266a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnyen po med pa'i tshig dang / de kho na'i tshig dang / de bzhin kho na'i tshig dang / ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
266a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig dang / yongs su chad pa'i tshig dang / 
266a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa'i tshig dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gnas med pa'i tshigo/ de ni
266a4(dkon brtsegs): mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par / das pa'i khams gnas pa'i tshigo// de ni rna ba dang // sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
266a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa'i tshigo/ de ni sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rna ma par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig/ de ni lce dang / ro dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i kham/ 
266a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa'i tshi go/ de ni lus dang / reg dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshigo/ de ni yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
266a7(dkon brtsegs): khams gnas med pa'i tshigo/ de ni don la rton pa'i tshigo/ de ni chos la rton pa'i tshe go// de ni ye shes la rton pa'i tshigo/ de ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la ston pa'i tshig ste/ 
266a8(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin gyi tshig go/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson pa/ tshul bzhin gyi tshig mthong ba de ni de gang gis mthong ba de nyid ma
266b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ ji ltar mi mthong rnam par mi mthong ba de ltar mtho // de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni
266b2(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la yang rmongs par mi 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang thar pa'i sgor mi 'gyur ba med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang
266b3(dkon brtsegs): yang spong ba'i phyir 'bad pa medado// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dra ba med/ gang chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta bzhin
266b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de ni yod dag par lta ba'o// chos thams cad jidalta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mi ma thong ba'o// mi mthong ba gang zhe na/ de ni ma skyes pa'i
266b5(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dag so// ma skyes pa zhe bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi snang ba'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas te/ rgya cher ji ltar sngar bzlas pa de ltar de bzhin du bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar/ 
266b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thad ni
266b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag bzhin du tshul bzhin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du chos zad bdag med par mtho // ji ltar son bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thaMd ni bdag med par mthong ste/ 
266b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin du mthong // gang tshul bzhin 'khor ba'i khams mthong ba de tshul bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang ldan par mthong ste/ de ni tshul bzhin du/ 
267a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de ni chos thaMd kyi rang bzhin la nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin du bye brag med pa dang ldan pa mthong ngo // rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma yin par ma snyom so// tshul
267a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sbyor bas tshul bzhi gyi mthong ste/ tshul bzhin sbyor ba ji snyed pa sems can gyi gnas thams cad kyang de rnyed de/ sems can gyi gnas kyang mi mthong / chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrug par
267a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhir sbyor ba ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na rnam pa 'di dang / thos pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin du 'jug pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin mthong ba
267a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'o/ di dag ni shes rab ces bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
267a5(dkon brtsegs): pal spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos thaMd la shes rab kyis ma
267a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa dang / lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'du byed rnams dang lhon cig tu mi gnas pa nas rgyas par bya ste/ rgya shi'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas
267a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu lta ba dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa nas/ bdag tu lte ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mtho bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi
267a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ dma' bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang log pa'i nga rgyal dang nye ba'i
267b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ chen po dang 'bring po dang / pA mo nas nyon mongs pa tha~Md kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ gti mugi mun pa rab rib kyi ling
267b2(dkon brtsegs): tog gis bsgribs pa dang / chod par byed pa kun tu dkris te 'dug pa nas dma' ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ rtsod pa'i rnyog pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bu
267b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / lha'i bu dang / 'chi bdag gi bdun nas bdud thams cad kyi las kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag dang sen dang srog dang gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed
267b4(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa nas bdag tu lta ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba'i// 
267b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / mi shwe b+hI s+thiH bananas kyi 'tshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lha na cig tu mi gnas/ kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog
267b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa dang / rnam par rig pa dang / 'dus pa'i sgro 'dogs pa thams cad dang lhan cig
267b7(dkon brtsegs): tu mi gnas/ ser sna dang / gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / 
267b8(dkon brtsegs): le le dang / bsam gtan dang / g.yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / 
268a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / mi shes pa'i bar thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / dge ba dang / mi
268a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa nas chos thams cad kyi gnyen po'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ zhing sna tshogs dang / sangs
268a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dang / chos sna tshogs nas sna tshogs thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mi shes pa dang shes pa dang / rnam par
268a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam pa nas semadas can thams cad kyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa/ dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ shes rab mi rgyu ba dang / 
268a5(dkon brtsegs): lus med pa dang dmatshan nyid med pa dang / ma rna ma med pa dang / 'dus ma byas nas yid la byed pa thams cad dang // sem sa dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas dag gi bar dang ldan
268a6(dkon brtsegs): cig tu mi gnas te/ de dag dang gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnaso// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol
268a7(dkon brtsegs): tu byin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab de ni gang 'das byas kyi spyod pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
268a8(dkon brtsegs): byin pa spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang na sems dpa'i sde snod la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
268b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'byed mkhas pa yin te/ chos thams cad la mkhas pa rje su 'thob bo// de la shes rab rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas
268b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa dang / rton pa la mkhas pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yis la
268b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa dang / lam la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang bcu ste/ mkhas pa rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi
268b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// de la phung po la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di phung po rnams kyi dper bya ba bstan pa 'di lta
268b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ lbu ba rdos pa lta bur bstan pa dang / smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa dang / chu bur lta bur bstan pa dang / chu shi nga lta bur bstan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa dang / rmi lam lta
268b6(dkon brtsegs): bur bstan pa dang / brag cha lta bur bstan pa dang / mig yor lta bur bstan pa dang / gzuDa brnyan lta bur bstan pa'o// gzuT ni chu'i lbu ba lta bu ste/ lbu ba la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ 
268b7(dkon brtsegs): srog med/ gang zag med/ skyes bu med/ shed bu med/ shed las skyes pa med de/ lbu ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa gzugs kyang de'i rang bzhin te/ gang de la mkhas
268b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// tsher ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ste/ chu bur la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ shed bu med/ 
269a1(dkon brtsegs): shed las skyes pa med/ skye ba po med de/ chu bur gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa tshor ba yang de'i rang bzhin te/ gang de la mkhas pa 'di phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 
269a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ smig rgyu ba la yang bdag med/ sems can med pa nas skyes bu'i bar du med de/ smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du shes kyang de'i rang bzhin to// 
269a3(dkon brtsegs): gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu ste/ chu shing la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med pa nas skyes bu'i
269a4(dkon brtsegs): bar du med pa ste/ chu shing gi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'a/ du byed kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkha sa pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes
269a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sgyu ma la yang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ shed bu med/ shad las skyes pa med/ skyes bu med/ byed pa po med/ 
269a6(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba po med pa ste/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po
269a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams shes bya ba ni 'jig rten yin te/ 'jig rten yang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'jig rten rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa phu po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin no// yang 'jig
269a8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi rang bzhin gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang / sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin te/ phung po yang de'i rang bzhin no// gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas
269b1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phung po la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos kyi khams de ni sa'i
269b2(dkon brtsegs): khams mod kyi chos kyi khams sra ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni chu'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni me'i kham
269b3(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi makyil tsha ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni rlung gi khams mod kyi chos kyi khams g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni mig gi rnam par
269b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni rna ba'i rnadam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams sgra rtogs
269b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni sna'i rna ma par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams dri snom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni
269b6(dkon brtsegs): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams reg
269b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams rnam par bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams dang bdag/ 
269b8(dkon brtsegs): gi khams de ni mtshungaso// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ni mtshungaso// 'khor ba'i khams dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams de
270a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshung so// de ltar chos thams cad kyi khams dang na mkha'i khams de mtshungs te/ stong pa nyid dang mtshungs pas mtshungs/ mi 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pas mtshungs
270a2(dkon brtsegs): te 'dus byas kyi khams su 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams su 'jug pa'i phyir de la bshad pa dpag tu med de/ gang khams la 'jug pa des rab tu rnam par
270a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byed pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na khams la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub
270a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ dmig bdag dang bdag gis stong pa de byang chub se dmas dpa' mig gi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu'o zhes yang
270a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/ de ni byang chub sem sa pa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// gong ma ba zhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang // 
270a6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / yid bdag dang bdag gis stong pa de byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta bo bzhin rab tu shes te/ dge pa sogs pa'i
270a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir gang skye mched la kun spogs pa dang / sna tshogs stsogs pa de dag stsogs par mi byed cing dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams la 'du shes gnyisu mi 'jug ste/ de ni
270a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// 'di ni mig gi skye mched do// 'di ni gzugs kyi skye mche do zhes de ltar mig dang gzugs rnams la 'dod chags med par
270b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong yang / 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus dang reg dang / yid dang / 
270b2(dkon brtsegs): chos gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yid dang chos kyi bar du 'dod chags med par mthong mod kyi/ 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni byang chub seMs
270b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// skye mched ces bya ba de yang 'phags pa'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched de/ de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni gang
270b4(dkon brtsegs): sdud par byed pa'o// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gang lam nga gtong bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la dam la gnas pa ni sems can lam la brtson pa bor zhing
270b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa la snying rje chen po 'thob cing / lam gyi skye mched kyang nga mi gtong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ma ched la mkhas pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i
270b6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa ni rnam pa/ 
270b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po rnams la mi skye bar shes pa
270b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang sred pa 'joms pa de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mi 'byung
271a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jig par shes pa de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i chos rnams la sgromi 'dogs pa don lam shes pa/ 
271a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bden pa 'di bzhi de ltar shes rab kyis shes kyang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon du mi byed pa de ni bden pa la mkhas
271a3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa la mkhas pa rnam pa gsum ste/ 'di lta ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o// de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa
271a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang brdar bstan pa ste/ de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhe bya 'o// de la don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ gang la sem
271a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyu ba yang med na yi ge lta ci smos te/ de ni don du ma pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de la mtshan nyid kyi/ bden pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste mtshan nyid thams cad
271a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig la mtshan nyid gcig pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'chad pas mi skyo// don dam pa'i bden pa mngon
271a7(dkon brtsegs): du byed par mi ltung / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa mtshan nyid med pas rtogs par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa ni
271a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu gnyis ma yin pa ste/ 'di lta ste 'gog pa'i bden pa'o// de la bden pa gcig pu la gang sgro mi 'dogs pa dang / sems can sgro 'dogs par ltung ba rnams
271b1(dkon brtsegs): la bden pa sbyor bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po lnga rnams ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang phung po lnga rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi
271b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid de ni sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa de ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po lnga rnams kyi
271b3(dkon brtsegs): bag la zhal rgyu srid pa las byung ba'i lta ba de ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o// gang sred pa'i rgyu lta ba de la yang sgro mi 'dogs mi len mi snyems pa de ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i
271b4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po lnga rnams shin tu za dad pa'i phyir 'gog pa sngon gyi mthar ma byung ba phyi dma'i mthar mi 'pho gang ltar byung bar mi gnas pa
271b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang lam lo brten nas sdug bsngal shes pa dang / ku na 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa la yang
271b6(dkon brtsegs): reg par byed la/ rjes las rtogs pa'i shes pa yang thob par byed pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang bden pa shes pa
271b7(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can yongasu brtag pa la rtog par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshor ba thams
271b8(dkon brtsegs): cad sdug bsngal ba ste/ de la tshor bar bya ba rnam par 'byed pa dang / blos rig pa nyid de sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// rgyu gang gis kun 'byung bar
272a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i rgyu de ji lta ba yang dag par rab tu shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang tshor ba gtong zhing ma tsher ba tshor bar byed pa dang / 
272a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa la yang so sor rtog la tshor ba 'gog pa yang mngon sum du mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba
272a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis gzings dang 'dra ba'i lam de sdud par byed la tshor ba dgos pa yang ma yin/ lam gyi dgos pa yang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro
272a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de ltar rtog/ sa nas bden pa de bzhi la mnyam par mthong zhing mthong ba shin tu dag pa'ang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sem
272a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang skye ba/ sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang mi skye ba la so sor rtogs pa shes pa de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// srid pa'i
272a6(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis skye ba ste gang srid pa 'jig par shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// skye ba thams cad gang gis mi skye bar shes pa de la 'gog pa gang yang med cing / gang mi 'gog par
272a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni zad pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// gang de ltar tshor ba dang / 'jal ba dang / yongs su tshor ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / 'jug pa'i shes pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya
272a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ gang bden pa'i shes pa de la gzhog par byed kyang / bden pa'i shes pa de la mi gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bden
272b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i so so
272b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rig pa ste/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / 
272b3(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la don so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la don dam pa'i tshig tu shes pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / 
272b4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen shes pa dang / 'dus pa shes pa dang / mtha' med pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / brten pa la 'judag pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes
272b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi gnas pa shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / mtshan ma med
272b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rtogs pa shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la smon pa med par shes pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la mngon par 'du byed par shes pa dang / tshul gcig tu 'jug pa shes pa dang / 
272b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / srog med pa byed pa gcig pa shes pa dang / gang zag med pa don dam par shes pa dang / 
272b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus la ma chags par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mtha' med par shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la thams cad du shes pa dang / phung po rnams la sgyu mar shes pa dang / 
273a1(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa dang mtshungs par shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la stong pa nyid du nges par rtogs pa shes pa dang / nang zhi ba shes pa dang / phyi rol tu mi
273a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba shes pa dang / yul la yul med par shes pa dang / dran pa la gnas su shes pa dang / rtogs pa la khong du chud par shes pa dang / blo gros la mngon sum du shes pa dang / bden pa la rab
273a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs par shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la mi 'byung bar shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba la mngon par 'du mi byed par shes pa dang / 'gog pa la mtshan nyid med par shes pa dang / lam
273a4(dkon brtsegs): la sgrol bar shes pa dang / chos la tshig rab tu tha dad par shes pa dang / dbang po rnams la 'jug par shes rab dang / stobs rnams la mi rdzi bar shes pa dang / zhi gnas
273a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas su shes pa dang / lhag mthong la snang bar shes pa dang / sgyu ma la bsgrub par shes pa dang / smig rgyu la 'khrul par shes pa dang / rmi lam la mi bden pa mthong ba
273a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / brag cha la rkyen la 'jug par shes pa dang / mig yor la 'pho bar shes pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs la mtshan nyid gcig tu shes pa dang / 'du ba la 'bral bar shes pa dang / 
273a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sbyangs pa la phyir mtshams sbyor ba med par shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sgra'i rje su 'gro bar 'jug par shes pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brtan pa la 'jug pa shes shingag
273a8(dkon brtsegs): dben pa la mchog tu shes pa dang / theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa thams cad shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// 
273b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang don la rton pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kun gyi don la rton pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma lus
273b2(dkon brtsegs): par stong pa ste/ stong pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par mtshan ma med pa ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par
273b3(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa ste smon pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus pa rnam par phye ba ste rnam par phye ba'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par
273b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med pa ste gang za/ gra med pa ste gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// gang de lta bu'i chos rnams rtogs pa de ni don so so yang
273b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/ gang don ston pa de ni gnas/ med pa ston pa'o// de ni mi zad pa ston pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa ni rtogs pa'i don ston pa yin te/ 
273b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang ba rjes su yong rang ba yang dag pa de kho na gzhan ma yin pa/ shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa de ni byang
273b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i don so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba ma
273b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i cha dang
274a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba'i chos rnams la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / byang chub kyi mnya
274a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid shes pa dang / khams mnyam pa nyid shes pa ste/ de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la sems
274a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / bcos pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags brtan par spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags chung ngu spyod pa rnams dang / rnam par mi ldang ba'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnam
274a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtha' mar rtag tu med pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rna dmas dang / da ltar byung ba la rkyen gyis 'dod chags spro/ dad pa rnams la 'jug pa ste/ sems can gang dag nang du
274a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang / phyi rol tu 'dod chags la nang du 'dod chags med pa dang / nang du'ang 'dod chags med/ phyi rol tu'ang 'dod chags
274a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / nang dang phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang / gzugs la 'dod chags la sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / sgra la 'dod chags la/ gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / gzug
274a7(dkon brtsegs): dang sgra la 'dod chags pa dang / gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags la reg la 'dod chags med pa dang / reg la 'dod chags la ro la
274a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags med pa dang / ro la 'dod chags la gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / dri la 'dod chags med pa de ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de'i sgos 'dod
274b1(dkon brtsegs): chags spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong / zhe sdang spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong / gti mug spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong / cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong ste/ gang de/ 
274b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sems 'jug pa shes pa dang / ji ltar rig par bstan pa shes pa dang / mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa shes pa dang / 'dod pa las yang dag par
274b3(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar shes pa dang / snod kyi khyad par shes pa dang / 'bras bu yod par bstan pa shes pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig
274b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ gang skad thams cad la skad med par 'jugapa shes pa dang / lha'i skad dang / klu'i skad dang / gnodasbyin gyi skad dang / dri za'i skad dang / mi 'am ci'i skad dang / 
274b5(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po'i skad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i skadadang / 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi ska de dang / sgra dang dbyangs rnams las skad des de dag la chos
274b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chad pa ste/ de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar chos de dag brtag par bya'o// de ltar chos de dag bsdu bar bya'o// de ltar chos de dag rje su rgyun chags
274b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de ltar chos de dag yi ge rnams kyis spel bar bya'o// de tshig gcig gi bla dgas shes/ tshig gnyis pa'i bla dgas shes/ tshig mang po'i blo dgas shes/ bud med kyi tshig shA
274b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i tshig shes/ ma ning gi tshig shes/ bsdus pa'i tshig shes/ rgyas pa'i tshig shes/ smad pa'i tshig shes/ stong pa'i tshig shes/ 'das pa'i tshig shes/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshig shes
275a1(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i tshig shes/ yi ge gcig gis sgro btags pa shes/ yi ge mang pos sgro btags pa shes te/ de nis nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// 
275a2(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin/ bzlos pa ma yin/ brtags pa ma yin/ don gsal ba'i ye shes yongs su byang ba ste/ ci nas kyang 'khor yang dag par
275a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba sna tshogs pa/ zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ kun rdzob dang don dam pas brgyan pa/ bdag gi sems mthong ba'i shes pa la rag lus pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ sems can thams cad
275a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa/ de'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang
275a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang tshig bzang ba mi gnas par lung bstan pa/ ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ spobs pa myur ba/ spobs pa mgyogs shing myur ba/ spobs pa rmongs pa/ spobs pa jis
275a6(dkon brtsegs): dris pa bzhin pa/ spobs pa yongasu mi nyams pa/ spobs pa mi 'gal ba/ spobs pa rtsod pa med pa/ spobs pa chos la rab tu dga' ba/ spobs pa bzod pa la gnas pa/ spobs pa zab pa
275a7(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa sna tshogs pa/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa la spobs pa/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab thams cad la
275a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i spobs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spongs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi
275b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / lhag mthong la spobs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa thams cad shes pa'i spobs
275b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ theg pa thams cad la spobs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la spobs pa/ tshogs mi lkug pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mi rtsub pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mi 'chal ba'i
275b3(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa/ tshig rtsub mo ma yin pa'i spobs pa/ tshig mnyen pa'i spobs pa dang / tshig dag pa/ tshig grol ba dang / tshig ma chags pa/ tshig btsun pa/ tshig 'brel ga/ tshig ldan pa/ tshig/ 
275b4(dkon brtsegs): ma nyams pa/ tshig snyan pa/ tshig 'jam pa/ tshig ma dasmad pa/ tshig 'phags pa thams cad kyis bstod pa ste/ zhing mtha' yas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rjesu song
275b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs dang 'dra ba rtog sa par byed pa'i sgra gcig pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gan nga ba'i spobs pa/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag
275b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la chos ston to// de'i chos bstan pa de yang 'byung bar byed pa/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang
275b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
275b8(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa 'di bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la ma yin pa dang // 
276a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rnams la rton gyi drang ba'i don rnams la ma yin pa dang / chos nyid la rton gyi gang
276a2(dkon brtsegs): zag la ma yin pa'o// de la don gang tshig 'bru gang zhe na/ tshig 'bru zhes bya ba gang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
276a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa dang / dus pa dang / sdom pa dang / des brtan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang / zhi gnas dang / sar pa ma yin pa dang / rnying pa ma yin par
276a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba yongs nga su bcad pa sgrogs pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni mi dmi gas pa la rton pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das
276a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su sgrogs pa'o// don zhes bya/ ba ni chos rang bzhin gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'dra/ sa pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba
276a6(dkon brtsegs): ni theg pa ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du 'chad pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni chos tshul gcig pa rtogs par shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad mi gtong bar
276a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid sdom zhing bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag
276a8(dkon brtsegs): bar len par bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid mi dmigs shing mngon par 'du mi byed pa yong su dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gnod sems kyi tha ba dang khre
276b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dregs pa 'joms shing bzod pa dang / nges pa brtan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dge nga
276b2(dkon brtsegs): rdza ba la brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni mi len mo gtong ba gnas po'i brtson 'grus so// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / 
276b3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 
276b4(dkon brtsegs): don zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i don to// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni
276b5(dkon brtsegs): gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rgya chos rnams nan tan du byed pa'i 'bras bu mngon su ma du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba dang / 
276b6(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba dang / lam rab tu bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs te rga shi'i bar du bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba
276b7(dkon brtsegs): ni ma rig pa 'gog pa nas rga shi'i bar du 'gog pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'o// tshig 'bru hA
276b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la chos bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rnam par grol ba mo 'khrugs pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba
277a1(dkon brtsegs): ni sgri'i par byed pa'i chos thams cad rab tu bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par thar pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum/ 
277a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' med pa yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'o// don zhes bya ba ni gang chos 'did chags med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun tu yon tan bsgrub pa'o// 
277a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bsgrubs pa dang / yon tan rtsom pa bstan pa'o// de ni zhes bya ba ni sems kyi skad
277a4(dkon brtsegs): cig gcig dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma dngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o// mdor na chos kyi dpung po brgyad khro ba ni stong gi bar du bstan pa de ni tshig
277a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bru zhes bya'o// sgra dang yi ge dang tshig 'bru thams cad brjod du/ med pa'i don to// de la drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ gang tshig 'bru bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher
277a6(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya ste/ 'di dag ni drang po'i don gyi mdo sde dag go// nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ don gang bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/ de dag ni ngas pa'i
277a7(dkon brtsegs): don gyi mdo sde dag go// de ji ltar na chos la rton gyi gang zag la ma yin zhe na/ gang drang ba'i don de ni gang zag gi don yin pas de la mi rton gyi/ gang nges pa'i don de ni chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin pas de
277a8(dkon brtsegs): la rton pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa bzhi'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rton pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
277b1(dkon brtsegs): bam po bco brgyad pa// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig 'bru la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
