302a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab ngo mtshar du 'gyur/ shes rab myur bar 'gyur/ shes rab rno bar 'gyur ro// shes rab mgyogs par 'gyur/ shes rab rgya
302a7(dkon brtsegs): che bar 'gyur/ shes rab zab par 'gyur/ shes rab nges par 'byed par 'gyur/ shes rab ma chags par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du mthong zhing mthong nas tshigs su
302a8(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis stod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul bzhin gyi zhu zhing tshul bzhin du zhu ba la zhus nas lan ldon par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag
302b1(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// de gzhan yang yon tan gyi phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mnyes par byas par
302b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi bcings pa thams cad lhod par 'gyur ba dang / des bdud thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad smad par 'gyur ba dang / 
302b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed thams cad du gtogs pa las yid bskyod par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba ngan 'gro ba'i lam thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro
302b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam mngon du 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thams cad las sgrol ba'i sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi cho ga'i rjesu
302b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bka'i rje su zhug par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan gyi phan bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// / 
302b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan blangs bzung bklags kun chub par byas gzhan la yang bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
302b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan na yon tan gyi phan yon 'di snyed thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 
302b8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa// mkhas pa de dag shes rab mtha' yas 'gyur// chos dang don rnams la yang mkhas par 'gyur// tshig kyang khyab par 'phags
303a1(dkon brtsegs): shing yi ge rdzogs// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa// de ni rab dga' shin tu mgu skyes nas// dge slong de ni 'di bsang chos 'jud de/ rtag tu
303a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbyin pa byed par 'gyur// sems can rnams ni mang du chos thos nas// kye ma'o yon tan chen po 'chad byed pa// nam zhig bdag cag 'di 'dra'i chos ston cing // mdo
303a3(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di 'dra 'dzin par 'gyur zhes zer// gang dag de 'dra shes rab ldan mchog rnams// chos rnams gang la'ang zhum par mi 'gyur te// dran dang ye shes kyis ni 'phags
303a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // bla na med pa'i ye shes tshig ston 'gyur/ gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa// de ni 'phags pa sra rtag bsngags rgyal bas gnang // chos tshig legs
303a5(dkon brtsegs): par bshad pa tshol bar byed// de ni thos pas rtag tu 'phags par 'gyur// thos nas don ni nye bar 'dzin par byed// shes rab ldan pa 'bru la mi
303a6(dkon brtsegs): snyegs te// don la lta bas rtogs pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de yi ye shes rtag tu tshad med do// ye shes mtha' yas don kyang mtha' yas te// sems pa mtha' yas dam
303a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don la mkhas// de yi yon tan phyogs dang phyogasu 'gro/ de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag go// de yi 'dod chags chung la zhe sdang chung // de yi gti mug shin
303a8(dkon brtsegs): tu rab tu chung // sems kyang shin tu dag pa rnyed par 'gyur// de yi thos pa'i yon tan 'di dag gi/ longs spyod rnyed nas rgyags par mi 'gyur te// 'di la snying po ci
303b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes don la rtog/ longs spyod snying po med par rab shes nas// de ni longs spyod mi lta rab tu 'byung // mngon par byung ste dgon par gnas// rtag tu g.yel ba med pa
303b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos rnams thos pas mi ngoms te// chos sbyin pa la ser sna med// 'jig rten mgon po'i drung nyid du// song ste zhu ba zhu byed pas// rtag de phyir de yi shes rab
303b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phel// de la dkar po 'bri ba med// shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de la brtson pa byang chub sems
303b4(dkon brtsegs): dbI spyad pa spyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o// de la bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa gang zhe na/ 'di bzhi ni byang chub sem
303b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste/ bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' yun ring por sem/ can rnams yang dag par bsdu bar byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ 
303b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mtshungs pa ste/ de dag ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o// de la sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste zang zing sbyin
303b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa ste/ de ni sbyin pa'o// de la snyan par smra ba gang zhe na/ slong ba dang chos nyan pa la snyan par smra ba'o// de la den byed pa ni bdag dang
303b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// don 'thun pa ni theg pa gang la yon tan du 'du shes pa'i theg pa dang / chos de dag la 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can
304a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzhog pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang slong ba la yid dang bar byed pa ste/ de ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang slong ba rnams la rim gro byed
304a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// don byed pa ni gang gis slong ba rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba rnams kyi don de yongasu thob par byed pa'o// don mtshungs pa ni gang slong ba la don mtshungs pa'o// gzhan
304a3(dkon brtsegs): yang sbyin pa ni bsam pas gtang ba'o// snyan par smra ba ni sbyor ba yongasu chad pa'o// don byed pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa 'gyod pa med pa'o// don mthun pa ni theg pa chen po la
304a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngo ba'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni byams pa'i rje su zhugs pa'i sems kyis btang ba'o// snyan par smra ba ni dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba la zhugs pa'i sems mi gtong ba'o// don byed pa
304a5(dkon brtsegs): ni snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa'i sems can gyi bya ba la brtson pa'o// don mtshungs pa ni btang snyon/ la mthon dman med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
304a6(dkon brtsegs): la bsngo ba'i sems so// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang chos kyi btsal ba'i longs spyod yongasu gtong pa'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang la sbyin par byed pa de chos la 'dzud pa'o// don byed pa
304a7(dkon brtsegs): gang bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don yang dag par bskyed pa'o// don mtshungs pa ni gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'o// gzhan yang
304a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa ni gang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi ye shes la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud
304b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// don byed pa ni gang gis don btang ste gzhan gyi don myong bar byed pa'o// don mtshungs pa nyid ni byang chub lag tu 'ong ba la bltas nas gzhan la sbyin pa ni yid mi bde bar mi
304b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de la chos sbyin pa gang zhe na/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'o// de la snyan par smra ba gang zhe na/ gang zang zing med par chos ston pa'o// don byed pa ni gang pha rol la lung
304b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bogs pa dang / kha tan byed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang ston pa la mi skyo ba'o// de la don mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar chos
304b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'dzud pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni chos nyan par 'ongs pa rnams la mi g.yeng bar ston pa'o// de la stan bar smra ba ni gang rgyang ring por yang song ste dam pa'i chos ston/ 
304b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de la don byed pa ni gang chos 'dod pas chos smra ba rnams gos dang bral bar gyur tam/ bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang 'bral bar gyur te// 
304b6(dkon brtsegs): ci dgos par gyur pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o// don mtshungs pa nyid ni lhag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa'i rgyud kyis chos ston pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi sbyin pa ni gang sbyin pa thams cad
304b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na mchog tu shes nas chos sbyin par byed pa'o// de la snyan par smra ba ni gang phan pa'i dngos po'i phyir ston pa'o// don byed pa ni gang don la rton gyi/ tshig 'bru la mi rton pa'o// de la don mtshung
304b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bskang ba'i phyir chos ston pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// snyan par smra ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
305a1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// don byed pa ni gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// don mtshungs pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes ra
305a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni byang chub semA dang sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi'o// snyan par smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi'o// don
305a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi'o// don mtshungs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni byang chub
305a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtsa ba'i gnas so// snyan par smra ba ni byang chub kyi myu gu yongasu rdzogs pa'o// don byed pa ni byang chub kyi me tog yongasu grub pa'o// don mtshungs par byed pa ni byang chub kyi/ 
305a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu mngon par grub pa ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
305a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po yun ring por sems can rnams yang dag par sdud cing byang chub tu spyod de/ de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjesu 'jug pa zhes bya'o// de lta bas na tshad med pa de dag dang pha rol
305a7(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa de dag dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po de dag ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
305a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas phung po chen po des brtson 'grus spyod pa la byang chub kyi lam de yang bshad/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa
305b1(dkon brtsegs): yang brjod do// shA ri'i bu de nas gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po las byang chub kyi lam de thos/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / 
305b2(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan yang zos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen po rnyed par gyur to// de dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen po rnyed nas/ bcom
305b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'di lta
305b4(dkon brtsegs): ste na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur bstin byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas/ mchod par byas nas
305b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// / 
305b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the tshom dang / yid gnyis za na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe dog
305b7(dkon brtsegs): dus nang gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ces bya bar gyur te/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang / so
305b8(dkon brtsegs): snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu bkur bsti byas bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod par byas/ nas byang chu
306a1(dkon brtsegs): tu smon lam btab kyang nga bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
306a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhes lung ma bstan to// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das 'od 'phro'i phung po chen po de tshun chad bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
306a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan lag ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dko
306a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog yan lag gi nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon
306a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems sa kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go/ shA ri'i bu yang de'i tshe na rgyal po mdzes par
306a6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba zhes bya ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba 'khor lo bsgyur ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po yul gyi mthu dang brtson pa dang thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig
306a7(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di dag go// 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che nas/ blon po rin po che'i bar du bdun te/ mngon par btul nas gnas pa'i bar du'o// shA ri'i bu rgyal po
306a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par snang ba de'i pho brang ni grong khyer 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser zhes bya ste/ shar phyogs nas nub phyogasu chur ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su zheng du ni
306b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad bdun yod de/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe na tshong dpon shes rab bzang
306b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba nas mdzod dang bang bas yongasu gang ba'i bar du rgyas par byas te/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon gyi sangs
306b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la bya ba byas pa zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des tshong dpon shes rab bzang gi bsam pa la brtags nas/ 
306b4(dkon brtsegs): kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzang byang chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rung ngo // kye ma'o tshong dpon shes rab bzang sangs rgyas kyi chos
306b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi snod du gyur to snyam du dgongs te/ snod du gyur/ par mkhyen nas/ tshong dpon shes rab bzang ga la ba der gshegs te phyin nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar
306b6(dkon brtsegs): snang la dkyil mo dkrungs su bzhugs nas/ byang chub kyi lam yang bshad/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa
306b7(dkon brtsegs): yang brjod do// shA ri'i bu de bas na tshong dpon shes rab bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam 'di yang thos/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang
306b8(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang thos nas/ dga' ba dang mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur to// de dga' ba dang mgu
307a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mchog tu dga' rgya chen po thob nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog yan
307a2(dkon brtsegs): lag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo stong du 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur byas
307a3(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas/ bsti sdang byas/ mchod par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon
307a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog yan lag des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstun to// shA da ri'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon shes rab bzang
307a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin snyam du the tshom dang yidaganyis za na de ltar mi blta'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na nga tshong dpon shes rab bzang zhes bya bar 'gyur
307a6(dkon brtsegs): to/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo stong dun bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / 
307a7(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas bsti stang du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ byang chub tu smon lam btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
307a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag des nga la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med
307b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dkon mchog yan lag tshun chad bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad
307b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yang de'i tshe rgyal po dgra thul zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ shA ri'i bu rgyal po dag thul gyi grong khyer pad+ma can zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa rgyas pa bde
307b3(dkon brtsegs): ba lo legs pa/ dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba zhig yod do// shA ri'i bu rgyal po dgra thul gyi bram ze mar me bdag ces bya ba/ shing sa la chen po lta bu byug pa
307b4(dkon brtsegs): nor yang ba longs spyod che ba nas mdzod dang bang ba'i bar du yongasu gang ba zhig byung ba de rgyal po dgra thul la dben zhing phangs sdug cing yid du 'ong ste/ mthong na mi
307b5(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa med de/ shA ri'i bu bram ze mar me'i bdag shing / sa la chen po lta bu la rgyal srid phyed byin no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste rgyal po mar me'i bdag po rgyal po byed byed
307b6(dkon brtsegs): pa chos kyis byed de/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po mar me'i bdag po las bu gzugs bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa shin tu bzang ba kha dog rgyas
307b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog dang ldan pa lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i lus thams cad las 'od byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'byung ba bzhin
307b8(dkon brtsegs): te/ de'i ming mar me mdzad du btags so// shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me bdag gis bram ze'i mtshan mkhan ltas shes pa rnams bsogs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad bstan
308a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de dag gis de byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ltar rgyal po mar me'i bdag pos rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad ma ma dag la gtad de// 
308a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de nas ring po ma lon par rgyal bu mar me mdzad gzhon nur mkhas par gyur to// shA ri'i bu de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'og
308a3(dkon brtsegs): min gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad la bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub
308a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me mdzad la tshig dasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// btsun mo 'khor gyi na du ni// yon tan 'byung gnas gyur pa med// drang srong rgyal
308a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gnas nas ni/ byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// lang 'tsho myur du 'gro ba ni// rlung gi shugs las lhag par mgyogs// rga ba de ni gzugs 'jig ste/ 
308a6(dkon brtsegs): rten yid du mi 'ong ba// grogs po rgas pa mthu nyam+ba ni/ ba tu 'byung bar da/ 'a ba ste/ khyed ni shin tu dang lang khyod ni btsal ba'i dus yin no// legaso legaso shes rab che// leg so legaso blo gros che// 
308a7(dkon brtsegs): myur du mngon par byung na legs// thub bstan byang chub rtogs par gyis// / bam po nyi shu pa ste tha ma'o// 
308a8(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang me mdzad la bskul ba dang / dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
308b1(dkon brtsegs): nas de nyid kyi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de nyid kyi nub mo de ltar bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs
308b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur par che ba dang dge bar grags pa'i sgra dang
308b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa mngon par byung nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po mar me bdag gis byin gyis ma brlabs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon
308b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de nyid kyi nub mo rgya cher sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa'i bar du che ba dang dge bar grags pa'i sgra dang / tshogasu bcad
308b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thos so// shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyi rgyal po mar me bdag la khyod kyi sras rab tu byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
308b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bdag gis thos te/ bdag ni khyod kyi sras mar me mdzad mthong bar 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad thugs brtse
308b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du bdag gi drung du gshegs su gsol/ de ste mi gshegs na bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te mchi'o zhes po nya btang ba dang / de nas shA ri'i bu
308b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mar me bdag gis rtsis pa dang / blon po dang sgo ba dang / 'khor rnams brtsegs te/ de ltar gyur pa dag bzlas pa dang / de dag gis lha de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de nyid
309a1(dkon brtsegs): la gsol na bcom ldan 'das de ni thugs rje che bas thugs rjes dgongs te rgyal po dgra thul gyi drung du gshegs par 'gyur te/ rgyal po dgra thul kyang 'dir mi mchi/ 
309a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me bdag blon po dag dang 'grogs te/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
309a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de ltar gyur pa de dag gsol to// de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis rgyal po mar me'i bdag po la
309a4(dkon brtsegs): de bas na rgyal po chen po thugs brtse ba'i phyir rgyal po dgra thul gyi drung du gshegs so zhes bka' stsal to// shAri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar
309a5(dkon brtsegs): med mdzad lha rdzas mchog gi rgyal po'i pho brang du ji srid dgos par bzhugs nas/ dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgya
309a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa bzhi dang thabs gcig tu yul rgyu zhing gshegs so// rgyal po mar me'i bdag po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te zham ring thog thag tu 'brang zhing de ga/ 
309a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa la na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur bsti byed cing bdag gi yul gyi
309a8(dkon brtsegs): bar du zham ring byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mchi ma blags nas slar log pa dang
309b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i pho brang
309b2(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma can du gshegs par rgyal po dgra thul gyis thos so// de nas rgyal po dgra thul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can brgyan te/ sa bzhi dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo
309b3(dkon brtsegs): dag la bseg ma dang gyo mo dag sel du btsud de bsal nas phyag dar dang chag chag 'debasu btsud do// spos chu'i chag chag kyang 'debasu btsud do// me tog bkram pas pus mo nub tsam
309b4(dkon brtsegs): du phyin par bya ba byed du btsud do// bdug pa'i snod nas kyang bdug pa byas so// gos rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re bres// sil snyan sna tshogs kyang dkrol du btsud do// de nas rgyal
309b5(dkon brtsegs): dag brul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can brgyan nas gang rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can kun na me tog dang dri dang byug pa yod pa rnams sus kyang ma spyad cig ma btsong shig/ de thaMd
309b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la dbul zhing mchod pa'i las su gyis shig/ la la zhig spyod dam 'tshong na de ni chad pa chen pos bcad do zhes sgra bsgrag so// de nas rgyal po dgra thul/ 
309b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te me tog dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / 
309b8(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dkrol ba dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i
310a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa chen pos rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can nas phyir byung ngo // pad+ma can gyis bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ga
310a2(dkon brtsegs): bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / 
310a3(dkon brtsegs): na bza' dang gdugs dang // rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas/ blon po dang 'khor dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis kyang bcom ldan
310a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ zham 'bring du 'brang ba dang / rgyal po dgra thul sems dga' sems mgu sems
310a5(dkon brtsegs): la sgrib pa med sems rangs par gyur nas/ bcom/ ldan 'das kyis zham 'bring du 'brang ngo // yang de'i tshe na gangs kyi ri'i ngos la bram ze rin po che
310a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba g.yog bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya yod pa klog tu 'dzud pa'i mkhan po sngags 'chang ba rig byed gsum po sgra nges par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang / shes
310a7(dkon brtsegs): gsal dang bcas pa dang / yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang / sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshig re zhing lung bstan pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan
310a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mchod sbyin gyi rgyu dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjes su rtogs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/ rang gi tshig rab la gsum rig pa dang / slob dpon du gyur pa yongasu shes pa/ 
310b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig gnas te/ shA ri'i bu yang bram ze rin po che de la gzhon nu sprin zhes bya ba nye gnas byed pa klog tu 'jug pa/ sngags 'chang ba rig byed gsum po sgra nges par
310b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang / shes gsal dang bcas pa dang / yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang / bcas pa dang / sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshig re zhing lung ston pa dang / 
310b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi rgyu dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjesu rtogs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / rang gi tshig rab la gsum rig pa dang / slob dpon du gyur
310b4(dkon brtsegs): par yongasu shes pa zhig yod do// shA ri'i bu de nas bram/  ze gzhon nu sprin zhes bya ba rig byed lobs nas/ ma khan po la kye mkhan po bdag gis rig byed lobs te/ bdag ni
310b5(dkon brtsegs): yul du mtshan bdag gis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / kye bu gzhon nu sprin po na la nor 'gron bu lnga brgya byin cig ces des de skad ces smra so// de nas
310b6(dkon brtsegs): bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor nas mkhan po'i drung nas song ste/ de grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na rgyu
310b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing slob dpon la dbul ba'i slob dpon gyi nor btsal te/ des slob dpon la dbul ba'i slob dpon gyi nor bsdus nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma ca du phyin te/ bram ze gzhonu sprin
310b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can kun brgyan par mthong ngo // mthong nas mi zhig bos te/ kye skyes bu rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can 'dir ci'i dga' ston zhig g.yos par gyur zhes smras pa
311a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / des gnon nu khyod kyis mi shes sam// de ring bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me
311a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i pho brang dad+ma can du gshegs te/ de'i phyir rgyal po'i pho
311a3(dkon brtsegs): brang pad+ma can 'di kun brgyan to// de la mi dag sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed/ bsod nams kyang byed do zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas bram ze sprin gyi gzhon nus sangs
311a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi sgra thos nas dga' ba dang dad pa dang / mgub cher skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'bru dang ba dkon te shin tu dkon u dum wa ra'i me tog dang 'dra
311a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod sbyin gyi shing gcig pu'i tshul lta bu yin pas gang bdag gis kar sha pa na lnga brgya po 'dis me tog nyon/ te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me
311a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad la me tog gtor la slob dpon gyi nor gung nas btsal lo snyam mo// yang de'i chen bu mo zhig me tog ung bal bdun khyer te lam gyi srang nas song ba dang / de nas bram ze
311a7(dkon brtsegs): gnon nu sprin gyis bu mo de la kye bu mo chu nas byung ba'i me tog gang nas rnyed par gyur zhes de skad ces smras pa dang des phyogs che ge mo zhig na phreng ba byed pa'i khang pa nas bdag gis kar
311a8(dkon brtsegs): sha pa na lnga brgyas nyos so zhes smras so// de nas bram ze gzhon nu smin gyis bu mo de la me tog chu las skyes pa 'di dag ji tsam gyis nyos pa bzhin dung la tshong shig ces de skad ces smras
311b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ des de ltar mi rung zhes smras nas des 'on gnyis khyod la nog lang la dka sha pa na lnga brgyas nor byan cig ces smras nas des 'di dag gis dri byanas rnas
311b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / des bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la gtor bar bya'o zhes smras so// des gal te khyod srid pa'i 'gro ba 'chi 'pho thams cad du bdag gi khyimathab tu 'gyur bar dam
311b3(dkon brtsegs): 'cha' na sbyin no// des bu mthong myong de sa ma zer tshig/ do co'i zhen khyod ni g.yeng shing rgong pa'o// bu mo blan med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med pa ni
311b4(dkon brtsegs): bsal bzangs med pas bsgru dgos te/ byi 'di sgyu sa 'gron bus nor budang dmutig / de n+ya nga ngu dang / man shesapa
311b5(dkon brtsegs): byi ru chen po dang gser dang dngul dang ldan pa dang / dang glang po che dang bong bu dang / ba glang dang / yuHdang rgyal srid kyang yongs su btang ba dang / shing du
311b6(dkon brtsegs): su btang ba dang / sngas yongs su gtang ba dang / bu pho dang bu mo yongs su gtang ba dang / lag pa yongs su gtang ba dang / rus pa dang rkang dang gtsug
311b7(dkon brtsegs): phud yongs su gtang ba dang / rna ba dang sna dang / mig dang yan lag mchog yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/ mdor na bu mo/ nang ngam phyi'i dngos po gang yang bdag
311b8(dkon brtsegs): gis yongs su mi btang bar bya ba med de/ bu mo gang bdag gis khyod kyang yongs su btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba'i
312a1(dkon brtsegs): dus dang // tshod du 'gyur na khyod ni g.yeng zhing rgod kyis khyod nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad ma byed cig ces de skad ces smras pa dang / des gal te/ 
312a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod lus las sha yungs dkar gyi 'brum bu tsam du bcad de nga la byin du zin kyang ngas khyod kyi sbyin pa'i bar chad mi bya'o zhes smras nas/ des de la de ltar gyur cig/ chu las skyes pa'i me tog
312a3(dkon brtsegs): dgang la byin cig ces smras pa dang / des kyang byin no// de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis me tog ud pa la de dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar
312a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyi/ das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad sro ga chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bskor cing bdun du bdar
312a5(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong ste/ spyod lam mdzes pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bcom ldan 'das la sems dang bar gyur to// de sems dang bar gyur nas shin tu dga' ba dang dad pa dang / 
312a6(dkon brtsegs): bkar bsti bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis mi mang po dag gis gos bzang po bzang ba dag bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad
312a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi drung du bkram pa mthong nas/ des bdag la gos med kyis/ gang bdag gis ri dgas kyi lpags pa 'di gding ngo snyam nas de ri dgas kyi lpags pa de bting ba dang / de na mi de dag
312a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra ba'i sems can dkon mchog gi drung du ri dgas kyi lpags pa gding ngam zhes 'phya zhing bting ba yang rtul bar byed do// de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin phyogs kyi mtha' ga la ba der song ste
312b1(dkon brtsegs): smin nas ridags kyi lpags pa brjing ste/ dgongs shig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kun nas spyan ri dgas kyi sngags pa 'di la zhabs gzhag par mdzod cig ces
312b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis dgongs nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyi ri dgas kyi lpags pa la zhabs bzhag go/ de des bram ze
312b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu sprin dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba bskyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la me tog ud pal lnga gtor ba dang / lha'i bu brgya phrag du mas lha'i me
312b4(dkon brtsegs): tog mnang rab dang / lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pa dA dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan da'adas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mngon par
312b5(dkon brtsegs): gtor lha'i sil snyan rnams dkrol lha'i glu dbyangs blangs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma ra me mdzad la bsti stang bya ba'i phyir me tog ud pal de dag
312b6(dkon brtsegs): ud pa la stong phrag du mar byas te/ me tog gi bla bre mdab mthur dun sdong bu gyen du blta bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
312b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la mngon par gtor te 'di lta ste bram ze gzhon nu sprin sems dang nas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar lo bcu gnyis su ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu bting
312b8(dkon brtsegs): nasabadag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dbug dbyung bar
313a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzod cig/ bdag la phyag gis drang bar gsol zhes yi dam brtan par byas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me
313a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bdag gi ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i steng du zhabs mi 'jog cing bdag la dbugs phyin par mi mdzad cing bdag la byang chub tu lung yang mi ston na de'i
313a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir bdag 'di nyid du lus bskams par bgyi'o zhes yong ma yang bcas so// shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar
313a4(dkon brtsegs): me mdzad kun nas spyan kun nas mkhyen pa dus gsum gang yang dmi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ba des bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ bram ze'i khye'u sprim
313a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgra ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu la zhabs bzhag ste/ g.yas phyogs nas glang po che'i gzigs pas gzin/ sa te/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de la dge slong dag ral
313a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la rkang pa ma bzhag shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang yang dag par rdzogs
313a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de ltar bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las lung bstan
313a8(dkon brtsegs): bzos nas dga' zhing mgu nas steng gi bar snang gi namakha' la mngon par 'phags te/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brjod du med pa mngon sum du byed do// de mngon
313b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa dag gis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin
313b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung snyan pa dang de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang / 
313b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du shar dang lho'i mtshams nas steng dang 'og gi bar dang phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma pas lhag pa dag gis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs
313b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar lung ston pa
313b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar bram ze'i khye'u sprin lung bsdu na pa thos nas dbugs phyin par gyur te/ nam pa 'i dkyil de nas babs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
313b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mar me mdzad de'i drung ngu dang pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// shA ri'i bu khyod ngo'i che 'i'adus na bram ze'i khye'u sprin zhes bya bar gyurapa
313b7(dkon brtsegs): dganan yin snyam du sa dogs shing tho tshom zan de ltar mi ng+ga'o// de ci'i phyir zhen ngango'i tshe de'i dus ni bram tho'i khye'u sngon zhes bya bar gyur pa de yinatu
313b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar ma mdzad ngal matog ud pal lnga gtor ral pa yang bting ngo // shAra'i bu sar nabyang chub sems dang 'jung bas/ 
314a1(dkon brtsegs): pa myur du thob par 'dod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'a'i sde sdod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan par byablang bar
314a2(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya gzhan dag la yang brjod par bya rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// gang 'di mtshan ma med pa'i spyod pa'i nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// 
314a3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na mar me mdzad kyi pha rol nangs dkar po'i chos kyi spyod pa gang la ma spyad pa de gang yang med do// 
314a4(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis lung ma bsdu na to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nga mtshan ma dang bcas pas spyod par gyur to// 
314a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi/ rnam grangs mtshan ma med par spyod pa dmigs pa med par spyod pa/ ji ltar thos pa
314a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bsgrub pas gnas pa de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
314a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes nga lung bstan to// shA ri'i bu de ltar ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong
314a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu spyod pa thams cad las 'das te/ chos thams cad mnyam
314b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhing du mthong ba khong du chud do/ mthong ma thag tu chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis sa skyes par shes so// de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das dbazhin gshegs pa
314b2(dkon brtsegs): mar me mdzad des bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA
314b3(dkon brtsegs): rnguthub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// lung bstan ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// bzod pa rab tu thob pa ji lta bu zhen gang
314b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di gzugs rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang du dbyed dang rnam par shes pa rab tu mi rnyed par
314b5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi rnyed bar bzong pa rab tu thob bo// yang bzod pa rab tu/ 
314b6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bzod pa med pa'i chos rab tu thob pa'i tshig bla dgas so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i chos de la ni 'jig rten gyi chos rnams
314b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu mi 'byung ngo // so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ma yin/ slob pa'i chos rnams ma yin mi slob pa'i chos rnams ma yin/ byang
314b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // chos thams cad mi 'byung bas de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob ces bya'o// 
315a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad thob pa med cing mi dmigs pas de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o// bzod pa de yang mtshan ma thams cad dang dmirga/ 
315a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis skad cig pa yin te/ de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ste/ de la ni mig med do// mig la smras pa med do// gong ma
315a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sbyar te/ rna ba med sna med lce med lus med yid med// yid la smras pa med de/ mi zad pa'i yul de ni bzod pa// 'gro ba med pa'i yul
315a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni bzod pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa myur du thob par 'dod pa dag gis gang 'di byang chub
315a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mtshan ma med par// spyod pa lhun gyis grub pa spyod pa/ dmigs pa/ med par spyod pa shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ 
315a6(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la brjod par bya/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya/ nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// yang de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du
315a7(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang / sangs rgyas kyi
315a8(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 
315b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bdag la khyim bdag
315b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa 'thob ste/ 'don rga shi tha ma'o nas de ltar 'jug par bgyis de skad ces rjes su bstan mong bdag bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos
315b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas 'di snyam du gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub zen
315b4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po 'di ni mchog/ gtso bo dam pa mtsho dag rab gya nom pa bla na med pa'o snyam dang gyid do// bcom ldan 'das las kyang bdag
315b5(dkon brtsegs): gis rab tu rnam par bye ba'i chos rnams kyis mchog gang yin pa de bskyed par bya'o zhes mngon sum du thos mngon sum du bzung nas/ bdag 'di snyam du
315b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rnam par bye ba'i chos bzung ba ma mchis pa nga'i bam mchis payongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa rnams kyis chos gang yang mchog gtso bo/ 
315b7(dkon brtsegs): rab gya nom pa/ bla na med pa'i chos de yang dag par bsgrubs te 'jug go snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du theg pa thams cad kyi nang na ni sangs rgyas kyi
315b8(dkon brtsegs): theg pa bla na med par gnas pa lags pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa ni theg pa gang ji snyed pa de dag gi mchog tu brjod pa nas bla na med pa'i bar du brjod pa ste/ bcom ldan
316a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag skye bo mang po la ngan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye
316a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs chen po dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad dung slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// 
316a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bcas pa la yang bslab par bgyi'o snyam bgyid do// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mis
316a4(dkon brtsegs): byin la 'od skad ces bka' stsal to// mis byin bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yid nges par dka' ba bsgrub par dka' ba'o// gsol pa
316a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid ches par dka' zhing bsgrub par dka' ba lags kyang / bcom ldan 'das de dang 'thun par brtson
316a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsams te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// 
316a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te sems bskyed pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus par gyur la/ sems bskyed pa re
316a8(dkon brtsegs): re yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la na re re zhing yang mgogang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed chad par gyur kyang de ltar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
316b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su mi btong ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam grangs 'dis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar smon gang bde ba'i yo byad kyi byang chub mngon par
316b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgyo bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal rdo ci'i slang du zhen bcom ldan 'das blan mang pa'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni dri ltar bskal dbye babargya stong du rig/ 
316b3(dkon brtsegs): gi kyang khong du chud par srab ma lags te/ de ltar rgya che ba'o// sangs rgyas kyu chos 'di dag kyang de ltar rgya meda'o// de ltar bas ma gyis mi khyab ba'o// da ltar dzu/ 
316b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis so// de ltar dpag tum mchis so// de ltar grangs ma mchis so// sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pa yang de ltar chags
316b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis na gyis ngo'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// bdag ni byang chub
316b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed cing / sdug bsngal kun gyis gces gyur kyang / sems can rnams ni mi btang ngo // sems bskyed pa ni la na re zhing / mgo ma phung por rab
316b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phang tsam mthon por gyur pa dag/ thams cad gcod pa spro bar bgyi// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub 'di la bdag 'dug go// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod
316b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dra de 'dra kho nar gyur par shog/ theg pa chung ngu theg pa dman// nyan thos theg pa spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod ci 'dra// da 'dra kho nar gyur pa
317a1(dkon brtsegs): shog/ theg pa 'di ni theg pa che// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchog ces bsngags// bzung bar 'os pa gzhan ma mthong // de bas bdag ni
317a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mos// gnod par gyur pa rnams la skyob// ngan 'gro gsum las thar bar bgyi// de yi phyir ni sangs rgyas dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo // de nas
317a3(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu dag shes la// gang bu dang chung ma dag chos 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin du ma
317a4(dkon brtsegs): bcug na// 'di ni bdag gis mi cha'o snyam nas de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tre/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
317a5(dkon brtsegs): nas rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rang gi khyim gal ba/ der song ste/ chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bang/ na dang / bu mo bdun dang / dran po bdun dang / bran mo
317a6(dkon brtsegs): bdun dang lhan cig tu ras bcos bu zung stong thogs te rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das la blta bar 'dod pas/ rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab
317a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ba dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi mi dang mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag gis tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas te/ rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal
317a8(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces mis byin khyod g.yog dang bcas te ring shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis gar cha zhes 'dzer ba dang / smras pa/ 
317b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu khyed cag gis de na na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya rgod kyi thung za' ral 'khor ba rgya stong phrag dums bskor ga bdun du byung nas/ rnam grangs du
317b2(dkon brtsegs): mas sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag yang dag par rab tu ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag gi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa
317b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gal ba der song ste/ bla na med pa
317b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed parabyed pa mi shes pa lta/ gal te khyed sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag yongs su bsgrub par 'dod na tshur
317b5(dkon brtsegs): sheg 'dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de'i gan du dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya che ba rgya che ba dag gi phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// de ltar rgyal po'i khag
317b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi mi rnams mis byin gyi tshig de thos nasasrog chags khri phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin chung ma bdun dang khye'u bdun dang / 
317b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dadun dang bran pho bdun dang bran mo bdun dang lhan cig tu ras bcos bu zung stong thogs nas srog chags stong phrag bcu po de dag dang rol mo mkhan lnga brgya
317b8(dkon brtsegs): tsam po de dag dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / rnga dang
318a1(dkon brtsegs): rom ma sal snyan dkrol te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas ras bcos bu zung stong po dag bcom ldan 'das kyi
318a2(dkon brtsegs): skul gsol nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can dam pa mi mchog gang lags pa/ byang chub mchog du rnam par dag baspyod/ 
318a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas gzigs pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ de la de ring bdag ni mchod par bgyi// gang zhig sngon gyi skul pa mang por spyad // srog chags rnams
318a4(dkon brtsegs): la lan phyir byang chub btsal// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi dbang mchog brnyes// de la de ring bdag gis mchod par bgyi// bu dang bran bcas nye du'i
318a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang bcas/ srog chags rnams la phan phyir byang chub tshol// srog chags stong po 'di dang / lhan cig tu// sangs rgyas dang ni chos la
318a6(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su mchi// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu pad pa de dag gis mngon par stod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
318a7(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bdag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du mchis pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sha
318a8(dkon brtsegs): stag lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bcom
318b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang lags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur
318b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ltar de dag la chos bstan du gsol 'di lta ste da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chos 'di dag thos par gyur cig/ de nas tshong dpon
318b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu mis byin dang skye dgu'i bdag mo bdun po de dag dang khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun dang / srog chags
318b4(dkon brtsegs): khri ba de dag dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag dgas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sangs rgyas dang chos
318b5(dkon brtsegs): dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dge snyan du bzung du gsol/ deng nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo // 
318b6(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su mchis so// mngon par dad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di lta ste da
318b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyod bzhin du bdag cag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams
318b8(dkon brtsegs): la chos bstan par bgyi'o// 'di lta ste da ltar bcom ldan 'das tshogs la gdams ngag mdzad pa de bzhin du tshogs la gdams par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
319a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams thar pa mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang sems can sdug bsngal
319a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis nyen pa rnams thar par bgyi'o// de nas rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis sil snyan gyi sgra chen pos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed do// srog chags khro bo
319a3(dkon brtsegs): dedag dang tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin chung ma dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun dang / g.yog thams cad
319a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag la thugs
319a5(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'i slad du steng gi bar snang la dkyil mo dkrung bcasate bzhugs so// de nas rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po ngag gis bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang la dkyil mo
319a6(dkon brtsegs): dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dad pa skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo'i cha byad de dag thams cad bor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag ma bzung
319a7(dkon brtsegs): bar steng gi bar snang la gnas shing sgra 'byin te/ sgra 'byin bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bar snang la bzhugs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byed do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin
319a8(dkon brtsegs): g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / srog chags khri bo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul 'di mthong nas dga' mgu yid rangs te
319b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas thams cad thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yang sil snyan stong phrag du ma yongs
319b2(dkon brtsegs): su ma bzung ba dag gis khyab par gyur te/ dper na sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma'i tshang bzhin du steng gi bar snang la rnga dang rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang
319b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / srog chags khri bo de dag dang / chos nyan du sngar lhags pa las srog chags drug stong tsam zhig dang dge slong
319b4(dkon brtsegs): stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ma thus steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa
319b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa lnga lnga byung ngo // rol mo mkhan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bzhis mdun gyis bltas pa'i rol mo mkha na gyi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad na chos ston to// 
319b6(dkon brtsegs): babar snang la gnas pa'i lha stong phrag bye ba du ma dag gis kyang lha'i me tog man ngar bdag gtor to// me tog de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad cur
319b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po steng gi bar snang la gnas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba dang dad pa dang / gus pa dang rjes
319b8(dkon brtsegs): cher byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'dra'is skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i dad pa mkhyen/ tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i
320a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad deng bu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
320a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
320a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang / 
320a4(dkon brtsegs): lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom da ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi
320a5(dkon brtsegs): bumis byin 'dis chung ma bdun dang khye'u brda na dang bu mo bdun dang bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun gyis ngal mchod pa byas te
320a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du log par lhung bar mi 'gro ste/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das nas de bzhin gshegs
320a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ded dpon zhes bya ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur// bla mar byed par
320a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ rim gror byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shur log par lhung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de la chong
320b1(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyi bu mis byin gyi chung ma bdun dang khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun gang yin pa dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas bung med
320b2(dkon brtsegs): lus las gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob nas byang chub sems dpa' mis byin dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// de dag bskal pa gcig la bla
320b3(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mis byin ni de bzhin
320b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems snyoms shes bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mis byin gyi zham 'bring ba gang yin
320b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ming tha dad par 'gyur ra ro// rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni bskal pa grangs med par log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ 
320b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong byed par bgrang bas smras te/ bar skabs der sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu mnyes par byas nas/ bsti stang du byeng par 'gyur/ 
320b7(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur// mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
320b8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs 'jam zhes bya bar thams cad ming 'thun par 'gyuraro// 
321a1(dkon brtsegs): srog chags khri bo nga las srog chags pa ni brgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa mnyes par byas nas de'i tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur/ 
321a2(dkon brtsegs): lhag ma rnams ni bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ tshul 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur// bla mar byed par 'gyur/ 
321a3(dkon brtsegs): ri mor byed par 'gyur// mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
321a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngo ma/ char zhes bya bar thams cad kyang ming 'thun par 'gyur ro// srog chags drug stong po de dag las srog chags stong ning
321a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das te dam pa'i chos nub nas/ mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma ni 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa ni ma byung ba'i dus der sems can rnams kyi tshe 'phe/ 
321a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i dus de na rang sangs rgyas brgyad khri 'byung bar 'gyur te// srog chags stong po de dag gis rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mnyes par byas nas bsta stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla
321a7(dkon brtsegs): mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur// mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// gang zag gi mchog byams pa de yang mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur// bla mar byed par 'gyur/ 
321a8(dkon brtsegs): mi mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shur log par lhung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas lus kyi tha ma bdag
321b1(dkon brtsegs): gis lus kyi la mthob nas dge ba'i byab rnams kyis bsgyul te/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byu nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// srog
321b2(dkon brtsegs): chags khri bo las srog chags mthong ba skyes pa stong gos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha'i bu khrag khrig drug cuni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
321b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral zhing dri ma med pa skyes so// kun dga' bo byis pa rnams ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la su zhig dga' ba dang dad pa dang / gus pa dang / rjes
321b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus 'di lta bu'i che ba nyid thob cing mya ngan las 'das pa la yang reg go// de nas bcom
321b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas// 'ja 'dra ba yi dpal thob ste// de phyir gang la byin pa ni// / 
321b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu che ba'i ston la mchod/ gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang // gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ring bsrel yongs 'bru tsam mchod pa// de
321b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba mthong // gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang // gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa// sems kyang
321b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam la 'bras bu mnyam/ mnyam pa'i sems su byas nas ni// gang zag mchog la mchod byed pa// de ni rnam par smin pa mnyam// mtshungs par byang
322a1(dkon brtsegs): chub 'chang yang rgya/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam bzung ste/ ngan par 'gro ba'i lam yang bcang // mya ngan 'das par
322a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i lam/ de yang de la mi dkon no// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa dang // sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin mchog gis// de phyir mchog la dang byas nas// 
322a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu 'gyur// mchod pa dam pa byas nas ni// myur du mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs/ 
322a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mchog tu 'gyur// mi gang mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi// chos la brten par 'dod pa de// mdun pa drag po bskyed par bya// mang du thos nas tshul bzhin no// 
322a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // tshangs pa dbang byed/ gyur nas ni// yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas dang // mya ngan 'das par nges par 'gyur// de'i tshe
322a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa bla na med pa
322a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'dun pa drag po bskyed de
322a8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos
322b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan tam blangs sam/ bzung ngam/ kun chub par byas sam gzhan dag la brjod dam gzhan dgal rgya cher yang dag
322b2(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu bstan na dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// chang med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral pa yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
322b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa yin no// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams sdud par brtson pa yin no// shA ri'i bu gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub
322b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang 'brel to// shA ri
322b5(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi nang du bcug go shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam
322b6(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di la bslabs nas yang dag par chad pa rjes su thob bo// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son
322b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la nges par byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rgyun ma bcad pa rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad med pa'i rjes su thob pa de bzhin
322b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas dpag tu med pa rjes su thob bo// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjes su thob pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la shin tu gnas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
323a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// las kyi las dang rnam smin gyis/ rnam par smin pa shes par bya/ las
323a2(dkon brtsegs): smin rnam smin ma yin kyang // de bde de ni mya ngan 'das// gang la shes pa med pas// 'dus byas thams cad sdug bsngal te// dpyir shes rab bskyed nas ni/ 
323a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kun las rnam par 'grol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong dag dang // lha dang mi dang lham
323a4(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa
323a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phrags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u te/ 'dus pa bcu gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// 
323a6(dkon brtsegs): / 'di la sho log stong phrag drug bam po nyi shu yod do// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang shI len dra bo d+hi dang lo che chen po zhang d+ha ra ma hA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
323a7(dkon brtsegs): la phab pa// / dga' bo mngal du 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po gcig pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
323a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
323b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' rab na bzhugs te/ de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pa las langs te dge slong lnga brgya dang lhan gcig tu bcom
323b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste thal mo sbyar nas gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
323b3(dkon brtsegs): padaga' bo dang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga la chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po gcig tu ma 'dres/ 
323b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa yongs su dkar ba tshangs par spyod pa'i chos 'di lta/ ste mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yod kyis/ 
323b5(dkon brtsegs): legs par nyon la yid la bzung shig dang / ngas khyed la rnam par phye ste bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan
323b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo sems can rnams ni
323b7(dkon brtsegs): mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa'i tshe rgyu dang rkyen phun sum tshogs par gyur na ni lus len par 'gyur gyi gal te phun sum tshogs par ma gyur na ni lus len par mi 'gyur ro// 
323b8(dkon brtsegs): de la rkyen dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste pha dang ma gnyis ka yang chags pa'i sems byung bar gyur la/ bar ma do'i phung po yang mngon du gyur cing skye ba'i gnas/ 
324a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol bar byed kyang pha ma de dag gi 'du 'grong snga phyir gyur cing dus gcig tu byung bar ma gyur tam/ so so
324a2(dkon brtsegs): lus la nad rnams dang ldan par gyur na yang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te ma'i mngal na rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang khrag gis nye bar non par gyur tam/ tshig
324a3(dkon brtsegs): pas nye bar non par gyur tam mtshams shas gang pa'am/ sman gyis gang ba'am/ dpung gnas 'dra ba 'am/ grog mo'i rkyad pa 'dra ba 'am
324a4(dkon brtsegs): rnga mo'i kha 'dra ba'am/ shing rta'i tshigs bzhin sogs khar 'dug pa 'am/ shing rta'i srog shing lta bur 'dugapa'am/ shing rta'i lte ba'i kha lta bur 'dug pa'am
324a5(dkon brtsegs): shing lo lta bur gyur pa 'am/ spa lta bur gyu gyur 'khyil bar gyur tam/ mngal gyi nang nas kyi gram skyes pa/ lta bur gyur tam/ khu chu dang khrag mang du 'dzag cing
324a6(dkon brtsegs): skad cig yud tsam yang 'dug tu mi btub par gyur tam thur du 'dzag par gyur tam/ mngal gyis lam rtsub par gyur tam/ steng du yangs par gyur pa 'am/ 'og tu
324a7(dkon brtsegs): yangs par gyur pa 'am/ yo ba 'am/ zab pa ma yin pa 'am/ rdol nas blags pa 'am/ mtho ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ thung zhing dog pa 'am/ nad
324a8(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang bcas par gyur na yang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te pha mtsho rigs btsun zhing bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur la/ bar ma do'i phung po bsod nams
324b1(dkon brtsegs): chung ba'am bar ma do'i srid pa'i tshe rigs btsun zhing bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur la pha ma bsod nams chung bar gyur tam/ gnyis ka bsod nams dang ldan yang phan
324b2(dkon brtsegs): tshun phrad par gyur pa'i las bsags par ma gyur na yang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bar ma do'i phung po de ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ba na thog ma kho nar phyin ci log gi
324b3(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam pa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste pha ma gnyis phrad par gyur pa'i tshe/ gal te phor gyur pa zhig yin na ni ma la ni chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ 
324b4(dkon brtsegs): pha la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te pa'i khu ba byung na 'di ni bdag yin/ no snyam du sems so// gal te mor 'gyur ba zhig yin ni pha la ni chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ ma la
324b5(dkon brtsegs): ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ ma'i khu ba byung na 'di ni bdagayin no snyam du sems pas gal te 'di lta bu'i zhe sdang dang chags pa'i sems skyes par ma gyur na mngal tu 'jug
324b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dga' bo ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste pha ma yang chags pa'i sems skyes par gyur/ dus kyi zla mtshan yang
324b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'thun par gyur/ bar ma do'i phung po yang mngon du gyur la gong ma lta bu'i skyon mang po yang med cing las kyi rkyen dang yang ldan par gyur na mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'di
324b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar bar ma do'i phung po de mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa na de yang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang bsod
325a1(dkon brtsegs): nams chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o// bsod nams dang ni ldan pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'i sems byung nas yul mthong bar gyur pa
325a2(dkon brtsegs): na'adi snyam du sems te deng bdag ni rlung dang grang ba dang gnam rmugs pa dang char 'bab pa dang skye bo mang po'i ca cong mang po'i mthu stobs kyis gnod par byed
325a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang phrad par gyur to zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas dang bdag tshwa'i khyim dang / lo ma'i khyim dang rtsig pa'i drung dben par 'jug par bya'o// yang na ri dang nags stug po dang brag
325a4(dkon brtsegs): lug dag du 'jug par bya'o snyam du sems te/ gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas ji ltar mthong ba debazhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed do// gang bsod
325a5(dkon brtsegs): nams chen po dang ldan pa de yang 'di snyam du deng bdag ni rlung dang grang ba dang / gnas rmugs pa dang / char 'bab pa dang skye bo mang po'i ca co dang / mang po'i
325a6(dkon brtsegs): mthu stobs kyis gnod par byed pa dang phrad par gyur to zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas khang pa rtsegs ma'i steng du 'jog pa 'am/ yang thog mthon po'i steng du 'dzeg pa 'am/ 
325a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang gi nang du 'jug pa 'am khri la 'dug par bya'o snyam du sems te gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nasaji ltar mthong ba bzhin
325a8(dkon brtsegs): du ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'di ltar bar ma do'i phung po de thog ma kho nar mngal du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni mer
325b1(dkon brtsegs): mer po zhes byas/ pa ma'i mi gtsang ba dang 'das pa'i las la brten nas lus len par byed kyang 'di sar las dadang nga ma'i rkyen rnams kyis so so nas nga bsrung bar ma bya
325b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i mthu stobs kyis lum len par byed pas 'di lta ste dper na snod kyi nang du nos bkang nas skyes bu'i tshul ba dang / thag pa la sogs pa la brten te/ mar
325b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yang rkyen rnams las dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang 'dus pa'i mthu las mar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ltar rgyu dang
325b4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyi mthu mngal du lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na rtswa sngon po dang glang gi lci ba dang rgya shug dang rgol brten nas so so nas srin
325b5(dkon brtsegs): bu skye bar 'gyur ba'i re re'i nang du srin bu mi dmigs kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis srin bu skye bar 'gyur/ srin bu de dag skye ba na so so nas rten ji lta ba bzhin
325b6(dkon brtsegs): du kha dog sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las lus 'di skye bar yang rkyen rnams kyi
325b7(dkon brtsegs): nang du btsal na dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi'on kyang rkyen 'dus pa'i mthu dang ma bral bar yang lus yang dag par len par mi 'gyur ro// lus 'di skyes
325b8(dkon brtsegs): pan pa ma'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ngo ba nyid tha mi dang par 'gyur te/ 'di lta sta sa'i khams kyis ni sra ba'i bya ba byed do// chu'i khams kyis ni bsher ba'i bya'o
326a1(dkon brtsegs): byed do// me'i khams kyis ni dro ba'i bya ba byed do// rlung gi khams kyis ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba byed do// mer mer po'i lus
326a2(dkon brtsegs): de gal te sa'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la chu'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste dper na phye dang thal ba skam po bcangs pa bzhin du 'dur mi btub par 'gyuraro// 
326a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la sa'i khams med par gyur na ni 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bru mar ram/ chu'i rang bzhin snum zhing bsher ba 'am/ sra ba med pa bzhin du bo zhing
326a4(dkon brtsegs): gyes par 'gyur ro// gal te sa dang chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan na me'i khams med par gyur mi la/ dbyar tsha ba'i dus dasu shi'i gong bu grib ma la bzhag pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis phog
326a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du rul zhing myags par 'gyur ro// gal te/ sa dang chu dang me'i khams dang ldan la rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper
326a6(dkon brtsegs): na khur ba mkhan nam de'i slob ma mkhas pas/ khur ba btses nas dbugs kyis bus te/ ci dang ci bya ba rnams mngon par 'dus byas nas de dag nang khong stong du byed pa/ gal te rlung
326a7(dkon brtsegs): gi stobs med par gyur na mngon par grub par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig brten cing yongasu gzung bas rnam par bzhag pa yin
326a8(dkon brtsegs): pas de'i phyir mer mer po'i lus pha ma'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / las kyi rlung gi rgyus skye bar 'gyur ba yang de bzhin du rkyen mang po rnams kyi nang na dmigs par mi 'gyur yang 'das pa'i
326b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis lus yang dag par legs par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dag 'o 'di lta ste dper na sa bon sar pa yongasu gtsang ba legs par sbas pa srin bus ma thos pa
326b2(dkon brtsegs): rul cing ma tshig pa dang / mags pa dang bu ga med pa zhig gang la la zhig gis zhing bzang gshin pa btsal te/ sa bon de btab na ci nyin zhag gis myu gu dang sdong bu dang / yal
326b3(dkon brtsegs): ga dang lo ma grib ma dang bcas pa dang / me tog dang 'bras bu rgyas shing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mi 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan
326b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen las rim gyis skye/ par 'gyur gyis// dus gcig tu dbang po rnams phun/ 
326b5(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs par mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas pha ma las byung bar gyur pa'i lus 'di rkyen rnams kyi nang nas btsal na yang dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang tshogs pa'i
326b6(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis skye ba len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas me shel gyis nor bu blangs nas nyi ma la bzhag ste/ lci ba
326b7(dkon brtsegs): skam po nor bu dang mi ring bar bsten pa las me 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lci ba dang nyi ma 'od so so nas me 'byon par mi nus kyang / phan tshun mi 'bral bas rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis me 'byung
326b8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// pha ma las byung ba'i lus kyang de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste mer mer po'i lus gang yin pa de ni gzugs shes bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
327a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ming zhes bya ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi phung po lnga pos skad cig ma gcig la lus
327a2(dkon brtsegs): blangs nasasdug bsngal myong bar byed po la yang ngas bsngags pa brjod par mi byed na/ yun ring por srid pa rnams su 'khor bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 
327a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na mi gtsang ba ni nyung na yong man mon mang po lnga smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na mer mer po'i lus nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la su zhig sred cing chags par
327a4(dkon brtsegs): byed gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar lus de ma'i ma dngal na gnas pa yang zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad lon nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur te/ zhag bdun phrag dang
327a5(dkon brtsegs): po la ma'i mngal na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mer mer po ni sa bya ste/ lus kyi mtshan ma dang por snang du/ yin pas 'di lta ste dper na/ nom chags pa dang dra
327a6(dkon brtsegs): bas zhag bdun gyi bar du mngal gyi nang du bcos rab tu bcos nas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi mthar gyis mngon par grub par byed// zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal
327a7(dkon brtsegs): du gnas pa'i tshe las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni kun sdud ces bya ste/ rlung shin tu pha mo des ma'i rtsib logs g.yon pa dang g.yas pa bus te/ mer mer po'i lus kyi/ 
327a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma rim gyis snang bar byed pas/ de'i dbyibs zho ska ba 'am mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/ nang du bcos rab tu bcos pas nur nur po'i lus su gyur nas/ 'di ltar 'byung ba chen
327b1(dkon brtsegs): tho bzhi pa dag mthar gyis mngon par grub par byed do// zhag bdun drug gsum pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i cha yang las kyis rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni mdzod kha zhes bya
327b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis nur nur po gang yin pa de mthar gyis mkhyags shing ltar ltar por byed pas de'i dbyibs ni sman brdungs pa'i gtun bu 'dra la thung zhing chung ste/ mngal gyi nang
327b3(dkon brtsegs): du bcos rab tu btsos pas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar gyis 'brel bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par
327b4(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa de ni nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ste rlung de'i stobs kyis ltar ljar po gang yin pa de mkhadang bar byed pas/ de'i dbyibs ni mchig gu 'dra ste/ 
327b5(dkon brtsegs): nang du btsos rab tu bcos pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dang mthar gyis 'phel bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung
327b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis la khrang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rkang lag brgyus pas bsgyur bar byed pas gor gor// 
327b7(dkon brtsegs): po gang yin pa de ni rnam par phye nas brla gnyis dang dpung pa gnyis dang mgo'i mtshan ma mngon du 'byung bar byed do// 'di lta ste dper na dbyar gyis dus su tshar 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing
327b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams yal ga dang 'dab ma skye bar byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang lus kyi mtshan ma rnams snang bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas/ 
328a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni zas shes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma bzhi 'byung bar byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dri
328a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste pus mo gnyis dang / dpung pa gnyis gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung ma
328a3(dkon brtsegs): par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'khyil bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste lag pa'i mthil gnyis dang rkang pa'i ma
328a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis te/ de'i mtshan ma ni shin du mnyen pas dbu ba 'dus pa 'dra'o// zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa
328a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni bzlog cing bsgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar/ byed de/ 'di lta ste lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mo'i mtshan
328a6(dkon brtsegs): ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed pa gang yin pa'o// de ni 'di lta ste dper na dbyar char pa 'bab pa'i tshe ljon shing rnams kyi yal ga dang / 'dab ma mthar gyis skyes zhing 'phel bar byed pa de
328a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang mtshan ma rnams mngon du snang bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub
328a8(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa dgu 'byung bar byed do// dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste mig gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis
328b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sna gnyis dang kha dang bshang ba dang gci ba'i gnas gang yin pa de dag ni mtshan ma rnam pa dgu zhes bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ma'i mngal nagan/
