356b5(dkon brtsegs): bus bcings te/ phyis 'jim pa rnams bskus nas gzung gas brnyan mngon par 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs des rus pa rnams rnam par
356b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dga' bo de dag zhag bdun phrag nyi shu pa la ni rus pa phra mo ma gtogs par rus pa chen po skye ba'i grangs ni nyis brgya yod par
356b7(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal nas yang dag bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa de'i lus la sha
356b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byed pas 'di lta ste/ dper na zhal zhal mkhan nam/ zhal zhal mkhan gyi slob mas 'jim pa legs par sbyar nas rtsig ngos la zhal zhal byed pa
357a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du las kyi rlung sa ga skyed par byed pa yang de bzhin du blta par bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gnyis pa la na ma'i mngal nas kun
357a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i khrug bskyed par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gsum pa la ni ma'i mngal nas yongasu dag par
357a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lpagaso pa bskyed par byed// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bzhi pa la ni ma'i mngal nas kun tu 'byung
357a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lpags pa rkyong zhing mdog dang ldan pa der byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu lnga pa la ni ma
357a5(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas grong khyer 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i sha dang khrog rab tu dang bar byed do// dga' bo zhig bdun phrag
357a6(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu drug pa la ni ma'i mngal nas skyo ba mngon par 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi skra dang spu dang sen ma rnams bskyed par byed// de dag
357a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang rtsa rgyus rnams dang phan tshun 'brel par blta bar bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bdun pa la ni ma'i mngal nas sman yon po zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ 
357a8(dkon brtsegs): rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i skra dang spu dang sen mo rnams mngon pararo 'grub par byed do// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dag pa'i las mngon par 'dus
357b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pas/ ser snas longs spyod bdog pa rnams 'phangs shing shin tu brtan par mngon par zhen nas sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa dang / pha mangs ban po dang / slob dpon dang / 
357b2(dkon brtsegs): bla ma'i gnas rnams kyis rjesu bston pa dag mnyan par mi byed pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba'i lam mngon par 'dus byas shing / nyin mtshan du
357b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed bzhin yin na ni 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur te/ gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang 'bras bu rnam par smon pa ying du mi 'ong ba thob par/ 
357b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas/ gal te 'jig rten pa rnams 'di ltar ring pos mdzes par 'gyur na ni de thung bar 'gyur ro// gal te thung ngus mdzes par gyur na ni de ring
357b5(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur ro// gal te sbom pos mdzes par gyur na ni de phra bar 'gyur ro// gal te phra mo sa ma/ dzes par gyur na ni de sbom por 'gyur ro// gal te yan
357b6(dkon brtsegs): lag dang nying lag phan tshun thag nye bar mdzes par gyur na ni de theg ring por 'gyur ro// gal te thag ring pos mdzes par gyur na ni de thag nye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mang pos
357b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par gyur na ni de nyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyung ngus mdzes par gyur na ni de mang bar 'gyur ro// gal te tshe ba 'dod na ni rid par 'gyur ro// rid pa 'dod na ni tshe bar 'gyur ro// 
357b8(dkon brtsegs): zhan zhing mnyen par 'dod na ni bsher bar 'gyur ro// bshor bar 'dod na no zhan zhing mnyen par 'gyur ro// dkar bar 'dod na ni gnag par 'gyur ro// gzhag par 'dod na ni dkar bar
358a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa 'on pa dang / long ba dang / lkugs pa dang / 
358a2(dkon brtsegs): glen pa dang / byad bzhin mi sdug pa dang / tshig smras pa rnams gzhan gyis mnyan pa'i yongasu mi 'gyur ba dang / rkang lag 'phye shing 'gro ba dang / lus mi sdug cing yi dgas
358a3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra bas/ nyi shes rnams kyang mthong bar mi 'dod na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis las ji snyed btsal ba dag gzhan la smras pa na
358a4(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan gyis yid mi ches shing yid la mi 'dzin pa dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir/  zhe na/ des tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon
358a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bo mngal na ga zhes pa de tshe rabs snga ma la bsod nams kyi las mngon
358a6(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubaso pa dang / ser sna med par legs par sbyin pa gtong zhing 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba dang / logs spyod rnams la phangs shing mngon par zhen pa'i sems med
358a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams nyin mtshan du 'phel bar byed pa zhig yin na ni 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin par khyad par du 'phags pa myong bar 'gyur te/ mir skyes
358a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na yang 'bras bu rnam par smin po yid du 'ong ba thob par 'gyur bas gal te 'jig tan pa rnams ring pos mdzes par gyur na yang de bzhin du ring por 'gyur ro// gal te thung ngus
358b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par gyur na yang de bzhin du thung bar 'gyur ba dang / phra sbom ran zhing yan lag dang nying lag 'tsham pa dang / mang nyung dang / tshe ring dang / bshor mi bshor yang de bzhin du mdzen
358b2(dkon brtsegs): shing yid du mi 'ong ba med pa dang / dbang po drug tshang zhing byang bzhin sdug pas gzhan lnga khyad par du 'phags pa dang / tshogs gsal zhing dbyangs snyan pa dang / skyes
358b3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i mtshan phun sum tshogs shing gang gis mthong ba rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las ji snyed btsal ba dag gzhan la bsnyad no yang gzhan gyis yid
358b4(dkon brtsegs): chos shing gus pas yid la 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci byor zhe na/ des tsherabs snga ma la dge 'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis de la bun
358b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur bas so// dga' ba mang lan gnas pa de gal te khye'u len na nam 'irtsi ba logs g.yas phyogs rtsog bur 'dug la/ lag
358b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i skal tshigs logasu bltas te 'dug go// gal te bu mo yin na ni ma'i rtsib logs g.yon phyog su cog pur 'dug la/ lag pa ga
358b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i lho log su kha bltas te/ mgu ba'i gnas kyi ni 'og/ zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni steng na mthu ba'i dngos pos ni mthur du mnan/ zhu ba'i dngos pos
358b8(dkon brtsegs): ni ma 'degs par byed pa'adi la/ dper/ gnas lnga cings nas gas pa shing rnan par btsugs pa shes
359a1(dkon brtsegs): so// gal te mas mang du zos sam nyung ngu zos na yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gal te shin tu snum pa 'am/ shin tu rtsub pa 'am/ shin tu grang ba 'am/ shin tu tsha ba 'am/ 
359a2(dkon brtsegs): lan cha bro ba'am/ mi bro ba 'am/ kha ba 'am/ sbyar ba 'am/ dang ra ba la sogs pa zas 'di lta bu dag zos na yang thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// gal te mas 'dod pa spyod par gyur tam/ drag
359a3(dkon brtsegs): tu song ngam/ brgyugs sam/ nyam nga ba'i phyogs su 'dug gam/ yun ring du 'dug par gyur tam/ yun ring du nyal bar gyur tam/ mchongs par gyur na yang thams cad du sdug bsngal myong
359a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo ma'i mngal du gnas pa na de lta bu'i sku dag bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brjod kyis me lang pos las la nyon mongs par rig par bya ste mi'i 'gro ba na yang sdug bsngal
359a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu myong bar 'gyur na/ ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba'i sngun bsngal dpe byar dka' ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bas na dga' bo mkhas pa gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ 
359a6(dkon brtsegs): pan gnas par mos shing sdug bsngal de lta bu nyams myong bar byed/ dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu brgyad pa la ni mngal na gnas pa de phyin ci log gi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad skye bar 'gyur ro// brgyad gang
359a7(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ 'di lta ste khyim gyi 'du shes dang / gzhon pa'i 'du shes dang / kun dga' ra ba'i 'du shes dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'du shes dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes dang / khril
359a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa'i 'du shes dang / chu ba'i 'du shes dang / rdzing gi 'du shes te/ yang dag par 'di dag yod pa ma yin yang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed par byed do// dga'
359b1(dkon brtsegs): bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu dgu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas me tog phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lpags pa'i mdog kun tu gsal zhing yongs su dkar ba dang / yo
359b2(dkon brtsegs): su dag cing dang bar byed de ma tsha na 'do po sra sa / sngon por 'gyur te/ gzhan yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / btsog ni nub pa snum med pa dang / kha dog da/ 
359b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / kha dog nag pa dag kyang ci rigs par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas lcags kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa
359b4(dkon brtsegs): de bus pas skra dang spu dang / sen mo rnams skye zhing 'phel bar byed do// sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis kha dog dkar nag dal sogs pa ci rigs par snang bar 'gyur ba yang gong ma
359b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de mthar gyis che ra skye bar byed de/ de bzhin du zhag bdun phrag sum cu gnyis
359b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i bar du yang rgya cher skye zhing 'phel bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu lnga pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de ma'i mngal du yan lag dang nying lag
359b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu drug pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas de ma'i mngal na 'dug mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun
359b8(dkon brtsegs): phrag sum cu bdun pa la mngal na gnas pa de phyin ci log ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang / mun nag gi
360a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni phyogs gcig gi dbang du byas te bstan to// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu brgyad pa la ni ma'i mngal nas yan lag
360a2(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de lus bsgyur nas thur du phyogs shing lag pa gnyis brkyang nas skye bo'i gnas kyi sgo logs su phyogs par byed do// 
360a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de'i tshe kha thur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ las kyi stobs kyis rlung des mngal na gnas pa de bus pas/ mgo ni thur du blta zhing rkang pa gnyis ni gyen du
360a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs par byas nas/ skye ba'i gnas kyi sgo nasa'abyung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas dpade tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon
360a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dus byas shing / gzhan gyi mngal ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa zhig yin na ni rgyu dang rkyen des mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ rkang lag log cing
360a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnol mar gyur nas bsgyur mi nus pas ma'i mngal de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe shes pa dang ldan pa'i bud med dam/ sman pa mkhas pas mar dang 'bru mar 'jam
360a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'am shing shal ma la'i shun pa'i khu ba 'am/ gzhan yang dngos po 'jam po dag gis lag pa bskus nas/ lag pa'i sor mos gri rnon po blangs te snabs phyi sa dang 'dra zhing
360a8(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dri mi zhim pa dang / smyug bro ba'i 'angam khung srin bu'i rigs brgya stong tshad med pa rtag tu gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba'i khu ba rtag tu 'dzag pa/ khu ba dang khrag rlangs rnams
360b1(dkon brtsegs): rul zhing myags pa mthong na skyo bar 'gyur ba lpags pa srab mos g.yogs pa sdig pa'i las las byung ba'i lus ma dang bcas mi gtsang ba'i gnas der sor mo bcug ste/ der bcug nas gri
360b2(dkon brtsegs): rnon pos mngal na gnas pa de'i lus dum bu dum bur gtubs nas ma'i mngal nas 'byin par byed pas des na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad cing tsha ba rtsub pa dag myong ba'i rgyus// 
360b3(dkon brtsegs): ma de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na yang shi ba dang bye brag med do// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de dge ba'i las mngon par grub pa zhig
360b4(dkon brtsegs): yin na ni gal te log par gyur na yang ma la gnod pa med par bde bar bcas par 'gyur bas sdug bsngal dmyong bar mi 'gyur ro// dga' bo gang bgegs 'di lta bu
360b5(dkon brtsegs): dang mi ldan pa de dag ni zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das nas btsas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ sdug bsngal che na po srog la bab pa myong nas/ gdod ma'i mngal nas 'byung
360b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur bas na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu legs par brtags nas nges par 'byung ba yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la
360b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang / btsas pa'i sdug bsngal shes par byas nas so so'i skye bo mngal nas skye ba len pa gang yin de dag ni shin tu sdug bsngal
360b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yin par rig par bya'o// dang po bcas pa'i tshe khye'u 'am bu mo yang rung ste/ lag pa'i steng ngam/ gos la sogs pa'i steng du lhung nas/ nyi ma 'am/ grib ma 'am/ bskul ba'i shing leb bam/ 
361a1(dkon brtsegs): stan nam/ pang pa'i steng du bzhag pa na rgyu dang rkyen des thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na ba lang gson
361a2(dkon brtsegs): por lpags pa ba shus pa rtsig pa dang thag nye bar gyur na/ rtsig pa la gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gal te shing dang / rtswa'i phung po dang nye bar gyur na/ shing dang rtswa la gnas
361a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gal te bla gab med par 'dug par gyur na bla gab med pa na gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba
361a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du dang po btsas pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dadang po btsas pa de la chu don ran pas bkrus na yang sdug dbasngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes
361a5(dkon brtsegs): bu mdze can lpags pa rul zhing myags pa/ rnag khrag zag pa la yang lcag gis bzhus na sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba dang rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dang po btsas pa'i
361a6(dkon brtsegs): lus chu dron gyis bkrus pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dang po btsas pa'i lus de yang phyis ma'i khrag gi dri ma 'thungs nas cher skye bar 'gyur te/ de'i khrag gi dri ma zhes bya ba ni 'phags
361a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos 'dul ba las nu zho nyid la bya bar bstan pas/ de lta bas na dga' bo 'di ltar shin tu mi bzang ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / bde ba cung zad kyang med na mkhas pa
361a8(dkon brtsegs): su zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho 'di la rjes su chags pa bskyed nas rtag tu 'khor ba'i rgyun phyogs su 'jug cing rgyun 'chad pa med par byed de dang po btsas pa zhag bdun lon pa dang / lus de
361b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid la srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu byung nas lus thams cad za bar byed do// dga' bo srin bu'i rigs sbal zab zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ sgra'i rtsa ba la gnas nas rtag/ 
361b2(dkon brtsegs): tu sbal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs khar ba'i mdzod dang mgo sbom zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mgo la brten te gnas nas rtag tu mgo la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs
361b3(dkon brtsegs): mig 'khor zhes bya ba gcig yod de mig la gnas nas rtag tu mig la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs ded pa dang / 'bros pa dang / khang khyim dang / yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya
361b4(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi yod de/ glad pa la gnas nas rtag tu glad pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs sa lu'i lo ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za
361b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba gcig/ yod de sna la gnas nas sna la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'phen pa dang / kun tu 'phen pa zhes bya ba
361b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis yod de/ mchul gnas nas mchu la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs sbrang rtsi'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de so la gnas nas so la za bar byed do// srin
361b7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rigs shing gdong zhes bya ba gcig yod de so'i rtsa ba la gnas nas so'i rtsa ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i khab mchu zhes bya ba gcig yod de lce la gnas nas lce la zabar
361b8(dkon brtsegs): byed do// srin bu'i rigs khag nor zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce'i rtsa ba la gnas nas lce'i rtsa ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lags rdzogs shes byab
362a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig yod do// rkan la gnas nas rkan la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang / khyed skur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag mthil la gnas/ 
362a2(dkon brtsegs): nas lag mthil la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'phyang ba dang / rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag par la gonas nas lagangar la za bar byed do// srin du
362a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs dpung pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ dpung pa la gnas nas dpung pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs med pa dang / nye ba'i mid pa zhes bya ba gnyis
362a4(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ mid pa la gnas nas med pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' ba dang dpa' ba chen po zhes bya ba/ da gnyis yod de/ brang la gnas nas brang la za bar byed
362a5(dkon brtsegs): do/ srin bu'i rigs dung dang dung kha zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ sha la gnas nas sha la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha dog ldan pa dang / stobs ldan zhes
362a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la gnas nas khrag la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dri gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ chu ba la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do// 
362a7(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs mi mtho ba dang / kha sbub ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la gnas nas rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs gnyis ka yang tshil
362a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi kha dog ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mkhris pa'i kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mkhris pa la gnas nas
362b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhris pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mkhal ma la gnas nas mkhal ma la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu tig chen po zhes bya ba gcig
362b2(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ rked pa la gnas nas byed pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mcher ba la gnas nas cher ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs
362b3(dkon brtsegs): chu srog dang / chu srog chen po dang / khab kyi mchu dang / mtshon cha mchu zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ sgyu ma la gnas nas rgyu ma la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs zla ba rdzogs dang / 
362b4(dkon brtsegs): zla ba gtong dang / bsil byed dang / bsil byed gtong dang / so sor gnas pa zhes bya ba lnga yod/ de/ rtsib logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsib logs
362b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa la za bar byed do// gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs gong ma dang ming 'thun pa lnga yod de/ rtsib log sa g.yon pa la gnas nas g.yon pa la za bar byed do// 
362b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs mdun du 'bigs pa dang / rgyab tu 'bigs pa dang / brtan par 'bigs pa dang / 'bigs te gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rus pa la gnas nas
362b7(dkon brtsegs): rus pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs cher dkar ba dang / cung zad dkar ba dang / sprin brtsegs dang / dri mi zhim zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rtsa rgyus la
362b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas rtsa rgyus la za bar byed do// srid bu'i rigs seng ge dang / stobs ldan dang / mgyogs pa'i mda' dang / pad+ma zhes bya ba bani yod de/ 
363a1(dkon brtsegs): ma nu ba'i gnas la gnas nas ma zhu ba'i gnas la ba bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs brtan pa dang / nye bar brtan pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ nu ba'i ga/ 
363a2(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu kha dang / phung po'i kha dang / dra ba'i kha dang / khye'u kha zhe bya ba bzhi yod de/ gci ba'i lam la gnas
363a3(dkon brtsegs): nas gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang / byed pa chen po dang / dbyibs chung dang / bo ta ra ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ bshang ba'i lam la gnas nas bshad
363a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha gnag dang kha~M gnag chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brla la granas nas brlal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs ma
363a5(dkon brtsegs): can dang / mdze con chung ngu zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ pus mo la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs myos po'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ 
363a6(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la gnas nas byin pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mgo nag ces bya ba gcig yod de/ rkang pa la gnos nas rkang pa la za bar byed// dga' bo yongasu skyo bar bya ba
363a7(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di 'dra ba 'di la ni srin bu'i rigs 'di lta bu stong phrag brgyad cu rtag par nyin mtshon du za bar byed pa des na lus la gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung po dang / nyam chung zhing rma ba dang / 
363a8(dkon brtsegs): bkres pa dang / skom par byed cing gzhan yang sems kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang ldan zhing gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang // yongasu gdung ba dang / nad mang po rnams mngon
363b1(dkon brtsegs): du snang bar byed pas sman pa mkhas pa gang gis kyang gso zhing gsal bar mi nus te/ dga' bo srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khor ba 'dir sdug bsngal de lta bu dang ldan pa yin na/ ci'i phyir
363b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la rje su chags pa bskyed par byed de/ gzhan yang gnod pa mang pos yongs su bzung ba 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / ka ta pu ta na'i bar gyi gdon rnams kyis yongasu
363b3(dkon brtsegs): zin pa dang / gzhan yang gcan zan gyi gdon rnams kyis yongasu zin pa dang / gzhan yang nyi ma dang zla pa / rgyu skar gyi gdon la sogs pas yongasu zin nas nad sna tshogs
363b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis lus dang sems nyon mongs par byed pa yod de/ brjod kyis mi lang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bdaka' stsal pa/ dga' bo mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba 'dir ma'i
363b5(dkon brtsegs): mngal du 'jug par mos shing sdug bsngal mi zad pa myong bar byed de/ de ltar btsas shing / de ltar cher gyur na/ sa/ ma'i nu zho khrag dang 'dres pa 'thungs shing za ba dang / btung
363b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams zos shing 'thungs pa na yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byed do// mthar gyis cher skyes nas lus bde zhing nad med pa dang / gos dang / bza'
363b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang btung ba dang ldan zhing / tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur na yang tshe 'di nyid la gnyid kyis phyed bri bar byed/ dang po byis pa dang / de'i 'og tu gzhon nu nos mthar gyis cher skyes pa'i bar du yang mya ngan dang
363b8(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir zhing sdug bsngal gyis rig pa brgya stong tshad med pa brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams kyis lus la/ 
364a1(dkon brtsegs): mongs par byed pas/ lus kyi sdug bsngal dang du len par mi nus pa'i tshe/ gson par mi smon cing shi bar dga' bas na lus 'di sdug bsngal mngal bde ba
364a2(dkon brtsegs): chung ba yin te/ re shig tsam du gnas par byed kyang mthar 'jog par 'gyur bas/ dga' bo skye ba rnams ni thad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur bas rtag par gnas pa gang yang mdo// gal
364a3(dkon brtsegs): te sman dang zas kyis bsos nas tshe ring por 'gyur na yang mthar 'chi bdag gi rgyal po sa gsod cing yul stong du skye bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir skye ba la dga' ba gcig kyang med
364a4(dkon brtsegs): par rig par byas nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis ma 'ongs ba'i tshogs bsags pa la bag yod par bya ba dang / tshang sa par spyod pa la brtson zhing le lo mi bya ba dang / don gyi spyod
364a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa dang / yon+tan gyi spyod pa dang / dge ba'/ ba' shig spyod pa la rtag par mos pas bsgom par bya'o// rtag par bdag nyid kyi dge ba dang / mo dge ba'i
364a6(dkon brtsegs): las rnam pa gnyis la so sor brtags nas sems la gtad/ ma 'ongs pa na 'gyod pa chen po med par bya'o// rje su chags par bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni mthar bral bar 'gyur/ 
364a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du tshe phyi ma len par 'gyur ro// dga' bo che lo brgya thub pa de yang gnas skabs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dang po ni byos pa'i gnas
364a8(dkon brtsegs): skabs te/ nyam chung zhing gan rkyal du nyal bar byedado// gnyis pa ni gzho nur gyur pa ste/ byis pa'i rtsed mo la dga' bar byed// gsum pa la ni lang tshe la bab ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams myong ba
364b1(dkon brtsegs): byedo// bzhi pa ni mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa yino// lnga pa ni der la bab pa ste/ shes rab kyis spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa yino// drug pa ni yongs/ 
364b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa ste/ legs par dpyod pa la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin no// bdun pa ni mthar gyis rgas pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung lugs rab tu shes pa yo no// brgyad pa ni rgas par
364b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ bya ba mang po rnams la mthu chung bar 'gyur ba yino// dgu pa ni shin tu rgas pa ste/ ci yang mi nus pa yino// bcu pa ni lo brgya pa ste 'chi ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o// 
364b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gnas skabs chen po de dag kyang mdor bsdus te bstan na 'di ltar zla ba bzhi zhing dus gcig du byas nas/ lo brgya la dus sum brgya yod par 'gyurate/ 
364b5(dkon brtsegs): dpyid dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi dus re re la yang dus pa rgya brgya yod pas so// lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis yod pas zla ba brgya phrag bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur la/ 
364b6(dkon brtsegs): de yang zla ba phyed phyed bsgrangs na zla ba phyed kyang brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod par 'gyur bas dus gsum po re re yang zla ba brgyad brgya brgyad brgya yod pas mdor bsdus na nyin mtshan
364b7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyi su za bas mdor bsdu na zas ni lan stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/ rkyen gyis bar chad
364b8(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ ma zos pa'i grangs kyang der gtog so// zas ma zos pa'i rkyen ni 'di lta ste/ khro nas ma zos pa dang / sdug bsngal myong nas ma zos pa dang / btsal te ma rnyed nas ma zos
365a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang gnyid kyis log nas ma zos pa dang / sdom pa blangs pa dang / rtse bas myos te ma zos pa dang / brel te ma zos pa ste/ zos pa dang ma zos pa dang gcig tu bsdus na
365a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs de snyed yod de/ ma'i nu zho 'thungs pa yang grangs der gtog so// de ltar na ngas mi rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i tshe lo brgya pa'i lo dang / zla ba dang / nyin mtshan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang
365a3(dkon brtsegs): zos pa dang / mthungs pa'i grangs yongasu rdzogs par bstan pa yin gyi/ khyod kyis 'di ltar yongasu skyo ba bskyed par bya'o// dga'o de ltar btsas shing cher skyes pa'i lus la yang nad
365a4(dkon brtsegs): mang po 'di lta ste/ glad pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na ga dang / sna ba dang / lcen pa dang / son pa dang / lkog ma na ba dang / snying na ba dang / lto na pa dang / lag pa na ba dang / 
365a5(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa na bas gnod pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / smyo sa pa dang / skangs pa dang / lud pa dang / 'khris pa dang nga/ bad kan la sogs pa nad mang po rnams kyis
365a6(dkon brtsegs): yan lag dang / nying lag na zhing sdug bsngal myong bar byed do// dga' bo mo'o lus la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs yod do// gzhan yang rlung nang brgya rtsa gcig
365a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khris pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad kan gyi nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'dus pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig yod pas mdor bsdus na nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nang gi lus las skyes
365a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo lus 'di ni 'bras dang 'dra zhing zug rngu dang 'dra bas nad mang po las mngon par grub pa skad cig tsam du yang mi gnas shing skad cig mar 'gyur ba
365b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa nyid dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par gyur pa/ 'chi ba dang nye zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can yid brtan du mi rung ba yi no// dga' bo 'di
365b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar sems can rnams ni gzhan yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste lag pa bcad pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang / mig phyung ba dang rna ba bcad pa dang / sna bcad
365b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lce bcad pa dang / mgo bcad pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag bcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / gzhan yang go rar 'jug pa dang / gag shing dang / lcug gis gzhu ba dang / 
365b4(dkon brtsegs): brdeg pa dang / bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / ngal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / 
365b5(dkon brtsegs): sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sha sbrang dang / gcan zan dang / sdi/ ga sbrul la sogs pa'i reg pa las byung ba'i sdugabasngal rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa
365b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa dag rje su myong bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams ni rtag tu 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad ba rtsub pa yi du mi 'ong ba la gnas shing / rje su chags pa dang bying
365b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa yin pas/ 'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin yang / de spang bar bya ba yin par mi shes shing yang yongasu gnyer bar byed pas nyin mtshan du lus dang / 
365b8(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs gdung ba dang / nang bsreg cing tshig par byed pa la yang rgyun chad pa med/ de bzhin du skye ba yang sdug bsngal yin no// rga ba yang sdug bsngal yin no// 
366a1(dkon brtsegs): nab yang sdug bsngal yin no// 'chi ba yang sdug bsngal yin no// sdug pa dang bral ba yang sdug bsngal yino// mi sdug pa dang phrad pa yang sdug bsngal yin no// 
366a2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa yang sdug bsngal yino// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yang sdug bsngal yin// 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'o spyod lam
366a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po dag kyang sdug bsngal yin pas gal te rtag tu 'gro zhing 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang nyal bar ma gyur na yang sdug bsngal myong zhing bde ba med par 'gyu ro// gal te rtag tu 'gre
366a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar gyur tam/ gal te rtag tu 'dug la/ 'gro ba dang 'greng ba dang / danyal bar ma gyur tam/ gal te rtag tu nyal la/ 'gro ba
366a5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'greng ba dang / 'dug par ma gyur na yang thams cadasdug bsngal mi bzang ba myong zhing bde ba thob par mi 'gyur rabs/ dga' bo 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal ma spangs
366a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sdug bsngal yongasu gnyer bar byed pa yin pas/ sdug bsngal kho na skye zhing sdug bsngal kho na 'gag par gyur pas/ 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen rgyun 'chad pa med par 'byung bar
366a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di dag thugasu chud pa'i phyir sems can rnams kyi 'khor ba'i chos 'du byed pa rnams mi rtag cing yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa ma yin pa rnam par
366a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i chos can yid brtan du mi rung ba yin pas/ chog shes pa yongasu btsal nas/ shin tu skyo ba bskyed/ nan+dan brtson 'grus kyis rnam par grol ba yongasu gnyer bar bya'o/ 
366b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa yi no// dga' bo bde 'gror skyes pa'i sems can yang skye gnas mi gtsang ba dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba yang brjod kyis mi rdzogs
366b2(dkon brtsegs): nangan song gsum po yo dgas dang / dud 'gro dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyis myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzang ba/ bzod par dka' ba yong su rdzogs
366b3(dkon brtsegs): par brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos so// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// gzhan yang dga' bo ma'i mngal du 'jug pa rnam pa bzhi
366b4(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can kha cig ni yang dag/ par shes bzhin 'jug la/ yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas/ yang dag par shes bzhin du 'byung ba
366b5(dkon brtsegs): yang yod/ kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhon du gnas la/ yang dang / bar mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod/ kha tsog na yang
366b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par shes bzhin du 'jug la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas shing yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod/ kha cig ni yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'jug/ 
366b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod/ de la su zhig yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung bar
366b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni so sor skye bo'i sems can kha cig ni rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' zhing yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang / 
367a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos pa mchog la mos shing bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / shin tu yang dag par sdom pa dang / rtag par drang bar sems shing bag mang par ma byed pa dang / na
367a2(dkon brtsegs): rab chen po dang ldan pas 'chi ka'i dus kyi che 'grong ba med par skye ba yang dag par len par byed pa rgyun tu zhug pa skyeb lan bdun pa'am/ rigs nas rig su skye ba'am/ lan cig
367a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'ong ba 'am/ bar chad gcig pa dag yin te/ gang zag de dag gis sngar dge ba spyad sngor 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang
367a4(dkon brtsegs): ma banyam su myong bar gyur kyang sems la g.yeng ba med pa dar yang dag par dran bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas/ yang dag par dran bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhugs nas
367a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang / thams cadargyu dang rkyen las skye bar 'gyur bas/ rtag tu bdu dkyi gnas byas par gyur to zhes rab tu sheso// dga'
367a6(dkon brtsegs): bo lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba thams cad kyi khyim yin pas/ rang bzhin gyis rtag par gnas pa ma yin pa dang / glen pa'i dngos po yin pas rmongs pa dag la slu bar byed pa yin snyam du
367a7(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya'o// lus 'di ni rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor rtsa rgyus rnams phan tshun 'brel pa/ bu ga dang gnad rnams dod par gyur pa/ sha dang tshil dang rus pa dang / rkang phan tshun
367a8(dkon brtsegs): bkris shing lpags pas g.yogs pa yin yang skyon du ma mthong bas/ rab tu gdungs pa'i phug tu mi gtsang bas yongasu gang ba/ skra dang spu dang sen mo dang / so'i gnas skabs tha
367b1(dkon brtsegs): dad pa la bdag dang bdag gir bzung ba'i phyir rtag tu rang dbang med par khrid ba/ rtag tu 'chil ma dang snabs dang / mi gtsang ba dang / kha chu dang / rdul dang / 'khris pa dang / bang
367b2(dkon brtsegs): kan 'byung zhing zhag dang / tshol rul zhing myags pa/ mkhal ma dang / mtshar ba dang / mtshan pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu mche phra mi gtsang bas gang zhing skyugs bro ba/ srin bu'i rig
367b3(dkon brtsegs): mang pos kun tu khyab par gang ba/ steng dang / 'og go bu ga rnamasu rtag tu mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa/ zhu ba dang mazhu ba'i gnas gnyis lpags pa srab mo g.yogs pas 'di ni snabs phyis
367b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra ba yino snyam du khyod kyis so sor brtag par bya'o// / ji tsam du bza' ba dang bca' ba zos 'chos shingabaldang pa na mchil snab su gyur nas/ mid par 'dzud
367b5(dkon brtsegs): cing rkang pa dang klad pa phan tshun 'dres nas lto bar 'bab par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na khyi rus pa skam po bldad pa lta bur gyur pa yin yang yang dag pa ma yin
367b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byed pas/ zas rked par phyin nas gyen du glon par byed kyang slar med par byed// dga' bo lus 'di ni dang po mer mer po dang / 
367b7(dkon brtsegs): nur nur po dang / ltar ltar po dang / 'khrang 'gyur dang / rkang lag 'gyus pa mi gtsang ba'i dngos po cher skyes nas byis pa'i tshe/ 'khor bar gyur pa nas/ rgas pa'i bar du 'khor
367b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing bcang bar gyur pa ni 'di lta ste dper na mun pa'i g.yangs dang 'dra'o// khron pa mnam po dang 'dra bar rtag tu lan tshwa dang / skab dang / tsha ba dang / skyur ba la sogs pa'i zas
368a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi ros yongasu gsos pa/ gzhan yang ma'i mngal gyi mes lus kyi dbang po rab tu bcos pa/ mi gtsang ba'i snod du rtag tu rab tu gdung ba'i sdug bsngal myong / 
368a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba gal te ma 'greng ngam/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal bar gyur pa na btsang ba lngas bcings pa'am/ mes gdungs pa bzhin du shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong
368a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur bas dpe byar yang mi nuso// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de de ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam du gnas shing sdug bsngal mang pos nyon mongs par 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang
368a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rno ba'i phyir sems g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro// ga/ zhe na yang sems can bsod nams chung ba kha cig/ da ni ma'i mngal na 'phreng du nyal ba 'am/ log par 'dug
368a5(dkon brtsegs): par yang 'gyur te/ de yang sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang / rkyen gyi stobs kyi phyir ram/ yang na mas kha zas ma snyoms pa shin tu grang ba 'am/ shin tu tsha ba 'am/ 
368a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu sbyar ba 'am/ shin tu mang ra ba 'am/ shin tu kha ba zos pa'i phyir ram/ yang na tshad las 'das par skom mthungs sam/ 'dod chags mang du spyad dam/ nang bu can du
368a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ mya ngan mang pos non tam/ brdeg 'chos sam/ brdeg par gyur na yang rkyen 'di dag gi dbang gis ma'i lus kyang yongasu gdung bar 'gyur la/ yongasu gdungs
368a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i phyir/ mngal na gnas pa yang yongasu gdung bar 'gyur ro// yongasu gdungs par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal mang po myong bar
368b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i phyir ni g.yo bar 'gyu ro// g.yos par gyur pa'i phyir ni/ lus log par 'phreng du nyal zhing 'byung bar mi nus pa la bud med mkhas pas mar ram/ 'bru mar gyis
368b2(dkon brtsegs): lag pa bskus na sa ma'i mngal du 'jug ste/ bags kyis bags kyis mngal myangs nas/ sngar ji ltar gnas pa bzhin 'jog par byed pas/ lag pas reg par gyur pa
368b3(dkon brtsegs): na mngal na gnas pas sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa dag myong bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo 'di lta ste dper/ khye'u 'am bu mo shin tu gzhon pa'i lus la/ la la zhig gis
368b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshon rnon pos lpags pa dang sha bcad nas/ de'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ de'i rkyen gyis sdug bsnga la chen po myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mngal na gnas pa'i
368b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mo bzad pa rtsub pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ de lta/ bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang dbang po mchog/ tu rno ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas/ rnam
368b6(dkon brtsegs): par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ dga' bo de ltar na mngal na gnas pa de ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang btsa su nye ba'i tshe na
368b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dang bcas pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ las kyi rlung gi pang gi do lag pa bsnol nas yan lag dang / nyin lag bcu ma ste/ sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa myong
368b8(dkon brtsegs): nas ma'i mngal nas byung bar gyur pas lus kyi yan 'ams cad sngon por 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na gsar du skangs pa la reg par mi bzod pa bzhin du bkres skom
369a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis gdungs pa dang / snying 'phyang zhing gdung pa dang bcas pa bzhin du las kyi rlung gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis bus nas mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngal nas byung
369a2(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang phyi rol gyi rlung gis reg par gyur pa na/ 'di lta ste dper na mtshon gyis bcad nas thal bas bslus pa ji lta ba bzhin tu 'gyur ro// lag pa dang gos kyis reg par 'gyu
369a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe na yang thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang / dbang po rab tu rno ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas rnam
369a4(dkon brtsegs): par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ ma'i mngal du shes pa bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba thams cad kyang sdug bsngal ba yin na/ dga' bo
369a5(dkon brtsegs): ba su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed/ dga' bo de la su zhig ma'i mngal du yang du/ ga par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la/ yang dag pa/ 
369a6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ dga' bo ji ltar 'di na so so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig ni rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' zhing yang dang yang du dge ba'i byor/ 
369a7(dkon brtsegs): la goms par byed pa dang rtags tu dngos po mchog la mos shing bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang de'i sems drang zhing bag med par mi byed pa dang / 
369a8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chung ngu dang ldan pas 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod la 'gyur ba rgyun du zhugs pa skye ba lan bdun pa 'am/ rigs nas rigasu skye ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 
369b1(dkon brtsegs): bar chad gcig pa dag yin te/ gang zag de dag gis sngar dge ba spyad pas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang / tshab nyam su myong bar gyur kyang
369b2(dkon brtsegs): sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag par dran bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhugs nas/ chos rnams las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang / thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar rab tu shes so/ zhes
369b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba nas ma'i mngal nas byung nas shes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa cha zhing rtsub pa rnams myong bar gyur kyang dbang
369b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bring dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag par shes bzhin du du cing nas pa/ yang sa kyi du grug 'gyur mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i dpal du 'jug pa la mos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma
369b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// ngaga'o su zhig yang dag par shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug pa phrag bzhin du gnas shing 'byung bar byed ce na dga'
369b6(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di ltar 'di na so so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig ni rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' zhing yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang
369b7(dkon brtsegs): tu dngos po mchog la mos shing bsod nams mas mngon par 'du byed pa zhes bya ba nas 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par gyur pa rgyun tu zhugs pa skye ba lan bdun pa zhes bya ba
369b8(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa'i bar yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ 'tsho ka'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang cha ba nyams myong bar gyur kyang sems la g.yeng ba med par
370a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dran bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed de/ dbang po rnon po ma yin pa'i phyir shes bzhin du mngal du 'jug par byed kyang mi shes bzhin du gnas
370a2(dkon brtsegs): shing 'byung bar byed do// mkhas pa su me/ sadra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mas par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// dgar ba sa zhig yang dag par mi
370a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung bar byed ce na ji ltar 'di na so so skye bo'i sems can kha cig tshul khrims yongasu dag pa 'dral ba
370a4(dkon brtsegs): la dga' zhing dge ba'i phyogs bsgrub par mi byed pa rtag tu dngos po ngan pa la mos shing sdig pa rnams spyod pa / sems kyi rang bzhin mi drang zhing bag med pa
370a5(dkon brtsegs): mang ba shes rab dang mi ldan ba dag longs spyod la mngon par zhen cing ser sna byas/ pa dang / rtag tu lag pa bskam nas
370a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la rkyong zhing gtong bar mi byed pa dang rtag tu re ba dang bcas shing sems rab tu dul bar ma gyur pa dang / lta ba dang spyod pa phyin
370a7(dkon brtsegs): ci log tu gyur pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa dang bcas shing sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon du gyur pas 'chi ka'i dus kyi
370a8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang rtsub pa dang yid du mi 'ongs pa dag gis rab tu gzir zhing de'i sems rnam par g.yeng bar byed pas sdug
370b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi dbang gis bdag ni su zhig gang nas 'dir 'ongs de gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes rab tu ma shes pas dga' bo 'din dus gsum du yang dag pa
370b2(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro// dga' bo sems can de dag mir skyes nas de lta bu'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur
370b3(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi 'on kyang de dag ni gnas mchogs tu gyur pa yin pas skal pa bye ba brgya stong chad med pa snyed du yang mi'o lus shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin no// 
370b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te mtho rimu skyes par gyur na/ rtag tu ltung bas 'jigs pas sdu pa dang bral po'i sdug bsngal dang ldan te/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lnga gzhan rnams
370b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad du khyod bde 'gro'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig/ bde 'gro'i 'jig rten ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste de ni mi'i 'gro gang yin pa'o zhes zer
370b6(dkon brtsegs): bas/ mi'i 'gro ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin la/ khom pa dang ldan pa ni de bas kyang ches shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// ngan 'gro gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ngan
370b7(dkon brtsegs): song gsum po dag gang yin pa'o// sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba ni rtag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa shin tu yid du mi 'ong ba 'am/ rab tu tsha zhing rtsub pa dag myong bar 'gyu
370b8(dkon brtsegs): bas dpe byar yang mi nus so// yi dgas kyi 'gro ba ni rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang mang ba rab tu mnyen cing dul ba'i sems med pa g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa
371a1(dkon brtsegs): gapa sa da par byung / lag sa zug gas pas pa/ byas pa pa myu hA/ bya ma jug/ mang sa
371a2(dkon brtsegs): ma dang nye bar 'gyur na yang 'grel pa dang sgom pa'i sdug 'asngal myong bar byed sadag par slob ba dang chas shing thogs 'dang ma gi yin no// drung cu skyeg
371a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ni tshad med dpag tu med de/ don gyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ chos kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i sbyong ba dang ma ldan
371a4(dkon brtsegs): drang po'i spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ phan tshun gcig sa gcig za ba dang / mthung nga ldan pa rnams mthu nung bdag la ra bar byed pa dag yin no// dung 'gro'i skyegs
371a5(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni mun par skyes/ mun par rgas/ mun par/ 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / mi gtsang ba'i gnas gcig/ gcin drug gi nang du gnas nas res 'ga' snang ba dang bcas
371a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yod de/ 'di lta ste phye ma leb dang / sbrang ma dang / sro shig dang / tre la ta lta bu rnams so// gzhan yang rtag par mun pa'i nang du skyes mun pa'i nang du rgas par gyur
371a7(dkon brtsegs): pa tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de// de ni tshe rabs snga ma la mir gyur pa na glen zhing gti mug pas chos yang dag par ma mnyan pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid thal rang su gtong
371a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'dod pa lnga la mngon par zhen par gyur pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas pas de'i rigs su skyes nas/ glen zhing rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal myong
371b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dag yin no// dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skyes gnas pa'i sems can chu'i nang du skyes nas/ chu'i nang du rgas chu'i nang du dus byed par 'gyur ba
371b2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de// 'di lta ste nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / ba lu ka lta bu rnams te/ thams cad kyang che
371b3(dkon brtsegs): rabs snga ma la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba'i dbang gis shes bya ba la sogs pa yang gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i
371b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can bshang ba dang gci ba'i dri tshor na/ myur du der song nas bza' ba dang gtung ba byed pa tshad med dang dag tu med pa rnyed yod de/ 'di lta ste phag dang / khyim bya
371b5(dkon brtsegs): dang khyi dang / wa dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog dang / sbrang bu dang / skur pa dang / gcan zan rnams te/ thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi
371b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rtag tu rtswa dang / shing dang / mi gtsang ba'i dngos po rnams za zhing 'thung bar
371b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa tshad med dpag tu med pa ji snyed yod do// 'di lta ste glang po dang / rta dang rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / dre'u la sogs pa lta bu rnams te/ thams cad kyang
371b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs snga ma'i las mi dge ba'i dbang gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dga' bo kye ma gyi hud srid par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di ni/ 
372a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/ shin tu mchog tu 'bar ba yin pas/ sems can 'ga' tsam yang des ma bsregs shing ma bcos pa
372a2(dkon brtsegs): med de/ de yang mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi me rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pas mngon du snang ba'i yul gzugs dang / sgra dang
372a3(dkon brtsegs): dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos yongs su gnyer ba'i dbang gis de ltar gyur pa yin no// dga' bo 'bar/ rab tu 'bar bar byed pa'i me gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod
372a4(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me nga dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i me dang / mya ngan dang // smre sngags 'don pa dang / 
372a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i/ me dag gis rtag tu bsregs shing 'bar bar byed pa/ sa/ 'ga' tsam yang de las thar pa med do// dga' bo le lo la
372a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas pa dag ni sdug bsngal mang po myong zhing nyon mongs pas kun tu dkris nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos mngon par 'dus byas pas/ 'khor bar 'khor yang nye bar zhi zhing
372a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba mang du myong zhing / brtul ba'i sems bskyed par byed pas/ nyon mongs pa yongs su bsal
372a8(dkon brtsegs): nas dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i rab tu brtson pa mi gtong ba la rgyun 'chang ba med do// de lta bas na deng khyod kyi lus 'di'i lpags pa dang / sha dang / chu dang / rus pa dang
372b1(dkon brtsegs): khrag dang / rtsa rgyus dang / rkang rnams ni ring por mi thogs par gyis shing 'jig par 'gyur ro snyam duso sor brtags nas rtag par sems rtse gcig tu le lo ma
372b2(dkon brtsegs): byed par mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang rtsod par mi byed na
372b3(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams ni nan gyis nga dang rtsod par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos shes pa rnams ni gzhan dang rtsod par mi byed de/ bdag dang bdag gir
372b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin na su dang lhan cig rtsod par byed/ 'on kyang mthong ba dang shes pa med pa dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa bskyed par byed pa'i phyir
372b5(dkon brtsegs): ngas yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di skad du ngas ni chos rnams gang yang mi she/ sa pa med do zhes smras pa yin te/ dga' bo ngas de
372b6(dkon brtsegs): skad smras pa de la tha dad du gyur pa yod dam/ dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis te de bzhin gshegs pas de skad gsungs pa la gzhan
372b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la gdon mi za bar tha dad du
372b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsung ba/ 'den par gsung ba de bzhin nyid du gsung ba tha mi dad par gsung ba/ slu ba med
373a1(dkon brtsegs): par gsung ba/ 'jig rten pa rnams la yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang / phan yon chen po thob par mdzad pa/ 
373a2(dkon brtsegs): lam mkhyen pa/ lam rig pa/ lam ston pa/ lam 'byed pa/ lam 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
373a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
373a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa yin no// 'jig rten pa rnams ni shes pa med pa/ mngon par yid ches pa med pa/ rtag par dbang po rnams
373a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dran pa med pa/ lag mthil na yod pa kho na mthong zhing don chen po la mi blta ba/ bla ba'i nga ngos po mi sgrub par gang bya dka' ba rgyun du byed pa yino// 
373a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo shes rab dang ldan pa'i spyod yul 'di ltar re zhig zhog la deng khyod kyis sha'i mig gis lta bas shes pa dang / mthong ba ji snyed pa dag yang dag pa ma yin par so
373a7(dkon brtsegs): sor brtags na de nyid rnam par thar pa zhes bya bas// dga' bo khyod nga la dad pa'i phyir ma 'gro zhig/ nga la 'dun pa'i phyir 'brang bar ma byed cig/ nga'i tshig la rton
373a8(dkon brtsegs): par ma byed cig/ nga'i mtshan ma la rtog par ma byed cig/ dge sbyong gi lta ba dang shes pa'i rjes su ma 'drang zhig/ dge sbyong la gus pa ma bskyed cig
373b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du dge sbyong go bo ta ma ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no// zhes ma zer bar ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gang yin pa de gcig pu dben par
373b2(dkon brtsegs): song la yid la bosems te 'jal bar gyis shig/ so sor rtogs shig/ rtag par mang du bsgoms shig/ sems rtse gcig tu chos rnams so sor brtags te/ chos de dag
373b3(dkon brtsegs): la bsgoms pa'i 'du shes yongasu rdzogs par byas te/ yang dag pa'i dran pa la gnas nas bdag nyid kyis gling byos shig/ bdag nyid kyis gnas dang skyabs byos shig/ chos
373b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gling byos shig/ chos kyis gnas dang skyabs byo/ sa shig dang / de las gzhan pa'i gling dang gnas dang skyabs med do// dga' bo ji ltar na dge slong bdag
373b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid gling du gyur pa dang / bdag nyid gnas dang / skyabs su gyur pa dang // chos kyis gling du gyur pa dang / chos kyis gnas dang skyabs su gyur cing / de las gzhan
373b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gling dang / de las gzhan pa'i gnas dang skyabs med par gyur pa gang yin zhe na/ dga' bo 'di ltar dge slong la la zhig bdag nyid kyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba la
373b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas nas/ brtson 'grus kyi dran pa rtse gcig tu byas pas yang dag pa'i shes pa thob nas/ 'jig rten pa'i khong khro ba ji snyed pa dag rtag tu yid la sems shing / dul
373b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi lus la sdug bsngal yin par rjes su lta ba zhes bya ste/ gang gis phyi rol gyi lus dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i lus la rjes su lta ba
374a1(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin no// dga' bo de'i 'og tu kun 'byung ba'i chos kyi lus su bltas nas rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos su
374a2(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas rab tu gnas par byed la gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la lus su lta zhing rjes su gnas par byed pa nyid kyi lus 'di la yang dag
374a3(dkon brtsegs): bar dran par byed pas res 'ga' ni shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba kho na dang lnga par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur zhing
374a4(dkon brtsegs): brten pa med par gnas par 'gyur bas 'jigarten la 'di la blang bar bya ba ci yang med par rab tu shedas par 'gyurate/ de ltar na dga' bo 'di ni dge
374a5(dkon brtsegs): slong bdag nyid kyis nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ phyi rol gyi lus dang phyi nang gnyis ka'i lus la lta ba yang de bzhin no// 
374a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi rol gyi tshor ba dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i tshor bar lta ba la rab tu gnas pa dang / nang gi sems dang phyi rol gyi sems
374a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i sems su lta ba la gnas pa dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi rol gyi chos dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i chos su lta ba la ra
374a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas/ brtson 'grus kyi dran pa rtse gcig tu byas pas yang dag pa'i shes pa thob nas 'jig rten pa'i khong khro baji steng pa dag rtag tu yid la maM sems shing ba
374b1(dkon brtsegs): dul bar gyur nas kun 'byung ba'i chos su bltas nas rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos su bltas nas rab tu gnas par yang byed la/ gzhan yang kun
374b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la cho su bltas nas rab tu gnas par byed pa nyid kyis lus 'di nyid la yang dag par dran par byed pas res 'ga' ni shes pa kho na dang
374b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten 'di la blang bar bya ba ci yang
374b4(dkon brtsegs): med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na dga' bo 'di ni dge slong bdag nyid gling du gyur pa dang / bdag nyid gnas dang skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos
374b5(dkon brtsegs): gling du gyur pa dang / chos gnas dang skyabs su gyuracing / de las gzhan pa'i gling med pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i gnas dang skyabs med pa zhes bya'o// 
374b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo skyes bu rang bzhin drang zhing g.yo rgyu spangs pa gang la la zhig snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ nga'i thad du 'ongs pa langs dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos de la rjesu bstan nas/ 
374b7(dkon brtsegs): de phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe bdag nyid thob pa dang ldan par smras par 'gyur la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe chos rjes su bstan pa yang bdag nyid 'thob pa dang ldan par smra bar byed pas na dga' bo ngas
374b8(dkon brtsegs): legs par bstan pa'i chos 'di mthong ba'i chos la mngon sum du rtogs pa/ rab tu gdung ba sel bar byed pa/ dus dang dbang po dang rab tu 'tsham par 'gyur ba thabs dang ldan
375a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rang gis rig pa'i chos legs par skyob par byed pa yin pas gang gis nga'i mngon sum du chos bstan pa thos par gyur na/ mya ngan
375a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i rjes su 'thun par 'gyur zhing / byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni nga'i mkhyen pa yin te/ de lta bas na deng khyod kyis bdag gi don
375a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan gyi don dang / gnyis ka'i don de lta bu mthong nas/ chos 'di la rtag par yang dag par bslabs te rab tu 'byung ba'i chos bag yod par bsgrubs nas/ 
375a4(dkon brtsegs): chud mi gsan cing 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par byas nas/ gzhan gyis byin pa'i chos gos dang / bsod bsnyoms dang / 
375a5(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman la sogs pa blang bar/ bya zhing / sbyin bdag rnams bsod nams kyi phan yon chen po thob pa dang / 'bras bu rnam
375a6(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa khyad par du 'phags pa yangs shing rgya che ba dag 'thob par 'gyur ba de ltar dga' bo khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo gzugs 'ga' tsam yang
375a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags par bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de ni gnas med do// gang yang mya ngan dang / 
375a8(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang nyon mongs pa mi bskyed pa gang yang med de de'i gnas med do// dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs de rtag pa zhig yin nam
375b1(dkon brtsegs): 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ btsun pa de ni rang bzhin gyis mi dag pa lagaso/ dga'abog la 'ang bzhin gyis mi ga pa yinanan pa bdag yin napa'on rdzug bsngal bzhig yinan/ tsun pa na
375b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba lags so// gang mi rtag cang sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin na/ nga nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan padag/ 
375b3(dkon brtsegs): cigazugs 'di ni 'dag nyid yin no// bdagon gzugs rnams dang ldan no// gzugs ni bdag gi ba yin no// bdag ni gzugs la gnas so zhes khas len
375b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das don ma legs so// 'didi snyam du sems tshor ba dang / 'jugs dang / 'du byed dang
375b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa de dag rtag pa zhig yin nam/ 'onate mi drug pa zhig yin/ btsun pa thams cad / rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa lags// dga'
375b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te rang bzhin gyis ma rtag pa yin na/ ci 'du bdag yin nam/ 'on te bsdug bsngal bzhig yin/ bdun pa sdug bsngal 'a lags// gang ma dag
375b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'di ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jug pa'i chos can yin pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos meng du byas pa dang ldan pa dag na tshor ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni nid yin no// dang mang/ 
375b8(dkon brtsegs): li migs pa dang ldan no// tsher ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni bdag gi pa yin no// bdag ni tshor ba las shes pa la gnas// des pas len par byed dag bcom ldan
376a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni ma lag so// de lta bas na ji tsam du gzugs su gyur pa 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am// da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ 
376a2(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang po 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ thag ring ba 'am/ thag nye yang rung ste/ ji tsam du gzugs gyur pa thams cad kyang
376a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang // gzugs kyang bdag gi ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs la gnas pa ma yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du yang
376a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji tsam du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam dpar shes par gyur pa 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ 
376a5(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang po 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ thag ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba yang rung ste/ 
376a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / de dag kyang bdag gi ba ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag la gnas pa ma yin par legs
376a7(dkon brtsegs): par so sor brtag par bya'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis nga'i nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ni 'di ltar gzugs la so/ 
376a8(dkon brtsegs): sor brtags nas/ yongasu skyo ba skyes pa dang / gzhan yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la so sor brtags nas yongasu skyo ba skye bar 'gyur
376b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te skyo bar gyur na mngon par zhen par mi byed do// mngon par zhen pa med pas rnam par grol 'thob par 'gyur ro// rnam par grol nas bdag rnam par grol lo snyam du shes
376b2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad du bdag gi skye ba ni zad do// tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par sprad do// bya ba byas pas yang srid pa phyi ma len par mi 'gyu ro zhes sgrogs par 'gyuraro snyam du so sor/ 
376b3(dkon brtsegs): brtags par bya'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral nas chos kyi mig
376b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya dpo rnams ni zag pa rnams las sems rnam par dgrol ba thob par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
376b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// gang la mnyam bzhag sems med pas// rnam dag ye shes med pas na// gang zag rnams
376b6(dkon brtsegs): ni spong mi 'gyur// de bas khyod kyis nan tan bsgrubs// khyod kyis rnal 'byor rtag bsgoms la// phung po skye 'gag shes par gyis// rnam dag gal te rdzogs gyur na// 
376b7(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kun gyis dga' bar 'gyur// mdza' bshes lhan cig 'brel dga' zhing // phan tshun 'drul zhing chags pa dang / thob dang grags pa mngon zhen pa// dga'
376b8(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod kyis kun spongs shig/ khyim pa dang ni rang byung la// brten cing bshes ni mi byed par// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'das sems la// sdug bsngal mthar ni phyin par
377a1(dkon brtsegs): byos dang po mer mer por las ni// sha yi chu bur skye bar 'gyur// chu bur las ni ltar ltar skye// ltar ltar po las mkhrang bar 'gyur/ 
377a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhrang ba rnam par gyur nas ni// mgo dang yan lag bzhi skye bas// rus pa 'dus nas lus grub pa// thams cad las kyi rgyu las byung // mgo thong rus pa dgu 'du zhing // 'gram/ 
377a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rus pa gnyis 'brel te// so ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan// de yi rtsa ba'ang de bzhin no// rna rtsa gnya' ba'i rus pa dang // rkan dang sna yi rus pa dang // drang dang med pa'i rus pa
377a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bsdus na rus pa nyi shu yod// mig la rus pa bzhi ye do// phrag pa byin pa zung gnyis yod// lag pa gnyis dang sor mo rnams// bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yong// ldag
377a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyab rus pa brgya yod// sgal tshigs la ni sum cu gnyis// 'di dag kun la rtsa yod pas// de yi grangs ni cha ba ni 'gyur// rtsib logs g.yas pa'i rus pa ni// phan tshun 'brel
377a6(dkon brtsegs): ba bcu gsum yod// rtsi logs g.yen 'brel skye ba yi// rus pa dag ni bcu gsum yod// rus pa'i lu gu rgyud 'di dag/ gsum gsum dag ni phan tshun 'brel// gnyis gnyis
377a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni tshigs ldan te// lhag ma gzhan ni 'brel pa med// g.yas g.yon brla ni gnyis po la// bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yod// lus dang 'brel ba'i rus pa ni// bsdom na sum
377a8(dkon brtsegs): burtsa drug yod// dus tshigs phan tshun 'brel na ni// sems can lus ni grub yin zhes// yang dag sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yis// bden tshigs rab tu gsungs pa yin/ 
377b1(dkon brtsegs): rkang mthil nas ni mgo bo'i bar/ mi gtsang 'dres shing mi brtan pa// de dag lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas// nyams chung 'dam bu'i khyim dang 'dra// rus pa 'ba' zhig gcer
377b2(dkon brtsegs): bu med// sha khrag kun tu bskus pas na// shing ma'i 'khrul 'khor rab 'dra zhing / sgyu mas sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'dra// lus 'di rtsa rgyus dkris nas ni// lpags pa
377b3(dkon brtsegs): gsher bas g.yogs pas na// gnas dgu rma yi sgo yod pas// de la bur ni blta bar bya// kun nas gcin rgyag mi gtsang ba// rtag tu gang zhing 'dzag pas na// dper na bang
377b4(dkon brtsegs): dong rnams su// 'bru rnams sna tshogs bkang bltar// lus 'di yang ni de zhin te// mi gtsang sna tshogs rab tu gang // rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor g.yo bas na// nyams
377b5(dkon brtsegs): chung snying po ci yang med// byis pa skye bo rtag tu chags/ mkhas dag ni zhen mi byed// 'chil snabs rdul ni rtag tu 'bab// rnag khrag dag ni rgyun tu gang // zhag sar
377b6(dkon brtsegs): 'om lhan cig 'dres// glang rgyas dag ni glad pa gang // snying khar bang kan rgyun tu 'byung // nang gi zhu dang mazhu'i gnas// glang rgyas dang ni lpags pa dang // snying dang nang
377b7(dkon brtsegs): grol glo mchin dang // 'di la sogs pa'i rum myags dang // mi gtsang rnams dang lhan cig gnas// sdig pa'i lus ni 'jigs rung bas// 'di nyid bdag gi dgra yin na/ shes
377b8(dkon brtsegs): med 'dod la zhen pa yi// blun po rtag tu 'phang bar byed/ 'di 'dra'i mi gtsang lus 'di ni// gro khyer rnying pa 'dra bas na// nyin mtshan nyon mongs rab gzir cing // skad cig/ 
378a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas kun tu 'khyam// rus pa'i grong khyer rtsig par byed// sha dang khrag gis zhal zhal bskus// 'dod sdang gti mug mtshon bkye nas/ 
378a2(dkon brtsegs): ci rigs par ni brgyan par byed// rus pa'i grong khyer skyug dro ba// sha khrag 'brel zhing 'dus pas na// rtag tu sdug pa'i grogs po yis// phyi nang sdug bsngal gdung bar byed/ 
378a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo khyod kyis shes par byos// ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// nyin mtshan rtag tu dran byos la// 'dod pa'i yul la sems ma byed// gal te 'dod pa spong
378a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod na// rtag tu de bzhin rab bsgoms la// rnam grol yongasu tshol bar gyis// myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'da'// bcom ldan 'das kyis mngal du 'jug
378a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na tshe dang / ldan pa dga' bo dang / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
378a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par bste ngo // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'brog dgon pa las yang dag par 'das te/ mthar thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i
378a7(dkon brtsegs): gnasu phyin nas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pas bdag nyid shin du dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gus sems
378a8(dkon brtsegs): khrus ni bslabs pa dang / chu gtsang byug spos phul ba dang // bsod nams rnams ni bsgrub pa na/ rnam smin mchog 'di thob pa yin// de nas 'khor mang po rnams de
378b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pas thams cad the tshom skyes par gyur nas/ the tshom bcad pa'i phyir ston pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa
378b2(dkon brtsegs): dgar po 'dis sngon sug las ci bgyis na/ de'i rnam par smin pas lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur la/ mtshan sum cu dang ldan pas bdag nyid brgyan cing bcom
378b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis sgrubs sor bzhis thung bar gyur/ ci'i slad du 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen pa las ston pa chen pos thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ mthus 'khor
378b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te/ thabs kyis shin tu mthar thub pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par bzhag pa bkas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
378b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa dge slong dag dge slong dga' bo sngon las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongasu smin pas na/ thang mngon du gyur pa yin zhes gzhan nas bstan pa
378b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rgya cher bka' stsal nas/ tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te bskal pa brgya lon kyang // las byas chung bar mi 'gyur te// rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa na// lus can nyid la 'bras
378b7(dkon brtsegs): bur sminaHdge slong dag khyod nyon cig/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu cu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol na skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
378b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
379a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs gcig tu ldong
379a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu zhing grong khyer mnyen ldan rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du gshegs nas mnyen ldan gyi tshal na zhugaso// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i g.yas khyim gyi gcung zhig yod pa de 'dod pa'i
379a3(dkon brtsegs): yul la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs
379a4(dkon brtsegs): bzla ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar bskul nas thabs kyis mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rnam par bzhago/ de'i tshe na yul de'i bdag po mnyen ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po/ 
379a5(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ 'di ltar chos kyis mi rnams 'dul ba/ mi dang skye/ bo mang po rgyas pa/ lo legs shing bde ba/ g.yo sgyu dang chom rkun med cing nad dang bral ba/ ba lang dang rwa
379a6(dkon brtsegs): lug dang sa lu dang / bu ram shing kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur te/ rgyal po de'i g.yas khyim gyi nu bo zhig yod pa yang shin tu 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur to// 
379a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te mnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs par thos pas/ btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / skye bo mang po'i tshogs
379a8(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'bod pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das des
379b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi gtam kun tu bstan cing bzeng bstod pas/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur to// de'i nu bo 'dod pa
379b2(dkon brtsegs): la zhen cing khyim nas 'byung du ma btub pa dang / de'i tshe de la blon po'i bu dang / gzhan yang snga nas lhan cig rtse rtse ba'i grogs po dag gis/ kye grogs po dag shes par gyis
379b3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ 'di ltar rgyal po'i gzhon nu dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / skye bo mang po dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der dong ste/ gus pas
379b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos mnyan pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar khyod kyang mi'i lus shi don tu thob par dka' ba las deng thob par gyur na/ ci'i phyir
379b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags nas sgo yang 'byung du mi btub ces smras pa dang // des kyang de skad du spro ba thos pas shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ de dag gis rjes su
379b6(dkon brtsegs): 'brangs te lhan cig dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i gcung dge slong des/ mang po de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te dong ba mthong nas/ kye khyod ci'i phyir mi 'di gcig pu khrid
379b7(dkon brtsegs): nas lhan cig 'grogs te 'gro zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhing du smraso// dge slong des smras pa/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung yin te/ sngon khyim na
379b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i tshe 'dod pa'i yul rnams la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/ ston pa chen pos thugs rjer dgongs nas/ mthus 'khor ba las bzlas te/ mthar thug pa'i
380a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no// gzhan yang skyes bu glen pa bdag dang 'dra ba 'di lta bu yod pa las khyed kyis snying brtse nas lhan cig khrid 'ongs
380a2(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu legaso// deng khyod bla na med pa'i ston pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der khrid cig dang gdon mi za bar shin tu dang ba'i skye bar 'gyuraro zhes smras pas// de dag kyang lhan cig
380a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das des kyang de la gzigs nas/ dbang po dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos yang dag par bstan pas de dag/ 
380a4(dkon brtsegs): gis thos par gyur nas/ shin tu dang pa skyes pas 'dra/ dag pa'i stan nas langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gci ngag tu gzar te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
380a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa chen po'aphags pa'i dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par sro khang du khrus la gshegs
380a6(dkon brtsegs): par ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang cang mi gsung bar gshegs par zhal gyis bzheso// des kyang zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
380a7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te song ngo // de nas rgyal po ga la ba der seng ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po la lus gus pas phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras rgyal po chen po bdag cig bcom
380a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal ba der mchis nas/ chos thos pas shin tu dang ba skyes nas 'dod pa'i yul rnams la yongs skyo ba'i sems skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
380b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dang bcas pa sang gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par srobang du khrus la gshegs par gsol ba las de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen pos kyang thugs brtse bar dgod nas shes
380b2(dkon brtsegs): par zhal gyis bzhes te/ bcom ldan 'das do ni lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa bgyi ba'i 'os su gyur pa lags na// lhas kyang grong khyer gyi shul dang srang rnams phyag dar byas
380b3(dkon brtsegs): nas chag chag btab ste/ mdzes par bgyi ba'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang rgyal pos 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs na bdag gis grong khyer mdzes
380b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gi nu bo 'dod pa la ma// ngan par zhen nas bzlog par dka' ba las// deng bcom ldan 'das kyis thul bar gyur pa ni yang dag par ngo
380b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshar che'o snyam du bsams nas/ nu bo shin tu leg/ sa kyis khyod song la khrus kyi yo byad ci dgos pa sbyorag dang / ngas kyang ci nus kyis grong khyer brgyan par bya'o// 
380b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras pas/ rgyal po'i nu bo yang shin tu dga' bar gyur te// rgyal po la phyag byas te sa las langs te song ngo // de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ kye khyed
380b7(dkon brtsegs): cag deng la grong khyer du dril chen po bsgrags te phyogasu 'di skad du sang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs kyis grong khyer na gnas pa dang / yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye
380b8(dkon brtsegs): bo rnams so so nas ci nus kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la lam dang srang rnams phyag dar byas te chag chag btab nas/ me tog dang / spos dang / dri rnams thogs te/ ston pa chen
381a1(dkon brtsegs): po gshegs pa su cig ces bsgo shig/ blon po rnams kyis kyang lha de bzhin du 'tshalo zhes rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas/ phyogs go bar bsgo
381a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing dril chen gyi sgra bsgrags pas skye bo rnams grong khyer de'i rtsig pa dang / gyo mo dang / bong ba rnams gsal te/ spos kyi chus kun tu khyab par chag chag btab nas/ 
381a3(dkon brtsegs): bdug pa dam pa rnams kyang bsregs/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po yang btsugs te/ me tog rnams mngon par gtor bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
381a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bskyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du byas so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i nu bos kyang spos chu dang / spos mar da la sogs pa sbyar te/ khri bshams nas gdan yang bting / 
381a5(dkon brtsegs): po de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs mtharagyis grong khyer du gshegasu nye ba dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo dang / sras dang / 
381a6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mang po rnams grong nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsu nas/ rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te zha 'bring byas nas/ grong khyer du gshegs pa dang / 
381a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe rgyal po'i nu bo des kyang bcom ldan 'das sro khang du gshegs par spyan drangs te/ spos chu la sogs pa phul nas sku bsil bar gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
381a8(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi kha dog can mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yongasu brgyan pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' nas shin tu dang ba'i ngang pa skyes par gyur to// sku bsil nas
381b1(dkon brtsegs): na bza' bsnams pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas 'di skad du deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa la mchod pa cung
381b2(dkon brtsegs): zad bgyis pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang tha dad pa med pa'i gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
381b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i gcung 'di 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las mthus yongasu bzlas te/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag
381b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur nas/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen
381b5(dkon brtsegs): cing chags par gyur pa na yang mthus sred pa'i chu bo zab mo las yongasu bzlas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab po// 
381b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag khyed kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po mnyen ldan gyi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi lta ste/ de ni dge slong dga' bo 'di
381b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin no// 'dis sngon 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs sro khang du gshegs par gsol nas/ spos chu la sogs pas sku bsil te/ shin tu dang pas smon lam
381b8(dkon brtsegs): btab pa de'i dge ba'i rgyus/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung ngu gyur nas lus gser gyi kha dog ltar gyur pa dang / 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa lasangs mthus byung ste/ khyim nas khyim med par
382a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phyung nas mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu bde ba'i gnas phyin par gyur pa yin no// de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tshom du gyur
382a2(dkon brtsegs): nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu mngon par grub pa lags bcom
382a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag 'dis las mngon par 'dus byas pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher snga ma bzhin te/ sngon 'das pa'i dusu ri brags
382a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/  yo byad kyis brel pa med pa zhig gnas pa de la de bskyed mos tshal me tog dang 'bras bu rgyas shing chu mig
382a5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bab chu dang / ljong shing dang ldan pa rab tu byungaba'i dben gnas su 'os pa zhig yod de/ de'i tshe/ rang sangs rgyas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'jig
382a6(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung nas/ dben pa na gnas pa yod pas/ nam 'jig rten du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'di 'ba' shig bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur te/ de nas rang sangs rgyas
382a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig ljongs rgyu zhing / ri brag gi grong khyer der phyin nas/ phan tshun kun tu brtags te gnas btsal ba las de'i skyed mes tshal du phyin pa dang // skyed mos tshal de srung ba'i mis
382a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa de mthong nas/ bde bar gshegs sam mnyel bso ba'i slad du 'phags pa 'dir bzhugasu gsol zhes smras// des na nam gyi gung thun la me'i khams la snyoms
382b1(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa dang / bskyed mos tshal bsrung bI mri mthong nas 'di snyam du btsun pa chen po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i spyod pa mchog grub pa'o snyam du bsams nas/ de nas nu mo langs te/ 
382b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag ga la ba der song nas 'di skad du khyim bdag chen po dang dga' ba chen po bskyed cig/ bskyed mos tshal na 'phags pa zhig bdag gi thang du gshegs nas/ mtshan mo 'das
382b3(dkon brtsegs): pa las de ni spyod pa gya nom pa dang ldan zhing / rdzu 'phrul chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ 'od zer chen po bskye nas bskyed mos tshal gyi nang kun tu gsal bar byas so zhes smras
382b4(dkon brtsegs): pa khyim bdag gis thos nas/ myur zhing rings par bskyed mos tshal du song ste rkang gnyis la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du 'phags pa ni bseng snyoms bzhed
382b5(dkon brtsegs): pa lags la/ bdag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba la gas na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bskyed mos cha/ la 'dir bzhugaso gsol/ bdag gis rnam par
382b6(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang / des kyang de gus pas gsol ba btab par mthong nas khas blangs te bskyed mos tshal de'i nang du gnas nas/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa
382b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba rjesu myong bar gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na 'di snyam du bdag ni lus rus pa 'di ni 'khor bar 'khor ba las bdag gis gang bya ba de ni
382b8(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur pas/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs nas/ btan du mi skye ba mngon sum du bya ba rigs so snyam nas/ nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 
383a1(dkon brtsegs): me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bstan te/ 'od zer chen po bkye nas steng du 'bar ba dang cha ba dang / 'og tu chu
